7AWURADE bɛma w’atamfo a wɔsɔre tia woɔ adi nkoguo w’anim; wɔnam ɔkwan koro so bɛfiri abɛhyia wo, na wɔnam akwan nson so adwane w’anim. 8 AWURADE bɛhyɛ nhyira ama no aba wo so wɔ w’asan so ne adeɛ a wode wo nsa bɛka nyinaa mu, na ɔbɛhyira wo, asase a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de rema woɔ no so. 9 Sɛ wodi AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn mmara nsɛm so na wonante n’akwan so a, AWURADE de wo bɛgyina hɔ ayɛ ɔman kronkron afa, sɛdeɛ waka wo ntam no. 10Na asase so aman nyinaa bɛhunu sɛ wɔde AWURADE din na afrɛ woɔ, na wɔbɛsuro wo. 11Na AWURADE bɛma nnepa abu wo so wɔ wo yafunu mu aba mu ne w’afieboa aba mu ne w’asase so aba mu, asase a AWURADE kaa wo nananom ntam sɛ ɔde bɛma woɔ no so. 12 AWURADE bɛbue n’adepa korabea a ɛyɛ ɔsoro no ama wo, na atɔ w’asase so osuo ne berɛ mu, na wahyira wo nsa ano adwuma nyinaa; na wode bɛfɛm amanaman pii, na wo deɛ, woremfɛm obi hɔ biribi. 13Sɛ wotie AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn mmara nsɛm a merehyɛ wo nnɛ yi sɛ wobɛhwɛ ayɛ a, ɛnneɛ AWURADE bɛma woakɔ kan na worenka akyire, na wobɛkɔ soro ara, na woremmrɛ ase da; 14 Ne saa nti, mmane mfiri nsɛm a merehyɛ mo nnɛ yi mu biara ho nkɔ nifa anaa benkum nkɔdi anyame foforɔ akyi nkɔsom wɔn.
Asoɔden ho nnome
(Lewitikɔs 26.14-46)
15Nanso ɛbɛba sɛ, sɛ woantie AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn nne sɛ wobɛhwɛ ne mmara nsɛm ne n’ahyɛdeɛ a merehyɛ wo nnɛ yi ayɛ a, nnome yi nyinaa bɛba wo so abɛmene wo. 16Nnome bɛka wo, kuro mu, na nnome aka wo, wiram. 17Nnome bɛka wo kɛntɛn ne wo mmɔre kodoɔ. 18Nnome bɛka wo yafunu mu aba ne w’asase so aba, w’anantwie mma ne wo nnwan mma. 19Nnome bɛka wo, wo fieba mu, na nnome bɛka wo w’adifire mu.
20AWURADE bɛma nnome, benabɔ ne adapaabɔ aba wo so deɛ wode wo nsa bɛka ayɛ nyinaa mu de akɔsi sɛ wo bra bɔne nti wɔbɛdwɛre woɔ, na woasɛe ntɛm, ɛfiri sɛ woagya me. 21AWURADE bɛma ɔyaredɔm afam wo ho de akɔsi sɛ ɔbɛwie wo hyeɛ afiri asase a worekɔ so akɔfa no soɔ. 22 AWURADE de ɛfɔn, ɔfoɛ ne ahuhuro ne ahohyehyeɛ kɛseɛ ne nkrantɛ ne ɔhoɔ ne ɔpoɔ bɛbɔ wo, na ɛbɛti wo de akɔsi sɛ wobɛsɛeɛ. 23 Na ɔsoro bɛyɛ sɛ kɔbere mfrafraeɛ ama wo, na asase ayɛ sɛ dadeɛ ama wo. 24Na AWURADE bɛma mfuturo ne nso atɔ sɛ osuo ama no agu w’asase so de akɔsi sɛ wɔbɛsɛe woɔ.
25AWURADE bɛma woadi nkoguo wɔ w’atamfo anim: Wonam ɔkwan koro so bɛfiri akɔhyia wɔn, na wonam akwan nson so adwane wɔn anim, na wɔbɛto wo apete asase so ahennie nyinaa mu. 26Na wo funu bɛyɛ ewiem nnomaa nyinaa ne asase so mmoa aduane, na obiara renka wɔn. 27 AWURADE de Misraim mpɔmpɔ ne nsisiiwa ne ntutuiɛ ne ntwom a wɔrentumi nsa bɛbobɔ wo. 28AWURADE de adammɔ ne anifira ne akoma mu ahodwirie bɛbɔ wo. 29Na wobɛkeka awia ketee sɛdeɛ onifirani keka sum mu, na w’akwan renwie wo yie, na hyɛ nko na wɔbɛhyɛ wo afom wo afa daa nyinaa, na obiara rennye wo. 30 Wobɛgye ɔbaa aware, na obi ne no ada; wobɛsi dan, na worentena mu; wobɛtɛ bobeturo, na worente ɛso aba. 31Wɔbɛkum wo nantwie w’anim, na worenni bi; wɔbɛfa w’afunumu w’anim, na wɔrennane mma wo; wɔde wo nnwan bɛma w’atamfo, na worennya ɔgyefoɔ. 32Wɔde wo mmammarima ne wo mmammaa bɛma ɔman bi, na w’ani bɛhwɛ, na wɔn hwɛ ama w’ani atɔ sia daa nyinaa, ɛfiri sɛ tumi biara nni wo nsam. 33 W’asase so aba ne w’adwumadeɛ nyinaa, ɔman a wonni wɔn na wɔbɛdie, na hyɛ nko na wɔbɛhyɛ woɔ na wɔapɛkyɛ wo, nna nyinaa; 34na w’ani so adeɛ a wobɛhunu no bɛbɔ wo dam. 35AWURADE de akuro bɔne bɛbɔ wo wɔ nankoroma ne srɛ so a wɔrentumi nsa mma woɔ firi wo nan ase kɔsi w’atifi.
36 AWURADE de wo ne wo hene a wobɛsi no wo soɔ no bɛkɔ ɔman a wo ne wo nananom nnim soɔ, na ɛhɔ na wobɛsom anyame foforɔ, nnua ne aboɔ. 37 Na wobɛdane ahodwirideɛ ne kasabebuo ne ɛfene, aman a AWURADE de wo bɛkɔ soɔ no nyinaa mu. 38 Wode aba pii bɛfiri akɔ afuom, na ketewaa bi na wobɛboa ano aba mu, ɛfiri sɛ ntutummɛ bɛdi. 39Wobɛtɛ bobe nturo na woadɔ mu, na nsa deɛ, worennom, na woremmoa aba no ano, ɛfiri sɛ mmoa bɛdi. 40Wobɛnya ngodua w’asase nyinaa so, na ngo deɛ, worensra bi, ɛfiri sɛ wo ngodua no bɛpore agu. 41Wobɛwo mmammarima ne mmammaa, na wɔrenyɛ wo deɛ, ɛfiri sɛ wɔbɛkɔ nnommumfa mu. 42Wo nnua nyinaa ne w’asase so aba, mmɛbɛ bɛfa. 43Ɔhɔhoɔ a ɔwɔ wo mu bɛkɔ soro akyɛne wo ara, na wo deɛ, wobɛsiane aba famfamfam; 44 ɔno deɛ, ɔbɛfɛm wo adeɛ, na wo deɛ, worennya bi mfɛm no; ɔno bɛkɔ kan, na wo deɛ, woaka akyire. 45Na nnome yi nyinaa bɛba wo so abɛmene wo akɔsi sɛ wobɛsɛeɛ, ɛfiri sɛ woantie AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn nne sɛ wobɛdi ne mmara nsɛm ne n’ahyɛdeɛ a ɔhyɛɛ woɔ no soɔ. 46Na ɛbɛyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ ne anwanwadeɛ, wo ne w’asefoɔ ho daa.
47Ɛsiane sɛ woamfa anigyeɛ ne akoma pa ansom AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn w’ahonya mu nti, 48wobɛsom w’atamfo a AWURADE bɛsoma aba wo soɔ no, ɛkɔm ne sukɔm ne adagya ne nnoɔma nyinaa mu hia mu; na ɔde dadeɛ kɔnnua bɛto wo kɔn mu akɔsi sɛ ɔbɛsɛe woɔ. 49 AWURADE de ɔman bi bɛfiri akyirikyiri afiri asase ano aba wo so, ɔherɛ so, sɛdeɛ ɔkɔdeɛ tuo; ɔman a wonte wɔn kasa, 50 ɔman a wɔn ani yɛ den a wɔnhwɛ akɔkoraa anim na aberanteɛ nyɛ wɔn mmɔbɔ. 51Na wɔbɛdi wo mmoa mma ne w’asase so aba akɔsi sɛ wɔbɛsɛe woɔ, na wɔrennya w’aburoo, nsa anaa ngo, w’anantwie mma anaa wo nnwan mma, kɔsi sɛ wɔbɛsɛe woɔ. 52Na wɔbɛka wo ahyɛ mu wo nkuro apono nyinaa mu akɔsi sɛ w’afasuo atentene a ɛyɛ den a wode wo ho too soɔ no bɛdwiri aguo, w’asase nyinaa so, na wɔbɛka wo ahyɛ mu wo nkuro apono nyinaa mu, w’asase a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de ama woɔ no nyinaa so. 53 Na wobɛdi wo yafunu mu aba, wo mmammarima ne wo mma mmaa a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ama woɔ no nam, ahohiahia ne ahokyere a w’atamfo bɛma wo ho akyere woɔ no mu. 54Ɔbarima a ɔdwoɔ na ɔwɔ tema wɔ wo mu bɛnya ne nua ne ne kokom yerɛ ne ne mma nkaeɛ a wama no aka no ho anibɔne, 55sɛ ɔremma wɔn mu biara ne mma nam a ɔredie no bie, ɛfiri sɛ hwee nkae wɔ ne ho bio, — ahohiahia ne ahokyere a w’atamfo bɛma wo ho akyere woɔ, wo nkuro apono nyinaa mu no mu. 56Wo mu ɔbaa nso a ɔdwoɔ na ahodɔ ne mmerɛyɛ nti ɔnsɔ nhwɛɛ pɛn sɛ ɔde ne nan bɛsi fam no bɛnya ne kokom kunu ne ne babarima ne ne babaa ho anibɔne, 57na ɔbɛdi ne mma a wawo wɔn ne akyiriadeɛ wɔ kokoam, ɛsiane ahohiahia ne ahokyere a wo tamfo bɛma aba wo soɔ, wo nkuro apono nyinaa mu no nti.
58Sɛ worenhwɛ nyɛ mmara yi mu nsɛm a wɔatwerɛ no nwoma yi mu nyinaa na worensuro din a ɛwɔ animuonyam na ɛho yɛ hu yi a ɛne AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn no a, 59ɛnneɛ AWURADE bɛma wo haw ne w’asefoɔ haw ayɛ nwanwa, ɔhaw akɛseɛ a ɛkyɛreɛ ne nyarewa bɔne a ɛkyɛreɛ; 60 na ɔde Misraim nyarewa a wosuro no nyinaa no bɛba wo so, na abɛfemfam wo ho; 61nso yadeɛ biara ne ɔhaw biara a wɔntwerɛɛ no mmara yi nwoma mu no, AWURADE de bɛba wo so akɔsi sɛ wɔbɛsɛe woɔ. 62 Na mobɛka nnipa kakraa bi, nanso kane no na mo dodoɔ te sɛ ɔsoro nsoromma, ɛfiri sɛ woantie AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn nne. 63 Na sɛdeɛ AWURADE ani gyee mo ho sɛ ɔbɛyɛ mo yie na wama moadɔre no, saa ara nso na AWURADE ani bɛgye mo ho sɛ ɔbɛsɛe mo na wadwerɛ mo; na wɔbɛtutu mo afiri asase a morekɔ hɔ akɔdi soɔ no so. 64Na AWURADE bɛbɔ wo ahwete aman nyinaa mu afiri asase ano akɔsi asase ano, na ɛhɔ na wobɛsom anyame foforɔ a wo ne wo nananom nni wɔn a ɛyɛ nnua ne aboɔ; 65na amanaman no mu nso worennya ahodwoɔ, na w’anammɔn rennya home; ɛhɔ na AWURADE bɛma wo akoma a ɛtuo ne ani a ɛyɛ samoo ne ɔkra a ɛkusa; 66na wo nkwa bɛsɛne w’anim ahinhim, na wobɛsuro anadwo ne awia, na worennye wo nkwa nni. 67Na w’akoma mu suro a wobɛsuro ne w’ani so adeɛ a wobɛhunu nti, anɔpa wobɛka sɛ: Sɛ ɛyɛ anwummerɛ ɛ, na anwummerɛ nso wobɛka sɛ: Sɛ ɛyɛ anɔpa ɛ! 68 Na AWURADE de wo bɛsane afa ahyɛn mu akɔ Misraim wɔ ɔkwan a mekaa wo ɛho asɛm sɛ worenhunu bio no so; na ɛhɔ na mobɛtontɔn mo ho ama mo atamfoɔ sɛ nkoa ne mfenaa, na obiara rentɔ mo mpo.

Title: DEUTERONOMIUM 29
Content:
AWURADE apam
1 Yei ne apam a AWURADE hyɛɛ Mose sɛ ɔne Israelfoɔ mpam Moab asase so nka apam a ɔne wɔn pamm Horeb ho no mu nsɛm no ho.
2 Na Mose frɛɛ Israel nyinaa ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Mo ara moahunu deɛ AWURADE yɛɛ Farao ne ne nkoa nyinaa ne n’asase nyinaa mo ani so wɔ Misraim asase soɔ no nyinaa, 3nsɔhwɛ akɛseɛ a w’ani hunuiɛ, nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ ne anwanwadeɛ akɛseɛ no. 4 Nanso ɛde bɛsi nnɛ AWURADE mmaa mo saa akoma a ɛnim adeɛ, ani a ɛhunu adeɛ ne aso a ɛte asɛm. 5 Na mama moanante ɛserɛ so mfirinhyia aduanan; mo ntoma nsuu mo ho, na wo mpaboa ntetee wo nan ase; 6moanni paanoo na moannom bobesa ne nsa biara, na moahunu sɛ mene AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn. 7 Na moduruu ha yi no, Hesbon hene Sihon ne Basan hene Og firi ne yɛn bɛkoe, na yɛkumm wɔn; 8 na yɛfaa wɔn asase de maa Rubenfoɔ ne Gadfoɔ ne Manasefoɔ abusuakuo fa sɛ wɔnni so. 9Enti monhwɛ apam yi mu nsɛm nni so, na deɛ moyɛ nyinaa awie mo yie.
10Ɛnnɛ mo nyinaa mogyina AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn anim; mo atitire, mo mmusuakuo, mo mpanimfoɔ ne mo ahwɛfoɔ, Israel mmarima nyinaa; 11mo mma, mo yerenom ne wo hɔhoɔ a ɔwɔ wo nsraban mu, ɛfiri duabuni so kɔsi wo nsusafoɔ soɔ, 12sɛ wobɛhyɛne AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn apam ne ne nseɛ a ɔne wo repam na ɔredi nnɛ yi mu, 13sɛ nnɛ ɔde wo resi hɔ ayɛ ne man, na ɔno nso ayɛ wo Nyankopɔn, sɛdeɛ ɔka kyerɛɛ woɔ ne sɛdeɛ ɔkaa wo nananom Abraham, Isak ne Yakob ntam no. 14 Na ɛnyɛ mo nko na me ne mo repam yi na meredi nseɛ yi, 15na mmom me ne wɔn a wɔne yɛn gyina AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn anim ha nnɛ yi ne wɔn a wɔne yɛn nni ha nnɛ yi.
16Na mo ara monim sɛdeɛ yɛtenaa Misraim asase soɔ, ne sɛdeɛ yɛtwaa amanaman a mofaa wɔn mu baeɛ no mu; 17na mohunuu wɔn akyiwadeɛ ne wɔn nnua ne aboɔ ne dwetɛ ne sika ahoni a ɛwɔ wɔn mu no; 18 na monhwɛ yie, na ɔbarima bi anaa ɔbaa bi anaa abusua bi anaa abusuakuo bi antena mo mu a wɔn akoma redane nnɛ afiri AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn ho, sɛ worekɔ akɔsom amanaman no anyame no, na nhini bi antena mo mu a ɛso ɛborɔ ne ɔnwono; 19na sɛ ɔte nseɛ yi mu nsɛm no a, wanhyira ne ho n’akoma mu anka sɛ: Menam m’akoma denyɛ mu deɛ, nanso mɛnya asomdwoeɛ; na wɔansesa deɛ wanom ne deɛ sukɔm de no ammom. 20 AWURADE rempene mfa nkyɛ no, na ɛno de AWURADE abufuo ne ne ninkuntwe bɛpunu onipa ko no, na nseɛ a wɔatwerɛ no nwoma yi mu no nyinaa bɛduru no, na AWURADE bɛpepa ne din afiri asase so. 21Na AWURADE bɛyi no afiri Israel mmusuakuo nyinaa mu ama bɔne, sɛdeɛ apam a wɔatwerɛ no mmara nwoma yi mu no mu nseɛ no nyinaa teɛ. 22Na sɛ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛbɛba, mo mma a wɔbɛsɔre adi mo akyire, ne ɔnanani a ɔfiri akyirikyiri asase so bɛba no hunu asase yi haw ahodoɔ ne nyarewa a AWURADE de aba soɔ, 23 sɔfe ne nkyene, hyeɛ a asase no nyinaa ahyeɛ a wɔnnua so adeɛ na ɛnsoɔ, na wira biara mfifiri soɔ, sɛ Sodom ne Gomora, Adma ne Seboim butuo a AWURADE de n’abufuo ne n’abufuhyeɛ butuiɛ no a, wɔbɛka ho asɛm, 24na amanaman nyinaa bɛka sɛ: Adɛn nti na AWURADE ayɛ asase yi seyie? Abufuo kɛseɛ hyehyeɛ yi yɛ deɛn? 25Na wɔbɛka sɛ: Ɛfiri sɛ wɔagya AWURADE wɔn nananom Nyankopɔn apam a ɔyii wɔn Misraim asase soɔ no, ɔne wɔn pameeɛ no, 26na wɔakɔ akɔsom anyame foforɔ na wɔasɔre wɔn, anyame a wɔnni wɔn na ɛnyɛ ɔno na ɔde wɔn maa wɔn. 27Na AWURADE abufuo dɛre tiaa asase yi maa no de nnome a wɔatwerɛ no nwoma yi mu nyinaa baa so; 28enti na watutu wɔn afiri wɔn asase soɔ abufuo ne aboɔhyeɛ ne abohuro kɛseɛ mu na wato wɔn agu asase bi soɔ sɛdeɛ ɛteɛ nnɛ yi.
29 Nnoɔma a ahunta yɛ AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn dea, na deɛ wɔayi no adie no yɛ yɛn ne yɛn mma dea kɔsi daa, sɛ yɛnni mmara yi mu nsɛm nyinaa so.

Title: DEUTERONOMIUM 30
Content:
1 Na sɛ nsɛm yi nyinaa, nhyira ne nnome a mede masi w’anim yi ba wo so, na wokae wɔ amanaman a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn apamo wo akɔ hɔ no nyinaa mu, 2 na wosane ba AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn nkyɛn, na wo ne wo mma tie ne nne sɛdeɛ merehyɛ wo nnɛ yi nyinaa, mo akoma nyinaa ne mo kra nyinaa mu a, 3 ɛnneɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn bɛdane wo dommum no, na ne yam ahyehye no ama wo, na wasane aboa wo ano afiri aman a AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn apansam wo akɔ hɔ no nyinaa mu. 4Sɛ wo nnipa a wapamo wɔn no wɔ ɔsoro ano mpo a, ɛfiri hɔ na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn bɛboa wo ano, na ɛfiri hɔ na ɔbɛfa woɔ. 5Na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de wo bɛba asase a wo nananom dii soɔ no so, na woadi so, na wayɛ wo yie, na wama woadɔre akyɛne wo nananom. 6 Na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn bɛma wo ne w’asefoɔ akoma a ɛdwoɔ, na wode w’akoma nyinaa ne wo kra nyinaa adɔ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn na woanya nkwa. 7Na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn de nnome yi nyinaa bɛgu w’atamfo ne wɔn a wɔkyiri woɔ a wɔtaa woɔ no so. 8Na wo deɛ, wobɛsane abɛtie AWURADE nne, na woadi ne mmara nsɛm a merehyɛ wo nnɛ yi nyinaa so. 9Na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn bɛma woadi yie ama biribiara abu wo so, wo nsa ano adwuma nyinaa mu, wo yafunu mu aba mu ne wo mmoa mma mu ne w’asase so aba mu, ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE ani bɛgye wo ho bio, ama woadi yie sɛdeɛ n’ani gyee wo nananom ho no; 10sɛ wotie AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn nne, na wodi ne mmara nsɛm ne n’ahyɛdeɛ a wɔatwerɛ no mmara nwoma yi mu no so, na wode w’akoma nyinaa ne wo kra nyinaa sane ba AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn nkyɛn a!
11Na mmara nsɛm a merehyɛ wo nnɛ yi nnyɛ den mma wo, nanso ɛnni akyirikyiri; 12 ɛnni ɔsoro na woaka sɛ: Hwan na ɔbɛkɔ ɔsoro ama yɛn akɔfa abrɛ yɛn ama yɛate ayɛ? 13Na ɛnni po agya nso na woaka sɛ: Hwan na ɔbɛtwa po ama yɛn akɔfa abrɛ yɛn ama yɛate ayɛ? 14Na asɛm no bɛn wo papaapa, ɛwɔ w’anomu ne w’akoma mu sɛ di so.
15 Hwɛ, ɛnnɛ mede nkwa ne papa ɛne owuo ne bɔne masi w’anim, 16na merehyɛ wo nnɛ sɛ: Dɔ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn, nante n’akwan so, na di ne mmara nsɛm ne n’ahyɛdeɛ ne n’atemmudeɛ so, na woanya nkwa, na woadɔre, na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ahyira wo, asase a worekɔ so akɔdi soɔ no so. 17Na sɛ w’akoma dane na woantie, na woma wɔtwe wo kɔsɔre anyame foforɔ na wosom wɔn a, 18 mepae mu mekyerɛ mo nnɛ sɛ sɛeɛ na mobɛsɛeɛ, wo nna renkyɛre asase a woretwa Yordan akɔ so akɔdi soɔ no so. 19 Ɛnnɛ mefrɛ ɔsoro ne asase medi mo adanseɛ, sɛ mede nkwa ne owuo, nhyira ne nnome masi mo anim; enti fa nkwa, na wo ne w’asefoɔ nnya nkwa, 20na dɔ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn na tie ne nne na bata ne ho, ɛfiri sɛ ɛne wo nkwa ne wo nna dodoɔ, na woatena asase a AWURADE kaa wo nananom Abraham, Isak ne Yakob ntam sɛ ɔde bɛma wɔn no so.

Title: DEUTERONOMIUM 31
Content:
Yosua si Mose ananmu
(Numeri 27.12-23)
1Na Mose kɔ kɔkaa nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ Israel nyinaa. 2 Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Ɛnnɛ madi mfeɛ ɔha aduonu, me a mentumi nkɔ na me nso a mentumi mma; afei nso AWURADE aka akyerɛ me sɛ: Worentwa Yordan yi. 3 AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn, ɔno na ɔretwa adi w’anim, ɔno na ɔbɛsɛe amanaman yi afiri w’anim, na woadi wɔn so; Yosua na ɔretwa adi w’anim, sɛdeɛ AWURADE aka no. 4 Na AWURADE bɛyɛ wɔn sɛdeɛ ɔyɛɛ Amorifoɔ ahene Sihon ne Og a ɔsɛee wɔn no ne wɔn asase. 5 Na AWURADE de wɔn bɛhyɛ mo nsa na moayɛ wɔn sɛdeɛ mmara nsɛm a mahyɛ mo no nyinaa teɛ. 6Monyɛ den na monyɛ nnam, monnsuro na mommma wɔn ho nnyɛ mo hu, ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn no, ɔno na ɔne wo nam; ɔrempa wo na ɔrennya wo.
7 Na Mose frɛɛ Yosua, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no Israel nyinaa anim sɛ: Yɛ den na yɛ nnam, na wo na wode ɔman yi bɛkɔ asase a AWURADE kaa wɔn nananom ntam sɛ ɔde bɛma wɔn no soɔ, na wo na wobɛkyɛ ama wɔn. 8Na AWURADE, ɔno na ɔredi w’anim, ɔno na ɔbɛdi w’akyire, ɔrempa wo na ɔrennya wo; nsuro na mma w’akoma nntu.
Wɔnkenkan mmara no mfeɛ nson biara
9Na Mose twerɛɛ mmara yi, na ɔde maa asɔfoɔ no, Lewi mma a wɔsoa AWURADE apam adaka no, ne Israel mpanimfoɔ nyinaa. 10 Na Mose hyɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Daa mfirinhyia nson awieeɛ, Adekyɛ afe afahyɛ no mu, asese nnapɔnna no mu 11a Israel nyinaa aba rebɛpue AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn anim faako a ɔbɛkyerɛ no, kenkan mmara yi, Israel nyinaa anim gu wɔn aso mu. 12Na ɔman no mmarima ne mmaa, mmɔfra ne wo hɔhoɔ a ɔwɔ wo nkuro apono mu mmɔ dwa na wɔntie, na wɔnsua, nsuro AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn, na wɔnhwɛ mmara yi mu nsɛm nyinaa nni so: 13Na wɔn mma a wɔnnim no ntie, na wɔnsua, nsuro AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn, nna a mode te asase a moretwa Yordan akɔ so akɔdi soɔ no so no nyinaa.
AWURADE ka Israel asoɔden ho asɛm
14Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ: Hwɛ, wo nna a worebɛwuo no abɛn; frɛ Yosua bra, na mommɛgyina ntomadan no mu, na menhyɛ no mmara. Na Mose ne Yosua ba bɛgyinaa ahyiaeɛ ntomadan no mu. 15 Na AWURADE de mununkum dum bɛyii ne ho adi ntomadan no mu, na mununkum dum no bɛgyinaa ntomadan no ano. 16Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Mose sɛ: Hwɛ, worebɛti wo nananom wɔ asamando na ɔman yi bɛsɔre akɔdi asase a wɔrekɔ soɔ no anyame akyi adwamammɔ mu, na wɔagya me, na wɔato m’apam a me ne wɔn pameeɛ no. 17Na me bo bɛfu wɔn da no, na magya wɔn, na mayi m’ani ahunta wɔn, na wɔamene wɔn, na bɔne pii ne ahohiahia ahodoɔ bɛto wɔn ama wɔaka no da no sɛ: Ɛnyɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn a ɔnni yɛn mu nti na bɔne yi abɛto yɛn yi anaa? 18Na me deɛ, bɔne a wɔayɛ no nyinaa sɛ wɔamane akɔ anyame foforɔ nkyɛn nti, da no hunta na mede m’anim bɛhunta. 19 Na afei montwerɛ dwom yi mfa, na fa kyerɛkyerɛ Israelfoɔ; fa hyɛ wɔn anomu, na dwom yi nni me adanseɛ, Israelfoɔ mu. 20 Na mede wɔn duru asase a nufosuo ne ɛwoɔ sene wɔ soɔ a mekaa ho ntam mekyerɛɛ wɔn nananom no so a, wɔbɛdidi amee na wɔayɛ akɛseɛ, na wɔamane akɔ anyame foforɔ nkyɛn akɔsom wɔn, na wɔapo me na wɔato m’apam. 21 Na sɛ bɔne pii ne ahohiahia ahodoɔ bɛto wɔn a, dwom yi bɛyɛ danseni adi adanseɛ wɔ wɔn anim, ɛfiri sɛ ɛrempa wɔn asefoɔ anomu. Na menim wɔn adwene a wɔredwene nnɛ mpo, ansa na mede wɔn maduru asase a mekaa ho ntam no so. 22Na Mose twerɛɛ dwom yi da no ara, na ɔde kyerɛkyerɛɛ Israelfoɔ no.
23Na AWURADE hyɛɛ Nun ba Yosua sɛ: Yɛ den na yɛ nnam; na wo na wode Israelfoɔ bɛkɔ asase a mekaa wɔn ɛho ntam no soɔ: Na mɛdi w’akyi.
Mose de mmara no hyɛ Lewifoɔ nsa
24Na Mose twerɛɛ mmara yi mu nsɛm de hyɛɛ nwoma mu wiee koraa no, 25ɔhyɛɛ Lewifoɔ a wɔso AWURADE apam adaka no sɛ: 26Momfa mmara nwoma yi nto AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn apam adaka no ho, na ɛntena hɔ nni wo adanseɛ. 27Na me deɛ, menim w’atuateɛ ne wo kɔn a asene; hwɛ, meda so ne mo te ase nnɛ yi mpo moyɛ AWURADE anim atuatefoɔ, na me wuo akyiri ɛ!
28 Momma mo mmusuakuo mu mpanimfoɔ nyinaa ne mo ahwɛfoɔ mmɛbɔ me nkyɛn dwa, na menka nsɛm yi nyinaa ngu wɔn aso mu, na memfrɛ ɔsoro ne asase nni wɔn adanseɛ. 29Na menim sɛ me wuo akyiri no, sɛeɛ na mobɛsɛeɛ, na moamane afiri ɔkwan a mahyɛ mo no so, na bɔne abɛto mo daakye, ɛfiri sɛ mobɛyɛ AWURADE anim bɔne, na mode mo nsa ano adwuma bɛhyɛ no abufuo. 30Na Mose kaa dwom yi mu nsɛm guu Israel badwa no nyinaa aso mu de kɔsii sɛ ɔwieeɛ.

Title: DEUTERONOMIUM 32
Content:
Mose dwom no
1 Ɔsoro, monyɛ aso, na merebɛkasa,
na asase ntie m’anomu nsɛm!
2 Me nkyerɛkyerɛ nsosɔ sɛ nsuo,
na me kasa ngu sɛ obosuo,
sɛ wira so mfetema
ne nhahan so hasuo.
3Na AWURADE din na mɛbɔ.
Momfa anidie mma yɛn Nyankopɔn.
4Ɔbotan no, n’adeyɛ yɛ pɛ,
na n’akwan nyinaa yɛ tenenee;
ɔyɛ nokorɛ Nyankopɔn na nkontompo nni ne mu;
ɔteneneeni ne teefoɔ ne no.
5 Wɔadi no asɛmmɔne, wɔn nkekaeɛ nti wɔnna so nyɛ ne mma,
awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ kontonkye a wɔakyea.
6 AWURADE na motua no ka seyie yi?
Ɔman nkwaseafoɔ a wonni tire!
Ɛnyɛ ɔno ne w’agya a ɔnyaa woɔ?
Ɔno na ɔyɛɛ woɔ na ɔde wo tim hɔ.
7 Kae tete nteredee nna,
hwɛ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ dodoɔ no mfeɛ;
bisa w’agya na ɔnkyerɛ wo,
wo mpanimfoɔ, na wɔnka nkyerɛ wo.
8 Ɔsorosoroni no kyekyɛɛ asase maa amanaman,
ɔpaepaee Adam mma mu no,
ɔde aman no ahyeɛ totoo hɔ
sɛ Israelfoɔ ano sie.
9Na AWURADE kyɛfa ne ne man,
Yakob ne n’agyapadeɛ a wɔasusu ama no.
10 Ɔhunuu no anwea pradada asase so
ne nkyɛkyerɛ so,
ɛserɛ so mmoa werɛmfoɔ su mu; ɔtwaa ne ho hyiae,
ɔhwɛɛ ne so yie, ɔkoraa no sɛ n’aniwa kurutuawisi.
11 Sɛdeɛ ɔkɔdeɛ hwanyan ne buo
na ɔtu bɔ ne mma ho mpɛmpɛ no,
ɔtrɛɛ ne ntaban mu faa no,
ɔsoaa no ne ntakra so.
12AWURADE nko ara na ɔkyerɛɛ no kwan,
na anyame foforɔ biara anka ne ho.
13 Ɔmaa no faa asase sorɔnsorɔn so kɔe,
na ɔdii asase so nnɔbaeɛ;
na ɔmaa no fefee ɛwoɔ firii ɔbotan mu,
ne ngo firii abohemmaa mu,
14anantwie nufosuo ani sradeɛ, ne nnwan nufosuo,
nnwammuruwa sradeɛ,
ne Basan adwennini mpapo deɛ,
ne ayuo sawa mu sradeɛ,
na wonom bobe aba mu mogya gyenegyene.
15 Na Yesurum dɔree sradeɛ, na ɔtotoo anankotie;
woadɔre sradeɛ ayɛ kɛse, wo mu ayɛ duru;
na wagyaa Onyankopɔn a ɔyɛɛ no no,
na ɔbuu ne nkwagyeɛ botan no akumaa.
16Wɔde ananafoɔ anyame maa no twee ninkunu,
wɔde akyiwadeɛ huruu ne bo.
17Wɔbɔɔ afɔdeɛ maa abosom a wɔnyɛ Onyankopɔn,
anyame a wɔnni wɔn,
afoforɔ a ɛbaa akyire yi
na wɔn nananom amfɛre wɔn.
18Ɔbotan a ɔwoo woɔ no, woannwene ne ho,
na wo werɛ afiri Onyankopɔn a ɔkyem woo woɔ no.
19Na ne mmabanin ne ne mmammaa ho ahi nti
AWURADE hunuiɛ no, ɔpoo wɔn,
20na ɔkaa sɛ: Mɛyi m’ani mahunta wɔn,
mɛhwɛ deɛ wɔn akyiri bɛwie,
na awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ kontonkyi ne wɔn,
mma a nokorɛ nni wɔn mu.
21 Wɔn deɛ, wɔde deɛ ɛnyɛ Onyankopɔn maa metwee ninkunu,
wɔde wɔn adehuhuo yii me abufuo.
Na me nso mede deɛ ɛnyɛ ɔman bɛma wɔatwe ninkunu,
mede ɔman nkwaseafoɔ bi na ɛbɛyi wɔn abufuo.
22Na ogya asɔ m’abufuo mu,
na ɛredɛre akɔduru Asamando aseɛ,
na ɛrehye asase ne ne nnɔbaeɛ,
na ɛde ogya ato mmepɔ nnyinasoɔ mu.
23 Mɛboaboa mmusuo ano agu wɔn so,
mɛhwere m’agyan wɔ wɔn so.
24Ɛkɔm bɛfɔn wɔn,
na ahoɔhyeɛ yadeɛ yaya
bɛmene wɔn;
na mɛsoma mmoa se aba wɔn mu,
ne mfuturo mu awɔ borɔ.
25Nkrantɛ bɛfa wɔn mma abɔntene so,
na ehu aku wɔn mpia mu,
aberanteɛ ne ababaa,
akɔkoaa ne deɛ wafu ɛdwono nyinaa.
26Anka mese: Mɛhu wɔn agu,
mɛma wɔn nkaeɛ to atwa afiri nnipa mu,
27sɛ ɛnyɛ ɔtamfoɔ ahiyie na mesuro a,
na wɔn ahohiahiafoɔ annane me nsusuiɛ yi ani,
na wɔanka sɛ: Yɛn nsa na adi nkonim
na ɛnyɛ AWURADE na ɔyɛɛ yei nyinaa.
28 Na wɔyɛ ɔman a afotuo abɔ wɔn,
na nhunumu bi nni wɔn mu.
29Sɛ wɔyɛ anyansafoɔ a, anka wɔbɛte yei ase,
na wɔahunu wɔn awiekyire.
30 Sɛ ɛnyɛ wɔn botan na watɔn wɔn
na AWURADE ayi wɔn ama a,
anka ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na ɔbaakofoɔ bɛtaa apem,
na baanu ama mpemdu adwane?
31Ɛfiri sɛ wɔn botan nte sɛ yɛn botan,
na yɛn atamfoɔ mpo bu atɛn saa.
32Na Sodom bobe mu na wɔn bobe fire,
ɛne Gomora mfofowa so;
wɔn aba yɛ ɛborɔ aba,
wɔso esia esia a ɛyɛ nwono;
33wɔn nsa yɛ atweaseɛ borɔ
ne nhuritia borɔ a ano yɛ den.
34 Wɔnkoraa yeinom wɔ me nkyɛn,
na wɔnsɔɔ ano wɔ m’adekorabea?
35 Me na aweretɔ ne akatua wɔ me,
ɛberɛ a wɔn nan bɛwatiri no.
Na wɔn dwɛreɛ da abɛn,
na deɛ wɔahyɛ ama wɔn bɛba ntɛmntɛm.
36 Na AWURADE bɛbu ne man atɛn,
na ne nkoa bɛyɛ no mmɔbɔ,
berɛ a ɔbɛhunu sɛ wɔahodwo koraa,
na akoa anaa ɔdehyeɛ nni hɔ bio.
37Na ɔbɛka sɛ: Ɛhe na wɔn anyame no wɔ,
ɔbotan a wɔde wɔn ho too soɔ no?
38 Wɔn a wɔdii wɔn afɔdeɛ sradeɛ,
na wɔnom wɔn ahwiesa no?
Ma wɔnsɔre mmɛboa mo,
ma wɔnyɛ mo so nkatasoɔ.
39 Afei monhunu sɛ me ara mene no,
na onyame biara nka me ho.
Me na mekum, na mema nkwa,
mepira, na mesa,
na deɛ ɔbɛtumi agye afiri me nsam nni hɔ.
40 Na mema me nsa so mekɔ soro,
na mese: Sɛ mete ase daa yi!
41Sɛ mese me nkrantɛ nyinamnyinam no
na me nsa sɔ atemmuo mu a,
mɛtɔ wɔn a wɔne me di asie were,
na matua m’atamfoɔ ka.
42Mɛma m’agyan aboro mogya,
na me nkrantɛ adi nam,
atɔfoɔ ne nnommumfoɔ mogya,
ɔtamfoɔ tiri a apɛsɛ no.
43 Amanaman, mo ne ne man mmɔ anigyese,
ɛfiri sɛ ɔbɛtɔ ne nkoa mogya so were,
na ɔde aweretɔ bɛtua n’atamfo ka,
na wapata ama n’asase, ne man.
44Na Mose ba bɛkaa dwom yi mu nsɛm nyinaa guu ɔman no aso mu, ɔno ne Nun ba Yosua. 45Na Mose wiee Israel nyinaa nsɛm yi nyinaa ka no, 46 ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Momfa mo akoma nto nsɛm a meredi mo ho adanseɛ nnɛ yi so, na mode ahyɛ mo mma, sɛ wɔnhwɛ mmara yi mu nsɛm nyinaa nni so. 47 Na ɛnyɛ mo asɛnhunu, na mmom ɛne mo nkwa, na asɛm yi so na monam bɛma mo nna aware asase a moretwa Yordan akɔdi soɔ no so.
Onyankopɔn soma Mose Nebo bepɔ so
48Na AWURADE kasa kyerɛɛ Mose da no ara sɛ: 49 Kɔforo Abarim bepɔ yi, Nebo bepɔ a ɛwɔ Moab asase soɔ, Yeriko ntentensoɔ no, na kɔhwɛ Kanaan asase a mede merema Israelfoɔ sɛ wɔmfa no. 50 Na wu wɔ bepɔ a woreforɔ akɔ soɔ no so, na ti wo nananom wɔ asamando, sɛdeɛ wo nua Aaron wuu Hor bepɔ soɔ na ɔkɔkaa ne nananom ho no, 51 ɛfiri sɛ mofomm me Israelfoɔ mu, ɔham nsuo a ɛwɔ Kades, Sin serɛ soɔ ho, ɛsiane sɛ moanyɛ me kronkron Israelfoɔ mu. 52 Na wobɛhunu asase no w’anim, na korɔ deɛ, worenkɔ asase a mede merema Israelfoɔ no so hɔ.

Title: DEUTERONOMIUM 33
Content:
Mose hyira Israel
1 Na yei ne nhyira a Nyankopɔn nipa Mose de hyiraa Israelfoɔ ansa na ɔrewuo. Na ɔkaa sɛ: 2 AWURADE firi Sinai bae,
na ɔpue firii Seir maa wɔn,
ɔharan firii Paran bepɔ so;
ɔfiri akronkronfoɔ ɔpedu no mu na ɛbaeɛ,
ogya a ɛyɛ mmara ma wɔn wɔ ne nifa mu.
3Aane, ɔdɔ ne man,
n’akronkronfoɔ nyinaa wɔ ne nsam.
Na wɔn deɛ, wɔtete wo nan ase
na wɔtie w’asɛm.
4Mmara na Mose hyɛɛ yɛn,
Yakob badwa agyapadeɛ;
5 na ɔyɛɛ Yesurun mu hene,
ɛda a ɔman no atitire hyiaeɛ
na Israel mmusuakuo nyinaa hyiaa faako no.
6Ruben nnya nkwa na ɔnnwu,
na ne mmarima nso mma wɔn ase nhye.
7Na Yuda nso deɛ nie, ɔse:
O AWURADE, tie Yuda nne,
na fa no kɔ ne man nkyɛn;
ma wo nsa nko mma no,
na yɛ no ɔboafoɔ firi n’ahohiahiafoɔ nsam.
8 Na Lewi ho deɛ, ɔkaa sɛ:
Wo nokorɛ ne wo hann wɔ wo hotefoɔ no,
deɛ wosɔɔ no hwɛɛ Masa hɔ
na wo ne no ham Meriba asuo ho no.
9 Ɔno a ɔkaa wɔ n’agya ne ne na ho sɛ:
Menni wɔn!
Na wammu ne nuanom,
na ɔpoo ne mma.
Na wɔdi wo nsɛm so,
na wɔkora w’apam;
10wɔde w’atemmudeɛ bɛkyerɛ Yakob,
na wɔde wo mmara akyerɛ Israel;
wɔde aduhwam bɛtua wo hwene ano,
na wɔde afɔdeɛ amuamu abɛgu w’afɔrebukyia so.
11AWURADE, hyira n’ahonyadeɛ so,
ma ne nsa ano adwuma nsɔ w’ani;
bobɔ wɔn a wɔsɔre tia no no dwonku,
ne wɔn a wɔtane no, na wɔansɔre bio.
12Benyamin ho nso, ɔkaa sɛ:
AWURADE dɔfo bɛtena ne nkyɛn dwoodwoo;
ɔkata ne so daa nyinaa,
na ɔbɛtena ne mmatiri so.
13Na Yosef ho nso, ɔkaa sɛ:
AWURADE nhyira n’asase;
ɔmma no ɔsoro nnepa,
obosuo ne ebunu a ɛtrɛtrɛ aseɛ no deɛ,
14ne owia mu nnɔbaeɛ nnepa,
ne deɛ asrane ma no fifire mu nnepa,
15ne tete mmepɔ atifi
ne daapem nkokoɔ nnepa,
16 ne asase ne ne mayɛ mu nnepa,
na deɛ ɔte nkyɛkyerɛ no mu no anisɔ;
ɔmma no mmra Yosef atifi,
ne ne nuanom mu hotuafoɔ no mpampam.
17Ne nantwinini abakan, animuonyam wɔ no,
na n’abɛn yɛ ɛkoɔ abɛn;
ɛno na ɔde bɛsunsum aman nyinaa
aguo akɔduru asase ano.
Na wɔn ne Efraim apedu no,
Manase mpempem ne no.
18Na Sebulon ho nso, ɔkaa sɛ:
Sebulon, ma w’ani nnye w’adifire mu,
ne Isakar, wo ntomadan mu.
19Wɔbɛfrɛ aman akɔ bepɔ no so,
ɛhɔ na wɔbɛbɔ tenenee afɔdeɛ;
na wɔbɛfefe ɛpo mu mmorosoɔ
ne anwea mu ademudeɛ a ahunta.
20Na Gad ho nso, ɔkaa sɛ:
Nhyira ne deɛ ɔtrɛ Gad mu;
ɔbutu hɔ sɛ gyatabereɛ,
ɔtete basa ne mpampam;
21 ɔno na ɔyii deɛ ɛdi kan faeɛ,
na ɛhɔ na wɔakora mmarahyɛfoɔ no kyɛfa;
na ɔnam di ɔman no atitire mu,
ɔyɛ AWURADE teneneedeɛ
ne n’atemmudeɛ wɔ Israel.
22Na Dan ho nso, ɔkaa sɛ:
Dan yɛ gyataburuwa,
ɔhuri firi Basan.
23Na Naftali ho nso, ɔkaa sɛ:
Naftali a anisɔ amee no
na AWURADE nhyira ayɛ no ma,
fa ɛpo ne ahuhuro asase no di so.
24Na Aser ho nso, ɔkaa sɛ:
Ma wɔmfa mma nhyira Aser,
ɔnyɛ deɛ ɔsɔ ani ne nuanom mu,
na ɔmfa ne nan mmɔ ngo mu.
25Dadeɛ ne kɔbere mfrafraeɛ nyɛ w’adaban,
sɛ wo nna teɛ no, saa na w’ahoɔden nyɛ.
26 Obi nni hɔ a ɔte sɛ Yesurun Nyankopɔn!
Ɔnam soro di boa wo,
ɔde ne kɛseyɛ nam mununkum mu.
27Tete Nyankopɔn ne wo tenabea,
na aseɛ na daapem abasa no wɔ.
Na ɔbɛpamo ɔtamfoɔ w’anim,
na waka sɛ: Dwɛre wɔn.
28 Na Israel bɛtena hɔ dwoodwoo,
Yakob asubura no nkutoo,
ɔbɛtena aburoo ne nsa asase so;
ne soro nso bɛsosɔ obosuo.
29 Nhyira ne wo, Israel, hwan na ɔte sɛ woɔ,
ɔman a wɔanya AWURADE mu nkwagyeɛ!
Ɔyɛ wo mmoa kyɛm,
na ɔyɛ wo kɛseyɛ nkrantɛ.
W’atamfo bɛwae ama wo,
na wo deɛ, wobɛtiatia wɔn sorɔnsorɔmmea so.

Title: DEUTERONOMIUM 34
Content:
Mose wuo
1 Na Mose firii Moab mpaperɛ mu foro kɔɔ Nebo bepɔ so, Pisga atifi, wɔ Yeriko ntentensoɔ, na AWURADE maa no hunuu Gilead asase nyinaa de kɔsii Dan, 2ne Naftali nyinaa ne Efraim ne Manase asase ne Yuda asase nyinaa de kɔsii akyiri po no ho; 3ne Negeb asase ne mpaperɛ a ɛyɛ, nkyiresua kuro Yeriko bonhwa no de kɔsii Soar. 4 Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Yei ne asase a mekaa ho ntam mekyerɛɛ Abraham, Isak ne Yakob sɛ: W’asefoɔ na mede bɛma wɔn no. Mama wode w’ani ahunu, na ɛkorɔ deɛ, worenkɔ hɔ.
5 Na AWURADE akoa Mose wuu wɔ hɔ, Moab asase so sɛdeɛ AWURADE kaeɛ no. 6 Na ɔsiee no bonhwa mu Moab asase so, Bet-peor ntentensoɔ. Na obiara nnim ne damena de bɛsi nnɛ. 7Na Mose wuiɛ no, na wadi mfirinhyia ɔha aduonu. N’ani anyɛ kusukusu, na n’ahoɔden so anhwan. 8Na Israelfoɔ suu Mose, Moab mpaperɛ mu adaduasa, na wɔdii Mose su ne ne gyam nna no wiee.
9Na nyansa honhom yɛɛ Nun ba Yosua ma, ɛfiri sɛ Mose de ne nsa guu ne so; na Israelfoɔ tiee no, na wɔyɛɛ sɛdeɛ AWURADE hyɛɛ Mose no.
10Na odiyifoɔ bi ansɔre Israel mu bio a ɔte sɛ Mose a AWURADE ne no nyaa nkitahodie a emu dɔ yie. 11Saa Mose yi na AWURADE somaa no sɛ ɔnkɔyɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ ne anwanwadeɛ nyinaa wɔ Farao ne ne nkoa nyinaa anim wɔ Misraim asase soɔ. 12Afei nso ɛnam Mose so na ahudeɛ akɛseɛ nyinaa da adi wɔ Israel nyinaa anim.

Title: YOSUA NHYƐNMU
Content:
NHYƐNMU
Yosua nwoma no mu nsɛm fa di a Yosua dii Israelfoɔ anim kɔtoaa Kanaanfoɔ ne wɔn koeɛ. Yosua yi na ɔdii Mose adeɛ. Nsɛm titire a wɔka ho asɛm bi ne twa a wɔtwaa Asubɔnten Yordan, Yeriko sɛeɛ, Ai ko no ne Onyankopɔn apam a ɔne ne nkurɔfoɔ yɛeɛ no ntimu. Asɛm a wɔnim no yie koraa wɔ saa nwoma yi mu ne, “Ɛnneɛ, ɛnnɛ monyi deɛ mobɛsom no mfa, sɛ anyame a mo agyanom someeɛ a wɔwɔ asuogya no oo, sɛ Amorifoɔ a mote wɔn asase so yi anyame oo, na me ne me fie deɛ, yɛbɛsom AWURADE” 24.15.
EMU NSƐM
Wɔdi Kanaanfoɔ so nkonim 1.1—12.24
Asase no kyɛ 13.1—21.45
1. Yordan apueeɛ fam asase 13.1-33
2. Yordan atɔeɛ fam asase 14.1—19.51
3. Dwanekɔbea nkuro no 20.1-9
4. Lewifoɔ nkuro no 21.1-45
Apueeɛ fam mmusuakuo no sane kɔ wɔn asase so 22.1-34
Yosua nkradie nsɛm 23.1-16
Wɔhyɛ apam no mu den wɔ Sekem 42.1-33

Title: YOSUA 1
Content:
Onyankopɔn yi Yosua na ɔkyerɛ no deɛ ɔnyɛ
1Na AWURADE akoa Mose wuo akyiri no, AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Nun ba Yosua, Mose somfoɔ no sɛ: 2 M’akoa Mose awu; afei sɔre twa Yordan yi, na wo ne ɔman mu yi nyinaa nkɔ asase a mede merema wɔn, Israelfoɔ, no so.
3 Baabiara a mo nan bɛtia no, mo na mede mama mo, sɛdeɛ meka mekyerɛɛ Mose no, 4ɛfiri serɛ no so ne Lebanon yi ho de kɔsi asu kɛseɛ no, Asubɔntene Eufrate ano, Hetifoɔ asase nyinaa de kɔsi ɛpo kɛseɛ no ano wɔ deɛ owia kɔtɔ hɔ na ɛnyɛ mo hyeɛ.
5 Obiara biara rentumi nnyina w’anim, wo nkwa nna nyinaa; sɛdeɛ medii Mose akyire no, saa ara na mɛdi w’akyire; merempa wo na merennya wo. 6 Wo ho nyɛ den na yɛ nnam, na wo na wobɛkyɛ asase a mekaa wɔn agyanom ntam sɛ mede bɛma wɔn no mu ama ɔman yi. 7 Wo ho ara na ɛnyɛ den na yɛ nnam pa, na hwɛ di mmara a mehyɛɛ m’akoa Mose no nyinaa so; mfiri ho nkɔ nifa anaa benkum, na deɛ wobɛkorɔ nyinaa woadi yie. 8 Mma mmara nwoma yi mmfiri w’anomu, na dwene ho awia ne anadwo, na woahwɛ ayɛ sɛ deɛ wɔatwerɛ no wɔ mu nyinaa teɛ no: Na ɛno na wo kwan bɛyɛ dwoodwoo, na ɛno na ɛbɛsi wo yie. 9Menhyɛɛ wo sɛ yɛ den na yɛ nnam, nsuro, na mma w’akoma nntu anaa? Ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn di w’akyi deɛ wokorɔ nyinaa.
10Ɛnna Yosua hyɛɛ ɔman no ahwɛfoɔ no sɛ: 11Momfa nsraban no mu, na monhyɛ ɔman no sɛ: Monsiesie akwansoduane nsie, na ɛha yi nnansa morebɛtwa Yordan yi akɔfa asase a AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn de rema mo sɛ monni soɔ no.
12Na Rubenfoɔ ne Gadfoɔ ne Manase abusuakuo fa no deɛ, Yosua ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: 13 Monkae asɛm a AWURADE akoa Mose hyɛɛ mo sɛ: AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn de mo atena ase, na ɔde asase yi ama mo; 14mo yerenom, mo mma ne mo mmoakuo ntena asase a Mose de maa mo Yordan agya yi so, na mo deɛ, monni mo nuanom anim amia mu, akofoɔ nyinaa, na monni mmoa wɔn, 15nkɔsi sɛ AWURADE de mo nuanom bɛtena ase sɛ mo, na wɔn nso wɔbɛdi asase a AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn de rema wɔn no so ansa na moasane aba mo sodie asase no so abɛdi so, sɛ AWURADE akoa Mose de maa mo, Yordan agya owiapueeɛ hɔ no. 16Na wɔbuaa Yosua sɛ: Deɛ woahyɛ yɛn nyinaa, yɛbɛyɛ, na baabiara a wosoma yɛn no, yɛbɛkɔ. 17Sɛdeɛ yɛtiee Mose, ade nyinaa mu no, saa ara na yɛbɛtie woɔ; die na AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn nni w’akyire, sɛdeɛ ɔdii Mose akyire no. 18 Obiara a ɔbɛte w’anomu asɛm ho atua na ɔrentie wo nsɛm, deɛ wobɛhyɛ yɛn nyinaa mu no, wɔnku no. Den ara nko na wo ho nyɛ, na yɛ nnam.

Title: YOSUA 2
Content:
Rahab gye akwansrafoɔ no
1 Na Nun ba Yosua somaa mmarima asrafoɔ baanu firi Sitim ahuntaeɛ mu sɛ: Monkɔ nkɔhwɛ asase no ne Yeriko. Na wɔsii mu kɔe, na wɔduruu ɔbaa dwamamfoɔ bi a wɔfrɛ no Rahab fie, na wɔdaa hɔ. 2Na obi kɔka kyerɛɛ Yeriko hene no sɛ: Hwɛ, mmarima bi a wɔfiri Israelfoɔ no mu aba ha anadwo yi rebɛsra asase yi. 3Na Yeriko hene no soma maa wɔkɔɔ Rahab nkyɛn sɛ: Yi mmarima a wɔaba wo nkyɛn na wɔabɛhyɛne wo fie no firi adi, na wɔbaa asase yi nyinaa nsra. 4Na ɔbaa no faa mmarima baanu no de wɔn huntae; na ɔkaa sɛ: Ɛwom, mmarima no baa me nkyɛn deɛ, nanso mennim deɛ wɔfire; 5na esum duruiɛ a wɔrebɛto kuro pono no mu no, na mmarima no firii adie; mennim deɛ wɔkorɔ. Monti wɔn ntɛm, na mobɛto wɔn. 6Na ɔno deɛ, na ɔde wɔn akɔ ɛdan atifi na ɔde wɔn akɔhunta ɛsowa a ɔde aboa ɛdan no atifi no ase. 7Na mmarima no tii wɔn faa Yordan kwan so de kɔɔ atwaeɛ; na wɔn a wɔtii wɔn no firii adie ara pɛ, na wɔtoo kuro pono no mu.
8Na wɔn deɛ, wɔnnya nkɔdaeɛ no, ɔbaa no foro kɔɔ wɔn nkyɛn ɛdan no atifi 9 kɔka kyerɛɛ mmarima no sɛ: Menim sɛ AWURADE de asase yi ama mo, na mo ho hu atɔ yɛn so, na asase yi sotefoɔ nyinaa akoma tu mo anim. 10 Na yɛate sɛdeɛ mo Misraim fire mu no AWURADE maa Mmɛwa Po mu nsuo wee wɔ mo anim ne deɛ moyɛɛ Amorifoɔ ahemfo baanu a wɔwɔ Yordan agya no, Sihon ne Og a mosɛee wɔn pasapasa no. 11 Na yɛteeɛ no, yɛn akoma tuiɛ, na home bi rensɔre bio obiara mu wɔ mo anim, ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn no, ɔno ne Onyankopɔn wɔ nyameso ɔsoro ne asase so ɛfam. 12 Na afei monka me AWURADE ntam sɛ, sɛ mayɛ mo yie yi, mo nso mobɛyɛ m’agya fie yie, na momma me nokorɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ, 13na momma m’agya ne me na ne me nuammarimanom ne me nuammaanom ne deɛ wɔwɔ nyinaa nnya nkwa, na monyi yɛn mfiri owuo mu. 14Na mmarima no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Yɛn kra nsi mo ananmu nwu, sɛ woanka yɛn asɛm yi ankyerɛ, na ɛba sɛ AWURADE de asase yi ma yɛn a, yɛne wo bɛdi no adɔeɛ ne nokorɛ so.
15Ɛnna ɔbaa no de ntampehoma twetwee wɔn faa mpomma mu sisii fam, na na ne dan si kuro no ho fasuo so, na ɔfasuo no so na ɔteɛ. 16Na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Bepɔ so na monkorɔ, na atifoɔ no anto mo, na monhunta hɔ nnansa nkɔsi sɛ atifoɔ no bɛsane, na ɛno akyiri no moakɔ mo kwan. 17Na mmarima no ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Yɛbɛdi bem afiri ntam a womaa yɛkaeɛ yi ho. 18Hwɛ, sɛ yɛreba asase yi so a, fa asaawa kɔkɔɔ homa yi kyekyere mpomma a wode yɛn faa mu sii fam no mu. Na boa w’agya ne wo na ne wo nuanom ne w’agya fiefoɔ nyinaa ano wo nkyɛn wɔ efie ha, 19na obiara a ɔbɛfiri adi afiri wo fie pono ano akɔ abɔntene soɔ no, ne mogya bɛgu n’atifi, na yɛn deɛ, yɛadi bem; na obiara a ɔwɔ wo nkyɛn efie no, sɛ obi de ne nsa ka no a, ne mogya ngu yɛn atifi. 20Na sɛ woka yɛn asɛm yi kyerɛ a, ɛno nso yɛbɛdi bem afiri ntam a womaa yɛkaeɛ no ho. 21Na ɔkaa sɛ: Ɛnyɛ sɛdeɛ mo nsɛm yi teɛ. Na ɔgyaa wɔn kwan na wɔkɔe; na ɔde homa kɔkɔɔ no kyekyeree mpomma no mu. 22Ɛnna wɔsii mu kɔduruu bepɔ no soɔ, na wɔdii hɔ nnansa kɔsii sɛ atifoɔ no saneeɛ. Na atifoɔ no hwehwɛɛ wɔn ɔkwan no so nyinaa, nanso wɔanhu wɔn.
23Na mmarima baanu no siane firii bepɔ no so, na wɔtwa baa Nun ba Yosua nkyɛn, na wɔkaa deɛ ɛyɛɛ wɔn nyinaa kyerɛɛ no, 24 na wɔka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: Ampa ara, AWURADE de asase no nyinaa ahyɛ yɛn nsa, na afei nso asase no sofoɔ nyinaa akoma atu wɔ yɛn anim.

Title: YOSUA 3
Content:
Wɔtwa Yordan
1 Ɛnna Yosua sɔree anɔpahema, na wɔtu firii Sitim, na wɔduruu Yordan ano, ɔno ne Israelfoɔ nyinaa, na wɔdaa hɔ ansa na wɔretwa. 2Na nnansa wiee duro no, ahwɛfoɔ no kyinii nsraban no mu, 3kɔhyɛɛ ɔman no sɛ: Sɛ mohunu AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn apam adaka no ne Lewifoɔ asɔfoɔ a wɔso no a, mo nso montu mfiri deɛ mowɔ, na monni akyire; 4nanso monsusu ɔkwan bɛyɛ sɛ basafa apem nto mo ne no ntam, mommmɛn no, sɛdeɛ ɛbɛyɛ na moahunu kwan ko a mobɛfa soɔ, ɛfiri sɛ momfaa ɔkwan yi so pɛn. 5 Na Yosua ka kyerɛɛ ɔman no sɛ: Monte mo ho, na ɔkyena AWURADE bɛyɛ mo mu anwanwadeɛ. 6 Na Yosua ka kyerɛɛ asɔfoɔ no sɛ: Monsoa apam adaka no nsene nni ɔman no anim. Na wɔsoaa apam adaka no dii ɔman no anim.
7 Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: Ɛnnɛ da yi na mɛfiri aseɛ mayɛ wo kɛseɛ Israel nyinaa ani soɔ, na wɔahunu sɛ, sɛdeɛ medii Mose akyire no, saa ara na mɛdi w’akyire. 8Na wo deɛ, hyɛ asɔfoɔ a wɔso apam adaka no sɛ: Sɛ moduru Yordan nsuo no ano a, monnyina Yordan mu.
9Na Yosua ka kyerɛɛ Israel mma no sɛ: Montwe mmra ha, na montie AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn nsɛm. 10Ɛnna Yosua kaa sɛ: Yei na mode bɛhunu sɛ Onyankopɔn teasefoɔ no wɔ mo mu, na pamo na ɔbɛpamo Kanaanfoɔ ne Hetifoɔ ne Hewifoɔ ne Perisifoɔ ne Girgasifoɔ ne Amorifoɔ ne Yebusifoɔ no afiri mo anim. 11Hwɛ, asase nyinaa wura apam adaka no redi w’anim akɔ Yordan mu. 12Na afei momfa mmarima dummienu mfiri Israel mmusuakuo no mu, abusuakuo biara mu nipa baako. 13Na sɛ asɔfoɔ a wɔso AWURADE, asase nyinaa wura adaka no anammɔn ka Yordan nsuo no ara pɛ a, Yordan mu nsuo a ɛresiane firi atifi ba no bɛtwa, na abɔ kuo agyina hɔ.
14Na ɔman no tu firii wɔn ntomadan mu sɛ wɔrekɔtwa Yordan, na asɔfoɔ a wɔso apam adaka no dii ɔman no anim, 15na wɔn a wɔso adaka no duruu Yordan ano, na asɔfoɔ a wɔso adaka no nan sii nsuo no mu ara pɛ, (nso na Yordan yiri kata ne nsunoa nyinaa ayutwaberɛ nna nyinaa), 16 ɛnna nsuo a ɛfiri atifi ba no gyina bɔɔ kuo baako wɔ akyirikyiri, wɔ Adam, kuro a ɛwɔ Saretan nkyɛn no ho; na nsuo a ɛsiane kɔ mpaperɛ mu po a ɛne Nkyene-po no mu no twa wiee koraa. Na ɔman no twae, Yeriko ntentensoɔ. 17Na asɔfoɔ a wɔso apam adaka no gyinaa asase pɛsɛɛ so Yordan mfimfini pintinn, na Israel nyinaa nam asase pɛsɛɛ so twa de kɔsii sɛ ɔman mu no nyinaa wiee Yordan twa.

Title: YOSUA 4
Content:
Wɔsi nkaeɛ dum
1Na ɔman mu no nyinaa twaa Yordan wieeɛ no, AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: 2Monyiyi ɔman no mu mmarima dummienu, abusuakuo biara mu onipa baako, 3na monhyɛ wɔn sɛ: Montase aboɔ dummienu mfiri Yordan mfimfini ha mfiri deɛ asɔfoɔ no nan gyinaa pintinn hɔ, na momfa ntwa, na monkɔgya no mo asoɛeɛ a mobɛsoɛ hɔ anadwo yi. 4Ɛnna Yosua frɛɛ mmarima dummienu a ɔyii wɔn firii Israelfoɔ mu no, abusuakuo biara mu onipa baako. 5Na Yosua ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Monsene nni AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn adaka no anim nkɔ Yordan mfimfini, na montase aboɔ mmaako mmaako mmobɔ mo kɔn ho, sɛdeɛ Israelfoɔ mmusuakuo no ano sie, na yei ayɛ mo mu nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ. 6 Sɛ mo mma bisa mo ɔkyena bi sɛ: Mode aboɔ yi kyerɛ deɛn? 7Monka nkyerɛ wɔn sɛ: Ɛkyerɛ sɛ Yordan nsuo no twae, AWURADE apam adaka no anim; ɛtwaa Yordan no, Yordan nsuo no twae; na aboɔ yi nyɛ nkaeɛ mma Israelfoɔ nkɔsi daa.
8Na Israelfoɔ no yɛɛ saa, sɛdeɛ Yosua hyɛeɛ no, na wɔtasee aboɔ dummienu Yordan mu, sɛdeɛ AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Yosua no, sɛ Israelfoɔ mmusuakuo no ano sie, na wɔde twa baa wɔn asoɛeɛ, na wɔgyaa no hɔ. 9Na Yosua memaa aboɔ dummienu nso so sisii Yordan mu, deɛ asɔfoɔ a wɔso apam adaka no nan sisiiɛ hɔ, na ɛwɔ hɔ de bɛsi nnɛ.
10Na asɔfoɔ a wɔso adaka no gyinaa Yordan mu ara de kɔsii sɛ wɔwiee asɛm a AWURADE hyɛɛ Yosua sɛ ɔnka nkyerɛ ɔman no nyinaa sɛ Mose hyɛɛ Yosua no nyinaa.
Na ɔman no yɛɛ ntɛm twae. 11Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔman no nyinaa wiee twa no, na AWURADE adaka no nso twaeɛ, na asɔfoɔ no kɔdii ɔman no anim. 12 Na Ruben mma ne Gad mma ne Manase abusuakuo fa no miae twa kɔdii Israelfoɔ no anim, sɛdeɛ Mose ka kyerɛɛ wɔn no, 13nnipa bɛyɛ mpemaduanan a wɔasiesie wɔn ho ama ɔko na ɛtwa dii AWURADE anim kɔɔ ɔsa, Yeriko mpaperɛ soɔ. 14 Da no ara na AWURADE pagyaa Yosua, Israel nyinaa ani so, na wɔsuroo no sɛdeɛ wɔsuroo Mose no, ne nkwa nna nyinaa.
15Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: 16Hyɛ asɔfoɔ a wɔso adanseɛ adaka no, na wɔmforo mfiri Yordan mu. 17Na Yosua hyɛɛ asɔfoɔ no sɛ: Momforo mfiri Yordan mu. 18Na asɔfoɔ a wɔso AWURADE apam adaka no foro firii Yordan mu na asɔfoɔ no anammɔn bɛsii asase pɛsɛɛ soɔ ara pɛ, na Yordan mu nsuo no sane baa n’afa, na ɛbɛkataa ne nsunoa nyinaa sɛdeɛ na ɛteɛ kane no.
19 Na ɔman no foro firii Yordan mu bosome a ɛdi kan no da a ɛtɔ so du, na wɔkyeree nsraban Gilgal, Yeriko apueeɛ hyeɛ so. 20Na aboɔ dummienu a wɔtase firii Yordan mu no, Yosua de sisii Gilgal. 21 Na ɔka kyerɛɛ Israelfoɔ no sɛ: Sɛ ɔkyena bi mo mma bisa wɔn agyanom sɛ: Aboɔ yi kyerɛ deɛn? 22Momma mo mma nhunu sɛ asase pɛsɛɛ so na Israel fa de twaa Yordan yi, 23 sɛ AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn wee Yordan nsuo no mo anim kɔsii sɛ motwaeɛ, sɛdeɛ AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn yɛɛ Mmɛwa Po no a ɔweeɛ no yɛn anim kɔsii sɛ yɛtwaeɛ no, 24na asase so aman nyinaa ahunu AWURADE nsa sɛ ɛyɛ den, na moasuro AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn.

Title: YOSUA 5
Content:
1 Na Amorifoɔ ahene a wɔwɔ Yordan agya atɔeɛ fam no nyinaa ne Kanaan ahemfo a wɔwɔ ɛpo ano no nyinaa tee sɛ AWURADE awe Yordan nsuo Israelfoɔ no anim akɔsi sɛ wɔtwaeɛ no, wɔn akoma tui a na ɔhome bi nni wɔn mu bio Israelfoɔ no anim.
Ɔman twetiatwa ne Twam afahyɛ
2 Saa berɛ no ara na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: Yɛ twerɛboɔ asekan, na sane twitwa Israelfoɔ no twetia a ɛtɔ so mmienu. 3Na Yosua yɛɛ twerɛboɔ asekan de twitwaa Israelfoɔ no twetia Aaralot kokoɔ so. 4Na deɛ enti a Yosua twitwaa wɔn twetia ne sɛ: Ɔman no a wɔfiri Misraim baeɛ no mu mmarima nyinaa, akofoɔ no nyinaa wuwuu kwan mu wɔ serɛ so, wɔfiri Misraim firiiɛ no akyi. 5Nanso ɔman no a wɔfiri Misraim firiiɛ no akyire wɔwoo wɔn kwan mu wɔ serɛ soɔ no nyinaa deɛ, na wɔntwitwaa wɔn twetia. 6 Mfirinhyia aduanan na Israelfoɔ no nantee ɛserɛ soɔ kɔsii sɛ akofoɔ a wɔfiri Misraim baeɛ no nyinaa saa korakora, ɛfiri sɛ wɔantie AWURADE nne maa AWURADE kaa wɔn ntam sɛ wɔrenhunu asase a AWURADE kaa wɔn agyanom ntam sɛ ɔde bɛma yɛn no, asase a ɛsene nufosuo ne ɛwoɔ no. 7Na wɔn mma na ɔmaa wɔsɔre sii wɔn ananmu; wɔn na Yosua twitwaa wɔn twetia, na wɔyɛ momonoto, ɛfiri sɛ wɔantwitwa wɔn twetia ɔkwan no mu. 8Na wɔwiee ɔman mu no nyinaa twetiatwa no, wɔtenaa wɔn tenabea hɔ nsraban no mu kɔsii sɛ wɔn ho tɔɔ wɔn. 9Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: Ɛnnɛ mamuni Misraim nsopa afiri mo so. Ɛno nti wɔfrɛɛ hɔ Gilgal de bɛsi nnɛ yi ara.
10 Na Israelfoɔ no kyeree nsraban Gilgal, na wɔdii Twam no, bosome no da a ɛtɔ so dunan no anwummerɛ, Yeriko mpaperɛ so. 11Na Twam no akyi, adeɛ kyeeɛ no, da no ara, na wɔdii asase no so aduane, apiti ne nkyeweɛ.
Nyankopɔn bɔfoɔ no
12 Na mana no to twae firi da a wɔdii asase no so aduane no, adeɛ kyeeɛ, na Israelfoɔ no annya mana bio, na wɔdii Kanaan asase no so nnɔbaeɛ afe no ara mu.
13 Na Yosua wɔ Yeriko ho no, ɔmaa n’ani so hwɛe, na hwɛ, ɔbarima bi gyina ne ntentensoɔ kura nkrantɛ a watwe. Na Yosua kɔɔ ne nkyɛn kɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Wowɔ yɛn afa anaa yɛn atamfoɔ afa? 14 Na ɔse: Dabi, na afei na maba sɛ AWURADE dɔm so safohene. Na Yosua de n’anim butuu fam sɔree no, na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na me wura reka akyerɛ n’akoa? 15 Na AWURADE dɔm so safohene no ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: Yi wo mpaboa firi wo nan, na deɛ wogyina hɔ yɛ kronkron. Na Yosua yɛɛ saa.

Title: YOSUA 6
Content:
Yeriko tua
1Na Yeriko deɛ, na wɔato mu na wɔabram ano Israelfoɔ no anim. Obi mfiri adi, na obi mma mu. 2Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: Hwɛ, mede Yeriko ne ne hene ne akofoɔ no mahyɛ wo nsa. 3Na montwa kuro no ho nhyia; akofoɔ no nyinaa ntwa ho nhyia prɛko. Saa ara na yɛ no nnansia. 4 Na asɔfoɔ baason nkurakura osebɔ ntotorobɛnto nson mfa nni adaka no anim, na ɛda a ɛtɔ so nson no, montwa kuro no ho nhyia mprɛnson, na asɔfoɔ no nhyɛne ntotorobɛnto no. 5Na sɛ wɔhyɛne osebɔ abɛn no na mote totorobɛnto no nne a, ɔman no nyinaa nhuro mmɔ ose kɛseɛ, na kuro no ho fasuo no bɛhwe fam tim, na ɔman no mforo nkɔ wɔn anim tee. 6Na Nun ba Yosua frɛfrɛɛ asɔfoɔ no, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Monsoa apam adaka no, na asɔfoɔ baason nkurakura osebɔ ntotorobɛnto nni AWURADE adaka no anim. 7Na wɔka kyerɛɛ ɔman no sɛ: Monsene nkɔtwa kuro no ho nhyia, na wɔn a wɔamia no nsene nni AWURADE adaka no anim.
8Na Yosua ka kyerɛɛ ɔman no no, asɔfoɔ baason a wɔkurakura osebɔ ntotorobɛnto no sene dii AWURADE anim na wɔhyɛnee ntotorobɛnto no, na AWURADE apam adaka no dii wɔn akyi. 9Na wɔn a wɔamia no dii asɔfoɔ a wɔhyɛne ntotorobɛnto no anim, na kyidɔm no dii adaka no akyi; wɔnam na wɔrehyɛne ntotorobɛnto no ara. 10Na ɔman no deɛ, Yosua hyɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Mommmɔ ose, na mommma wɔnnte mo nne, na asɛm biara mmfiri mo anomu de kɔsi da a mɛse mo sɛ mommɔ ose no ansa na moabɔ ose. 11Na AWURADE adaka no twaa kuro no ho hyiaa prɛko, na wɔbaa nsraban mu bɛdaa hɔ.
12Na Yosua sɔree anɔpahema, na asɔfoɔ no soaa AWURADE adaka no. 13Na asɔfoɔ baason no kurakura osebɔ ntotorobɛnto nson no de di AWURADE adaka no anim, wɔnam na wɔrehyɛne ntotorobɛnto no ara, na wɔn a wɔamia no dii wɔn anim, na kyidɔm no dii AWURADE adaka no akyi, wɔnam na wɔrehyɛne ntotorobɛnto no. 14Na da a ɛtɔ so mmienu no, wɔtwaa kuro no ho hyiaa prɛko, na wɔsane baa nsraban no mu. Wɔyɛɛ saa nnansia.
15Na da a ɛtɔ so nson no, adeɛ rekye pɛ, na wɔtuaa nhema sɔree ntɛm, na wɔtwaa kuro no ho hyiaa saa ara mprɛnson; da no nko ara na wɔtwaa kuro no ho hyiaa mprɛnson. 16Na ɛbaa sɛ deɛ ɛtɔ so nson no soɔ a asɔfoɔ no rehyɛne ntotorobɛnto no no, Yosua ka kyerɛɛ ɔman no sɛ: Mommɔ ose, ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE de kuro no ama mo. 17 Na kuro no nyɛ ahyiradeɛ, ɛno ne emu ade nyinaa mma AWURADE; odwamamfoɔ Rahab nko ara na ɔnnya nkwa, ɔno ne wɔn a wɔwɔ ne nkyɛn ne ne fie nyinaa, ɛfiri sɛ ɔno na ɔde abɔfoɔ a yɛsomaa wɔn no huntaeɛ. 18 Mo ho yie ara na monhwɛ ahyiradeɛ no ho, na moanhyira so na moamfa ahyiradeɛ no bi, na moamfa Israel nsraban no anyɛ ahyiradeɛ amma amaneɛ amma so. 19Na dwetɛ ne sika, ne kɔbere mfrafraeɛ ne dadeɛ nnoɔma nyinaa nyɛ kronkron mma AWURADE, na wɔmfa mmra AWURADE adekorabea. 20 Ɛnna ɔman no bɔɔ ose na wɔhyɛnee ntotorobɛnto no. Na ɛbaa sɛ ɔman no tee ntotorobɛnto no nne no, ɔman no huro bɔɔ ose kɛseɛ, na ɔfasuo no hwee fam tim, na ɔman no foro kɔɔ kuro no mu, wɔn nyinaa kɔɔ wɔn anim tee, na wɔfaa kuro no. 21Na wɔde nkrantɛ ano sɛee deɛ ɛwɔ kuro no mu nyinaa pasapasa, mmarima ne mmaa, mmɔfra ne mpanin, anantwie ne nnwan ne mfunumu.
22 Na mmarima baanu a wɔkɔsraa asase no deɛ, Yosua ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Monkɔ ɔbaa dwamamfoɔ no fie nkɔfa ɔbaa no ne deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa mfiri hɔ, sɛdeɛ mokaa no ntam no. 23 Na mmeranteɛ akwansrafoɔ no kɔe, na wɔde Rahab ne n’agya ne ne na ne ne nuanom ne deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa firi bae, na wɔde n’abusua nyinaa firii adi bɛgyaa wɔn Israel nsraban no akyi. 24Na kuro no deɛ, wɔde ogya hyee ɛne deɛ ɛwɔ mu nyinaa. Emu dwetɛ ne sika, ne kɔbere mfrafraeɛ ne dadeɛ nnoɔma nko na wɔde bɛguu AWURADE fie adekorabea no mu. 25 Na odwamamfoɔ Rahab ne n’agya fie ne deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa deɛ, Yosua gyee wɔn nkwa, na ɔtenaa Israel mu de bɛsi nnɛ, ɛfiri sɛ ɔde abɔfoɔ a Yosua soma maa wɔkɔsraa Yeriko no huntae.
26 Na Yosua kaa ntam saa berɛ no sɛ:
Nnome nka onipa a ɔbɛsɔre
abɛkyekyere Yeriko kuro yi, AWURADE anim:
Ɔde n’abakan na ɛbɛhyɛ aseɛ,
na ɔde ne ba akumaa na ɛbɛsisi ano apono.
27Na AWURADE dii Yosua akyi, na wɔtee ne nka asase no nyinaa so.

Title: YOSUA 7
Content:
Wɔkum Israelfoɔ wɔ Ai. Wɔkum Akan
1Na Israelfoɔ no too ahyiradeɛ no ho mmara, na Sera ba Sabdi ba Karmi ba Akan a ɔfiri Yuda abusuakuo mu no faa ahyiradeɛ no bi, na AWURADE bo fuu Israelfoɔ no. 2Na Yosua somaa mmarima bi firi Yeriko kɔɔ Ai a ɛwɔ Bet-awen ho, Betel apueeɛ, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Monkɔ nkɔsra asase no. Na mmarima no kɔ kɔsraa Ai. 3Na wɔsane baa Yosua nkyɛn bɛka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Mma ɔman no nyinaa mmforo nnkɔ; na mmarima bɛyɛ mpennu anaa mpensa nkɔbɔ Ai, nha ɔman no nyinaa mma wɔnnkɔ hɔ, na wɔsua. 4Na ɔman no mu bɛyɛ mpensa foro kɔɔ hɔ, nanso wɔdwane firii Ai mmarima no anim. 5Na Ai mmarima no kunkumm wɔn mu nnipa bɛyɛ aduasa nsia, na wɔtaa wɔn Ai kuro pono no akyi de kɔɔ Sebarim, na wɔbobɔɔ wɔn asianee no mu. Na ɔman no akoma tui, na ɛyɛɛ sɛ nsuo.
6Na Yosua sunsuanee ne ntadeɛ mu, na ɔde n’anim butuu fam, AWURADE adaka no anim de kɔsii anwummerɛ, ɔno ne Israel mpanimfoɔ, na wɔde dɔteɛ guguu wɔn atifi. 7Na Yosua kaa sɛ: AWURADE Nyankopɔn, adɛn nti na wode ɔman yi twaa Yordan sɛ wode yɛn rebɛhyɛ Amorifoɔ nsa na wɔasɛe yɛn? Yɛnim a, anka yɛpene tenaa Yordan agya hɔ ara. 8Wo kyɛw nie, AWURADE, sɛ Israel adane wɔn akyiri akyerɛ wɔn atamfoɔ yi, ɛdeɛn na menka? 9 Na Kanaanfoɔ ne asase yi sofoɔ nyinaa bɛte, na wɔabɛtwa yɛn ho ahyia, na wɔatwa yɛn din afiri asase so: Na ɛdeɛn na wobɛyɛ ama wo din kɛseɛ no?
10Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: Sɔre ɛ, adɛn nti na wode w’anim abutu fam seyie? 11Israel ayɛ bɔne, wɔato m’apam a mehyɛɛ wɔn ho mmara no nso, na wɔafa ahyiradeɛ no bi nso, na wɔabɔ korɔno nso, na wɔasi so nso, na wɔde asie wɔn adeɛ mu nso. 12Na Israelfoɔ no rentumi nnyina wɔn atamfoɔ anim, wɔn akyiri na wɔbɛdane akyerɛ wɔn atamfoɔ, ɛfiri sɛ wɔayɛ ahyiradeɛ. Merenkɔ so menni mo akyi, gye sɛ moyi ahyiradeɛ no hɔ firi mo mu. 13 Sɔre te ɔman no ho na ka sɛ: Monyɛ mo ho kronkron nsie ɔkyena; na sɛ AWURADE, Israel Nyankopɔn no seɛ nie: Ahyiradeɛ wɔ wo mu, Israel! Worentumi nnyina w’atamfo anim kɔsi sɛ mobɛyi ahyiradeɛ no afiri mo mu. 14Enti anɔpa, wɔmfa mo mpinkyɛ mmusuakuo mmusuakuo. Na abusuakuo a AWURADE bɛkyerɛ no ntwe mpini mmusua mmusua, na abusua a AWURADE bɛkyerɛ no ntwe mpini afie, na efie a AWURADE bɛkyerɛ no mu mmarima ntwe mpini mmaako mmaako. 15Na deɛ wɔbɛkye no ahyiradeɛ no ho no, wɔmfa ogya nhye no ne deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa, sɛ wato AWURADE ntam, na wayɛ nkwaseadeɛ Israel mu.
16 Ɛnna Yosua sɔree anɔpahema, na ɔde Israel pinkyɛe abusuakuo abusuakuo. Na wɔkyeree Yuda abusuakuo. 17 Na ɔde Yuda mmusua pinkyɛe, na wɔkyeree Serafoɔ abusua. Na ɔde Serafoɔ abusua mu mmarima pinkyɛe mmaako mmaako, na wɔkyeree Sabdi. 18Na ɔde ne fie mmarima pinkyɛe mmaako mmaako, na wɔkyeree Sera ba Sabdi ba Karmi ba Akan a ɔfiri Yuda abusuakuo mu. 19Na Yosua ka kyerɛɛ Akan sɛ: Me ba, fa animuonyam ma AWURADE, Israel Nyankopɔn, na di no ni, na ka kyerɛ me ɛ: Ɛdeɛn na woyɛeɛ? Nsi me so. 20Na Akan buaa Yosua sɛ: Nokorɛ, me na mayɛ AWURADE, Israel Nyankopɔn no, bɔne, na sɛɛ ne sɛɛ na meyɛeɛ. 21Mehunuu asadeɛ no mu Sinear ngusoɔ fɛfɛ bi ne dwetɛ nnwetɛbena ahanu ne sika dame baako a ano si nnwetɛbena aduonum, na m’ani beree, na mefae; na hwɛ, ɛhyɛ fam me ntomadan mu, na dwetɛ no wɔ aseɛ.
22Ɛnna Yosua somaa abɔfoɔ, na wɔde mmirika kɔɔ ntomadan no mu, na hwɛ, na ɛhyɛ ne ntomadan no mu, na dwetɛ no hyɛ aseɛ. 23Na wɔyi firii ntomadan no mu de brɛɛ Yosua ne Israelfoɔ no nyinaa, na wɔde bɛguu AWURADE anim. 24Ɛnna Yosua faa Sera ba Akan, ne dwetɛ ne ngusoɔ ne sika dame no, ne ne mmammarima ne ne mmammaa, ne n’anantwie ne ne mfunumu ne ne nnwan, ne ne ntomadan ne deɛ ɔwɔ nyinaa, na Israel nyinaa ka ne ho, na wɔde wɔn foro kɔɔ Akor bonhwa mu. 25Na Yosua kaa sɛ: Adɛn na woaha yɛn saa yi? AWURADE bɛha wo nnɛ da yi. Na Israel nyinaa sii no aboɔ, na wɔde ogya hyee wɔn, na wɔde aboɔ guu wɔn so. 26 Na wɔhɔree ne so abosie kɛseɛ a ɛwɔ hɔ de bɛsi nnɛ yi. Na AWURADE dane firii n’abufuhyeɛ no ho. Ɛno nti wɔfrɛ hɔ sɛ Akor bonhwa de bɛsi nnɛ yi.

Title: YOSUA 8
Content:
Wɔdi Ai so nkonim
1Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: Nsuro, na mma w’akoma nntu. Fa akofoɔ dɔm no nyinaa ka wo ho, na sɔre foro kɔ Ai: Hwɛ, mede Ai hene ne ne man ne ne kuro ne n’asase mahyɛ wo nsa. 2 Na yɛ Ai ne ne hene sɛdeɛ woyɛɛ Yeriko ne ne hene no: Emu asadeɛ ne mmoa nko na momfom mfa. Fa atɛfoɔ ma wɔnkɔtɛ kuro no akyiri mma wo.
3Na Yosua sɔree, ɔno ne akofoɔ dɔm no nyinaa sɛ wɔreforo akɔ Ai. Na Yosua yiyii mmarima akofoɔ mpem aduasa, na ɔgyaa wɔn kwan anadwo. 4Na ɔhyɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Monhwɛ, monkɔtɛ kuro no, kuro no akyiri nohoa; mommma mo ne kuro no ntam nnware bebree, na mo nyinaa nnyina ahoboa mu. 5Na me deɛ, me ne nnipa a wɔka me ho no nyinaa bɛtwe apini kuro no; na sɛ wɔfiri adi bɛhyia yɛn sɛ akane no a, yɛbɛdwane afiri wɔn anim; 6 na wɔbɛfiri adi abɛdi yɛn akyi akɔsi sɛ yɛbɛtwe wɔn afiri kuro no mu; na wɔbɛka sɛ: Wɔredwane afiri yɛn anim sɛ akane no; enti yɛbɛdwane afiri wɔn anim. 7Na mo deɛ, monsɔre mfiri ɔtɛ no mu, na momfa kuro no, na AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn de bɛhyɛ mo nsa. 8Na sɛ monya fa kuro no a, monto kuro no mu gya; monyɛ no sɛdeɛ AWURADE ahyɛ no; monhwɛ, hyɛ na mahyɛ mo no. 9Ɛnna Yosua gyaa wɔn kwan, na wɔsii mu kɔe kɔtɛe. Na wɔtenaa Betel ne Ai ntam, Ai atɔeɛ fam; na Yosua daa ɔman no mu anadwo no.
10Na Yosua sɔree anɔpahema siesiee ɔman no, na ɔno ne Israel mpanimfoɔ foro dii ɔman no anim kɔɔ Ai. 11Na akofoɔ dɔm a wɔka ne ho nyinaa foro kɔe, na wɔtwe pinii, na wɔduruu kuro no ntentensoɔ, na wɔbɔɔ nsraban Ai atifi fam, na bonhwa wɔ wɔn ne Ai ntam. 12Na ɔde nnipa bɛyɛ mpemnum kɔtetɛɛ Betel ne Ai ntam, kuro no atɔeɛ fam. 13Na wɔde dɔm no sisii, ɛdɔm a wɔwɔ kuro no atifi fam ne akyire atɛfoɔ no a ɛwɔ kuro no atɔeɛ fam no nyinaa; na Yosua kɔɔ bonhwa no mu anadwo no ara. 14Na Ai hene hunuiɛ no, ɔne ne man nyinaa, kuro no mu mmarima no, yɛɛ ntɛm tuaa ahema kɔɔ deɛ wɔahyɛ hɔ, mpaperɛ no anim, sɛ wɔrebɛhyia Israel ne wɔn ako; nso na ɔnnim sɛ wɔretɛ no kuro no akyi. 15Na Yosua ne Israel nyinaa maa wɔpamm wɔn wɔn anim, na wɔdwane faa ɛserɛ so kwan so. 16Ɛnna wɔteaa mu frɛɛ ɔman a wɔwɔ kuro no mu nyinaa sɛ wɔmmɛti wɔn; na wɔtii Yosua, na wɔtwee wɔn firii kuro no mu. 17Na ɔbarima biara anka Ai ne Betel a wamfiri adi ankɔdi Israel akyire; na wɔgyaa kuro no hɔ maa ano daa hɔ kɔdii Israel akyi.
18Ɛnna AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: Tene pea a ɛwɔ wo nsam no kyerɛ Ai, na mede bɛhyɛ wo nsa. Na Yosua tenee ne pea a ɛwɔ ne nsam no kyerɛɛ kuro no. 19Ɛnna atɛfoɔ no sɔree ntɛm firii wɔn afa hɔ, na ɔtenee ne nsa no, wɔtutuu mmirika kɔhyɛnee kuro no mu na wɔfae, na wɔyɛɛ ntɛm de ogya too kuro no mu. 20Na Ai mmarima no danedanee wɔn ani hwɛɛ wɔn akyiri no, na hwɛ, na kuro no mu wisie retu kɔ soro, na wɔnnya kwan nnwane nkɔ ha anaa ha. Na nnipa a wɔdwane kɔɔ ɛserɛ soɔ no danedanee wɔn ho tiaa atifoɔ no.
21Na Yosua ne Israel nyinaa hunuu sɛ atɛfoɔ no afa kuro no, na kuro no mu wisie retu kɔ soro no, wɔsanee wɔn akyi bɛkunkumm Ai mmarima no. 22Na yeinom nso firii adi firii kuro no mu bɛhyiaa wɔn, na wɔtɔɔ Israel ntam, yeinom wɔ ha, na yeinom nso wɔ ha; na wɔkunkumm wɔn ara kɔsii sɛ wɔn mu anikanfoɔ anaa odwanefoɔ biara anka. 23Na Ai hene no, wɔkyeree no animono, na wɔde no brɛɛ Yosua.
24Na Israel wiee Aifoɔ nyinaa kum wɔ ɛserɛ so petee mu, faako a wɔbɛtii wɔn no, na wɔn nyinaa totɔɔ nkrantɛ ano kɔsii sɛ wɔsaeɛ no, Israel nyinaa sane kɔɔ Ai de nkrantɛ ano kunkumm wɔn. 25Na nnipa a wɔtotɔɔ da no nyinaa, mmarima ne mmaa yɛ mpem dummienu, Aifoɔ nyinaa. 26 Na Yosua antwe ne nsa a ɔde tenee ne pea no de kɔsii sɛ wɔsɛee Aifoɔ nyinaa pasapasa. 27Kuro no mu mmoa ne asadeɛ nko na Israel fom faeɛ, sɛ AWURADE asɛm a ɔde hyɛɛ Yosua no teɛ no. 28Na Yosua hyee Ai na ɔyɛɛ no daa amamfo sie de bɛsi nnɛ yi. 29 Na Ai hene no deɛ, ɔsɛnee no dua so kɔsii anwummerɛ; na owia kɔtɔeɛ no, Yosua hyɛɛ sɛ wɔnkɔyi ne funu no mfiri dua no so, na wɔde no too kuro no pono ano, na wɔhɔree ne so aboɔsie kɛseɛ a ɛwɔ hɔ bɛsi nnɛ yi.
Yosua si afɔrebukyia, na ɔtwerɛ mmara no gu aboɔ so
30 Ɛnna Yosua kɔsii afɔrebukyia maa AWURADE Israel Nyankopɔn Ebal bepɔ soɔ, 31sɛdeɛ AWURADE akoa Mose hyɛɛ Israelfoɔ no sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ no Mose mmara nwoma no mu no, afɔrebukyia a wɔde aboɔ amuamu a obi mmaa dadeɛ so wɔ so pɛn asie; na wɔbɔɔ so ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ maa AWURADE, na wɔkunkumm asomdwoeɛ afɔdeɛ. 32Na aboɔ no so hɔ na ɔtwerɛɛ Mose mmara ntimu a ɔtwerɛɛ no Israelfoɔ anim no. 33 Na Israel nyinaa ne wɔn mpanimfoɔ ne ahwɛfoɔ ne wɔn atemmufoɔ gyinaa adaka no ho ha ne ha, asɔfoɔ Lewifoɔ a wɔso AWURADE apam adaka no anim, ɔhɔhoɔ ne ɔmanba nyinaa. Wɔn mu fa wɔ Gerisim bepɔ ntentensoɔ, na ɔfa nso wɔ Ebal bepɔ ntentensoɔ, sɛdeɛ AWURADE akoa Mose hyɛɛ sɛ wɔnhyira ɔman Israel kane no. 34Na ɛno akyiri no, ɔkenkanee mmara mu nsɛm no nyinaa, nhyira no ne nnome no, sɛdeɛ wɔatwerɛ no nwoma no mu nyinaa. 35Deɛ Mose hyɛeɛ no nyinaa mu asɛm biara nni hɔ a Yosua ankenkan no Israel dwabɔ nyinaa ne mmaa ne mmɔfra ne ɔhɔhoɔ a ɔnam wɔn mu no anim.

Title: YOSUA 9
Content:
Gibeonfoɔ ne Yosua yɛ apam
1Na ahemfo a wɔwɔ Yordan agya ha fam mmepɔ so nyinaa ne Sefela mpaperɛ so ne ɛpo kɛseɛ no ano nyinaa de kɔ Lebanon ntentensoɔ, Hetifoɔ ne Amorifoɔ, Kanaanfoɔ ne Perisifoɔ ne Hewifoɔ ne Yebusifoɔ no teeɛ no, 2wɔbɛhyia boaa wɔn ano yɛɛ nokorɔ sɛ wɔne Yosua ne Israel rebɛko.
3 Na Gibeonfoɔ tee deɛ Yosua yɛɛ Yeriko ne Ai no, 4wɔn deɛ, wɔdii no nyansam na wɔkɔpɛɛ akwansoduane, na wɔfaa mmɔtɔ adada de soasoaa wɔn mfunumu ne nsa nkotokuo adada a asunsuane na wɔapempam. 5Na wɔde mpaboa adada a wɔasesa kyekyeree wɔn nan, na wɔhyehyɛɛ ntadeɛ agoago, na wɔn kwan so paanoo nyinaa akyenkyen na abobɔ atuo. 6Na wɔsii mu baa Yosua nkyɛn nsraban mu wɔ Gilgal bɛka kyerɛɛ no ne Israel mmarima no sɛ: Akyirikyiri asase bi so na yɛfiri baeɛ, na afei mo ne yɛn nyɛ apam. 7 Na Israel mmarima no ka kyerɛɛ Hewifoɔ no sɛ: Ebia yɛn mu na woteɛ; na ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na yɛne wo bɛyɛ apam? 8Ɛnna wɔka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: Wo nkoa ne yɛn. Na Yosua ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Hwannom ne mo, na ɛhe na mofire? 9Na wɔse: AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn no din nti na wo nkoa firi akyirikyiri asase bi so aba, ɛfiri sɛ yɛate ne nka ne deɛ ɔyɛɛ no Misraim nyinaa 10 ne deɛ ɔyɛɛ Amorifoɔ ahemfo baanu a wɔwɔ Yordan agya no, Hesbon hene Sihon ne Basan hene Og a ɔtenaa Astarot no. 11Na yɛn mpanimfoɔ ne yɛn asase no sofoɔ nyinaa ka kyerɛɛ yɛn sɛ: Momfa akwansoduane na monkɔ nkɔhyia wɔn, na monka nkyerɛ wɔn sɛ: Mo nkoa ne yɛn, na afei mo ne yɛn nyɛ apam. 12Yɛn paanoo nie, ɛda a yɛresim aba mo nkyɛn no, yɛfaa no hyehyeɛ de firii yɛn afie mu, sɛ yɛrebɛdi no ɔkwan so; na afei, monhwɛ, akyenkyen na abobɔ atuo. 13Na nsa nkotokuo yi a yɛhyehyɛɛ no amaama na ɛyɛ foforɔ no, hwɛ, asunsuane, na ɔkwan no ware a ɛware pii nti yɛn ntadeɛ ne yɛn mpaboa yi asusu. 14 Na mmarima no faa wɔn akwansoduane no bi, na AWURADE anomu asɛm deɛ, wɔammisa. 15 Na Yosua ne wɔn dii no asomdwoeɛ mu, na ɔne wɔn yɛɛ apam sɛ wɔbɛma wɔatena ase; na asafo no mu mmapɔmma kekaa wɔn ntam.
16Na wɔne wɔn yɛɛ apam no akyiri nnansa no, wɔtee sɛ wɔbɛn wɔn na wɔte wɔn mu. 17Na Israelfoɔ tui, na wɔkɔtoo wɔn nkuro da a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa no; na wɔn nkuro ne Gibeon ne Kefira ne Beerot ne Kiriat-yearim. 18Na Israelfoɔ no anku wɔn, ɛfiri sɛ asafo no mu mmapɔmma akeka wɔn AWURADE Israel Nyankopɔn no ntam. Na asafo no nyinaa nwiinwii tiaa mmapɔmma no. 19Na mmapɔmma no nyinaa ka kyerɛɛ asafo no nyinaa sɛ: Yɛaka wɔn AWURADE Israel Nyankopɔn ntam, enti ɛnsɛ sɛ yɛka wɔn. 20 Yei na yɛbɛyɛ wɔn, na yɛama wɔatena ase, na ntam a yɛkaa wɔn no nti, abufuo amma yɛn so. 21Na mmapɔmma no ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Wɔntena ase, na wɔnyɛ nnuatwafoɔ ne nsusafoɔ mma asafo no nyinaa, sɛdeɛ mmapɔmma no ka kyerɛɛ wɔn no.
22Na Yosua frɛɛ wɔn bae, na ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Adɛn nti na modaadaa yɛn kaa sɛ: Yɛne mo ntam ware pa ara, nanso mote yɛn mu yi? 23Enti afei wɔadome mo, na mo mu na nkoa ne nnuatwafoɔ ne nsusafoɔ a wɔbɛyɛ adwuma ama ne Nyankopɔn fie no bɛfire daa. 24Na wɔbuaa Yosua sɛ: Ampa ara, wɔka kyerɛɛ wo nkoa sɛ AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn ahyɛ n’akoa Mose sɛ ɔmfa asase no nyinaa mma mo na ɔnsɛe asase no sofoɔ nyinaa mfiri mo anim no, na mo nti yɛsuroo yɛn nkwa ho papaapa, enti na yɛdii saa asɛm yi. 25Na afei, yɛn nie, yɛwɔ wo nsam, deɛ ɛyɛ na ɛtene w’ani soɔ a wobɛyɛ yɛn no, yɛ! 26Na ɔyɛɛ wɔn saa, na ɔyii wɔn firii Israelfoɔ nsam, na wɔanku wɔn. 27 Na da no ara Yosua de wɔn yɛɛ nnuatwafoɔ ne nsusafoɔ maa asafo no ne AWURADE afɔrebukyia no sɛ ɛntoa so mmɛsi nnɛ yi faako a ɔbɛyie.

Title: YOSUA 10
Content:
Gibeon sa
1 Na Yerusalem hene Adoni-sedek tee sɛ Yosua afa Ai na wasɛe no pasapasa ne sɛdeɛ ɔyɛɛ Yeriko ne ne hene no, saa ara na wayɛ Ai ne ne hene nso, 2 ne sɛ Gibeonfoɔ ne Israel adi asomdwoeɛsɛm na wɔaba wɔn mu no, wɔsuroo papaapa, ɛfiri sɛ Gibeon yɛ kuro kɛseɛ te sɛ ahennie nkuro no bi, na ɛso sene Ai, na emu mmarima nyinaa yɛ nnɔmmarima. 3Na Yerusalemhene Adoni-sedek soma maa wɔkɔɔ Hebronhene Hoham ne Yarmuthene Piram ne Lakishene Yafia ne Eglonhene Debir nkyɛn sɛ: 4Mommra me nkyɛn mmɛboa me, na yɛnkunkum Gibeon, ɛfiri sɛ wɔne Yosua ne Israelfoɔ no akɔdi asomdwoeɛsɛm. 5Na Amorifoɔ ahemfo baanum boaboaa wɔn ano bae, Yerusalem hene, Hebron hene, Yarmut hene, Lakis hene, Eglon hene, wɔne wɔn dɔm nyinaa, na wɔbɛkyeree Gibeon so nsraban sɛ wɔne wɔn rebɛko.
6Ɛnna Gibeonfoɔ no soma maa wɔbaa Yosua nkyɛn Gilgal nsraban no mu sɛ: Nyi wo nsa mfiri wo nkoa so, bra yɛn nkyɛn bɛgye yɛn nkwa na di boa yɛn, na Amorifoɔ a wɔte mmepɔ soɔ ahemfo nyinaa abɛhyia atia yɛn. 7Ɛnna Yosua firii Gilgal foro kɔeɛ, ɔno ne akofoɔ no nyinaa ne nnɔmmarima nyinaa. 8Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: Nsuro wɔn, na wo nsa na mede wɔn mahyɛ, wɔn mu biara rennyina w’anim. 9Na Yosua baa wɔn so mpofirim, ɔde anadwo mu no nyinaa na ɛforo firii Gilgal baeɛ. 10Na AWURADE tanee wɔn ani Israel anim, na wɔde okunkɛseɛ kunkumm wɔn wɔ Gibeon, na wɔtii wɔn Bet-horon aforoeɛ kwan no so, na wɔkunkumm wɔn de kɔsii Aseka ne Makeda. 11 Na wɔredwane afiri Israel anim na wɔkɔduruu Bet-horon asianee mu no, AWURADE totoo aboɔ akɛseɛ firi soro guguu wɔn so de kɔduruu Aseka maa wɔwuwui, wɔn a asukɔtweaa no kunkumm wɔn no dɔɔso sene wɔn a Israelfoɔ no kunkumm wɔn nkrantɛ ano no.
Owia ne ɔsrane di Yosua asɛm so
12Ɛno mu na Yosua kasa kyerɛɛ AWURADE, da a AWURADE de Amorifoɔ maa Israel anim no, na ɔkaa no Israel anim sɛ:
Owia, twɛn wɔ Gibeon,
ne ɔsrane, wɔ Ayalon bonhwa mu.
13 Na owia twɛnee, na ɔsrane gyinae
de kɔsii sɛ ɛdɔm no tɔɔ wɔn atamfoɔ so were.
Wɔntwerɛɛ yei Teefoɔ Nwoma no mu? Na owia gyinaa ɔsoro mfimfini, na ampɛ ntɛm ankɔtɔ bɛyɛ da mu. 14 Na ɛda bi mmae sɛ ɛno, anim anaa akyire a AWURADE atie onipa nne, ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE ko maa Israel.
15Na Yosua sane ne Israel nyinaa baa Gilgal nsraban no mu.
16Na ahemfo baanum yi dwane kɔhuntaa Makeda ɔbodan no mu. 17Na wɔbɛka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: Yɛahunu ahemfo baanum no sɛ wɔahunta Makeda ɔbodan no mu. 18Na Yosua kaa sɛ: Monkɔmuni aboɔ akɛseɛ nhini ɔbodan no ano, na momfa mmarima nnyina ho mma wɔnwɛn wɔn. 19Na mo deɛ, monnnyina hɔ, monti mo atamfoɔ no, na monkum wɔn kyidɔm no; mommma wɔnnnuru wɔn nkuro mu, ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE mo Nyankopɔn de wɔn ahyɛ mo nsa. 20Na Yosua ne Israelfoɔ no de okunkɛseɛ pa kunkum wɔn wieeɛ maa wɔsaeɛ no, na nnipa a wɔfirii mu no dwanedwane kɔhyɛnehyɛnee nkuro a wɔatoto ho afasuo mu, 21na ɔman no nyinaa sane baa nsraban no mu Yosua nkyɛn wɔ Makeda dwoodwoo. Obiara antwe ne tɛkyerɛma antia Israelfoɔ no.
22Na Yosua kaa sɛ: Mommue ɔbodan no ano, na monyi ahemfo baanum no mfiri ɔbodan no mu mmrɛ me. 23Na wɔyɛɛ saa, na wɔyiyii ahemfo baanum no firii ɔbodan no mu brɛɛ no: Yerusalem hene, Hebron hene, Yarmut hene, Lakis hene, Eglon hene. 24Na wɔde ahemfo yi firi brɛɛ Yosua no, Yosua frɛɛ Israel mmarima nyinaa bae, na ɔsee mmarima akofoɔ a wɔne no kɔeɛ no asafohene no sɛ: Montwe mpini mfa mo nan mmɛsisi ahemfo yi kɔn so. Na wɔtwe pinii de wɔn nan bɛsisii wɔn kɔn so. 25Na Yosua ka kyerɛɛ wɔn sɛ: Monnsuro, na mo akoma nntu, mo ho nyɛ den na monyɛ nnam. Na saa ara na AWURADE bɛyɛ mo atamfoɔ a mo ne wɔn ko no nyinaa. 26Na ɛno akyiri no, Yosua bobɔɔ wɔn kunkumm wɔn, na ɔde wɔn sensɛnee nnua nnum so, na wɔsensɛnee nnua no so kɔsii anwummerɛ. 27 Na owia rekɔtɔ no, Yosua hyɛe maa wɔyiyii wɔn firii nnua no so, na wɔkɔtoo wɔn guu ɔbodan a wɔkɔhuntaa mu no mu, na wɔde aboɔ akɛseɛ guu ɔbodan no ano a ɛwɔ hɔ de bɛsi nnɛ yi ara.
28 Na Yosua faa Makeda da no ara, na ɔde nkrantɛ ano kunkumm wɔn, ne emu hene nso; na ɔsɛee akra a wɔwɔ mu nyinaa pasapasa, wamma obiara anka, na ɔyɛɛ Makeda hene sɛdeɛ ɔyɛɛ Yeriko hene no.
29Ɛnna Yosua ne Israel a wɔka ne ho nyinaa twaa mu firii Makeda kɔɔ Libna, na ɔne Libna kɔkoeɛ. 30Na AWURADE de ɛno nso hyɛɛ Israel nsa ne emu hene, na ɔde nkrantɛ ano kumm akra a wɔwɔ mu no nyinaa, wamma obiara anka wɔ mu, na ɔyɛɛ ne hene no sɛdeɛ ɔyɛɛ Yeriko hene no.
31Na Yosua ne Israel a wɔka ne ho nyinaa twaa mu firii Libna kɔɔ Lakis, na ɔkyeree so nsraban, na ɔne wɔn koe. 32Na AWURADE de Lakis hyɛɛ Israel nsa, na wɔfae, da a ɛtɔ so mmienu no, na ɔde nkrantɛ ano kunkumm wɔn ne akra a wɔwɔ mu nyinaa, sɛdeɛ ɔyɛɛ Libna no ara.
33Ɛno mu no Geser hene Horam foro ba bɛboaa Lakis. Na Yosua kumm no ne ne man nyinaa de kɔsii sɛ wamma no anka no obiara.
34Ɛnna Yosua ne Israel a wɔka ne ho nyinaa twaa mu firii Lakis kɔɔ Eglon, na wɔkyeree so nsraban, na wɔne wɔn koe. 35Na wɔfae, da no ara, na wɔde nkrantɛ ano kunkumm wɔn ne nnipa a ɛwɔ mu nyinaa; da no ara na ɔsɛee wɔn pasapasa sɛdeɛ ɔyɛɛ Lakis no ara.
36Ɛnna Yosua ne Israel a wɔka ne ho nyinaa foro firii Eglon kɔɔ Hebron, na ɔne wɔn koe. 37Na wɔfae de nkrantɛ ano kunkumm wɔn ne emu hene ne wɔn nkuro no nyinaa ne akra a ɛwɔ mu nyinaa. Wamma obiara anka, sɛdeɛ ɔyɛɛ Eglon no ara, na ɔsɛee ɛno ne akra a ɛwɔ mu nyinaa pasapasa. 38Ɛnna Yosua ne Israel a wɔka ne ho nyinaa sane baa Debir ne no bɛkoeɛ. 39Na ɔfae, ne ne hene ne ne nkuro nyinaa, na wɔde nkrantɛ ano kunkumm wɔn, na wɔsɛee akra a ɛwɔ mu nyinaa pasapasa, wamma obiara anka, sɛdeɛ ɔyɛɛ Hebron ne Libna ne ne hene no, saa na ɔyɛɛ Debir ne ne hene.
40 Na Yosua sɛee asase no nyinaa: Mmepɔ no ne Negeb ne ɛpo ho mpaperɛ so ne mmepɔ ase ne wɔn ahemfo nyinaa; wannya odwanefoɔ biara, na adeɛ biara a ɛhome no, ɔsɛee no pasapasa, sɛdeɛ AWURADE Israel Nyankopɔn hyɛeɛ no. 41Na Yosua kunkumm wɔn firii Kades-barnea kɔduruu Gasa ne Gosen asase no nyinaa kɔduruu Gibeon. 42 Na ahemfo yi nyinaa ne wɔn asase no Yosua faa no prɛko, ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE Israel Nyankopɔn ko maa Israel.
43 Na Yosua ne Israel a wɔka ne ho no nyinaa sane baa Gilgal nsraban no mu.

Title: YOSUA 11
Content:
Israel nkonimdie
1Na Hasorhene Yabin teeɛ no, ɔsoma maa wɔkɔɔ Madonhene Yobab ne Simronhene ne Aksafhene nkyɛn 2ne ahemfo a wɔwɔ atifi fam mmepɔ soɔ ne Kinerot anafoɔ fam mpaperɛ so ne Dor nkokoɔ so, atɔeɛ po fam 3Kanafoɔ a wɔwɔ apueeɛ ne atɔeɛ ne Amorifoɔ ne Hetifoɔ ne Perisifoɔ ne mmepɔ so Yebusifoɔ ne Hewifoɔ a wɔwɔ Hermon bepɔ ase Mispa asase soɔ no nkyɛn. 4Na wɔn ne wɔn dɔm a ɛka wɔn ho no nyinaa firi bae, nnipa pepeankoma a wɔn dodoɔ te sɛ mpoano anwea ne apɔnkɔ ne nteaseɛnam pii pa ara. 5Na ahemfo yi nyinaa bɛhyiae, na wɔba bɛkyekyeree nsraban faako, Merom asuo ho sɛ wɔne Israel rebɛko.
6Na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Yosua sɛ: Nsuro wɔn na ɔkyena sɛsɛberɛ me na mɛma woaku wɔn nyinaa Israel anim. Wɔn apɔnkɔ no, twitwa wɔn nantin, na wɔn nteaseɛnam no, fa ogya hye. 7Ɛnna Yosua ne akofoɔ dɔm a wɔka ne ho no nyinaa baa wɔn soɔ mpofirim, Merom asuo no ano bɛtuaa wɔn. 8 Na AWURADE de wɔn hyɛɛ Israel nsa na wɔkunkumm wɔn na wɔtaa wɔn de kɔduruu Sidon kɛseɛ ne Misrefot-maim ho ne Mispa bonhwa no mu apueeɛ fam, na wɔkunkum wɔn de kɔsii sɛ wɔannya wɔn odwanefoɔ biara. 9Na Yosua yɛɛ wɔn sɛdeɛ AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ no no, wɔn apɔnkɔ no, ɔtwitwaa wɔn nantin, na wɔn nteaseɛnam no, ɔde ogya hyee.
10Na Yosua sanee berɛ no ara mu bɛfaa Hasor, na ɔde nkrantɛ kumm ne hene. Na akane no na Hasor ne saa ahennie yi nyinaa ti. 11Na wɔde nkrantɛ ano kunkumm akra a ɛwɔ mu nyinaa sɛee wɔn pasapasa, wɔannya biribiara a ɛhome, na ɔde ogya hyee Hasor. 12Na ahemfo yi nkuro nyinaa ne emu ahemfo nyinaa, Yosua fae, na ɔde nkrantɛ ano kunkumm wɔn sɛee wɔn pasapasa, sɛdeɛ AWURADE akoa Mose hyɛeɛ no. 13Nanso nkuro a ɛda so sisi wɔn sibea no nyinaa, Israel anhyehye, gye Hasor nko na Yosua hyeeɛ. 14Na nkuro yi mu asadeɛ nyinaa ne mmoa no deɛ, Israelfoɔ no fom faeɛ; nanso nnipa no deɛ, wɔde nkrantɛ kunkumm wɔn kɔsii sɛ wɔhyee wɔn aseɛ, wɔannya biribiara a ɛhome. 15Sɛdeɛ AWURADE hyɛɛ n’akoa Mose no, saa ara na Mose hyɛɛ Yosua, na saa ara na Yosua yɛeɛ; wanyi asɛm bi amfiri deɛ AWURADE hyɛɛ Mose no nyinaa mu.
16 Na Yosua faa asase yi nyinaa, mmepɔ no ne anafoɔ nyinaa ne Gosen asase nyinaa ne ɛpo ho mpaperɛ no ne mpaperɛ so ne Israel mmepɔ ne ɛho asase ta no; 17ɛfiri bepɔ a ɛso petee a ɛforo kɔ Seir ho kɔsi Baal-gad, Lebanon bonhwa no mu Hermon bepɔ ase. Na wɔn ahemfo no nyinaa Yosua faa wɔn na ɔbobɔɔ wɔn kunkumm wɔn. 18Nna bebree na Yosua ne saa ahemfo yi koeɛ. 19 Kuro biara nni hɔ a wɔne Israelfoɔ dii asomdwoeɛsɛm, gye Hewifoɔ a wɔte Gibeon no; ɔsa mu na wɔfaa ne nyinaa. 20 Na ɛfiri AWURADE, sɛ ɔpirim wɔn akoma sɛ wɔnkɔhyia Israel ɔko mu, na wɔasɛe wɔn pasapasa na wɔanhu wɔn mmɔbɔ, na mmom wɔasɛe wɔn sɛdeɛ AWURADE hyɛɛ Mose no.
21 Na Yosua baa berɛ no mu bɛtwitwaa Anakfoɔ no gu firii mmepɔ no so, firii Hebron, Debir, Anab ne Yuda mmepɔ nyinaa ne Israel mmepɔ nyinaa so, na Yosua sɛee wɔn ne wɔn nkuro nyinaa pasapasa. 22 Wɔannya Anakfoɔ Israelfoɔ no asase so; gye Gasa ne Gad ne Asdod na ebi kaeɛ. 23 Na Yosua faa asase no nyinaa, sɛdeɛ AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Mose no nyinaa; na Yosua kyekyɛɛ mu maa Israel maa no yɛɛ wɔn agyapadeɛ, sɛdeɛ wɔn nkyekyɛmu teɛ wɔn mmusuakuo no mu. Na asase no so home firii akodie mu.

Title: YOSUA 12
Content:
Nsase a Mose faeɛ no so ahemfo baanu ho asɛm
1Na yeinom ne asase no so ahemfo a Israelfoɔ no kunkumm wɔn na wɔdii wɔn asase soɔ wɔ Yordan agya deɛ owiapueeɛ hɔ, firi Arnon subonhwa ho de kɔsi Hermon bepɔ ho ne Araba a ɛwɔ apueeɛ no nyinaa so, 2 Amorifoɔ hene Sihon a ɔtenaa Hesbon a ɔdii hene firi Aroer a ɛda Arnon subonhwa nsunoa ne subonhwa no mfimfini ne Gilead fa de kɔsi Yabok subonhwa a ɛne Amonfoɔ hyeɛ no ano, 3ne Araba so de kɔsi Kinerot po no ano apueeɛ fam, na ɛde kɔsi Araba po no a ɛne Nkyene Po no ano, apueeɛ Bet-yesimot kwan so, ne anafoɔ fam Pisga bepɔ ase no; 4 ne Basan hene Og a ɔfiri abrane akɛseɛ a aka no mu a ɔtenaa Astarot ne Edrei no asase no. 5Na ɔdii hene Hermon bepɔ so ne Salka ne Basan nyinaa de kɔsi Gesurfoɔ ne Maakatfoɔ hyeɛ so ne Gilead fa, Hesbon hene Sihon hyeɛ ho. 6 AWURADE akoa Mose ne Israelfoɔ no kunkumm wɔn, na AWURADE akoa Mose de asase no maa Rubenfoɔ ne Gadfoɔ ne Manase abusuakuo fa no maa wɔdii so.
Ahemfo a Yosua kumm wɔn
7Na yeinom ne asase no so ahemfo a Yosua ne Israelfoɔ no kunkumm wɔn Yordan agya atɔeɛ fam, firi Baal-gad a ɛda Lebanon bonhwa no mu de kɔsi bepɔ a ɛso petee a ɛforo de kɔ Seir no ho; (na Yosua de asase no maa Israel mmusuakuo sɛ wɔnni so sɛdeɛ wɔn nkyekyɛmu no teɛ, 8 mmepɔ no so ne ɛpo ho Araba so ne mmepɔ no ase ne ɛserɛ no so ne anafoɔ no: Hetifoɔ, Amorifoɔ ne Kanaanfoɔ, Perisifoɔ, Hewifoɔ ne Yebusifoɔ asase no): 9 Yerikohene, Ai a ɛwɔ Betel ho hene, 10 Yerusalemhene, Hebronhene, 11 Yarmuthene, Lakishene, 12 Eglonhene, Geserhene, 13 Debirhene, Gederhene, 14 Hormahene, Aradhene, 15 Libnahene, Adulamhene, 16 Makedahene, Betelhene, 17Tapuahene, Heferhene, 18 Afekhene, Lasaronhene, 19 Madonhene, Hasorhene, 20 Simron-meronhene, Aksafhene, 21Taanakhene, Megidohene, 22Kedeshene, Yokneam a ɛwɔ Karmel ase no hene, 23 Dor a ɛwɔ Dor kokoɔ soɔ hene, amanaman a ɛwɔ Gilgal no hene, 24Tirsahene, — ahemfo no nyinaa yɛ aduasa baako.

Title: YOSUA 13
Content:
Onyankopɔn hyɛ Yosua sɛ ɔnkyekyɛ asase no mu
1Na Yosua abɔ akora na wadi mfeɛ pii; na AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Woabɔ akora na woadi mfeɛ pii, na asase a aka sɛ wɔbɛfa no da so dɔɔso bebree. 2Asase a aka no nie: Filistifoɔ nsase nyinaa ne Gesur nyinaa. 3(Ɛde firi Sihor a ɛwɔ Misraim apueeɛ fam no ano de kɔsi Ekron hyeɛ so atifi fam no, wɔbu ma Kanaanfoɔ. Filistifoɔ ahemfo baanum no: Gasa deɛ ne Asdod deɛ, Askelon deɛ, Gat deɛ ne Ekron deɛ) ne Awifoɔ wɔ anafoɔ fam; 4Kanaanfoɔ asase no nyinaa ne Meara a ɛyɛ Sidonfoɔ dea no de kɔsi Afek kɔduru Amorifoɔ hyeɛ so; 5ne Gebalfoɔ asase ne Lebanon nyinaa wɔ owiapueeɛ de firi Baal-gad a ɛwɔ Hermon bepɔ aseɛ de kɔsi Hamat fam; 6 wɔn a wɔte bepɔ no soɔ nyinaa, de firi Lebanon ho de kɔsi Misrefot-maim, Sidonfoɔ nyinaa; me ara, mɛtu wɔn afiri Israelfoɔ no anim; ɛso ntonto nko na twe ma Israel na wɔmfa nni so, sɛdeɛ mehyɛɛ woɔ no. 7Na afei kyɛ asase yi mu na ɛnyɛ mmusuakuo nkron ne Manase abusuakuo fa no agyapadeɛ.
8 Manase fa ne Rubenfoɔ ne Gadfoɔ anya wɔn agyapadeɛ a Mose de maa wɔn Yordan agya apueeɛ no, sɛdeɛ AWURADE akoa Mose de maa wɔn no, 9ɛfiri Aroer a ɛda Arnon subonhwa no ano no ho ne kuro a ɛda subonhwa no mu no, ne Medeba asaseta no nyinaa kɔsi Dibon, 10ne Amorifoɔ hene Sihon a ɔdii hene Hesbon no nkuro no de kɔsi Amonfoɔ hyeɛ so, 11ne Gilead ne Gesurfoɔ ne Maakatfoɔ asase ne Hermon bepɔ nyinaa ne Basan nyinaa de kɔsi Salka; 12Og a ɔdii hene wɔ Astarot ne Edrei ahennie a ɛwɔ Basan no nyinaa, (ɔno na ɔkaa abrane akɛseɛ no nkaeɛ no mu); na Mose kumm wɔn na ɔtuu wɔn, 13nanso Israelfoɔ antu Gesurfoɔ ne Maakatfoɔ, na Gesurfoɔ ne Maakatfoɔ no tenaa Israel mu de bɛsi nnɛ yi.
14 Lewi abusuakuo no nko na wamma wɔn agyapadeɛ bie. AWURADE Israel Nyankopɔn gya afɔdeɛ so adeɛ no, ɛno ne n’agyapadeɛ, sɛdeɛ ɔka kyerɛɛ no no.
Yordan apueeɛ fam asase yɛ mmusuakuo mmienu ne fa no dea
15 Na Mose de maa Ruben mma abusuakuo no sɛdeɛ wɔn mmusua teɛ. 16Na wɔn hyeɛ no firi Aroer a ɛda Arnon subonhwa no ano no ho ne kuro a ɛda subonhwa no mu ne Medeba ho asaseta no nyinaa. 17Hesbon ne ne nkuro a ɛdeda asaseta soɔ no nyinaa. Dibon ne Bamot-baal ne Bet-baal-meon 18ne Yahas ne Kedemot ne Mefaat 19ne Kiriataim ne Sibma ne Seret-sahar, bonhwa no mu bepɔ so 20ne Bet-peor ne Pisga bepɔ ase ne Bet-yesimot, 21asaseta no nkuro no nyinaa; ne Amorifoɔ hene Sihon a ɔdii hene Hesbon no ahennie nyinaa; ɔno na Mose kumm no ne Midian mmapɔmma, Ewi ne Rekem ne Sur ne Hur ne Reba, Sihon asafohene a wɔtenaa asase no soɔ no. 22 Na Beor ba Bileam, nkɔmhyɛfoɔ no nso, Israelfoɔ de nkrantɛ kumm no fraa atɔfoɔ no mu. 23Na Ruben mma no hyeɛ ne Yordan ne ɛho hyeɛ. Yei ne Ruben mma no agyapadeɛ sɛdeɛ wɔn mmusua teɛ, nkuro no ne ɛho nkuraa.
24Na Mose de maa Gad abusuakuo, Gadfoɔ no, sɛdeɛ wɔn mmusua teɛ. 25Na wɔn hyeɛ ne Yaser ne Gilead nkuro no nyinaa, ne Amonfoɔ asase fa, de kɔsi Aroer a ɛda Raba anim no, 26na ɛfiri Hesbon de kɔsi Ramat-mispe ne Betonim, na ɛde firi Mahanaim de kɔsi Debir hyeɛ so; 27ne bonhwa no mu, Bet-haram ne Bet-nimra ne Sukot ne Safon a ɛyɛ Hesbon hene Sihon ahennie no nkaeɛ, Yordan ne ɛho hyeɛ, de kɔsi Kineret po no awieeɛ, Yordan agya apueeɛ. 28Yei ne Gadfoɔ agyapadeɛ sɛdeɛ wɔn mmusua teɛ, nkuro no ne ɛho nkuraa.
29Na Mose maa Manase abusuakuo fa no nso bi, na ɛyɛɛ Manase abusuakuo fa no deɛ sɛdeɛ wɔn mmusua teɛ. 30 Na wɔn hyeɛ firi Mahanaim, Basan nyinaa, Basan hene Og ahennie nyinaa ne Yair nkuro a ɛwɔ Basan no nyinaa, nkuro aduosia; 31ne Gilead fa ne Astarot ne Edrei, Og ahennie nkuro a ɛwɔ Basan no. Wɔde maa Manase ba Makir mma, sɛ ɛnyɛ Makir mma fa dea, sɛdeɛ wɔn mmusua teɛ.
32Yei ne agyapadeɛ a Mose kyekyɛɛ wɔ Moab mpaperɛ soɔ, Yeriko, Yordan agya apueeɛ. 33 Na Lewi abusuakuo no deɛ, Mose amma wɔn agyapadeɛ biara: AWURADE, Israel Nyankopɔn, ɔno ne wɔn agyapadeɛ, sɛdeɛ ɔka kyerɛɛ wɔn no.

Title: YOSUA 14
Content:
Wɔnam ntontotwe so ma mmusuakuo nkron ne fa no agyapadeɛ
1 Na yei ne Israel agyapadeɛ a wɔnyaa no Kanaan asase soɔ a Ɔsɔfoɔ Eleasa ne Nun ba Yosua ne Israelfoɔ mmusuakuo mu agyanom so atitire no kyekyɛ maa wɔn, 2 wɔn agyapadeɛ a ɛnam ntontotwe soɔ, sɛdeɛ AWURADE nam Mose so hyɛɛ sɛ wɔmma mmusuakuo nkron ne fa no. 3 Na Mose ama mmusuakuo mmienu ne fa no agyapadeɛ wɔ Yordan agya, na Lewifoɔ deɛ, wamma wɔn agyapadeɛ biara wɔ wɔn mu. 4 Na Yosef mma yɛ mmusuakuo mmienu, Manase ne Efraim, na wɔamma Lewifoɔ no kyɛfa biara asase no so, gye nkuro a wɔbɛtena mu ne ɛho mmoa adidibea nsase ma wɔn mmoa ne wɔn nnoɔma. 5Sɛdeɛ AWURADE hyɛɛ Mose no, saa na Israelfoɔ no yɛeɛ, na wɔkyɛɛ asase no mu.
Wɔde Hebron ma Kaleb
6 Na Yudafoɔ no baa Yosua nkyɛn wɔ Gilgal; na Kenesini Yefune ba Kaleb ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Wo ara wonim me ne wo ho asɛm a AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Nyankopɔn nipa Mose wɔ Kades-barnea. 7 Medii mfirinhyia aduanan na AWURADE akoa Mose somaa me firi Kades-barnea sɛ menkɔsra asase no, na mesane mede emu asɛm mebrɛɛ no, sɛdeɛ ɛwɔ m’akoma mu. 8Na me nuanom a wɔne me foro kɔeɛ no maa ɔman no akoma tui, na me deɛ, medii AWURADE me Nyankopɔn akyi mewiee. 9Na Mose kaa ntam da no ara sɛ: Asase a wo nan tiaa soɔ no bɛyɛ wo ne wo mma agyapadeɛ daa, ɛfiri sɛ woadi AWURADE me Nyankopɔn akyi awie. 10Na afei hwɛ, AWURADE ama matena ase sɛdeɛ ɔkaeɛ no, mfirinhyia aduanan nnum yi, ɛfiri berɛ a AWURADE kaa asɛm yi kyerɛɛ Mose berɛ a na Israel nam serɛ soɔ no. Na afei, hwɛ, ɛnnɛ madi mfirinhyia aduɔwɔtwe nnum. 11 Meda so mewɔ ahoɔden nnɛ yi ara, sɛ deɛ na meteɛ da a Mose somaa me no; sɛdeɛ m’ahoɔden teɛ da no, saa ara na ɛteɛ nnɛ ma ɔko ne adifire ne emuba. 12 Na afei, fa bepɔ yi a AWURADE kaa ho asɛm da no no ma me, ɛfiri sɛ da no ara wotee sɛ Anakfoɔ ne nkuro akɛseɛ a wɔatoto ho afasuo wɔ hɔ. Ebia AWURADE bɛdi m’akyi na matu wɔn, sɛdeɛ AWURADE kaeɛ no.
13 Na Yosua hyiraa no, na ɔde Hebron maa Yefune ba Kaleb sɛ n’agyapadeɛ. 14Ɛno nti na Hebron yɛɛ Kenesini Yefune ba Kaleb agyapadeɛ de bɛsi nnɛ da yi, ɛfiri sɛ ɔdii AWURADE Israel Nyankopɔn no akyi yie. 15 Nso akane no na Hebron din ne Kiriat-arba. Arba yi ne Anakfoɔ mu nipa kɛseɛ koraa. Na asase no so dwo firii akodie mu.

Title: YOSUA 15
Content:
Yuda asase no ahyeɛ
1 Na Yuda mma abusuakuo ntonto, sɛdeɛ wɔn mmusua teɛ no, ɛtɔɔ Edom hyeɛ ho kɔduruu Sin serɛ so, wɔ anafoɔ fam asase a ɛyɛ anafoɔ hyeɛ no awieeɛ so. 2Na wɔn anafoɔ fam hyeɛ no firi Nkyene Po awieeɛ no ho dɔnnɔn a ɛbu fa anafoɔ fam no ano. 3Na ɛnam Akrabim aforoeɛ anafoɔ fam sene kɔ Sin, na ɛforo kɔ anafoɔ fam wɔ Kades-barnea, na ɛtwam kɔ Hesron, na ɛforo kɔ Adar, na ɛpono kɔ Karka. 4Na ɛtwam kɔ Asmon, na ɛkɔpue Misraim subonhwa no ano, na ɛkɔpem mpoano. Yei nyɛ mo anafoɔ fam hyeɛ. 5Na apueeɛ hyeɛ ne Nkyene Po no de bɛsi Yordan awieeɛ. Na atifi fam hyeɛ no firi Nkyene Po ho dɔnnɔn a ɛwɔ Yordan awieeɛ no ho. 6 Na ɛhyeɛ no foro Bet-hogla, na ɛsene fa Bet-araba atifi fam, na ɛhyeɛ no foro kɔsi Ruben ba Bohan boɔ no ho. 7 Na ɛhyeɛ no firi Akor bonhwa no mu foro kɔ Debir, na ɛdane kɔ atifi fam kyerɛ Gilgal a ɛda Adumim aforoeɛ a ɛwɔ subonhwa no anafoɔ fam ntentensoɔ no. Na ɛhyeɛ no twam fa En-semes nsuo no ano, na ɛkɔpem En-rogel. 8 Na ɛhyeɛ no foro fa Hinom ba bonhwa no mu, Yebusifoɔ nkyɛn mu anafoɔ fam, (ɛne Yerusalem); na ɛhyeɛ no foro kɔ bepɔ a ɛwɔ Hinom bonhwa no ntentensoɔ wɔ atɔeɛ wɔ Refaim bonhwa no atifi fam awieeɛ no atifi. 9 Na ɛhyeɛ no hima firi bepɔ no mpampam kɔ Neftoa asutire no ho, na ɛfiri hɔ kɔ Efron bepɔ so nkuro ho, na ɛhyeɛ no hima kɔ Baala (a ɛne Kiriat-yearim). 10Na ɛhyeɛ no konton firi Baala kɔ atɔeɛ, Seir bepɔ ho, na ɛsene kɔ Har-yearim, (ɛne Kesalon), nkyɛn mu wɔ atifi fam; na ɛsiane kɔ Bet-semes, na ɛsene kɔ Timna; 11na ɛhyeɛ no pue kɔ Ekron nkyɛn mu atifi fam na ɛhima kɔ Sikron, na ɛtwam kɔ Baala bepɔ no so, na ɛpue kɔ Yabneel; na ɛhyeɛ no kɔpem ɛpo no ano. 12Na atɔeɛ hyeɛ no ne ɛpo kɛseɛ no ne ɛho hyeɛ. Yeinom ne Yudafoɔ no hyeɛ a atwa ahyia sɛdeɛ wɔn mmusua teɛ.
Kaleb kyɛfa
13 Na Yefune ba Kaleb deɛ, ɔmaa no kyɛfa, Yudafoɔ no mu sɛdeɛ AWURADE hyɛɛ Yosua no: (Anak agya Arba) kuro a ɛne Hebron. 14Na Kaleb tuu Anak mma baasa no firii hɔ, Sesai ne Ahiman ne Talmai, Anak asefoɔ. 15Na ɔfiri hɔ foro kɔɔ Debirfoɔ ho; nso akane no na Debir din ne Kiriat-sefer.
16Na Kaleb kaa sɛ: Deɛ ɔbɛbɔ Kiriat-sefer na ɔbɛfa no, mede me babaa Aksa bɛma no aware. 17Ɛnna Kaleb nua Kenas ba Otniel kɔfaeɛ, na ɔde ne babaa Aksa maa no awareɛ. 18Na ɔbaa no kɔɔ Otniel nkyɛn no, ɔhyɛɛ Otniel sɛ ɔmmisa n’agya Kaleb hɔ asase bi; na ɔbaa no firi n’afunumu so sii fam; na Kaleb ka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na worehwehwɛ? 19Na ɔka kyerɛɛ no sɛ: Ma me akyɛdeɛ bi ɛ, na anafoɔ asase na wode ama me nti, ma me mmasuo nso. Na ɔmaa no atifi mmasuo ne anafoɔ mmasuo. 20Yei ne Yuda mma abusuakuo no agyapadeɛ, sɛdeɛ wɔn mmusua teɛ.
Yuda nkuro
21Na Yudafoɔ abusuakuo no nkuro a ɛdeda anafoɔ fam pɛɛ de rekɔ Edom hyeɛ soɔ ne: Kabseel ne Eder ne Yagur, 22ne Kina ne Dimona ne Adada 23ne Kedes ne Hasor ne Itnan, 24Sif ne Telem ne Bealot, 25ne Hasor-hadata ne Keriot-hesron, (ɛne Hasor), 26Amam ne Sema ne Molada 27ne Hasar-gada ne Hesmon ne Bet-pelet, 28ne Hasar-sual ne Beer-seba ne ɛho nkuraa, 29Baala ne Iyim ne Esem, 30ne Eltolad ne Kesil ne Horma, 31ne Siklag ne Madmana ne Sansana, 32ne Lebaot ne Silhim ne Ain ne Rimon: Ne nyinaa yɛ nkuro aduonu nkron ne ɛho nkuraa.
33 Ɛpo ho mpaperɛ so deɛ ne: Estaol ne Sora ne Asna, 34ne Sanoa ne En-ganim, Tapua ne Enam, 35Yarmut ne Adulam, Soko ne Aseka, 36ne Saaraim ne Aditaim ne Gedera ne Gederotaim: Nkuro dunan ne ɛho nkuraa.
37Senan ne Hadasa ne Migdal-gad 38ne Dilean ne Mispe ne Yokteel, 39Lakis ne Boskat ne Eglon, 40ne Kabon ne Lahmam ne Kitlis, 41ne Gederot, Bet-dagon ne Naama ne Makeda: Nkuro dunsia ne ɛho nkuraa.
42Libna ne Eter ne Asan, 43ne Yifta ne Asna ne Nesib 44 ne Keila ne Aksib ne Maresa: Nkuro nkron ne ɛho nkuraa.
45 Ekron ne ɛho nkuro ne nkuraa, 46ɛfiri Ekron de kɔsi ɛpo fam deɛ ɛwɔ Asdod nkyɛn mu nyinaa ne ɛho nkuraa.
47 Asdod, ɛho nkuro ne nkuraa, Gasa, ɛho nkuro ne nkuraa de kɔsi Misraim subonhwa no ano, ne Ɛpo Kɛseɛ ne ɛho hyeɛ.
48Na mmepɔ so deɛ ne: Samir ne Yatir ne Soko, 49ne Dana ne Kiriat-sana (a ɛne Debir), 50ne Anab ne Estemo ne Anim, 51ne Gosen ne Holon ne Gilo: Nkuro dubaako ne ɛho nkuraa.
52Arab ne Duma ne Esan, 53ne Yanum ne Bet-tapua ne Afeka 54ne Humta ne Kiriat-arba (a ɛne Hebron), ne Sior: Nkuro nkron ne ɛho nkuraa.
55Maon, Karmel ne Sif ne Yuta, 56ne Yesreel ne Yokdeam ne Sanoa, 57Kain, Gibea ne Timna: Nkuro du ne ɛho nkuraa.
58Halhul, Bet-sur ne Gedor, 59ne Maarat ne Bet-anot ne Eltekon: Nkuro nsia ne ɛho nkuraa.
60 Kiriat-baal (a ɛne Kiriat-yearim), ne Raba: Nkuro mmienu ne ɛho nkuraa.
61Ɛserɛ so deɛ ne: Bet-araba, Midin ne Sekaka 62ne Nibsan ne Nkyene Kuro no ne En-gedi: Nkuro nsia ne ɛho nkuraa.
63 Na Yebusifoɔ a wɔte Yerusalem no deɛ, Yudafoɔ no antumi antu wɔn, na Yebusifoɔ no ne Yudafoɔ no tenaa Yerusalem de bɛduru nnɛ yi.

Title: YOSUA 16
Content:
Yosef ne Efraim asase no ahyeɛ
