Ɔsoro nnya ntwaa mu yi, wɔrennyane,
na wɔrempusu wɔn mfiri wɔn nna mu.
13 O, sɛ wode me resie Asamando ɛ,
sɛ wode me rehunta akɔsi sɛ w’abufuo bɛsane akorɔ ɛ,
sɛ wohyɛ me da na wokae me ɛ!
14 Sɛ onipa wu a, ɔbɛtena ase bio anaa?
Anka m’akodie nna nyinaa mɛtwɛn
akɔsi sɛ me nsakyera bɛba.
15Anka wobɛfrɛ, na me nso magye wo so,
anka w’ani bɛgyina wo nsa ano adwuma no.
16Nanso afei deɛ, wokan m’anammɔn,
na wonyi w’ani mfiri me bɔne so.
17 Wɔasɔ me mmarato ano de ahyɛ kotokuo mu,
na woakyekyere me bɔne ano.
18Ampa ara bepɔ mpo hwe ase yera,
na ɔbotan nso twe firi n’afa.
19 Na sɛdeɛ aboɔ nso, nsuo hono no,
na ne yire pra fam dɔteɛ kɔ,
saa ara na ɔdasani anidasoɔ nso woma no yera.
20Wotintim ne so ma no twam kɔ,
wosakyera n’anim na wosum no kɔ.
21Ne mma nya animuonyam mpo a, ɔnnim,
wɔbrɛ wɔn ase nso a, ɔnhunu mma wɔn.
22Ɔno ara ne honam yea nko na ɔteɛ,
na ne kra di ɔno ara ne ho abooboo.

Title: HIOB 15
Content:
Elifas ka Hiob anim, na ɔkyerɛ abɔnefoɔ mmusuo
1Ɛnna Temanni Elifas buaa sɛ:
2Onyansafoɔ de nimdeɛ huuhuu bɛbua,
na ɔde apueeɛ mframa ahyɛ n’afuru ma anaa?
3Ɔde nsɛm a ɛmfra bɛyi atɛn
ne nsɛnkeka a mfasoɔ nni mu anaa?
4Nso woto nyamesuro twene,
na wosi Nyankopɔn anim nsusuiɛ ho kwan.
5Na w’ano nsɛm kyerɛ wo bɔne,
na woafa aniteɛ tɛkyerɛma.
6Wo ara w’ano na ɛbu wo fɔ, na ɛnyɛ me,
aane, wo ara ankasa w’ano na ɛdi adanseɛ tia woɔ.
7Wone deɛ ɔdi kan a wɔwoo no onipa,
na wɔnyinsɛn wo ansa na wɔreyɛ nkokoɔ?
8 Wokɔtiee Nyankopɔn agyinatuo,
na woasi nyansa ano afa?
9 Ɛdeɛn na wonim a yɛnnim,
na wohunu mu a ɛnni yɛn nkyɛn?
10Hwɛ, wafu dwono ne akɔkoraa wɔ yɛn mu,
deɛ ɔsene w’agya panin mpo.
11Nyankopɔn awerɛkyekyerɛ ne n’asɛm
a wɔne woka no brɛɛ no sua w’ani so anaa?
12Adɛn na w’akoma twe wo korɔ,
na adɛn na w’ani pa anyinam,
13na wodane wo honhom tia Onyankopɔn
na woma nsɛnkeka firi w’anomu?
14 Hwan ne ɔdasani a ne ho bɛteɛ
ne deɛ ɔbaa awo no a ɔtene?
15 Hwɛ, n’akronkronfoɔ so mpo ɔmfa ne ho nto,
na ɔsoro ho nso nte n’ani so:
16Na nkantom deɛ ne ho yɛ nwunu na waporɔ,
onipa a ɔnom amumuyɛ sɛ nsuo!
17Mɛkyerɛ wo, na tie me;
na deɛ mahunu yi, mɛka akyerɛ wo.
18Deɛ anyansafoɔ aka akyerɛ
na wɔansi so firi wɔn agyanom berɛ soɔ;
19wɔn nko na wɔde asase no maa wɔn,
na ɔhɔhoɔ biara antwam wɔn mu.
20 Ɔbɔnefoɔ ho yera no, ne nna nyinaa,
na wɔde mfeɛ a wɔakan asie otirimuɔdenfoɔ.
21Ehu nkateɛ gyegye n’aso mu,
asomdwoeɛ mpo mu na ɔsɛefoɔ ba ne soɔ.
22Ɔnnye nni sɛ ɔbɛsane afiri sum mu,
na wɔayi no ama afena.
23Ɔkyini hwehwɛ aduane, ka sɛ: Ɛhe na ɛwɔ?
Ɔnim sɛ esum da abɛn no.
24Ahohiahia ne ahokyere yi no hu,
ɛtintim no sɛ ɔhene a wasiesie ne ho ama ɔko a ɛyɛ hu.
25Ɛfiri sɛ watene ne nsa atia Onyankopɔn,
na wate Otumfoɔ so atua.
26Ɔde kɔn a asene ato aba ne so,
ne n’akyɛm akyi apɔapɔ a emu yɛ duro no;
27 ɛfiri sɛ wama ne sradeɛ akata n’anim,
na wama ne mfe mu adɔre sradeɛ,
28 na wakɔtena nkuro a aguo so,
afie a obi nte mu na wɔahyɛ sɛ ɛnyɛ afituo mu:
29Ɔrennya ne ho, na n’adedodoɔ nso rennyina,
na ne nnɔbaeɛ renkonkom mma fam;
30Ɔremfiri sum mu mfi,
ogyaframa bɛma ne nnuaban adwan,
na n’anomu mframa bɛpra ne nhyerɛne akɔ;
31mma no mmfa ne ho nnto ahuhudeɛ so nnnaadaa ne ho,
na ahuhudeɛ ara na ɛbɛyɛ n’akatua.
32Ne da nnya nnuruiɛ no na akatua no bɛba,
na ne duban renyɛ frɔmfrɔm;
33ɔbɛpore n’asia abunu sɛ obobe deɛ,
na wawoso ne nhyerɛne agu sɛ ngodua deɛ;
34na abɔnefoɔ fekuo bɛyɛ abonini,
na ogya bɛhye adanmudegyeɛ ntomadan.
35 Wɔnyinsɛn ɔhaw, na wɔwo mmusuo,
na wɔn yafunu siesie nnaadaa.

Title: HIOB 16
Content:
Hiob su frɛ Onyankopɔn
1Na Hiob gyee so sɛ:
2Mate saa nsɛm a ɛte sɛɛ bebree;
mo nyinaa moyɛ gyamserefoɔ.
3Nsɛnhuuhuu yi awieeɛ nie?
Anaasɛ ɛdeɛn na ɛhwanyan wo ma wobua?
4 Sɛ mo wɔ me tebea mu a,
anka me nso mɛkasa sɛ mo,
anka mɛhɔre nsɛm magu mo so,
na mawoso me ti magu mo so;
5aane, anka mede m’ano bɛhyɛ mo den,
na m’anomu duema ama mo yea aboto.
6Sɛ mekasa a, me yea no mmoto,
na sɛ megyae nso a, ɛdeɛn na ɛfiri me ho korɔ?
7Na afei deɛ, Onyankopɔn ahodwo me;
woama me ho nnipa nyinaa agu;
8woapompono me ama no adane adanseɛ,
na me fɔn asɔre atia me atoto m’ano wɔ m’anim.
9 Wasunsuane me n’abufuo mu, na ɔtaa me;
ɔtwɛre ne se gu me so.
M’ahohiahiafoɔ no pɔkyere n’ani hwɛ me.
10 Wɔhaahaa wɔn anomu tia me,
wɔde ahohorabɔ bobɔ m’aso mu,
wɔn nyinaa boaboa wɔn ano tia me.
11Onyankopɔn ayi me ahyɛ abusufoɔ nsa,
na wasum me ato abɔnefoɔ nsam.
12 Anka medi yie, na ɔbubuu me.
Ɔsɔɔ me kɔn na ɔbubuu me pasaa,
na ɔde me sii hɔ yɛɛ ne botaeɛ;
13n’agyan dii me so ntwaguo,
ɔpaee me sawa mu, na wannodo ho,
ɔhwiee me bɔnwoma guu fam;
14Ɔbubuu me mprɛ bebree,
ɔto baa me so sɛ ɔdɔmmanin.
15 Mepam ayitoma mekataa me wedeɛ so,
na mede m’ahoɔden too mfuturo mu.
16Esu nti m’ani abere kɔkɔkɔkɔ,
na owuo sunsum da m’anisuatɛtɛ so.
17Nanso amim biara nni me nsam,
na me mpaebɔ ho te.
18 O! Asase, nkata me mogya so,
na mma me sufrɛ nnnya homebea!
19Seesei mpo, hwɛ, ɔsoro na me danseni wɔ,
na me dimafoɔ wɔ deɛ ɛkorɔn.
20 Me nnamfo mpo di me ho fɛw,
nanso Onyankopɔn na m’ani porepore nisuo ma no.
21Sɛ ɔnni mma onipa wɔ Nyankopɔn anim,
sɛdeɛ onipa ba di ma ne yɔnko no.
22 Na mfeɛ a ɛwɔ ano no bɛdu
na makɔ kwan a merensane memma.

Title: HIOB 17
Content:
1M’ahome asa, me nna ahi,
damena na ɛwɔ hɔ ma me.
2Ampa ara ahiyifoɔ na wɔne me wɔ hɔ,
na m’ani tua wɔn ntɔkwapɛ.
3 Si awowa ɛ, di me agyinamu wo ara w’anim.
Hwan na ɔbɛgyina m’akyire?
4Na wode nimdeɛ ahunta wɔn akoma,
enti woremma wɔn so.
5Deɛ ɔpa ne nnamfo de nya kyɛfa bie no,
ne mma bɛhwere saa kyɛfa no.
6 Na ɔde me ayɛ aman akasabebuo,
na wɔahinam m’ani so ntasuo.
7 M’awerɛhoɔ nti m’ani so asi,
na me ho ade nyinaa ayɛ sɛ sunsum.
8Teefoɔ ho dwiri wɔn yei ho,
na deɛ ɔdi bem no bo huru ɔkɔnkɔnsani.
9Nanso ɔteneneeni bɛkura ne kwan mu,
na deɛ ne nsa ho teɛ no bɛkɔ so anya ahoɔden.
10Na mo nyinaa, monsane mmra ɛ!
Nanso merenhunu mo mu nyansafoɔ biara.
11Me nna atwam, wɔatwitwa m’atirimpɔ mu,
m’akoma adeɛ a ɛpɛ no mu.
12Wɔde anadwo yɛ awia;
wɔse: Hann bɛn deɛ esum wɔ.
13Sɛ mede Asamando yɛ me fie,
na meto me mpa esum mu,
14 na mese Amena sɛ: M’agya ne wo,
ne mmoaa sɛ: Me na ne me nuabaa ne mo, a,
15na afei, ɛhe na m’anidasoɔ wɔ?
Na deɛ m’ani da soɔ no, hwan na ɔbɛhunu?
16Ɛbɛsiane akɔ Asamando adaban mu
berɛ a yɛn nyinaa home wɔ mfuturo mu.

Title: HIOB 18
Content:
Bildad kasa sɛ abɔnefoɔ bɛsɛe
1Ɛnna Suhini Bildad buaa sɛ:
2Mobɛkɔ nsɛnkeka so akɔsi da bɛn?
Monnwene ho, na ɛno akyiri no, yɛakasa.
3 Adɛn na wɔbu yɛn sɛ anantwie,
na yɛyɛ mo ani so sɛ tibɔnkɔso anaa?
4Wo a wotete wo ho w’abufuo mu.
Wo nti na wɔbɛgya asase,
na wɔatu ɔbotan afiri ne sibea anaa?
5 Nanso ɔbɔnefoɔ kanea bɛdum,
na ne gyaframa renhyerɛn.
6Hann bɛduru sum, ne ntomadan mu,
na ne kanea adum wɔ ne so;
7n’ahoɔden anammɔn ano bɛmoa,
na n’agyinatuo ahwe no ase.
8Na ɔno ara ne nan bɛka no ato atena mu,
na wanante mfidie so.
9Nsɛmma bɛsɔ ne nantin,
na nkyehoma akyekyere no.
10Wɔde kantankoraa bɛhunta fam ama no,
na wɔasum no fidie ɔkwan so.
11Ehu bɛkuta no mmaa nyinaa ahyia,
na ati no n’anammɔn mu.
12Ɛkɔm bɛsɛe n’ahoɔden,
na mmusuo rebɛma no asunti.
13Ɛbɛdi ne honam akwaa,
aane, owuo abakan bɛdi n’akwaa.
14Wɔbɛtu n’anidasoɔ afiri ne ntomadan mu,
na wɔde no akɔ ahudeɛ mu hene no nkyɛn.
15Deɛ ɛnyɛ ne dea bɛtena ne ntomadan mu,
wɔbɛbɔ sɔfe apete ne tenabea.
16Ne nhini bɛwuwu wɔ aseɛ,
na ne mman adwinnwan wɔ soro.
17 Ne nkaeɛ bɛsɛe afiri asase so,
na ɔrennya din asase ani.
18Wɔbɛsum no afiri hann mu akɔ sum mu,
na wɔapam no afiri wiase.
19Ɔrennya mma anaa mmanana ne man mu,
na aseni biara renka n’atenaeɛ.
20Ne da bɛyɛ wɔn a wɔwɔ atɔeɛ ahodwiri,
sɛdeɛ ehu kutaa wɔn a wɔwɔ apueeɛ no.
21Ampa ara sɛdeɛ amumuyɛfoɔ tenabea teɛ ne no,
ne deɛ ɔnnim Onyankopɔn no nso kyɛfa nie.

Title: HIOB 19
Content:
Hiob nim sɛ Onyankopɔn bɛgye no
1Na Hiob gyee so sɛ:
2Mobɛha me kra akɔsi da bɛn,
na mode nsɛm abubu me pasaa?
3Mprɛdu nie a moasopa me,
mo ani nwu mpo sɛ moho me werɛ?
4Na mpo, sɛ ampa sɛ mafom a,
me so na mfomsoɔ no da.
5Sɛ ampa sɛ moma mo ho so tia me,
na moyi me m’ahohora ho atɛn a,
6ɛnneɛ monhunu sɛ Onyankopɔn na wakyea me kwan ama me,
na ɔde n’asau atwa me ho ahyia.
7 Hwɛ, ayayadeɛ nti, meteam, nso wɔnnye me so.
Mesu mefrɛ mmoa, nanso ɔgyeɛ biara mma.
8 Ɔde ban atwa me kwan mu, na mentumi mensene,
na me kwan so aduru sum.
9Wayi m’animuonyam afiri me so,
na wahotiri me tiri so abotire.
10Wabubu me afa nyinaa a menni hɔ bio,
na watu m’anidasoɔ ase sɛ dua.
11 Wama n’abufuo afram me so,
na ɔbu me sɛ n’atamfo mu baako.
12 N’asafo ahodoɔ bɔɔ mu bae,
na wɔbɔɔ wɔn akwan wɔ me so,
na wɔkyeree nsraban twaa me ntomadan ho hyiae.
13 Wayi me nuanom afiri me ho kɔ akyirikyiri,
na wɔn a wɔni me adanedane me ahɔhoɔ koraa;
14 m’abusuafoɔ atwe wɔn ho kɔ, na wɔn a meni wɔn werɛ afiri me;
15wɔn a wɔbɛtena me fie ne me mmaawa bu me sɛ ɔhɔhoɔ,
madane wɔn ani so ɔnanani;
16mefrɛ m’akoa, na ɔmmua me,
mede m’ano mepa no kyɛw mpo.
17 Me yere mpo kyiri me home,
na me yafumma mpo mpɛ m’ahomeguo.
18 Ntɔtɔfefewa mpo bu me animtia,
mese meresɔre a, wɔkasa tia me.
19 Me ho yɛ me nnamfo pa nyinaa nwunu,
na m’adɔfo adane wɔn ani atia me.
20 Me nnompe femfam me wedeɛ ne me nam ho,
na me se ho wedeɛ nko na mede afiri mu afire.
21 Monhu me mmɔbɔ, monhu me mmɔbɔ, me yɔnkonom,
na Nyankopɔn nsa aka me.
22 Adɛn nti na moti me sɛ Onyankopɔn,
na me nam nso mmee mo?
23O, sɛ anka wɔretwerɛ me nsɛm ɛ!
Sɛ wɔde rehyɛ nwoma mu ɛ!
24Sɛ wɔde dadeɛ adetwerɛdeɛ ne sumpii rekurukyire ɔbotan mu
na atena hɔ daa ɛ!
25 Na me deɛ, menim sɛ me gyefoɔ te ase,
na awieeɛ no ɔbɛdi m’asɛm ama me wɔ asase so. 26 Na wɔasɛe me wedeɛ seyie akyiri no,
na mɛfiri me honam mu afi ahunu Onyankopɔn;
27 Ɔno na me ara mɛhwɛ no mafa,
na m’aniwa bɛhunu, na ɛnyɛ ɔhɔhoɔ bi.
Me sawa resa wɔ me mu.
28Sɛ mose: Sɛdeɛ yɛbɛsi apamo no afa!
Ne, yɛahunu asɛm no ase wɔ ne hɔ, a,
29monsuro afena, ɛfiri sɛ abufuhyeɛ de afena asotwe ba,
na moahunu sɛ atemmuo wɔ hɔ.

Title: HIOB 20
Content:
Sofar kasa sɛ: Abɔnefoɔ yiedie nkyɛ
1 Ɛnna Naamani Sofar buaa sɛ:
2Me ho pere me nti,
m’adwene yɛ me sɛ memmua.
3Mate atenetene a asopa me,
nanso honhom firi me nhunumu mu bua me.
4Wonnim yei a ɛfiri tete,
ɛfirii sɛ wɔde nnipa sii asase soɔ no,
5sɛ abɔnefoɔ ahurisidie nkyɛ,
na nyaatwomfoɔ anigyeɛ yɛ berɛ tiaa bi?
6 Sɛ ne kɛseyɛ korɔn kɔpem ɔsoro,
na ne tiri kɔka mununkum a,
7 ɔbɛyera koraa sɛ ne sɛbeɛ;
wɔn a wɔhu no no bɛbisa sɛ: Ɔwɔ he?
8 Ɔbɛtu akɔ sɛ daeɛ, na wɔrenhu no,
na wɔbɛpamo no akɔ sɛ anadwo adehunu.
9 Aniwa a ahu no renhu no bio,
na ne tenabea renhu no bio.
10 Ne mma bɛpata mmɔborɔfoɔ,
na ne nsa adane n’ahodeɛ ama.
11Ne mmeranteberɛ mu ahoɔden hyɛɛ ne nnompe mama,
na afei ɛne no abɛda dɔteɛ mu.
12Sɛ adebɔne yɛɛ n’anomu fremfrem,
na ɔde siee ne tɛkyerɛma ase,
13na ɔdii adɔna na wannyaa mu,
na ɔmaa no kaa ne dodom a,
14afei deɛ n’aduane asakyera ne nsono mu,
nhuritia borɔ wɔ ne yam.
15Wamene adedodoɔ, na ɔbɛfe bio,
Onyankopɔn bɛtu afiri ne yam.
16Ɔbɛfefe ahuritia borɔ,
na ɔprammire tɛkyerɛma bɛku no.
17N’ani rennye nsuwansuwa ho,
ɛwoɔ ne nufosuo ani sradeɛ asuasu nsubɔntene ho.
18 Ɔbɛdane deɛ wabrɛ ho ama,
na ɔremmene,
n’adeɛ a wanya no, ɔrenni ho ahurisie,
sɛdeɛ ne dodoɔ teɛ no.
19Ɛfiri sɛ wapɛkyɛ mmɔborɔfoɔ apo wɔn,
na wafa efie a ɛnyɛ ɔno na ɔsiiɛ.
20Ɛnam sɛ ne yafunu ammee da nti,
ɔrenkora deɛ n’ani gye ho no biara.
21Wannidi annya bi da,
enti n’ahonyadeɛ rentena hɔ.
22N’adedodoɔ mayɛ mu ne ho bɛhiahia no,
amanehunufoɔ nyinaa nsa bɛba ne so.
23Ɔbɛma n’abufuhyeɛ aba ne so
ama no de ahyɛ n’afuru ma,
na ɔbɛma no atɔ agu ne so de ayɛ n’aduane.
24Ɔdwane firi dadeɛ akodeɛ ano a,
kɔbere mfrafraeɛ agyan bɛwɔ no ahwire ne mu;
25 ɔtu firi ne honam mu
na agyan no firi ne bɔnwoma mu a,
ewuo ho hu bɛto ne so.
26 Wɔde sum nyinaa asie n’akoradeɛ,
ogya a obi mfite mu bɛhye no,
ɛbɛhye deɛ aka ne ntomadan mu.
27Ɔsoro bɛyi n’amumuyɛ adi,
na asase bɛsɔre atia no.
28Wɔbɛsoa ne fie ahonyadeɛ akɔ,
wɔbɛtwe akɔ, n’abufuo da no.
29Yei ne onipa ɔbɔnefoɔ kyɛfa a ɛfiri Nyankopɔn nkyɛn,
ne n’agyapadeɛ a Onyankopɔn ahyɛ ama no no.

Title: HIOB 21
Content:
Hiob mmuaeɛ
1Na Hiob gyee so sɛ:
2Tie na montie me kasa,
na yei nyɛ mo awerɛkyekyerɛ.
3Monnyaa me mma me nso menkasa,
na mekasa mewie a, afei moadi fɛw.
4Me deɛ, onipa na medi abooboo mekyerɛ no anaa?
Na adɛn nti na me home rente me?
5Monnane mo ani nhwɛ me, na mo ho nnwiri mo,
na momfa mo nsa ntuatua mo ano.
6Sɛ mekae a, mebɔ binim,
na nketenkete kuta me honam.
7 Adɛn nti na abɔnefoɔ nya nkwa,
wɔnyini kyɛ, na wɔyɛ ahoɔdenfoɔ akɛseɛ nso?
8Wɔn mma si wɔn anim pintinn ka wɔn ho,
aane, mekyerɛ wɔn asefoɔ.
9Wɔn afie mu dwo, ehu biara nni mu,
na Nyankopɔn ntea bi nni wɔn so.
10Ne nantwinini wo, na ɔnyɛ krawa,
ne nantwibereɛ yɛ awoyie, na ɔmpɔn.
11Wɔyi wɔn ntɔtɔfefewa adi sɛ nnwankuo,
na wɔn mmotafowa nso hurihuri.
12Wɔn nne di atweneka ne sankubɔ mu,
na wɔn ani gye abɛnhyɛne ho.
13Wɔhwere wɔn nna nnepa mu,
na wɔsiane kɔ Asamando ntɛm so.
14 Nanso wɔka kyerɛɛ Onyankopɔn sɛ: Firi yɛn so,
na yɛnhwehwɛ w’akwan ho nimdeɛ.
15Ɛdeɛn ne Otumfoɔ no a yɛnsom no,
na sɛ yɛbɔ no mpaeɛ a, mfasoɔ bɛn na yɛbɛnya?
16 Nanso hwɛ, ɛnyɛ wɔn ara wɔn nsam na wɔn nnepa wɔ,
abɔnefoɔ agyinatuo mpare me!
17 Mprɛ ahe na abɔnefoɔ kanea dum,
na wɔn mmusuo nso ka wɔn,
na Onyankopɔn kyekyɛ awerɛhoɔ n’abufuo mu?
18 Wɔte sɛ nkyɛnkyɛmma, mframa ano,
ne ntɛtɛ a ahum soa korɔ.
19Moka sɛ: Onyankopɔn kora n’amumuyɛ adeɛ ma ne mma;
ma no ntua ɔno ara ne ka na ɔnhunu.
20 Ma n’ani nhunu ne mmusuo,
na ɔnnom Otumfoɔ no abufuhyeɛ no bi.
21Na efie a ɔgya no n’akyire no mfa ne ho hwee bio,
berɛ a n’abosome dodoɔ to atwa no.
22 Obi bɛkyerɛ Onyankopɔn nhunumu anaa?
Ɔno a ɔbu ɔsorofoɔ no atɛn no.
23Obi wɔ ahoɔden pintinn nanso ɔwu, berɛ a ne ho tɔ no, na n’aso mu dwo no.
24Nufosuo ahyɛ ne nhina amaama,
na ne nnompe mu hon yɛ sɔɔsɔɔ.
25Na ɔfoforɔ nso de ne kra awerɛhoɔ wu
a wanni nnepa no bie.
26 Faako ara dɔteɛ mu na wɔdeda,
na mmoaa kata wɔn so.
27Hwɛ, menim mo adwene
ne adwemmɔne a mowɔ no me ho no,
28sɛ moka sɛ: Ɛhe na bakoma no fie wɔ?
Na ɛhe na ntomadan a abɔnefoɔ tenaa mu no wɔ?
29Mommisaa wɔn a wɔfa ɔkwan no soɔ,
na wɔn nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ nso, monkarii?
30Na wɔakora onipa bɔne de kɔsi sɛeɛ da,
wɔde wɔn kɔ aweretɔ da.
31Hwan na ɔbɛka n’anim, n’abrabɔ ho?
Na deɛ wayɛ no, hwan na ɔbɛtua no ɛso ka?
32Na ɔno deɛ, wɔkɔgya no damena mu,
na wɔwɛn ne damena so ara.
33Bonhwa mu dɔtetoa yɛ no dɛ,
na nnipa nyinaa twe wɔn ho di n’akyi,
na n’anim nso wɔnnim wɔn dodoɔ.
34Na adɛn na mokyekyere me werɛ kwa,
na mo mmuaeɛ yɛ nkontompo ara yi?

Title: HIOB 22
Content:
Elifas, ahonu ho afotuo
1Ɛnna Temanni Elifas buaa sɛ:
2Ɔdasani bi bɛtumi adi mu wɔ Onyankopɔn anim anaa?
Hwɛ, onimdefoɔ mpo, ɔdi mu wɔ n’ankasa n’ani so.
3Otumfoɔ nya ho biribi sɛ wotene,
anaasɛ ɔnya mfasoɔ sɛ w’akwan di mu?
4Wo suro nti na ɔbɛka w’anim,
na ɔde wo akɔ atemmuo mu anaa?
5Ɛnyɛ sɛ wo bɔne dɔɔso?
Na w’amumuyɛ nni awieeɛ.
6 Sɛ woagye wo nuanom awowa ɔkwa,
na woapa adagyafoɔ ho ntoma.
7 Woamma opititɔfoɔ nsuo annom,
na woakame deɛ ɔdi kɔm aduane.
8Na onipa a ne basa mu yɛ den no, ɔno na asase wɔ no,
na deɛ ɔwɔ animuonyam no na ɔtena soɔ.
9 Woama mmaa akunafoɔ de nsapan kɔ,
na nwisiaa abasa nso, wɔabubu.
10Enti na afidie atwa wo ho ahyia,
na nketenkete yi wo hu mpofirim.
11Anaasɛ wonhunu sum
ne nsuo pii a akata wo soɔ?
12Ɛnyɛ ɔsoro korɔn mu na Onyankopɔn wɔ?
Na hwɛ nsoromma a ɛwɔ sorosoro no sɛdeɛ ɛkorɔn fa!
13Na woka sɛ: Ɛdeɛn na Onyankopɔn nim?
Esum kabii akyiri nohoa na ɔbɛbu atɛn?
14Mununkum yɛ no nkataho, na ɔnhunu adeɛ,
na ɔsoro kɔntɔnkrɔn so na ɔnanteɛ.
15Wobɛfa tete tempɔn no
a mma busufoɔ nantee soɔ no so anaa?
16 Wɔn a wɔpraa wɔn kɔeɛ ansa na ɛberɛ reduro,
na wɔn nnyinasoɔ sene kɔɔ sɛ asuo no.
17 Wɔn na wɔka kyerɛɛ Onyankopɔn sɛ: Firi yɛn so!
Na ɛdeɛn nso na Otumfoɔ bɛyɛ wɔn?
18 Nanso ɔde nnepa hyehyɛɛ wɔn afie amaama
na abɔnefoɔ agyinatuo mpare me!
19 Ateneneefoɔ hunu, na wɔn ani gye;
na deɛ ɔdi bem no di wɔn ho fɛw,
20ka sɛ: Ampa ara, wɔn a wɔsɔre tiaa yɛn no ayera,
na wɔn nnikaeɛ no, ogya ahye!
21Fa wo ho bɔ Nyankopɔn ho ɛ, na wo ho nnwo wo;
yei mu na adepa bɛba ama woɔ.
22Gye n’anomu mmara,
na fa ne nsɛm sie w’akomam.
23 Sɛ wosane kɔ Otumfoɔ nkyɛn a, wɔde wo bɛsi hɔ,
sɛ woyi wo ntomadan mu abusudeɛ kɔ akyirikyiri a, —
24 fa sika amapa gu mfuturo mu,
na Ofir sika nso, fa gu asubɔnten mu mmoseaa mu.
25Na Otumfoɔ bɛyɛ wo sika amapa bebree
ne dwetɛ a wɔahɔre ama woɔ.
26 Ɛno na wo ho bɛsɛpɛ wo Otumfoɔ ho,
na woama w’ani so akyerɛ Onyankopɔn.
27 Wobɛsrɛ no, na watie wo,
na w’aboadeɛ ka no, woatua.
28Wobɛbɔ wo tirim, na ɛbɛgyina ama wo,
na hann bɛhyerɛn w’akwan so.
29 Sɛ wɔbrɛ wo ase a, ɛno deɛ, ahomasoɔ ntira.
Ɛfiri sɛ ɔhobrɛaseni deɛ, ɔbɛma no adi yie.
30 Sɛ deɛ ɔnnii bem mpo, ɔbɛgye no a,
ɛnneɛ w’ahoteɛ so na wɔbɛgye wo.

Title: HIOB 23
Content:
Hiob srɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn mma no nnyina n’atemmuo adwa anim
1Na Hiob gyee so sɛ:
2Ɛnnɛ na m’abooboodie mu ayɛ den,
na me pira ayɛ den asene m’apinisie.
3O, sɛ anka menya mehunu deɛ mɛhunu no,
na mekɔduru ne tenaberɛ ɛ!
4Anka mɛsiesie n’anim asɛnnie,
na mɛbisabisa no nsɛm ara yie.
5Anka mɛhunu nsɛm a ɔde bɛbua me,
na mahunu deɛ ɔbɛka akyerɛ me no mu.
6Tumi dodoɔ na ɔde ne me bɛham anaa?
Dabi, aso nko na ɔbɛyɛ ama me.
7Ɛhɔ na ɔteefoɔ ne no bɛyiyi no,
na mafiri me temmufoɔ nsam korakora.
8Hwɛ, mekɔ m’anim, nso ɔnni hɔ,
ne m’akyi, nso menhu no.
9Na ɔyɛ n’adeɛ benkum a, m’ani mmɔ no so,
ɔmane nifa a, menhu no.
10 Na ɔnim kwan a mefa soɔ.
Ɔsɔ me hwɛ a, mɛfiri mu sɛ sika mapa a wɔde afa ogya mu.
11N’anammɔn mu na me nan tintimiiɛ,
mahwɛ ne kwan, na mammane.
12N’anomu mmara, mamfiri ho,
makora n’anomu nsɛm sene deɛ ɛhia me.
13Nso ɔno deɛ, ɔnsakyera da, na hwan na ɔbɛsane no?
Na deɛ ɔpɛ, na ɔyɛ.
14Deɛ wahyɛ ama me na ɔbɛma no aba,
na adeɛ a ɛte seyie pii na ɛwɔ ne tirim.
15Enti ehu ka me n’anim,
medwene me tirim, na me ho popo wɔ ne ho.
16Na Onyankopɔn ama m’akoma abubu,
na Otumfoɔ ayi me hu,
17ɛfiri sɛ manyera esum no mu,
na wankata esum kabii no so m’anim.

Title: HIOB 24
Content:
Adɛn nti na Onyankopɔn ntea abɔnefoɔ ntɛm so
1Adɛn nti na Otumfoɔ nhyɛ berɛ ntua abɔnefoɔ ka,
na wɔn a wɔni no no nhunu saa berɛ no?
2 Ebinom deɛ wɔtwe ɛhyeɛ,
wɔfom mmoakuo fa yɛne wɔn.
3Wɔka nwisiaa afunumu kɔ,
wɔgye akunafoɔ nantwie awowa.
4Wɔsum ahiafoɔ firi ɔkwan so;
asase so amanehunufoɔ bom hunta.
5Hwɛ, sɛ anwea pradada so mfunumu firi adie no,
saa ara na wɔkɔ wɔn dwumadie so kɔpɛ aduane,
ɛserɛ so na wɔnya aduane ma mmɔfra.
6Mfuo so na wɔtwa mmoa aduane,
na wɔdi ɔbɔnefoɔ bobe turo mu mpɛpɛ.
7Wɔde adagya na ɛda, wɔnni ntoma,
na wɔnni nkataho awɔ mu.
8Mmepɔ so sutorɔ fɔ wɔn,
na ɛnam sɛ wɔnni dwanekɔbea nti,
wɔyɛ ɔbotan atuu.
9Wɔte agyanka firi nufoɔ ano,
na wɔgye mmɔborɔni hɔ awowa.
10 Wɔma wɔnenam adagya a wɔnni ntoma,
na wɔde ɛkɔm soasoa ayuo afiafi.
11 Wɔkyi ngo wɔn afasuo mu,
wɔtiatia nsa-kyi-amena so, nso wɔdi sukɔm.
12Nkuro mu nso na mmarima apinisie fire,
na wɔn a wɔapira wɔn akra su frɛ,
nanso Onyankopɔn mfa n’ani nkari amumuyɛsɛm no.
13Ebinom ayɛ hann anim atuatefoɔ,
wɔnhwɛ n’akwan,
na wɔntena n’atempɔn mu.
14Nhema na owudini sɔreɛ,
ɔkum ɔmanehunufoɔ ne ohiani,
na anadwo ɔyɛ sɛ owifoɔ.
15Na ɔwaresɛefoɔ ani twɛn sum berɛ,
ɔka sɛ: Ani biara renhu me.
Na ɔde nkataho kata n’anim.
16Esum mu na wɔhwirehwire adan mu;
wɔto wɔn ho pono mu awia,
wɔnnim hann.
17Na wɔn nyinaa, esum kabii yɛ wɔn sɛ anɔpa,
ɛfiri sɛ wɔne esum kabii mu ahuyideɛ yɛ nnamfo.
18 Ne ho yɛ hare wɔ nsuo ani;
wɔadome ne kyɛfa asase so,
ɔnnane n’ani nkɔ bobe nturo kwan so.
19Ɔhyeɛ ne ahuhuro na ɛnane sukyerɛmma nsuo,
saa ara nso na Asamando pra wɔn a wɔyɛ bɔne kɔ.
20Ɔyafunu a ɛwoo no no werɛ firi no, mmoaa fefe no.
Wɔnkae no koraa bio,
na wɔbɛbubu amumuyɛ sɛ dua.
21Ɔdidii obonini a ɔnwoɔ mpo ho,
na wanyɛ ɔbaa kunafoɔ yie.
22Nanso Onyankopɔn de ne tumi yi atumfoɔ firi hɔ;
wɔtumi nya asetena pa deɛ, nanso wɔnni nkwa ho anidasoɔ biara.
23Ɔma wɔtena hɔ dwoodwoo, na wɔde wɔn ho to ɛno so,
nanso na n’ani hwɛ wɔn akwan.
24Wɔduru deɛ ɛkorɔn, nso kakraa bi pɛ, na wɔnni hɔ;
wɔgyaa mu na wɔsie wɔn sɛ nnipa nyinaa,
na wɔtwitwa wɔn sɛ ayuo mmɛtem.
25Sɛ ɛnte saa a, hwan na ɔbɛyi me ɔtorofoɔ,
na wakyerɛ sɛ m’asɛm no nni mu?

Title: HIOB 25
Content:
Hwan ne onipa wɔ Nyankopɔn anim?
1Ɛnna Suhini Bildad buaa sɛ:
2Tumidie ne ehu wɔ Onyankopɔn hɔ;
ɔno na ɔma ɔmannwoeɛ ba wɔ ne sorɔnsorɔmmea hɔ.
3N’asafo ano wɔ abuyɛ anaa?
Na hwan na ne hann renhyerɛn ne soɔ?
4 Ɔdasani bɛtene Nyankopɔn anim sɛn,
na ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na deɛ ɔbaa awo no no ho bɛteɛ?
5 Hwɛ, ɔsrane mpo; ɛmpae hyɛnn wɔ n’anim
na nsoromma nso ho nte wɔ n’ani so.
6 Na nkantom ɔdasani, nsammaa yi,
ne onipa ba, aboaa yi!

Title: HIOB 26
Content:
Hiob kyerɛ Nyankopɔn kɛseyɛ
1Na Hiob gyee so sɛ:
2Woaboa deɛ ɔnni tumi sɛn?
Ɛdeɛn na woayɛ de agye basa a ɛnni ahoɔden?
3Afotuo bɛn na woatu deɛ ɔnni nyansa,
na woaka nimdeɛsɛm pa a ɛdɔɔso anaa?
4Hwan na woaka nsɛm akyerɛ no,
na hwan ahome na afiri wo mu yi?
5Nsamanfoɔ ho popo
nsuo ne wɔn a wɔte mu no ase.
6 Asamando da adagya n’anim,
na nkatasoɔ biara nni hɔ mma Ɔsɛeɛ Amena.
7Ɔno na ɔtrɛ ɔsoro a ɛbirie no mu ahunumu,
na ɔde asase sɛne deɛ biribi nnie.
8 Ɔkyekyere nsuo hyɛ mununkum mu,
na mununkum no mpae wɔ aseɛ.
9Ɔbram n’ahennwa anim
de ne mununkum katakata ho.
10 Ɔtwa nsuo ani hyeɛ
de kɔsi deɛ hann ne sum awieeɛ hyia hɔ.
11Ɔsoro nnyinasoɔ hinhim,
na wɔn ho dwiri wɔn, n’ateatea ano.
12Ɔde ne tumi nu ɛpo mu,
na ɔde ne nhunumu brɛ Ɛpobɔpɔn ase.
13 Ne honhom ano na ɔsoro teɛ,
ne nsa na ɛhwire ɔwɔ a ne ho yɛ herɛ no mu.
14Hwɛ, yeinom ne n’akwan ano ano,
na ɛho asomusɛm bi nko na yɛteɛ,
na ne mmaninyɛ prannaa a ɛbom no, hwan na ɔbɛhunu mu?

Title: HIOB 27
Content:
Hiob kyerɛ ne bemdie ne abɔnefoɔ ahotɔ a ɛnkyɛ
1Na Hiob kɔɔ so maa n’abebusɛm so sɛ:
2Sɛ Onyankopɔn a wayi me bem korɔ
ne Otumfoɔ a ɔhyɛ me kra awerɛhoɔ no te aseɛ yi, —
3na m’ahome nyinaa da so wɔ me mu,
na Nyankopɔn ahome da so wɔ me hwene mu yi,
4 ampa ara, m’ano renka amumuyɛsɛm,
na me tɛkyerɛma renka nnaadaasɛm!
5Ɛmpare me sɛ mɛbu mo bem;
meremma wɔnyi me mudie mfiri me ho de bɛkɔ akɔsi sɛ mɛgyaa mu.
6 Mɛkura me tenenee mu denden, na merennyaa mu;
m’akoma remmu me fɔ, me nna biara ho.
7Me tamfo nyɛ sɛ ɔbɔnefoɔ,
na deɛ ɔma ne ho so tia me no nyɛ sɛ omumuyɛfoɔ.
8 Na ɛdeɛn ne ɔbɔnefoɔ anidasoɔ berɛ a wɔtwa ne nkwa soɔ,
berɛ a Onyankopɔn twe ne kra korɔ no?
9Onyankopɔn bɛte ne sufrɛ
berɛ a ahohiahia bɛba ne soɔ no anaa?
10Anaasɛ n’ani bɛgye Otumfoɔ ho,
ɔbɛfrɛ Onyankopɔn berɛ nyinaa mu anaa?
11Mɛkyerɛ mo Nyankopɔn nsa ho asɛm,
deɛ ɛwɔ Otumfoɔ hɔ no, merensi so.
12Hwɛ, mo deɛ, mo nyinaa moahunu,
na adɛn na moda so di ahuhusɛm yi?
13Yei ne onipa ɔbɔnefoɔ kyɛfa a ɔnya no Onyankopɔn hɔ,
ne nhyɛsofoɔ agyapadeɛ a wɔnya no Otumfoɔ nsam:
14 Sɛ ne mma dɔɔso a, wɔdɔɔso ma afena,
na wɔn a wɔfiri ne mu no aduane remmee wɔn.
15Ne nnipa a wɔbɛka no, owuyadeɛ mu na wɔbɛsie wɔn,
na n’akunafoɔ rensu.
16Sɛ ɔboa dwetɛ ano sɛ mfuturo,
na ɔsiesie ntadeɛ sɛ dɔteɛ a,
17 ɔsiesie deɛ, nanso ɔteneneeni na ɔbɛhyɛ,
na dwetɛ no, deɛ ɔdi bem na ɔbɛkyɛ mu.
18Ɔsi ne dan sɛ abubummabaa,
na ɛte sɛ sese a ɔwɛmfoɔ yɛ.
19Ɔrekɔda, na ɔyɛ ɔdefoɔ, nso ɔrenna so nyɛ saa bio;
ɔbɛbue n’ani na ɔnni hɔ bio.
20Ahuyideɛ fa no sɛ nsuo,
anadwo na ahum wia no korɔ.
21Apueeɛ mframa soa no kɔ,
na ɛhwim no firi ne tenabea.
22Na ɔto gu ne so, na ɔnni ne ho adɔna,
dwane ara na ɔrepɛ adwane afiri ne nsam.
23Wɔbɛbobɔ nsam agu ne so,
na wɔabɔ ne so hwerɛma de no afiri ne tenabea akɔ.

Title: HIOB 28
Content:
Ɛhe na nyansa firi? Mpeepee Nyankopɔn nyansa mu
1Aane dwetɛ wɔ ne nkommena,
na afa wɔ hɔ ma sika a wɔhorɔ.
2Dadeɛ nso wɔtu no famu,
na wɔnane aboɔ yɛ kɔbere.
3Onipa ma esum to twa,
na ɔhwehwɛ kɔduru akyirikyiri
pɛ sum kabii ne sunsum mu aboɔ.
4Ɔtu nkoron deɛ obi nteɛ hɔ,
anammɔn a ɛtwam werɛ firi no,
ɔsensɛne hɔ, ɔdi ahim deɛ ɔdasani biara nnie hɔ.
5Asase wɔ hɔ yi, aduane firi mu ba,
na n’ase nso, ɔdane ani sɛ ogya.
6Hoaboɔ dabea ne n’aboɔ no mu,
na sikafuturo nso wɔ hɔ.
7Ɛyɛ ɔkwan a ɔkɔdeɛ nnim,
na akorɔma ani nhunuu da,
8anworanwora mmoa ntiatiaa soɔ,
na gyatabire mfaa hɔ.
9Ɔtene ne nsa ka ɔbohemmaa,
ɔbutu mmepɔ wɔ ne nhini mu.
10Ɔtwitwa aka abotan mu,
na n’ani hwɛ aboɔdenneɛ nyinaa.
11 Ɔsisi asuasu kwan na ansosɔ,
na adeɛ a ahunta no, ɔyi ba hann mu.
12Na nyansa deɛ, ɛhe na wɔbɛhu no,
na ɛhe na nhunumu afa wɔ?
13Ɔdasani nnim ne boɔ,
na wɔnhu no ateasefoɔ asase so.
14Ebunu donkodonko ka sɛ: Ɛnni me mu.
Na ɛpo ka sɛ: Ɛnni me hɔ.
15 Wɔmfa sika amapa nsi ananmu nnye,
na wɔnkari dwetɛ ntua ne tiri boɔ.
16 Wɔnkari no Ofir sika so ntɔ,
wɔmfa apopobibireboɔ a ne boɔ yɛ den ne hoaboɔ ntɔ.
17Wɔmfa sika ne ahwehwɛ nto ho,
na wɔmfa sika nnwinneɛ nsesa.
18Wɔmmɔ nhwene panin ne aboɔ a ɛhyerɛn din,
na nyansa boɔ sene nhwene pa deɛ.
19 Etiopia asase so akrateboɔ ne no nsɛ,
na wɔmfa sika amapa nkyerɛ ne boɔ.
20Ɛnneɛ na ɛhe na nyansa firi ba?
Na ɛhe na nhunumu tenabea wɔ?
21Wɔde ahunta ateasefoɔ nyinaa aniwa,
wɔakata so ɔsoro nnomaa anim.
22Ɔyera amena ne owuo ka sɛ:
Yɛde yɛn aso ate ne nka.
23 Onyankopɔn na ɔhunu ne kwan mu,
na ɔno na ɔnim ne tenabea;
24na ɔno na ɔhwɛ asase awieeɛ,
ɔsoro ase nyinaa nso, ɔhunu.
25 Ɔhyɛɛ mframa duro too hɔ,
na ɔhyɛɛ nsuo sɛ ne nsusuiɛ teɛ no,
26berɛ a ɔhyɛɛ osuo ahyɛdeɛ,
na ɔyɛɛ ɔkwan maa n’aprannaa asraman no,
27ɛno na ɔhunuiɛ na ɔyii no adie;
ɔde sii hɔ na ɔpeepee mu.
28 Na ɔka kyerɛɛ onipa sɛ:
Hwɛ, AWURADE ho suro, ɛno ne nyansa,
na bɔne ho dwanneɛ ne nhunumu.

Title: HIOB 29
Content:
Hiob kyerɛ n’ahotɔ a atwam
1Na Hiob kɔɔ so maa n’abebusɛm so sɛ:
2O, sɛ anka mereyɛ sɛdeɛ na meteɛ akane abosome no,
sɛ nna a Onyankopɔn hwɛɛ me soɔ no ɛ!
3 Berɛ a ne kanea hyerɛn m’atifi,
na mede ne hann menantee sum mu no!
4 Sɛdeɛ na meteɛ wɔ me twaberɛ nna mu,
berɛ a Nyankopɔn ayɔnkofa wɔ me ntomadan soɔ no;
5berɛ a Otumfoɔ ne me da so wɔ hɔ,
na me mmɔfra nso atwa me ho ahyia,
6berɛ a me nan ho fɔɔ nufosuo mu sradeɛ mu,
na abotan maa ngo asubɔnten senee me hɔ no.
7Mefiri adi mekɔ kuro pono ano,
na mede m’adwa mesi mpraeɛ so a,
8mmeranteɛ hu me, na wɔhunta,
na nkɔkoraa sɔre gyinagyina.
9Mmapɔmma gyae kasa,
na wɔde wɔn nsa butu wɔn ano.
10Mmakoma nne taa dinn,
na wɔn tɛkyerɛma fam wɔn dodom.
11Na aso te a, ɛhyira me,
na ani hu me a, ɛdi me adanseɛ.
12 Ɛfiri sɛ na meyi ɔmanehunufoɔ a ɔsu frɛ ɔboafoɔ
ne awisiaa a ɔnni boafoɔ.
13Deɛ ɔreyɛ ayera no nhyira ba me so,
na mema ɔbaa kunafoɔ nya abotɔyam.
14Mefira tenenee na ɛfira me,
m’atemmusɛm te sɛ atadeɛ yuu ne abotire:
15Meyɛɛ aniwa maa onifirani,
na meyɛɛ ɛnan nso maa apakye;
16 meyɛɛ agya maa ahiafoɔ,
na deɛ menni no no mpo asɛm, mehwehwɛ mu maa no;
17 na mebubuu omumuyɛfoɔ sebɔmmɔfoɔ,
na mehwim fomfa adeɛ mefirii ne se mu.
18Na mekaa sɛ: Me pirebuo ara mu na mɛgyaa mu,
na mama me nna adɔɔso sɛ anwea.
19Me nhini mu bɛbue ama nsuo,
na obosuo nso atena me mman so.
20M’animuonyam yɛ foforɔ ma me,
na me tadua anya denyɛ foforɔ me nsam.
21Me na wɔtie me na wɔtwɛn me,
na wɔyɛ komm tie m’afotuo;
22me kasa akyi wɔnsane nkasa,
na me nsɛm sosɔ gu wɔn so:
23Na wɔtwɛn me sɛdeɛ wɔtwɛn osutorɔ,
na wɔtrɛ wɔn anomu sɛdeɛ wɔde regye bereamporɔsuo.
24Mesere mekyerɛ wɔn a anidasoɔ abɔ wɔn,
na m’anim a ɛteɛ no, wɔmma no ngu ase.
25Meyii wɔn kwan memaa wɔn, metenaa ase sɛ otitire,
na metenaa hɔ sɛ ɔhene, asafo mu,
sɛ deɛ ɔkyekyere abooboodifoɔ werɛ.

Title: HIOB 30
Content:
Hiob kyerɛ ne seesei asetena a ɛyɛ mmɔborɔ
1 Na afei wɔn a mekyɛne wɔn panin koraa sere me,
wɔn a mepo wɔn agyanom
sɛ mede wɔn bɛhyɛ me nkraman a wɔhwɛ me nnwankuo so mu,
2wɔn nsam tumi nso bɛyɛ me dɛn,
wɔn a wɔn ahoɔden asa?
3Ohia ne ɛkɔm nti wɔatwintwam,
wɔwewe nkyɛkyerɛ so
deɛ ɛhɔ yɛ sakasaka, kusuu ne basabasa.
4Wɔtete nkyenhahan wɔ nnuaa so,
na ɛserɛ so nnuaa nhini ne wɔn aduane.
5Wɔatu wɔn afiri nnipa mu,
wɔhuro wɔn sɛ owifoɔ.
6Mmonhwa a ɛhɔ yɛ hu mu na wɔteteɛ,
ɛfam ne abotan mu ntokuro mu.
7Nnua ntam na wɔbobom,
nsansono ase na wɔsam.
8Agyegyentwie mma ne wɔn,
wɔn a wɔnni din mma nso,
wɔapam wɔn afiri asase so.
9 Na afei madane wɔn sankuo dwom,
na mayɛ wɔn sɛmɔdɛ.
10 Wɔkyiri me, wɔma me ne wɔn ntam twe,
na wɔnkame sɛ wɔtoto ntasuo gu m’ani soɔ.
11Na ɛnam sɛ Onyankopɔn asane me homa, na wabrɛ me aseɛ nti,
wɔn nso ato ahohyɛsoɔ atwene wɔ m’anim.
12Me nifa so na ahuhufoɔ no asɔreɛ,
wɔsum me fidie,
na wɔdane wɔn sɛeɛ akwan ba me so.
13Wɔdwiri me kwan,
wɔboa me sɛeɛ,
nso obiara biara nsianka wɔn.
14Wɔba sɛ obuba a emu trɛ,
wɔnam huuyɛ no mu munimuni ba.
15Ahuyideɛ adane hwɛ me so,
wɔpamo me bakomadie sɛ mframa,
na me yiedie asene kɔ sɛ mununkum.
16 Na afei me kra nane gu me mu,
amanehunu nna asosɔ me mu.
17Anadwo hodwo me nnompe wɔ me mu,
na yea a ɛwe me no nnyae.
18 Emu den nko ara nti m’atadeɛ asakyera,
ɛmia me sɛ me kamisaa kɔn.
19Wato me atwene atɛkyɛ mu,
me ho ayɛ sɛ dɔteɛ ne nso.
20 Mesu mefrɛ wo, na wonnye me so,
megyina hɔ, na wohwɛ me haa.
21Woadane ayɛ sɛ otirimuɔdenfoɔ ama me,
wode wo nsa a ɛyɛ den ne me di asie.
22Woma me so ma metena mframa so kɔ,
na woma menane huuyɛ mu.
23Na menim sɛ wode me bɛsane ama owuo
ne efie a ateasefoɔ hyia mu no.
24Nanso obi ntene ne nsa nhwehwɛ ɔgyeɛ nkunkumaboɔkuo mu,
na sɛ obi reyera a, ɔnsu mfrɛ ɔboafoɔ anaa?
25Mansu mamma deɛ ɔwɔ amaneɛ mu,
ohiani anyɛ me kra mmɔbɔ anaa?
26 Na metwɛn adepa, nso bɔne na aba,
na m’ani daa hann so, na esum kabii aba.
27Me yamuadeɛ huru, na ɛnnyae,
amanehunu nna ato me.
28Mabiri tumm na menenam, nso ɛmfiri awia;
mesɔre badwa mu na meteam.
29Madane ɛserɛ so akraman nua
ne sohoribereɛ adamfo.
30Me wedeɛ abiri rewae afiri me ho,
na ahuhuro nti me nnompe ahye.
31 Na me sankuo adane abooboo,
na me tɛntɛbɛn adane asufoɔ nne.

Title: HIOB 31
Content:
Hiob kyerɛ sɛ n’abrabɔ tene
1 Apam na me ne m’ani apam,
na adɛn na memfa m’ani menkari ɔbaabunu?
2Na anka ɛdeɛn ne Nyankopɔn kyɛfa a ɛfiri soro,
ne Otumfoɔ agyapadeɛ a ɛfiri sorɔnsorɔmmea?
3Ɛnyɛ ɔsɛeɛ ne obusufoɔ adeɛ,
na akatua denden ne amumuyɛfoɔ kyɛfa anaa?
4 Ɛnyɛ ɔno na ɔhunu m’akwan,
na ɔkan m’anammɔn tutuo nyinaa?
5Sɛ medii ahuhudeɛ akyi,
na me nan pɛɛ nnaadaa ho ntɛm a,
6ɔnkari me nsaniakwanmu mu,
na Onyankopɔn nhunu me mudie no.
7 Sɛ me nan mane firii ɔkwan no so,
na m’akoma dii m’ani akyi,
na nkekaeɛ wɔ me nsam a,
8ɛnneɛ wɔmma mennua na obi nni,
na wɔntutu me nnɔbaeɛ ngu.
9Sɛ wɔdaadaa m’akoma ɔbaa bi ho,
na metɛɛ me yɔnko pono ano a,
10 ɛnneɛ ma me yere nyam mma obi,
na ebinom nkom ne so,
11na ɛno na ɛyɛ aniwusɛm,
na ɛno ne asɛnnifoɔ anim amumuyɛ.
12Na ɛno ne ogya a ɛhye kɔ ɔyera amena mu,
na anka ɛbɛtutu me nnɔbaeɛ nyinaa.
13Sɛ mammu m’akoa anaa m’afenaa atemmuo hwee
berɛ a wɔne me wɔ ɛham bi a,
14ɛnneɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn sɔre a, ɛdeɛn na mɛyɛ?
Na sɛ ɔbisa a, ɛdeɛn na mede bɛbua no?
15 Ɛnyɛ deɛ ɔyɛɛ me no na ɔyɛɛ no ɔyafunu mu,
na ɔbaakofoɔ na ɔsiesiee yɛn nyinaa ɛna yam?
16 Sɛ masianka mmɔborɔfoɔ afiri deɛ wɔhwehwɛ ho,
na mama akunafoɔ ani abu,
17na me nkutoo madi m’aduane,
na awisiaa anni mu bi a,
18mmom ɛfiri ne mmɔfraase na meyɛnee no sɛ agya,
na ɛfiri ne na yam na mekyerɛɛ no kwan,
19sɛ mahunu obi a ntoma abɔ no nti ɔreyera
na nkataho bi nni ohiani nsam,
20na sɛ n’asenem anhyira me,
na wamfa me nnwan nwi anhyɛ ne ho hye,
21 na sɛ mama me nsa so awisiaa so,
ɛfiri sɛ mehunuu me boa kuro pono mu a,
22ɛnneɛ me mmatiri nhwan mfiri ne dompe so,
na me nsa mmubu mfiri ne dompe so.
23 Ɛfiri sɛ mmusuo a ɛfiri Onyankopɔn yii me hu,
na ne kɛseyɛ nti mantumi manyɛ hwee.
24 Sɛ mede sika mayɛ m’ahotosoɔ,
na maka makyerɛ sika amapa sɛ m’anidasoɔ ne no,
25na sɛ m’ani gyee sɛ m’ahodeɛ dɔɔso,
ne sɛ me nsa aka adeɛ bebree,
26 na sɛ mehunuu owia hann sɛ ɛhyerɛn,
na ɔsrane nam ne haran mu,
27 na ɛdaadaa m’akoma kokoam,
na m’ano fee me nsa ho de mae a,
28na anka mapa Onyankopɔn a ɔwɔ soro no akyi,
ɛno nso ne ɔtemmufoɔ anim amumuyɛ bi.
29 Sɛ m’ani gyee me tamfo amanehunu ho,
na me ho sanee me sɛ bɔne ato no,
30 nso mamma m’ano anyɛ bɔne,
sɛ mede nnome bɛsrɛ ne wuo;
31ampa ara me ntomadan mufoɔ anka sɛ:
Hwan na Hiob maa no nam a ammee no?
32 Ɔhɔhoɔ biara ansoɛ abɔntene so,
mebuee me pono mekyerɛɛ akwantufoɔ,
33sɛ mekataa me mmarato so sɛ Adam, na mede m’amumuyɛ mesiee me kokom,
34ɛfiri sɛ mesuroo nkurɔfoɔ dodoɔ
na abusuafoɔ ahohorabɔ yii me hu,
na ɛmaa meyɛɛ komm, mamfiri me pono ano amfiri adi a.
35 O, sɛ anka merenya obi a ɔbɛtie me ɛ!
(Hwɛ, m’agyiraeɛ nie! Otumfoɔ mmua me!)
O, sɛ anka ɔbarima a ɔne me anya no retwerɛ asɛm a ɔne me wɔ no ɛ!
36Anka ampa ara mede bɛto me mmati,
mede bɛbɔ me ti sɛ abotire,
37anka mɛkyerɛ no m’anammɔntutuo dodoɔ,
mɛtwe apini no sɛ ɔhene.
38Sɛ m’asase team tia me,
na n’akofie de nne korɔ su,
39 na sɛ medii n’aba na mamma sika,
na memaa ɔdenadeɛ hweree ne kra, a,
40ɛnneɛ ma nkasɛɛ mmɛsi ayuo ananmu mfifi,
na nnɛnkyɛnse mmɛsi atokoɔ ananmu.
Hiob nsɛm no asi.

Title: HIOB 32
Content:
Elihu asɛnka a ɛdi kan. Ɔkyerɛ deɛ enti a ɔkasa
1Ɛnna mmarima baasa yi gyaee Hiob bua, ɛfiri sɛ ɔyɛ n’ani so teneneeni. 2 Na Busini Elihu a ɔyɛ Barakel ba a ɔfiri Ram abusua mu bo fui. Hiob na ne bo fuu no, ɛfiri sɛ ɔbu ne ho teneneeni sene Onyankopɔn. 3 Na ne bo fuu ne mfɛfoɔ baasa no nso, sɛ wɔnnya mmuaeɛ bi bio, nanso wɔbuu Hiob fɔ. 4Na Elihu twɛn maa Hiob kasae ansa, ɛfiri sɛ wɔsene no panin. 5Na Elihu hunuu sɛ mmuaeɛ biara nni mmarima baasa no anomu bio no, ne bo fui.
6Na Busini Elihu a ɔyɛ Barakel ba buaa sɛ:
Me deɛ, meyɛ abɔfra,
na mo deɛ moyɛ nkɔkoraa,
enti na metɔɔ me bo aseɛ,
na mesuroo sɛ mɛka deɛ menim makyerɛ mo.
7 Mekaa sɛ: Wɔmma onyinkyerɛ nkasa,
aane, na mfeɛ dodoɔ nkyerɛ nyansa.
8Ampa, honhom a ɛwɔ ɔdasani mu
ne Otumfoɔ ahome na ɛma no nhunumu.
9Ɛnyɛ wɔn a wɔanyini pii na wɔnim nyansa,
na ɛnyɛ mpanin na wɔhunu atemmuo mu.
10Enti na mese: Montie me;
me nso mɛkyerɛ deɛ menim.
11Hwɛ, matwɛn ama mo akasa awie,
mayɛ aso mama mo nhunumusɛm,
sɛ mobɛhwehwɛ anya nsɛm.
12Na mewɛn m’aso sɛ meretie mo,
na hwɛ, obiara nni mo mu a n’asɛm tɔɔ Hiob aso mu,
na ɔtumi buaa ne nsɛm no.
13Na monnka sɛ: Yɛahunu nyansa;
Onyankopɔn na ɔnha no, na ɛnyɛ onipa.
14Ɛfiri sɛ ɛnyɛ me na ɔkaa ne nsɛm no kyerɛɛ me,
na me nso, meremfa mo nsɛm no memmua no.
15Wɔn abam abu, wɔremmua bio,
na wɔn anomu nsɛm nso asa.
16Na sɛ wɔnkasa bio, na wɔgyina hɔ,
na wɔmmua bio nti, mentwɛn anaa?
17Me nso mɛbua me fam deɛ,
me nso, mɛkyerɛ deɛ menim.
18Na nsɛm ahyɛ me ma,
na honhom a ɛwɔ me mu no hyɛ me.
19Hwɛ, me yam te sɛ nsa a wɔntuu ano,
sɛ nsa kotokuo foforɔ a ɛrepɛ apaeɛ.
20Mɛkasa, na manya ahomeyɛ;
mɛbue m’ano, na mabua.
21Ɛmpare me sɛ mɛhwɛ obi anim,
na madɛfɛdɛfɛ m’ano mama onipa,
22na mennim m’ano adɛfɛdɛfɛ,
anka ebia ɛbɛka ketewaa sɛɛ, na me yɛfoɔ afa me akɔ.

Title: HIOB 33
Content:
1Na afei, Hiob, tie me kasa ɛ,
na yɛ aso ma me nsɛm nyinaa.
2Hwɛ, mabue m’ano,
me tɛkyerɛma rekasa me dodom.
3M’akomam teeyɛ ne me nsɛm,
m’ano ka nimdeɛ kronkron.
4Nyankopɔn honhom na ɛyɛɛ me,
na Otumfoɔ no ahome na ɛmaa me nkwa.
5Sɛ wobɛtumi a, yi ano kyerɛ me;
Siesie wo ho m’anim, sɔre gyina.
6 Hwɛ, me nso meyɛ Nyankopɔn deɛ sɛ wo ara,
anwommoɔ mu na wɔtii me nso firiiɛ.
7Hwɛ, me ho hu rentu w’akoma,
na me nhyɛsoɔ renyɛ wo so duru.
8Ampa, woaka no m’aso mu,
na nsɛm nne na metee sɛ wose:
9 Me deɛ, me ho te, mmarato nni me ho;
me ho yɛ tɔtorɔtɔɔ, amumuyɛ biara nni me ho.
10 Hwɛ, ɔhunu ntɔkwa nsɛm wɔ me ho,
ɔbu me sɛ ne tamfo.
11 Ɔde me nan hyɛ mpokyerɛ mu,
ɔkari m’akwan nyinaa.
12Hwɛ, yei mu na wontene, merebua wo;
na Onyankopɔn so sene ɔdasani.
13Adɛn nti na wo ne no ham,
sɛ ɔmmua ne nsɛm nyinaa ho?
14Nso Onyankopɔn kasa prɛko
ne deɛ ɛtia mprenu, nanso onipa nnwene ho.
15Daeɛ mu, anadwo adehunu mu,
nnahɔɔ a atɔ nnipa soɔ mu,
mpa so nnaeɛ mu,
16 emu na ɔbue nnipa aso,
na ɔsɔ wɔn atenetene ano,
17 sɛ ɔbɛsane onipa afiri ne nneyɛɛ ho,
na wayi ahantan ahunta onipa,
18na watwe ne kra afiri Amena mu,
ne ne nkwa nso na antɔ afena ano.
19Na wɔde yea twe n’aso ne mpa so
ne ne nnompe mu daa aperedie.
20Na ne nkwa ma aduane fono no,
na ne kra po akɔnnɔduane.
21Ne honam afɔn ama no ayɛ hununa,
na ne nnompe a anka wɔnhunu mpo ada adi.
22Na ne kra bɛn ɔsɛeɛ Amena,
na ne nkwa nso bɛn akumfoɔ.
23 Sɛ ɔbɔfoɔ dimafoɔ wɔ hɔ ma no,
apem no mu ɔbaako,
sɛ ɔrekyerɛ onipa deɛ ɛtene ma no a,
24ɛno na ɔhu no mmɔbɔ ka sɛ: Kɔgye no,
na wankɔ ɔsɛeɛ Amena no mu,
na manya agyedeɛ, a,
25 ɛnneɛ ne honam yɛ sɔɔsɔɔ sɛ mmɔfra deɛ,
ɔsane kɔ ne mmeranteberɛ mu.
26Ɔkoto Onyankopɔn a, n’ani sɔ no,
na ɔhunu n’anim anigyeɛ mu,
na ɔdane ɔdasani tenenee ma no,
27na ɔto dwom kyerɛ nnipa sɛ:
Mayɛ bɔne, na makyea deɛ ɛtene no,
nanso ɔne me anni no sɛdeɛ ɛfata me.
28 Wagye me kra na ankɔ ɔsɛeɛ Amena mu,
na me nkwa rehunu hann no.
29Hwɛ, yeinom nyinaa na Onyankopɔn yɛ
mprenu ne mprɛnsa wɔ onipa ho,
30 sɛ ɔbɛsane ne kra afiri ɔsɛeɛ Amena ho,
na wanya hann, nkwa hann no mu.
31Yɛ aso, Hiob, na tie me;
yɛ komm, na menkasa.
32Sɛ nsɛm bi wɔ hɔ a, yi ano kyerɛ me,
kasa, na wo bemdie bɛyɛ me fɛ.
33Sɛ ɛnte saa a, ɛnneɛ tie me ara,
yɛ komm, na menkyerɛ wo nyansa.

Title: HIOB 34
Content:
Elihu kɔ so ara ka Hiob anim
1Na Elihu toaa so sɛ:
2Anyansafoɔ, montie me nsɛm,
na mo, animdefoɔ, monyɛ aso mma me.
3 Na aso na ɛsɔ nsɛm hwɛ,
na ano ka aduane hwɛ.
4Yɛbɛsɔ atemmuo ahwɛ afa,
na yɛahunu deɛ ɛyɛ yɛn ntam.
5 Na Hiob aka sɛ: Metene,
nanso Onyankopɔn afa me bem kɔ.
6 Me bem mu ara na wɔbu me torofoɔ,
m’agyan kuro mu ayɛ den, nanso mmarato nni me mu.
7 Ɔbarima bɛn na ɔte sɛ Hiob
a ɔnom mmusubɔ sɛ nsuo,
8 na ɔhyɛne amumuyɛfoɔ ayɔnkofa mu,
na ɔne nnipa abɔnefoɔ ananteɛ?
9 Na ɔka sɛ: Ɛnyɛ mfasoɔ mma onipa
sɛ ɔne Onyankopɔn bɔ.
10Enti mo a mowɔ tire, montie me,
ɛmpare Onyankopɔn sɛ ɔbɛdi asɛmmɔne,
na Otumfoɔ bɛdi amumuyɛsɛm,
11 na mmom, onipa nneyɛɛ so ka na ɔtua no,
na sɛdeɛ obi kwan teɛ no, saa na ɔma no to no.
12 Ampa ara, Onyankopɔn nni asɛmmɔne,
na Otumfoɔ nkyea atemmuo.
13Hwan na ɔde asase hyɛɛ ne nsa,
na hwan na ɔsiesiee wiase nyinaa?
14Sɛ ɔgye ne home fa
na ɔtwe ne honhom ne n’ahome ba ne nkyɛn a,
15 anka honam nyinaa bɛgyaa mu prɛko,
na onipa bɛsane akɔ dɔteɛ mu.
16Na sɛ wowɔ nhunumu a, tie yei,
yɛ aso ma me nsɛm.
17Deɛ ɔkyiri atɛntenenee bɛnya aman adi so anaa?
Anaasɛ wobɛbu ɔteneneeni tumfoɔ no fɔ?
18Deɛ ɔka kyerɛ ɔhene sɛ: Ohuhuni!
Ne mmapɔmma sɛ: Abɔnefoɔ!
19Deɛ ɔnhwɛ atitire anim,
na ɔmmu ɔdehyeɛ nsene mmɔborɔni;
ɛfiri sɛ ne nsa ano adwuma ne wɔn nyinaa.
20Mpofirim na wɔwuo,
na adasuo mu na aman hinhim na wɔsene korɔ,
na wɔpra aberempɔn kɔ, nso ɛnnam onipa nsa so.
21 Na n’ani wɔ onipa akwan so,
na ɔhunu n’anammɔntutuo nyinaa.
22 Esum nni hɔ, na esum kabii nni hɔ,
na amumuyɛfoɔ de wɔn ho ahunta hɔ.
23Na ɛnhia sɛ ɔhwɛ onipa ma no kyɛ
ansa na wakɔ Nyankopɔn nkyɛn, atemmuo mu.
24Ɔbubu aberempɔn a ɔnhwehwɛ wɔn asɛm mu,
na ɔde afoforɔ si wɔn ananmu.
25Ɛno nti ɔhwɛ wɔn nneyɛɛ,
na ɔbutu wɔn anadwo ma wɔdwerɛ wɔn.
26Ɔhwe wɔn sɛ abɔnefoɔ
ma nnipa nyinaa hunu.
27Ɛfiri sɛ wɔmane firii n’akyiri kɔe,
na wɔannwene n’akwan no biara ho,
28 sɛ wɔbɛma mmɔborɔni sufrɛ aduru ne nkyɛn,
na wate amanehunufoɔ sufrɛ.
29Na sɛ ɔno na ɔma no dwo a, hwan na ɔbɛbu fɔ?
Na ɔde n’ani hunta a, hwan na ɔbɛhu no?
Ɔman mu so oo, ɔbaakofoɔ so oo, ɔyɛ no pɛ,
30na onipa kɔnkɔnsani anni hene,
na wɔansum ɔman fidie.
31Na obi bɛka akyerɛ Onyankopɔn sɛ:
Mahunu amane, merenyɛ amumuyɛ bio,
32 deɛ mennya menhunuiɛ, wo na kyerɛ me,
sɛ madi amumuyɛsɛm a, merenni bio?
33Na worepo ne nneyɛɛ yi, ɔnhyɛ wo ananmu sɛdeɛ wopɛ anaa?
Enti wo na ɛsɛ sɛ woyi, na ɛnyɛ me,
na deɛ wonim no, ka ɛ!
34Nnipa a wɔwɔ tire bɛka akyerɛ me,
na ɔbarima nyansafoɔ bɛtie ama me,
35 Hiob deɛ, ɛnyɛ nimdeɛ so na ɔkasa,
na ne nsɛm mu nni nhunumu.
36Sɛ anka wɔresɔ Hiob ahwɛ akɔsi awieeɛ ɛ,
ɛfiri sɛ ne mmuaeɛ te sɛ amumuyɛfoɔ mmuaeɛ.
37 Na ɔde mmusubɔ ka ne bɔne ho,
yɛn mu mpo ɔbɔ ne nsam,
na ɔma ne nsɛm a ɔne Onyankopɔn de di asie no dɔɔso.

Title: HIOB 35
Content:
1Na Elihu kɔɔ so ara kaa sɛ:
2 Wobu no sɛ ɛtene,
anaa woka sɛ: Me tenenee sene Nyankopɔn deɛ,
3 sɛ woka sɛ: Ɛbɛyɛ me mfasoɔ bɛn?
Na mfasoɔ bɛn na mɛnya asene sɛ anka meyɛɛ bɔne?
4Me deɛ, mede nsɛm bɛbua wo
ne wo mfɛfoɔ a wɔka wo ho no.
5Hwɛ ɔsoro, na hunu,
na hwɛ mununkum a ɛkorɔn sene woɔ no.
6 Sɛ woyɛ bɔne a, ɛdeɛn na wode yɛ no,
na sɛ wo mmarato dɔɔso a, ɛdeɛn na woyɛ no?
7 Sɛ wotene a, ɛdeɛn na wode ma no,
anaasɛ wo nsam ɛdeɛn na ɔgyeɛ?
8Onipa a ɔte sɛ woɔ na w’abɔnefosɛm pira no,
na onipa ba bi na wo tenenee bɛma no anya mfasoɔ.
9Nhyɛsoɔ bebrebe nti na ɛma wɔteam,
wɔsu frɛ ɔboafoɔ, nnipa akɛseɛ nsa ase.
10 Nanso obi nka sɛ: Ɛhe na Onyankopɔn,
me yɛfoɔ no wɔ? Deɛ ɔma nnwom anadwo,
11deɛ ɔkyerɛ yɛn nimdeɛ sene asase so mmoa,
na ɔkyerɛ yɛn nyansa sene ɔsoro nnomaa no.
12Ɛhɔ na wɔteam, na ɔmmua,
abɔnefoɔ ahantan nti.
13 Ampa ara Onyankopɔn rentie ahuhusɛm,
na Otumfoɔ remmu.
14 Na nkantom sɛ wose: Wonhu no deɛ
nanso asɛm no da n’anim, na wotwɛn no ara!
15 Na afei ɛnam sɛ ɔmmɛtwee aso, n’abufuo mu,
na ɔnni amumuyɛ akyiri pii nti,
16Hiob bue n’ano kwa,
na nimdeɛ a ɔnnie mu, ɔma nsɛm dɔɔso.

Title: HIOB 36
Content:
Elihu asɛnka a ɛtwa toɔ
1Na Elihu kɔɔ so sɛ:
2Ma me kwan kakra, na menkyerɛ wo,
na meda so wɔ nsɛm bi meka ma Onyankopɔn.
3Mɛfa me nimdeɛ afiri akyirikyiri,
na mede me yɛfoɔ no bem ama no.
4Na ampa, me nsɛm nyɛ atorɔ,
deɛ ɔdi mu nimdeɛ mu na ɔne wo wɔ hɔ yi.
5Hwɛ, Onyankopɔn yɛ ɔkɛseɛ,
na ɔmmu obi animtia, ɔyɛ ɔkɛseɛ, nteaseɛ tumi mu.
6 Ɔmma ɔbɔnefoɔ nnya nkwa,
na ɔde amanehunufoɔ bem ma wɔn.
7Ɔnyi n’ani mfiri ɔteneneeni so,
na ɔma wɔne ahemfo tena adwa so daa,
na wɔma wɔn so.
8Na sɛ wɔgu wɔn nkɔnsɔnkɔnsɔn,
na wɔde amaneɛ nhoma kye wɔn a,
9ɛnna ɔka wɔn nneyɛɛ kyerɛ wɔn,
ne wɔn mmarato, sɛ wɔama wɔn ho soɔ,
10 na ɔbue wɔn aso ma atenetene,
na ɔka sɛ wɔnsane mfiri abusudeɛ ho.
11Sɛ wɔtie na wɔsom no a,
wɔwie wɔn nna di yiedie mu,
ne wɔn mfeɛ nso deɛ ɛyɛ wɔn dɛ mu.
12Na sɛ wɔantie a, wɔtɔ dadeɛ ano,
na wɔgyaa mu nimdeɛ a abɔ wɔn no mu.
13Na akoma mu ansuronyamefoɔ kora abufuo,
sɛ ɔkyekyere wɔn a, wɔnkoto nsrɛ.
14Wɔn kra wu mmeranteberɛ mu,
na wɔn nkwa sɛe sɛ nnwamamfoɔ deɛ no.
15 Ɔyi ɔmanehunufoɔ n’amaneɛ mu,
na ɔbue wɔn aso ahodwan no mu.
16Anka ɔbɛgye wo nso afiri ahohiahia mu
akɔ deɛ ɛhɔ trɛ a ahokyere nnie hɔ,
na sradeɛ ayɛ wo pono so aduane ma.
17Nanso ɔbɔnefoɔ atemmuo ayɛ wo ma,
atemmuo ne atɛntenenee asɔ wo mu.
18Na mma abufuo nnnyegye wo nnkɔ ahiyie mu,
na mma agyedeɛ no dodoɔ nnhima w’ani.
19W’ahonyadeɛ anaa wo tumi ahoɔdenneɛ nyinaa
de wo bɛsi deɛ ahohiahia nnie hɔ anaa?
20Mpere anadwo ho,
sɛ ɛmmɛpra aman mfiri wɔn afa.
21Hwɛ yie, nnane w’ani nkɔ ahuhudeɛ so,
ɛfiri sɛ wopɛ ɛno mmom sene amanehunu.
22 Hwɛ, Onyankopɔn di ne tumi mu asɛnkɛseɛ,
hwan ne ɔkyerɛkyerɛfoɔ sɛ ɔno?
23Hwan na ɔhyɛɛ no sɛdeɛ ɔnyɛ n’adeɛ mfa,
na hwan na ɔbɛka sɛ: Woadi asɛmmɔne?
24Kae sɛdeɛ wobɛkamfo ne nneyɛɛ
a adasa ato ho dwom no.
25Nnipa nyinaa hwɛ ara;
ɔdasani firi akyirikyiri hwɛ.
26Hwɛ, Onyankopɔn so, na yɛnni no;
ne mfeɛ dodoɔ nso mu nni hwehwɛbea.
27 Ɔno na ɔtwe nsuo ntoantoa
a ɛsosɔ tɔ ne mununkum mu nsuo,
28na ɛfiri mununkum mu tɔ gu fam,
ɛtɔ pii gu nnipa so.
29 Obi bɛtumi ate mununkum mu trɛ
ne ne ntomadan mu kurududuyɛ no ase anaa?
30 Hwɛ, ɔtrɛ ne hann mu wɔ ne so,
na ɔkata ɛpo nhini so.
31Na ɛno na ɔde di aman asɛm,
ɔde aduane bebree nso ma.
32Ɔde hann katakata ne nsa ho,
na ɔhyɛ ma no kɔsi botaeɛ bi mu.
33Ne mmobom ka ne ho asɛm,
mmoakuo mpo ka asɛm fa ahum a ɛreba ho.

Title: HIOB 37
Content:
1Aane, yei ho na m’akoma tutuo,
na ɛpopo firi n’afa.
2 Tie na montie ne nne huuyɛ,
ne mmobom a ɛfiri n’anomu no.
3Ɔgyaa mu ɔsoro ase nyinaa,
na ne hann kɔduru asase anoano.
4Aprannaa bobom di akyire,
ɔde ne kɛseyɛ nne no bobom.
Sɛ wɔte ne nne a, ɔrensianka wɔn.
5Onyankopɔn de ne nne prannaa bobom ma no yɛ nwanwa,
ɔyɛ adeɛ akɛseɛ a yɛnhunu mu,
6 na ɔka kyerɛ sukyerɛmma sɛ: Tɔ gu asase so!
ne osukɛseɛ nso saa ara sɛ: Tue! ne n’ahoɔden suo akɛseɛ no.
7Ɔsɔ nnipa nyinaa nsa ano,
sɛ nnipa a ɔbɔɔ wɔn nyinaa nhunu de.
8 Ɛnna mmoadoma kɔ wɔn atu mu,
na wɔtenatena wɔn tenabea.
9Ahum firi mpiakyire hɔ ba,
na awɔ nso firi atifi fam.
10Nyankopɔn home na ɛma nsuo nkyenkyeneeɛ,
na ɛma nsuo a ɛtrɛ nso da.
11Nsuo ara nko na ɔde soa mununkum,
ɔtrɛ ne hann mununkum no mu.
12Na ɔma no di kyinhyia sɛdeɛ n’akwankyerɛ teɛ,
sɛ ɛnkɔyɛ deɛ ɔhyɛ no nyinaa,
wiase nyinaa ne asase ani;
13sɛ ɛyɛ atenetene nti oo, sɛ ɛyɛ n’asase nti oo,
sɛ ɛyɛ n’adɔeɛ so oo, ɔma no ba ara.
14Hiob, yɛ aso wɔ yei ho,
gyina hɔ dwene Nyankopɔn anwanwadeɛ ho.
15 Wonim berɛ a Onyankopɔn susuo ho,
na ɔma ne mununkum mu hann hyerɛn?
16Wonim mununkum nkariiɛ,
nimdeɛ mu mudifoɔ no anwanwadeɛ no?
17Sɛdeɛ wo ntadeɛ mu hyeɛ,
berɛ a anafoɔ mframa ma asase yɛ dinn no?
18Wo ne no na ɛde ewiem tɔnn a ɛwɔ hɔ pintinn
sɛ ahwehwɛ a wɔaguo no trɛɛ hɔ?
19Ma yɛnhunu deɛ yɛnka nkyerɛ no;
esum nti yɛrenhunu deɛ yɛnka.
20Wɔnka nkyerɛ no sɛ mɛkasa?
Anaasɛ obi bɛpɛ sɛ wɔmene no?
21Na afei wɔnhunu hann sɛ ɛhyerɛn hyɛnn ewiem tɔnn,
na mframa twam a, ɛma ewiem hɔ te.
22Atifi fam asase so na sika firi ba,
Nyankopɔn ho na animuonyam a ɛyɛ hu wɔ.
23 Otumfoɔ deɛ, yɛnhu no;
ɔyɛ tumi mu ɔkɛseɛ,
na ɔrenkyea atemmuo ne tenenee a ɛdɔɔso.
24Enti nnipa suro no,
ɔmmu akoma mu nyansafoɔ biara.

Title: HIOB 38
Content:
AWURADE mmuaeɛ
1 Na AWURADE firi ahum no mu buaa Hiob sɛ:
2 Hwan ne deɛ ɔbiri afotuo ani,
nsɛm a emu nni nimdeɛ mu yi?
3 Bɔ w’asene sɛ ɔbarima ɛ,
na memmisa wo, na kyerɛ me.
4Ɛhe na na wowɔ berɛ a metoo asase fapem?
Sɛ wowɔ nhunumu a, ka ɛ!
5Hwan na ɔde ne nsusuiɛ too hɔ, wonim anaa?
Anaasɛ hwan na ɔsaa so homa?
6Ɛdeɛn so na wɔde ne nnyinasoɔ siiɛ,
anaa hwan na ɔde ne tweatiboɔ toeɛ,
7berɛ a adekyeeɛ nsoromma boom too ahurisie dwom,
na Ɔsoro dɔm nyinaa bɔɔ ose no?
8Na hwan na ɔkaa ɛpo hyehyɛɛ apono mu,
berɛ a ɛfiri asaseyam pueeɛ,
9na mede mununkum meyɛɛ ne nkataho,
ne sum kabii nso meyɛɛ n’aboomu,
10 na metwaa ne so hyeɛ,
na mesisii adaban ne apono,
11 na mekaa sɛ: Ɛha yi na bra bɛduro, na ntra so,
na ɛha ara na w’asorɔkyeɛ ahantan mmeso no?
12Ɛfiri wo nna mfitiaseɛ woahyɛ anɔpa so pɛn,
woakyerɛ adekyeeɛ nso ne diberɛ,
13sɛ ɛnsɔ asase mmuano mu,
na wɔmporepore abɔnefoɔ mfiri so?
14Sɛ ɛnnane sɛ daagyere nsɔano ase
na ɛnyɛ sɛ atadeɛ a wɔahyɛ no aduro,
15na wɔde abɔnefoɔ hann akame wɔn,
na nsa a wɔama soɔ no, wɔabu mu?
16Woakɔ ɛpo aniwa ho,
na wɔanante bunu donkodonko ase?
17Wɔayi owuo aponkɛseɛ adi akyerɛ wo,
anaasɛ woahunu esum kabii aboboɔ no?
18Woahunu asase trɛ mu anaa?
Sɛ wonim ne nyinaa a, ka ɛ!
19Ɛhe na hann tenabea kwan wɔ,
na esum nso, n’afa wɔ he?
20Na wode akɔ ne hyeɛ so,
na woahunu ne fie akwan no.
21Wonim, aane, ɛfiri sɛ saa berɛ no na wɔawo wo,
na woadi nna bebree!
22Woakɔ sukyerɛmma korabea,
anaa woahunu asukɔtweaa akoradeɛ no,
23 adeɛ a makora asie ahohiahia berɛ
ne ɔko ne akodie da no?
24Ɛhe na ɔkwan a hann nam so hyerɛnhyerɛn no wɔ,
ne deɛ apueeɛ mframa fa so bɔ asase soɔ no nso wɔ?
25 Hwan na ɔyiyi aka ma osuo
ne ɔkwan ma aprannaa asraman no,
26sɛ ɔbɛma osuo atɔ asase a obi nni hɔ soɔ,
ne anwea pradada a onipa bi nni soɔ so,
27na wama amamfo ne asase hunu ameeɛ,
na wama wira a ɛfuo no afefɛ?
28Osuo wɔ agya,
anaasɛ hwan na ɔwo obosuo a ɛsosɔ?
29 Hwan yam na nsuo nkyenkyeneeɛ fire,
na ɔsoro bosuo a akyenkyen no, hwan na ɔwoeɛ?
30Nsuo kyenkyen sɛ ɔboɔ,
na ebunu donkodonko ani pam.
31 Wobɛtumi akyekyere Akokɔbaatan-ne-ne-mma homa mu,
anaasɛ wobɛtumi asane Nwenwenente nhoma?
32Wobɛtumi ayi Owiakwanmu nsoromma adi wɔ ne berɛ mu,
anaasɛ wobɛtumi akyerɛ Sisire nsoromma ne ne mma kwan?
33Wonim ɔsoro nhyehyɛɛ,
anaa wobɛtumi ahyehyɛ sɛdeɛ ɛnni asase soɔ?
34Woma wo nne so kɔ mununkum mu
sɛ nsuo pii mmɛkata wo ho anaa?
35Wobɛtumi asoma anyinam ama no akɔ,
na aka akyerɛ wo sɛ: Yɛn nie! anaa?
36Hwan na ɔde nyansa siee ayamdeɛ mu,
anaasɛ hwan na ɔde nhunumu maa adwene?
37 Hwan na ɔde nyansa kan mununkum,
na ɔsoro nkotokuo no, hwan na ɔdane no
38ma mfuturo pia kɔbɔ dosie,
na dɔteɛ bɔ ntoantoa?
39Wo na woyɛ ha ma gyatabereɛ nya nam,
anaa woma agyataburuwa meeɛ,
40 ɛberɛ a wɔbutubutu wɔn atu mu,
na wɔtete adɔtɔ mu retɛ?
41 Hwan na ɔsiesie aduane ma anene,
ɛberɛ a ne mma su frɛ Onyankopɔn,
wɔkyini na wɔnni aduane no?

Title: HIOB 39
Content:
Mmoadoma di Nyankopɔn nyansa ho adanseɛ
1Wonim abotan so mmirekyie awoɔ berɛ,
na aforoteɛ awoko nso, wowɛn?
2Wokan abosome a wɔn afuru de nyini,
na wonim berɛ a wɔde woɔ anaa?
3Wɔkoto wowo wɔn mma,
wɔto wɔn awoɔyea twene,
4wɔn mma ho kokwa, wɔnyini wiram,
wɔfiri kɔ, na wɔnsane mma wɔn nkyɛn.
5Hwan na ɔgyaa ɛserɛ so afunumu sɛ ɔnne ne ho,
na afunumu prakaateni nhoma, hwan na ɔsane?
6Deɛ mede ɛserɛ pradada mayɛ ne fie,
na mede nkyene asase ayɛ ne tenabea.
7Ɔmmu kuro mu gyegyeegyeyɛ,
ɔnte ɔkafoɔ ateatea.
8Deɛ ɔnya no mmepɔ soɔ no ne n’aduane,
na ɔpɛ adeɛ biara a ɛyɛ frɔmfrɔm.
9Okoo bɛpene sɛ ɔsom woɔ,
anaasɛ ɔbɛtena w’adididaka ho?
10Wode homa bɛsa okoo, mfɛtɛeɛka ho,
anaasɛ ɔbɛtwe mmonhwa mu mfɛtɛeɛ so adi w’akyi?
11N’ahoɔden so nti, wode wo ho bɛto ne so,
na woagya w’adwuma ama no anaa?
12Wobɛgye no adi sɛ ɔde w’aba bɛba,
na waboa ano de aba w’asan so?
13Sohori bɔ ne ntaban mu ahurisidie mu,
ɛne asukɔnkɔn ntaban ne ne ntakra na ɛsɛ anaa?
14Mmom ɔgya ne nkosua ma asase,
na mfuturo so na ɔma ɛho dɔ,
15na ne werɛ firi sɛ ɛnan bɛpɛkyɛ,
anaasɛ wiram mmoadoma bɛbobɔ.
16Ɔbɔ ne mma atirimuɔden sɛdeɛ wɔnyɛ ne deɛ,
ne brɛ yɛ ɔkwa, nanso ɔnsuro,
17ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn ama nyansa abɔ no,
na wankyɛ no nhunumu.
18Na sɛ ɔyere ne ho tu a,
ɔsere ɔpɔnkɔ ne ne sotefoɔ.
19Wo na wode ahoɔden ma ɔpɔnkɔ?
Wo na wode nnawa hyehyɛ ne kɔn?
20Wo na woma no huri sɛ ntutummɛ?
Ne home foofoo denyɛ yɛ hu.
21Ɔwerɛwerɛ bonhwa mu, na ɔdi n’ahoɔden ho ahurisie,
ɔfiri kɔhyia akofoɔ a wɔamia.
22Ɔsere ehu, na ne ho mpopo,
na ɔnsane mfiri afena anim.
23Agyan boha woso ne so,
pea ne pɛmɛ a ɛtwa nyinamnyinam nso.
24Ɔde anibereɛ ne abufuo werɛwerɛ asase,
na totorobɛnto hyɛne a, ɔnnyina bio.
25Totorobɛnto hyɛne a, ɔka sɛ: Wiɛɛ!
Na ɔte ɔko hwa wɔ akyirikyiri,
asafohene nteam ne osebɔ no.
26Wo nhunumu so na asansa nam tuo?
Ɔtrɛ ne ntaban mu kyerɛ anafoɔ asase.
27Anaasɛ w’anomu asɛm so na ɔkɔdeɛ ma ne ho soɔ,
na ɔyɛ ne pirebuo deɛ ɛkorɔn?
28Ɔbotan mu na ɔteɛ na ɔda,
ɔbotan ano hwerɛmhwerɛm ne ahwɛeɛ sorɔnsorɔn so,
29ɛhɔ na ɔfiri hwehwɛ aduane,
n’ani hunu adeɛ akyirikyiri.
30 Na ne mma fe mogya,
na deɛ atɔfoɔ wɔ no, ɛhɔ na ɔwɔ.

Title: HIOB 40
Content:
Hiob brɛ ne ho ase, AWURADE asɛm a ɛtɔ so mmienu. Susono ne ɔdɛnkyɛmmirampɔn
1Na AWURADE buaa Hiob sɛ:
2 Ɔtɛnyifoɔ bi ne Otumfoɔ no bɛham anaa?
Deɛ ɔne Onyankopɔn gye akyinnyeɛ no, ɔmmua ɛ!
3Na Hiob gyee AWURADE so sɛ:
4Hwɛ, mesua, ɛdeɛn na memfa memmua woɔ?
Me nsa na mede meto m’ano.
5Makasa prɛko, na merentia so;
ne mprenu, na merenkɔ so bio.
6Ɛnna AWURADE firi ahum no mu buaa Hiob sɛ:
7 Bɔ w’asene sɛ ɔbarima ɛ,
mɛbisa wo, na woakyerɛ me.
8 Wobɛdane m’atemmuo no ani?
Wobɛbu me fɔ na woadi bem?
9Wowɔ nsa sɛ Nyankopɔn deɛ,
na wobɛtumi de nne a ɛte sɛ ne deɛ abom?
10Ɛnneɛ fa tumidie ne kɛseyɛ hyehyɛ wo ho,
na fira ɔhyerɛn ne animuonyam,
11hwie w’abufuo mmorosoɔ no gu,
na hwɛ ɔhantanni biara na brɛ no ase.
12Hwɛ ahantanfoɔ nyinaa na brɛ wɔn ase,
na tiatia abɔnefoɔ so wɔ wɔn tenabea hɔ.
13Fa wɔn nyinaa sie dɔteɛ mu,
na ma wɔn anim ntintim ahuntaeɛm,
14ɛnneɛ na me nso mɛkamfo wo
sɛ wo ara wo nifa na agye woɔ.
15Hwɛ susono a meyɛɛ no ne wo,
ewira na ɔdi no sɛ nantwie.
16Hwɛ ne tumi a ɛwɔ n’asene mu
ne n’ahoɔden a ɛwɔ ne yafunu ntini mu.
17Ɔkoa ne dua sɛ tweneduro,
ne srɛ mu nhoma nso toatoa mu.
18Ne nnompe te sɛ kɔbere mfrafraeɛ dorobɛn,
ne nkasɛɛ te sɛ adaban.
19Ɔno ne Nyankopɔn akwan mfitiaseɛ,
ne yɛfoɔ nko ara na ɔtumi de afena ka no.
20Na mmepɔ so aduane ma no,
na wiram mmoadoma nyinaa goro hɔnom.
21Nkasɛɛnkasɛɛ nnua ase na ɔda,
demmire ne ɔwora ahuntaeɛm.
22Nkasɛɛnkasɛɛ nnua nwunu kata ne so,
nsunoa nnua twa ne ho hyia.
23Hwɛ, asuo ano yɛ den mpo a, ne ho mpopo;
sɛ Yordan bu ba n’ano mpo a, ne bo da ne yam ara.
24Wɔbɛtumi akye no animono,
na wɔde fidie ahwire ne hwenem?

Title: HIOB 41
Content:
1 Wobɛtumi atwe dɛnkyɛmmirampɔn darewa ano,
na wode homa akyekyere ne tɛkyerɛma anaa?
2Wode kaa bɛhyɛ ne hwenem,
na wode nkɔtɔkorɔ ahwire n’afono mu?
3Ɔbɛkoto asrɛ wo pii,
anaa ɔbɛyɛ n’ano brɛbrɛ akyerɛ wo?
4Ɔne wo bɛpam apam
sɛ fa no yɛ akoa daa?
5Wo ne no bɛgoro sɛ anomaa,
na woasa no ahoma ama wo mmabaa anaa?
6Apofofoɔ asafo bɛsi no koso,
na wɔakyɛ ne mu adwadifoɔ mu?
7Wode mpea bɛhyɛ ne wedeɛ mu ma,
na wode mpataa mpɛmɛ awowɔ ne tirim?
8Fa wo nsa ka no hwɛ,
na deɛ wobɛhunu no, woremmɛn no bio!
9Hwɛ onipa anidasoɔ yɛ ohunu.
Ɛnyɛ ne hwɛ mpo na ɛma obi hwe aseɛ?
10Obi rensi ne bo sɛ ɔbɛhwanyan no,
na hwan ne deɛ ɔbɛtumi agyina n’anim?
11Hwan na wadi kan ama me biribie, na menhyɛ no ananmu?
Deɛ ɛwɔ ɔsoro nyinaa aseɛ, me na ɛwɔ me.
12Merennyae ne honam adeɛ,
ne ne mmaninyɛ ne n’aboaban fɛ a ɛyɛ no ho asɛnka.
13Hwan na ɔbɛyi ne ho abon?
Ne se kyerɛpɛn mmienu no, hwan na ɔbɛkɔ anim?
14N’anim apono nso, hwan na ɔbɛhini?
Ne se ho yɛ hu.
15N’akyɛm akyerɛpɛn yɛ fɛ,
wɔatotom sɛ adeɛ a wɔasɔ ano.
16Ɛpempam so pɛpɛɛpɛ
a mframa nnya mu kwan;
17ɛfemfam ho,
ɛdi nsosɔmu na emu nni ateyɛ.
18Ne nwansi ma hann hyerɛn,
na n’ani te sɛ adekyeeɛ anisuatɛtɛ.
19Agyatɛnee firi n’anomu,
ogya nturituriiɛ fifiri mu.
20Wisie firi ne hwene mu tokuro mu,
sɛ ɛsɛn a emu rehuro ne nkyɛkyerɛ a ɛrehyeɛ mu.
21N’ahome sɔ nsramma,
na ogyaframa firi n’anomu.
22Ne kɔn mu na ahoɔden wɔ,
na akomatuo sa wɔ n’anim.
23Ne honam a ɛsensɛne hɔ femfam ho pintinn,
wɔguu no ne ho, na ɛntwe.
24N’akoma yɛ den sɛ ɔboɔ,
ɛyɛ den sɛ oyuyammoɔ.
25Sɛ ɔma ne ho so a, atumfoɔ ho popo,
na ehu ma wɔn ani so yɛ wɔn krakra.
26Wɔde nkrantɛ ka no a, ɛnka,
pea ne pɛmɛ a wɔtoɔ ne dadeɛ akodeɛ mpo;
27ɔbu dadeɛ sɛ ntɛtɛ,
ne kɔbere mfrafraeɛ sɛ duawuiɛ;
28agyan nka no ngu,
ntɔmmoɔ mu aboɔ yɛ no sɛ nkyɛnkyɛmma;
29ɔbu aporibaa sɛ nkyɛnkyɛmma,
na ɔsere pea a wɔtoɔ huuyɛ.
30N’ase yɛ abono hwetahweta,
ɔbua atɛkyɛ so sɛ poreɛ adeɛ.
31Ɔma ebunu mu huru sɛ ɛsɛn mu,
ɔyɛ po sɛ sradeɛ;
32Ɔma ɔkwan hyerɛn di n’akyi,
ma wɔbu ebunu a ɛhuro no sɛ ɛdwono.
33Ne nsɛsoɔ nni asase so;
wɔyɛɛ no sɛ n’akoma nntu;
34ɔhwɛ adeɛ a ɛkorɔn nyinaa;
ɔne ahokyerɛ mma nyinaa hene.

Title: HIOB 42
Content:
Onyankopɔn ma Hiob so bio
1Ɛnna Hiob gyee AWURADE so sɛ:
2Mahunu sɛ wotumi ade nyinaa yɛ,
na wɔrensi wo tirimbɔ biara kwan.
3 Hwan ne deɛ ɔnni nimdeɛ,
na ɔhono afotuo ani yi?
Enti na mekaa deɛ mente aseɛ, anwanwadeɛ a ɛsene me a na mennim.
4 Tie ɛ, na menkasa.
Mɛbisa wo, na woakyerɛ me.
5Sɛ aso teɛ nko na metee wo nka,
na afei deɛ, m’ani nso ahu wo.
6Saa nti na mepo me ho na menu me ho,
dɔteɛ ne nso mu.
7Na AWURADE kaa nsɛm yi kyerɛɛ Hiob wieeɛ no, AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ Temanni Elifas sɛ: Me bo afu wo ne wo mfɛfoɔ baanu no, ɛfiri sɛ moanka me ho asɛm a ɛtene sɛ m’akoa Hiob. 8 Na afei momfa anantwinini nson ne adwennini nson, na monkɔ m’akoa Hiob nkyɛn, na monkɔbɔ ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ mma mo ho, na m’akoa Hiob mmɔ mo tiri so mpaeɛ, na ɔno nko ara anim na mɛhwɛ, na me ne mo anni no mo nkwaseasɛm so, ɛfiri sɛ moanka me ho asɛm tee sɛ m’akoa Hiob. 9Ɛnna Temanni Elifas ne Suhini Bildad ne Naamani Sofar sii mu kɔ kɔyɛɛ sɛdeɛ AWURADE ka kyerɛɛ wɔn no; na AWURADE tiee Hiob mpaebɔ.
10 Na Hiob bɔɔ ne nnamfo no tiri so mpaeɛ no, AWURADE danee ne duamda no na AWURADE de adeɛ a Hiob nyaeɛ no nyinaa mmɔho mmienu maa no. 11Ɛnna ne nuanom mmarima nyinaa ne ne nuanom mmaa nyinaa ne wɔn a wɔni no kane nyinaa baa ne nkyɛn, na wɔne no bɛdidii wɔ ne fie, na wɔgyam no, na wɔkyekyeree ne werɛ, amaneɛ a AWURADE maa no baa ne soɔ nyinaa ho, na wɔn mu biara maa no sika dwetɛbena baako ne sika kaa baako. 12Na AWURADE hyiraa Hiob awieeɛ senee ne mfitiaseɛ, na ɔnyaa nnwan mpemdunan ne yoma mpemnsia ne anantwie mpamho apem ne mfunumu abereɛ apem. 13Na ɔnyaa mmammarima baason ne mmammaa baasa. 14Ne mmammaa no, ɔtoo ɔbaako din Yemima, na deɛ ɔdi soɔ no de Kesia, na deɛ ɔtɔ so mmiɛnsa no de Keren-hapuk. 15 Na wɔanhunu mmaa a wɔn ho yɛ fɛ sɛ Hiob mmammaa no asase no nyinaa so; na wɔn agya memaa wɔn agyapadeɛ wɔn nuanom mu. 16Na yei akyiri no, Hiob dii mfirinhyia ɔha aduanan, na ɔhunuu ne mma ne ne mma mma awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nnan. 17 Na Hiob wui, na wabɔ akora pa ara.

Title: NNWOM NHYƐNMU
Content:
NHYƐNMU
Nnwom nwoma no yɛ nnwom nwoma ne mpaebɔ nwoma a ɛwɔ Twerɛ Kronkron mu. Ɛberɛ a ɛware na nnipa ahodoɔ a wɔtwerɛɛ nnwom ne mpaebɔ no de boaboaa ano maa Israelfoɔ nyamesom. Ɛno akyire no, wɔde kaa Atwerɛ nwoma no ho.
Saa nyamesom mu anwonsɛm no gu ahodoɔ; mpaebɔ a ɛfa mmoa ho, banbɔ, ne nkwagyeɛ; bɔne fakyɛ ho srɛ; Onyankopɔn nhyira ho aseda; ne asotwe a ɛfata wɔn atamfoɔ ho adesrɛ. Mpaebɔ no bi yɛ ankorankorɛ deɛ, na ebi nso yɛ ɔman deɛ. Ebi yɛ onipa baako bi ahiadeɛ ne n’atenka, na deɛ aka no yɛ Onyankopɔn nkurɔfoɔ ahiadeɛ ne wɔn atenka.
Yesu kasa firii nnwom no mu, na apam foforɔ atwerɛfoɔ nso yiyii wɔn nsɛm bi firii mu. Ɛfiri Kristosom ahyɛaseɛ no, abɛyɛ nwoma a ɛsom boɔ de abɛduru sɛsɛɛ.
EMU NSƐM
Sɛdeɛ wɔakyɛ nnwom ɔha aduonum a ɛgu akuakuo anaa nwoma ahodoɔ nnum no mu nie;
Nwoma a ɛdi kan 1—41
Nwoma a ɛtɔ so mmienu 42—72
Nwoma a ɛtɔ so mmiɛnsa 73—89
Nwoma a ɛtɔ so nnan 90—106
Nwoma a ɛtɔ so nnum 107—150

Title: NNWOM 1
Content:
NWOMA A ƐDI KAN
(Nnwom 1—41)
Ɔteneneeni ne ɔbɔnefoɔ
1 Nhyira ne onipa a
ɔnnante abɔnefoɔ agyina mu,
na ɔnnyina nnebɔneyɛfoɔ kwan soɔ,
na ɔntena fɛdifoɔ tenabea,
2 na mmom n’ani gye AWURADE mmara ho,
na ɔdwene ho awia ne anadwo.
3 Ɔte sɛ dua
a atim asubɔnten ho
a ɛso n’aba ne berɛ mu,
na n’ahahan mpo,
na deɛ ɔyɛ nyinaa bɛwie yie.
4 Na abɔnefoɔ deɛ, wɔnte saa,
na wɔte sɛ ntɛtɛ a mframa bɔ guo.
5Enti abɔnefoɔ renni bem atemmuo mu,
na nnebɔneyɛfoɔ rennya kyɛfa wɔ teneneefoɔ asafo mu.
6 Ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE nim teneneefoɔ kwan,
na abɔnefoɔ kwan deɛ, ɛbɛyera.

Title: NNWOM 2
Content:
Deɛ AWURADE asra no no
1 Adɛn nti na amanaman yɛ gyegyeegye,
na aman susu ade hunu yi?
2Asase so ahemfo sɔre gyina,
na atumfoɔ bom tu agyina
tia AWURADE ne deɛ wasra no no sɛ,
3 Momma yɛmmubu wɔn mpokyerɛ,
na yɛnto wɔn nhoma mfiri yɛn ho ngu.
4 Deɛ ɔte soro no sere,
AWURADE di wɔn ho fɛw.
5 Ɛno na ɔbɛkasa akyerɛ wɔn n’abufuo mu,
na ɔde n’abufuhyeɛ bɛyi wɔn hu aka sɛ:
6Me AWURADE na masi me hene,
me bepɔ kronkron Sion so.
7 Na mɛka no deɛ AWURADE ahyɛ no.
AWURADE ase me sɛ: Me ba ne wo,
ɛnnɛ na mawo woɔ.
8 Bisa me, na mede amanaman bɛyɛ wo apɛgyadeɛ,
na mama woafa asase ano nohoa adi so
9 Wode dadeɛ poma bɛbubu wɔn,
na woabobɔ wɔn sɛ ɔnwomfoɔ ahina.
10Na afei, ahemfo, monhunu nyansa.
Asase so atemmufoɔ, montie afotuo.
11 Monsom AWURADE osuro mu,
na monni ahurisie ahopopoɔ mu.
12 Momfa nidie mapa mma no,
na ne bo amfu, na moanyera ɔkwan mu;
na aka kakra na n’abufuo adɛ.
Nhyira ne wɔn a wɔdwane kɔtoa no nyinaa.

Title: NNWOM 3
Content:
Ahohia berɛ mu anɔpa dwom
Dawid dwom a ɔtoeɛ berɛ a ɔdwane firii ne ba Absalom anim.
1 AWURADE, hwɛ sɛdeɛ m’ahohiahiafoɔ si dɔɔso fa!
Wɔn a wɔsɔre tia me no yɛ pii.
2Nnipa bebree se me sɛ:
Ɔnni nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn mu.
Sela
3 Na wo, AWURADE, wone me ho kyɛm,
m’animuonyam ne me werɛkyekyefoɔ.
4Mede me nne mesu mefrɛ AWURADE,
na ɔgye me so firi ne bepɔ kronkron so.
5 Mekɔdae na medae;
manyane, na AWURADE kura me mu.
6 Mensuro nkurɔfoɔ mpempem
a wɔabɔ me ho nsraban ahyia yi.
7 O AWURADE, sɔre ɛ!
Me Nyankopɔn, gye me!
Na woabobɔ m’atamfoɔ nyinaa abɔgye,
woabubu abɔnefoɔ se.
8 Na AWURADE na nkwagyeɛ wɔ no;
wo man so na ma wo nhyira mmra.

Title: NNWOM 4
Content:
Nyankopɔn asomdwoeɛ
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔmfa sankuo nto. Dawid dwom.
1Me sufrɛ mu gye me so, me tenenee Nyankopɔn.
Ahohia mu, woboaa me.
Hu me mmɔbɔ, na tie me mpaebɔ.
2Mo mmarima mma, m’animuonyam bɛdane ahohora akɔsi da bɛn?
Mobɛdɔ ade hunu, mobɛdi atorɔ akyi akɔsi da bɛn?
3 Na monhunu sɛ AWURADE ayi ne dɔfo asi hɔ;
mesu mefrɛ AWURADE a, ɔbɛtie.
4 Mo bo fu a, monnyɛ bɔne!
Monkasa mo akoma mu wɔ mo daberɛ, na monyɛ komm.
5 Mommɔ tenenee afɔdeɛ,
na momfa mo ho ntwere AWURADE.
6 Nnipa bebree bisa sɛ: Hwan na ɔbɛma yɛahunu papa?
AWURADE, te w’anim ma no nhran yɛn so.
7Wode anigyeɛ ahyɛ m’akomam asene
berɛ a wɔn aburoo ne wɔn nsa dɔɔso no.
8 Asomdwoeɛ mu na mɛkɔ makɔda, na mada prɛko,
na wo, AWURADE, nko ara na woma metena hɔ dwoodwoo.

Title: NNWOM 5
Content:
Anɔpa afɔdeɛ ho mpaebɔ
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔmfa atɛntɛbɛn nto. Dawid dwom.
1AWURADE, yɛ aso ma me nsɛm,
na hwɛ me nsusuiɛ a mekura mu.
2 Tie me nteamu,
me hene ne me Nyankopɔn,
na wo na mɛbɔ wo mpaeɛ.
3AWURADE, tie me nne anɔpa,
anɔpa na masiesie mama woɔ, na mɛhwɛ wo kwan.
4Na wonyɛ Onyankopɔn a wopɛ adebɔne,
ɔbɔnefoɔ ne wo rentena.
5Agyimifoɔ rennyina w’anim,
wotane amumuyɛfoɔ nyinaa.
6Wosɛe wɔn a wɔka atorosɛm.
AWURADE kyiri mogyapɛfoɔ ne asisifoɔ.
7 Na me deɛ, menam w’adom bebree so
mɛba wo fie,
na wo ho suro mu na mɛkoto masɔre
makyerɛ w’asɔrefie kronkron no.
8AWURADE, fa wo tenenee kyerɛ me kwan,
wɔn a wɔtɛ me nti,
tene wo kwan wɔ m’anim.
9 Na wɔn anomu nni nokwasɛm bi,
wɔn yam wɔ mmusuo,
wɔn menewa yɛ ɛda a abue,
na wɔde wɔn tɛkyerɛma dɛfɛdɛfɛ.
10Onyankopɔn, bu wɔn fɔ,
ma wɔmpɔn mfiri wɔn agyinatuo ho.
Wɔn mmarato bebrebe nti sum wɔn gu,
na wɔasɔre atia wo.
11 Na ma wɔn a wɔdwane bɛtoa woɔ nyinaa ani nnye,
na wɔmfa ahosan nhuro daa,
ɛfiri sɛ woakata wɔn so,
na ma wɔn a wɔdɔ wo din no ani nka wo ho.
12 Na wo, AWURADE, wohyira ɔteneneeni,
wode anisɔ twa ne ho hyia sɛ ɛkyɛm.

Title: NNWOM 6
Content:
Nkotosrɛ mpaebɔ
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔmfa sankuo nto no “Seminit” ɛnne so. Dawid dwom.
1 AWURADE, mfa w’abufuo nka m’anim,
na mfa w’abufuhyeɛ ntwe m’aso.
2 AWURADE, hu me mmɔbɔ, ɛfiri sɛ meyɛ hodwoo;
AWURADE, sa me yadeɛ, na me nnompe abɔ huboaa,
3 na me kra nso abɔ huboaa sɛ.
Na wo, AWURADE, ɛnkɔsi da bɛn?
4Sane bra, AWURADE, bɛgye me kra,
gye me nkwa w’adɔeɛ nti.
5 Na wo ho nkaeɛ nni owuo mu.
Hwan na ɔbɛyi wo ayɛ Asamandoɔ?
6M’apinisie ama mabrɛ,
anadwo biara, me mpa fɔ,
mede me nisuo mefɔ me nnaeɛ.
7 Awerɛhoɔ ama m’ani ayɛ samoo,
ɛso ayɛ wisiwisi, m’ahohiahiafoɔ nyinaa nti.
8Mo amumuyɛfoɔ nyinaa, momfiri me so mfi!
Na AWURADE ate me su.
9AWURADE ate me nkotosrɛ,
AWURADE bɛgye me mpaebɔ so.
10 M’atamfoɔ nyinaa ani bɛwu, na wɔn ho adwiri wɔn sɛ,
na wɔapatu de fɛreɛ asane.

Title: NNWOM 7
Content:
Onyankopɔn bu atɛntenenee
Dawid adesrɛ dwom a Benyaminni Kus nsɛm nti ɔto maa AWURADE.
1 AWURADE, me Nyankopɔn, wo na medwane bɛtoa wo.
Gye me m’atifoɔ nyinaa nsam, na yi me!
2 Na wɔansunsuane me kra sɛ gyata antete me mu
a ɔgyefoɔ nni hɔ.
3 AWURADE me Nyankopɔn, sɛ mayɛ yei,
na amumuyɛdeɛ bi wɔ me nsam,
4sɛ mayɛ deɛ ɔne me te asomdwoeɛ mu bɔne
na madi deɛ ɔha me no amim bi kwa a,
5ma ɔtamfoɔ ntaa me kra,
na ɔnkyere me, na ɔntiatia me nkwa so ɛfam,
na ɔmma m’animuonyam nyɛ fam.
6AWURADE, sɔre w’abufuo mu,
ma wo ho so tia m’ahohiahiafoɔ aniɛden,
na nyane ma me, wo a woahyɛ atemmuo.
7Na ma aman asafo ntwa wo ho nhyia,
na sane firi wɔn so kɔ soro.
8 AWURADE bɛbu aman atɛn;
AWURADE di m’asɛm sɛdeɛ me tenenee
ne bem a ɛwɔ me mu teɛ.
9 Ao, ma abɔnefoɔ bɔne to ntwa ɛ!
Na ma ɔteneneeni ntim.
Na wone tenenee Nyankopɔn
a wosɔ akoma ne adwene hwɛ.
10 Me kyɛm wɔ Nyankopɔn nsam,
ɔno na ɔgye akoma mu teneneeni nkwa.
11 Onyankopɔn ne ɔtemmufoɔ tenenee,
ne Onyankopɔn a ɔteatea daa nyinaa.
12 Sɛ obi annane n’akwan, Onyankopɔn bɛse n’afena,
wakuntunu ne tadua mu, na wasiesie.
13Na wasiesie owuo adeɛ ama onii korɔ no,
wayɛ n’agyan ma no hye adeɛ.
14Hwɛ, ɔmumuyɛfoɔ nyinsɛn amumuyɛ,
na ɔnyem ɛhaw,
na ɔwo atorɔ.
15 Watu amena, na wafunu mu,
na ɔtɔ tokuro a ɔno ara tuo no mu.
16Ne mmusuo resane abua n’atifi,
na n’amim aduru ne mpampam.
17Mɛda AWURADE ase sɛdeɛ ne tenenee teɛ,
na mato ayeyie dwom mama AWURADE a ɔwɔ sorosoro no din.

Title: NNWOM 8
Content:
Onyankopɔn kɛseyɛ ne onipa diberɛ a ɛkorɔn
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no “Gittit” sankuo nne so. Dawid dwom.
1Ao, AWURADE, yɛn Awurade,
enim bɛn na wo din nni
asase nyinaa soɔ!
Wo a wode w’animuonyam akata ɔsoro.
2 Wo a w’animuonyam pue firi mmɔfra ne nkɔkoaa anomu.
Wo na woasiesie abankɛseɛ, w’atamfo nti,
na wode amua ɔtamfoɔ ne ɔweretɔfoɔ ano.
3 Sɛ mehwɛ wo soro, wo nsateaa ano adwuma,
ɔsrane ne nsoromma a woasiesie a,
4 ɔdasani ne hwan a wokae no,
na onipa ba ne hwan a w’ani ku ne ho!
5 Na woama aka no kakraa bi na wasɛ Onyame,
na wode animuonyam ne anidie abɔ no abotire.
6 Woama no adi wo nsa ano nnwuma so,
wode nnoɔma nyinaa ahyɛ ne nan ase:
7Aane, nnwan ne anantwie nyinaa
ne wiram mmoa nso,
8ewiem nnomaa ne ɛpo mu mpataa,
mmoa a ɛnam ɛpo mu akwan soɔ.
9Ao, AWURADE, yɛn Awurade,
enim bɛn na wo din nni asase nyinaa soɔ!

Title: NNWOM 9
Content:
Nyankopɔn atemmuo ho aseda dwom
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no “Mut labben! sankuo nne so”. Dawid dwom.
1Mede m’akoma nyinaa mɛda AWURADE ase;
AWURADE, mɛka w’anwanwadeɛ nyinaa akyerɛ.
2Mɛgye m’ani na madi ahurisie wɔ wo mu,
mɛto wo a wowɔ sorosoro no din ayeyie dwom.
3Ɛfiri sɛ m’atamfoɔ asane wɔn akyi,
wɔatotɔ, na wɔayera w’anim.
4 Woatena atemmuo adwa so abu atɛn tenenee,
Woadi m’asɛm abu me bem.
5Woateatea amanaman, woasɛe abɔnefoɔ,
woapepa wɔn din korakorakora.
6 Atamfoɔ awie sa adane daa amamfo,
na woama nkuro ase ahye,
na wɔn ho nkaeɛ ayera.
7 Na AWURADE deɛ, ɔte n’ahennwa so daa,
ɔde n’adwa asi hɔ rebu atɛn.
8 Ɔno na ɔbɛbu wiase atɛn tenenee mu,
na wadi aman asɛm tenenee mu.
9AWURADE bɛyɛ dwanekɔbea ama deɛ wɔrepɛkyɛ no,
ahokyere berɛ mu dwanekɔbea.
10Na wɔn a wɔnim wo din de wɔn ho bɛto wo so,
ɛfiri sɛ woannya wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ wo, AWURADE.
11 Monto ayeyie dwom mma AWURADE a ɔte Sion,
monka ne nneyɛɛ nkyerɛ aman mu,
12 sɛ, deɛ ɔtɔ mogya so were no akae wɔn,
na ne werɛ amfiri abrɛfoɔ nteamu.
13AWURADE, hu me mmɔbɔ, hwɛ m’amaneɛ a ɛfiri m’atamfoɔ,
wo a woma me so firi owuo aboboano,
14 na menka w’ayeyie nyinaa menkyerɛ,
Sion babaa aponkɛseɛ mu,
na menni ahurisie wo nkwagyeɛ mu.
15 Amanaman amemmem amena a wɔtuiɛ no mu,
afidie a wɔsum huntaeɛ no ayi wɔn nan.
16 AWURADE ayi ne ho adi, wabu atɛn,
ɔde ɔbɔnefoɔ nsam nneyɛɛ atoatoa no.
17Abɔnefoɔ bɛsane akɔ Asamando,
amanaman a wɔn werɛ afiri Onyankopɔn nyinaa.
18 Na ɛnyɛ daa na ne werɛ bɛfiri ohiani,
na ɛnyɛ daa na mmɔborɔni anidasoɔ bɛyera.
19AWURADE, sɔre, mma ɔdasani nnni nim,
ma wɔmmu amanaman atɛn w’anim.
20 AWURADE, yi wɔn hu,
na amanaman nhunu sɛ wɔyɛ adasamma.

Title: NNWOM 10
Content:
Atɛn tenenee ho mpaebɔ
1 AWURADE, adɛn nti na wogyina akyirikyiri,
na wode wo ho hunta ahokyere berɛ mu?
2Ɔbɔnefoɔ ahantan nti ɛmma mmɔborɔni ho hyehye no,
wɔde wɔn atirimpɔ a wɔabɔ no kye wɔn.
3Na ɔbɔnefoɔ hoahoa ne ho ade a ne kra kɔn dɔ ho,
na omimfoɔ ka abususɛm yi AWURADE ahi.
4Ɔbɔnefoɔ dwa n’anomu ka sɛ: Hwee mfa ne ho.
Onyankopɔn bi nni baabi! n’adwene nyinaa ne no.
5 N’akwan yere hɔ pintinn daa nyinaa.
W’atemmudeɛ asɔre n’ani so kɔ akyirikyiri,
ɔmfa n’ahohiahiafoɔ nyinaa nyɛ ahuro.
6 Ɔse no n’akomam sɛ: Merenhinhim da,
daa nyinaa merenhyia amaneɛ biara.
7 Nnome, nkontomposɛm ne amimdie ahyɛ n’anomu ma,
na ɔhaw ne mmusuo hyɛ ne tɛkyerɛma ase.
8Ɔtetɛ nsumaeɛ mu,
ɔdi deɛ ɔnyɛɛ hwee no awu kokoam,
ɔwɔ awiɛmfoɔ ho ani.
9 Ɔtɛ kokoam sɛ gyata wɔ ne bɔn mu,
ɔtɛ sɛ ne nsa bɛka mmɔborɔni
ne nsa ka mmɔborɔni no twe no ba n’afidie mu.
10Ɔkoto, ɔdɛɛdɛɛ,
na awiɛmfoɔ akɔka ne nsa.
11 Ɔse no n’akomam sɛ: Nyankopɔn werɛ afi,
ɔde n’ani ahunta ɔrenhunu ara da.
12Ao, AWURADE sɔre, ɛ! Ao, Onyankopɔn, ma wo nsa so.
Mma wo werɛ mmfiri amanehunufoɔ.
13Adɛn nti na ɔbɔnefoɔ yi Onyankopɔn ahi
ka no n’akomam sɛ: Worentwe m’aso?
14 Wohunu, ɛfiri sɛ wo na wohwɛ ɔhaw ne awerɛhoɔ,
sɛ wode bɛsie wo nsam.
Wo nsa na ɔbrɛfoɔ de hyɛ,
awisiaa boafoɔ ne wo ara.
15 Bubu abɔnefoɔ basa,
na di obusuyɛfoɔ bɔne akyi kɔsi sɛ worenhunu bio.
16 AWURADE ne hene daa daa,
amanaman ayera afiri n’asase so.
17AWURADE, wobɛtie deɛ ahobrɛasefoɔ pɛ,
woahyɛ wɔn akoma den, woama w’aso aba so
18sɛ wobɛdi awisiaa ne deɛ wɔhyɛ no soɔ no asɛm,
na ɔdasani a ɔfiri asase mu no anhunahuna bio.

Title: NNWOM 11
Content:
AWURADE mu ahotosoɔ
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ, Dawid deɛ.
1 AWURADE na medwane kɔtoa no,
adɛn na mose me kra sɛ:
Dwane sɛ anomaa kɔ mo mmepɔ so.
2 Na hwɛ, abɔnefoɔ kuntunu wɔn tadua mu,
wɔde wɔn mmɛmma asi homa so
sɛ wɔde bɛto abɔ akoma mu tenefoɔ esum mu. 3Sɛ wɔsɛe nnyinasoɔ a,
ɔteneneeni bɛyɛ dɛn?
4 AWURADE wɔ n’asɔrefie kronkron mu,
AWURADE ahennwa wɔ soro,
n’ani tua nnipa mma, na n’anisuatɛtɛ kari wɔn hwɛ.
5 AWURADE sɔ ɔteneneeni hwɛ,
na ɔbɔnefoɔ ne deɛ ɔpɛ amim deɛ,
ne kra tane no.
6 Ɔbɛma asraman aduru abɔnefoɔ,
ogya ne sɔfe ne mframa a ɛderɛ
ne wɔn kuruwa mu kyɛfa.
7 Na AWURADE yɛ ɔteneneeni, na ɔpɛ asɛntenenee,
wɔn a wɔtene bɛhunu n’anim.

Title: NNWOM 12
Content:
Mmoa ho mpaebɔ
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no “Seminit” sankuo nne so. Dawid dwom.
1O AWURADE, boa na ahotefoɔ rewie sa,
na nokwafoɔ ase rehye nnipa mma mu.
2Obiara twa ne yɔnko nkontompo,
ano fremfrem ne akoma nta na wɔde kasa.
3Ma AWURADE ntwa ano dɛfɛdɛfɛ nyinaa
ne tɛkyerɛma a ɛka nsɛnkɛseɛ,
4 wɔn a wɔse: Yɛn tɛkyerɛma na yɛde di mmaninsɛm,
yɛn ano wɔ hɔ, hwan na ɔbɛdi yɛn soɔ?
5Mmɔborɔfoɔ so hyɛ ne ahiafoɔ apinisie nti mɛsɔre afei,
sɛ AWURADE seɛ ni,
mɛgye deɛ ɔgu ahome repɛ nkwagyeɛ no nkwa.
6 AWURADE bɔhyɛ yɛ bɔhyɛ kronkron, te sɛ dwetɛ
a wɔanane no ananeeɛ a asene fam
a wɔayiyi mu mprɛnson.
7Ao, AWURADE, hwɛ yɛn so,
na kora yɛn firi nnɛ mma yi mu daa.
8 Sɛ ahuhusɛm ahoran nnipa mma mu yi,
abɔnefoɔ abu so nenam.

Title: NNWOM 13
Content:
Nyankopɔn mmoa a ɛmma ntɛm no ho abooboo
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dawid deɛ.
1 Ao, AWURADE, ɛnkɔsi da bɛn? Wo werɛ bɛfiri me daa?
Wode w’ani bɛhunta me akɔsi da bɛn?
2Ɛnkɔsi da bɛn na menni me kra mu yea,
na adeɛ kye a awerɛhoɔ ntena m’akomam?
Me tamfo nhoran me so nkɔsi da bɛn?
3Hwɛ na gye me so, AWURADE, me Nyankopɔn,
te m’ani, na manna owuo nna,
4na me tamfo anka sɛ: Matumi no,
na sɛ mehinhim a, m’ahohiahiafoɔ anni ahurisie.
5Na me deɛ, m’ani da w’adɔeɛ so,
m’akoma bɛdi wo nkwagyeɛ mu ahurisie,
6 mɛto AWURADE dwom
sɛ ɔne me adi no yie.

Title: NNWOM 14
Content:
Wiase nnebɔne
(Nnwom 53)
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dawid deɛ.
1Ogyegyentwie se n’akomam sɛ: Onyankopɔn bi nni hɔ.
Wɔasɛe wɔn nneyɛɛ ayɛ akyiwadeɛ,
obi nni hɔ a ɔyɛ papa.
2 AWURADE firi soro hwɛ nnipa mma,
sɛ ɔbɛhunu sɛ obi wɔ hɔ a ɔyɛ ɔbadwemma,
obi a ɔhwehwɛ Nyankopɔn akyiri kwan.
3 Wɔn nyinaa amane, wɔn nyinaa aporɔ,
obi nni hɔ a ɔyɛ papa,
ɔbaako mpo nni hɔ.
4 Enti omumuyɛfoɔ biara nni hɔ a ɔwɔ nimdeɛ,
wɔn a wɔdi me man sɛdeɛ wɔdi aduane,
na wɔnsɔre AWURADE?
5Ɛno na wɔn ho popoeɛ,
ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ teneneefoɔ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ mu.
6 Mobɛhwete mmɔborɔni atirimpɔ mu
ara, nanso AWURADE ne ne dwanekɔbea.
7Hwan na ɔde Israel nkwagyeɛ bɛfiri Sion aba?
Da a AWURADE de ne man agyapadeɛ bɛsane aba no,
Yakob bɛdi ahurisie, na Israel ani agye.

Title: NNWOM 15
Content:
Deɛ ɔfata AWURADE ntomadan mu tena
Dawid dwom.
1 O AWURADE, hwan na ɔbɛsoɛ wo ntomadan mu?
Hwan na ɔbɛtena wo bepɔ kronkron soɔ?
2 Deɛ ɔnante pɛpɛɛpɛ na ɔdi asɛntenenee,
na ɔka n’akomam nokorɛ.
3Ɔmfa ne tɛkyerɛma nni nsekuro,
na ɔnyɛ ne yɔnko bɔne,
na ɔmmɔ ne mfɛfoɔ ahohora.
4Ɔno ara n’ani so ɔbu onipa huhuo animtia,
na ɔdi wɔn a wɔsuro AWURADE no ni,
ɔka amanenya ntam a, ɔnsakyera.
5 Ɔmfa ne sika mma nnye nsiho,
na ɔnnye deɛ ɔdi bem ho adanmudeɛ.
Deɛ ɔyɛ yeinom no ɔrehinhim ara da.

Title: NNWOM 16
Content:
Onyankopɔn mu ahotosoɔ
Dawid abebuo dwom.
1Onyankopɔn, fa me sie, na wo na medwane bɛtoa wo.
2 Mese AWURADE sɛ: M’Awurade ne wo,
menni papa biara nka wo ho.
3Na akronkronfoɔ a wɔwɔ asase soɔ no,
wɔne animuonyamfoɔ a wɔsɔ m’ani koraa.
4Wɔn a wɔdi anyame afoforɔ akyire no, wɔma wɔn yea dɔɔso.
Merenhwie wɔn mogya nhwiesa no bi,
na meremfa m’ano memmɔ wɔn din.
5 AWURADE ne m’agyapadeɛ mu kyɛfa ne me kuruwa,
wo na me nkrabea kura wo nsam.
6Me susuhoma akɔfa deɛ ɛyɛ ama me,
aane, apɛgyadeɛ no yɛ me fɛ.
7 Mekamfo AWURADE a ɔtu me fo,
nso anadwo m’akoma kyerɛkyerɛ me.
8Mede AWURADE masi m’anim daa,
na ɔwɔ me nifa yi, merenhinhim.
9 Enti m’akoma tɔ me yam, na me kra di ahurisie,
na me honam tena ase dwoodwoo.
10 Na worennya me kra Asamando,
woremma wo hoteni nhunu Amena mu porɔeɛ. 11Wobɛkyerɛ me nkwa kwan,
anika a ɛmeeɛ wɔ w’anim,
anigyedeɛ wɔ wo nifa hɔ daa.

Title: NNWOM 17
Content:
Mmoa ho adesrɛ
Dawid mpaebɔ.
1O AWURADE, tie asɛntenenee, wɛn w’aso ma m’abooboo,
yɛ aso ma me mpaebɔ a ɛmfiri nnaadaa anofafa mu.
2 Ma bembuo mfiri w’anim mmra,
ma w’ani nhwɛ adeɛ a ɛtene mu.
3 Sɛ wosɔ m’akoma hwɛ, na wohwehwɛ me mu anadwo,
na wonane me yiyi mu, worenhunu hwee.
Mabɔ me tirim sɛ meremma asɛmmɔne mfiri m’ano.
4Nnipa nneyɛɛ fam, w’anomu asɛm no nti
masɔre me ho, awerɛmfoɔ akwan ho.
5W’anammɔn no ara so na me kwan nam,
me nan anwati.
6Ao, Onyankopɔn, mesu mefrɛ wo, na wobɛgye me so.
Yɛ aso ma me, tie me nsɛm.
7 Fa awanwa kwan so yi wo dɔ mapa adi kyerɛ,
wo a wogye wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ dwanekɔbea,
firi wɔn atamfoɔ nsam wɔ wo nifa.
8 Hwɛ me so sɛ ani kurutuawisi,
fa me hunta wo ntaban nwunu ase,
9abɔnefoɔ a wɔfom me fa,
m’atamfoɔ atirimuɔdenfoɔ a wɔtwa me ho hyia no nti.
10Wɔapirim wɔn akoma a wɔnni mmɔborɔhunu biara,
wɔde wɔn ano kasa ahantan kasa.
11Wɔtetɛ me, na afei wɔtwa me ho hyia,
wɔde wɔn ani akari me pɛ m’asehweɛ.
12 Wɔte sɛ gyata a wɔredɛɛdɛɛ apɛ adufudeɛ,
te sɛ gyata ba a ɔtɛ kokoam.
13Ao, AWURADE, sɔre bɛsianka wɔn na brɛ wɔn ase,
fa w’afena gye me kra firi abɔnefoɔ nsam.
14 AWURADE, fa wo nsa bɛgye me firi nnipa nsam,
nnipa a wɔn nkwa kyɛfa yɛ wiase deɛ,
fa deɛ wɔasiesie ama wɔn hyɛ wɔn yafunu ma;
ma wɔn mma nya no mmorosoɔ,
na wɔnnya bi mma wɔn mmotafowa.
15Me deɛ, mɛhwɛ w’anim tenenee mu,
menyane a, me ho bɛtɔ me sɛ mahu woɔ.

Title: NNWOM 18
Content:
Nkonim dwom
(2 Samuel 22.1-51)
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. AWURADE akoa Dawid deɛ. Ɔkaa dwom yi nsɛm kyerɛɛ AWURADE, da a AWURADE gyee no n’atamfo nyinaa ne Saulo nsam no. Ɔkaa sɛ:
1Ao, AWURADE, m’ahoɔden, medɔ wo.
2 AWURADE ne me botan ne m’abankɛseɛ ne me gyefoɔ,
me Nyankopɔn ne me botantim a medwane kɔtoa no,
me kyɛm ne me nkwagyeɛ abɛn, m’abantenten.
3Mesu mefrɛ AWURADE, ɔno a ɔfata sɛ wɔyi no ayɛ,
na wɔagye me m’atamfoɔ nsam.
4 Owuo nhoma bebaree me ho,
na ɔsɛeɛ twi faa me so sɛ osuhweam.
5Asamando nhoma twaa me ho kɔntɔnkrɔn,
owuo afidie bɛhyiaa me.
6M’ahohia mu mesu mefrɛɛ AWURADE,
me Nyankopɔn, na meteaa mu mefrɛɛ no.
Ɔtee me nne n’asɔrefie,
na me su a mesu mekyerɛɛ no no kɔduruu n’aso mu.
7Ɛnna asase hinhimiiɛ na ɛwosoeɛ,
na mmepɔ nnyinasoɔ popoe, na ɛhinhimii,
ɛfiri sɛ na ne bo ahuru no.
8 Wisie tu firii ne hwenem,
na ogya a ɛhye adeɛ firii n’anomu,
nnyansramma dɛre firii ne mu.
9 Na ɔkuntunuu ɔsoro mu, na ɔsii fam,
na esum kabii wɔ ne nan ase.
10 Na ɔtenaa Kerub so na ɔtui,
na ɔde mframa ntaban tu bae afrɛ so.
11 Ɔde sum kataa ne ho hyiae;
n’asasewa yɛ osuo a amuna kusuu.
12Hann a ɛdi n’anim no
nnyansramma firi
ne mununkum no mu bae.
13Na AWURADE boom ɔsoro,
na ɔsorosoroni no maa wɔtee ne nne,
asukɔtweaa ne nnyansramma.
14 Na ɔtotoo n’agyan de bɔɔ wɔn hwetee
ne asraman bebree de tanee wɔn ani.
15Ɛnna ɛpo mu mmɔnka yiyii adie,
na wiase nnyinasoɔ ho daa hɔ,
ɛfiri w’ateatea, AWURADE,
ne wo hwene mu home hahyeehahyee no.
16 Ɔtenee ne nsa firi soro bɛfaa me,
ɔtwee me firii nsuo pii mu.
17Ɔgyee me firii me tamfo hoɔdenfoɔ
ne wɔn a wɔkyiri me nsam,
ɛfiri sɛ wɔsene me ahoɔden.
18Wɔbɛtoaa me m’amanehunu da no mu,
na AWURADE bɛyɛɛ me okyiritaafoɔ.
19 Na ɔyii me kɔgyinaa deɛ ɛhɔ trɛ,
ɔgyee me, ɛfiri sɛ mesɔɔ n’ani.
20AWURADE tuaa me ka sɛdeɛ me tenenee teɛ,
sɛdeɛ me nsa ho a afire no teɛ na ɔtuaa me ho ka.
21Na manante AWURADE akwan so,
na menyɛɛ bɔne mennyaa me Nyankopɔn,
22 na mmom n’atemmudeɛ nyinaa wɔ m’ani so,
na memfirii n’ahyɛdeɛ ho.
23 Na me ho nni asɛm wɔ n’anim,
na mehwɛɛ me ho so firii amumuyɛ ho.
24Na AWURADE atua me ka sɛdeɛ me tenenee,
sɛdeɛ me nsa ho a afire wɔ n’ani soɔ no teɛ.
25Ɔnokwafoɔ na wo ne no bɛdi no nokorɛ mu,
onipa a ɔdi mu na wo ne no bɛdi no mudie soɔ.
26Deɛ ɔte ne ho na wobɛte wo ho akyerɛ no,
na ɔkontonkyini deɛ, wokyinkyim wo ho kyerɛ no.
27 Na wo na wogye ahobrɛasefoɔ,
na wobrɛ ahantanfoɔ ase.
28Na wo na woma me kanea derɛ,
AWURADE me Nyankopɔn te me sum mu.
29 Na wo na mede wo meto mehyɛ ɛdɔm soɔ,
na mede me Nyankopɔn mehuri metra ɔfasuo.
30 Na Onyankopɔn yi deɛ, ne kwan yɛ pɛpɛ,
AWURADE asɛm mu te,
ɔyɛ ɛkyɛm ma wɔn a wɔdwane kɔtoa no nyinaa.
31Na hwan ne Nyankopɔn sɛ AWURADE nko,
na hwan na ɔyɛ ɔbotan sɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn?
32Onyankopɔn a ɔde ahoɔden bɔɔ me abɔsoɔ,
na ɔma me kwan yɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.
33Ɔyɛ me nan sɛ aforotebereɛ deɛ,
na ɔde me gyina me sorɔnsorɔmmea so.
34 Ɔkyerɛ me nsa akodie,
na ɔma me basa kuntunu kɔbere mfrafraeɛ tadua.
35 Na woama me wo nkwagyeɛ kyɛm,
na wo nsa nifa sɔɔ me mu,
na wo mmoa maa meyɛɛ kɛseɛ.
36 Wotrɛɛ m’anammɔn mu m’ase,
na me nan anwatiri.
37Metii m’atamfoɔ, na metoo wɔn,
na mansane de kɔsii sɛ mewiee wɔn kum.
38Mebobɔɔ wɔn, na wɔantumi ansɔre,
wɔtotɔree me nan ase.
39Na wode ahoɔden bɔɔ me abɔsoɔ maa akodie,
wobrɛɛ wɔn a wɔsɔre tiaa me no ase hyɛɛ m’ase,
40na womaa m’atamfoɔ danee wɔn akyiri kyerɛɛ me,
na wɔn a wɔkyiri me no, mesɛee wɔn.
41 Wɔsu frɛe a ɔgyefoɔ bi nni hɔ,
wɔfrɛɛ AWURADE, na wammua wɔn.
42Na mepɛkyɛɛ wɔn meyɛɛ wɔn sɛ mfuturo, mframa anim,
mesesaa wɔn meguu sɛ mmorɔno so dɔteɛ.
43Woyii me nnipa aperedie mu, wode me sii amanaman so ti,
ɔman a mennim wɔn na ɛsom me.
44Aso teeɛ ara pɛ, na wɔtiee me,
ananafoɔ brɛɛ wɔn ho ase maa me.
45Ananafoɔ twintwamee,
na wɔde ahopopoɔ fifirii wɔn huntabea bae.
46AWURADE te ase, na nhyira ne me botantim no.
Na me nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn no, wɔmma no so.
47Onyankopɔn a ɔtɔɔ were maa me,
na ɔde aman hyɛɛ m’aseɛ;
48wagye me afiri m’atamfoɔ mu,
aane, woama me so afiri wɔn a wɔsɔre tiaa me no mu,
woagye me awerɛmfoɔ nsam.
49 Enti, AWURADE, mɛda wo ase amanaman mu,
na mabɔ wo din mato ayeyie nnwom,
50 sɛ wone deɛ ɔma ne hene nkwagyeɛ soɔ,
na ɔyɛ deɛ wasra no no adɔeɛ,
Dawid ne n’asefoɔ daa.

Title: NNWOM 19
Content:
Wɔhu Onyankopɔn animuonyam wɔ abɔdeɛ mu
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dawid dwom.
1 Ɔsoro ka Nyankopɔn animuonyam,
na ewiem kyerɛ ne nsa ano adwuma.
2Da koro biara woro kyerɛ,
na anadwo biara da nimdeɛ adi.
3Ɛnyɛ ɔkasa na ɛnyɛ nsɛm a wɔteɛ.
4 Ɔsoro susuhoma duru asase nyinaa so,
na ne nsɛm duru wiase ano;
wasi ntomadan ama owia ɔsoro hɔ.
5Na ɛfiri adi sɛ ayeforɔkunu a ɔfiri ne pia mu,
ɛde ahosɛpɛ tu mmirika sɛ ɔbrane.
6 N’adifire wɔ ɔsoro ano,
na ne kyini kɔduru ano hɔ,
na biribiara nkora ne ho mfiri ne hyeɛ ano.
7 AWURADE mmara yɛ pɛ,
ɛdwodwo ɔkra.
AWURADE adanseɛ atim,
ɛma awiɛmfoɔ hunu nyansa.
8 AWURADE ahyɛdeɛ tene,
ɛma akoma tɔ yam.
AWURADE mmarahyɛ ho te,
na ɛte ani.
9AWURADE suro yɛ kronkron,
ɛgyina hɔ daa.
AWURADE atemmudeɛ yɛ nokorɛ,
ne nyinaa tene.
10 Ɛyɛ akɔnnɔ sene sika
ne sika amapa pii,
na ɛyɛ fremfrem sene ɛwoɔ
ne ahwedeɛ mu nsuo.
11Wɔnam so bɔ w’akoa kɔkɔ,
ɛsodie mu wɔ akatua pii.
12 Hwan na ɔhunu ɔno ara ne mfomsoɔ mu?
Me bɔne a ahunta me, fa kyɛ me.
13 Nso bɔ w’akoa ho ban wɔ bɔne a wɔboapa yɛ ho,
na anhyɛ me so.
Ɛno na mɛdi bem,
na me ho afi amumuyɛ kɛseɛ ho.
14Ma m’anomu nsɛm nyɛ wo fɛ,
na m’akomam nkɔmmɔ nsɔ w’ani,
O AWURADE, me botan ne me gyefoɔ.

Title: NNWOM 20
Content:
Nkonimdie ho adesrɛ
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dawid dwom.
1 AWURADE ntie wo hiada,
Yakob Nyankopɔn din mmɔ wo ho ban,
2ɔmfiri kronkron mu hɔ mmɛboa wo,
na ɔmfiri Bepɔ Sion mmɛhyɛ wo den.
3Ɔnkae w’aduane afɔdeɛ nyinaa,
na wo hyeɛ afɔdeɛ nsɔ n’ani.
4 Ɔmma wo deɛ w’akoma pɛ,
na ɔmma wo tirim asɛm nyinaa mmra mu.
5Ma yɛn mmɔ ose wɔ wo nkonimdie ho,
na yɛn Nyankopɔn din mu na yɛhim yɛn frankaa:
AWURADE mma deɛ wosrɛ nyinaa mmra mu.
6 Afei mahunu sɛ AWURADE boa deɛ wasra no no,
ɔgye no so, ne soro kronkronbea hɔ,
ɔde ne nifa ahoɔdenneɛ gye no.
7 Ebinom kamfo nteaseɛnam,
na ebinom kamfo apɔnkɔ,
na yɛn deɛ, yɛkamfo AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn din.
8Wɔn deɛ, wɔbubu duedue so hwehwe ase,
na yɛn deɛ, yɛasɔre gyina hɔ kyirebenn.
9AWURADE, gye ɔhene nkwa.
Ɔbɛtie yɛn, da a yɛfrɛ no yi ara mu.

Title: NNWOM 21
Content:
Aseda mpaeɛ a wɔbɔ ma ɔhene
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dawid dwom.
1Ao, AWURADE, wo na ɔhene ani gye wɔ w’ahoɔden mu,
na wo nkwagyeɛ nti hwɛ sɛdeɛ ne ho si sane no fa.
2 Deɛ n’akoma pɛ na wode ama no,
na deɛ n’ano bisaeɛ no, woankame no.
3 Na wode papa mu nhyira hyia no,
wode sika amapa abotire bɔ ne ti.
4Ɔbisaa wo hɔ nkwa,
wode ama no, nna a ɛware daa daa.
5N’animuonyam so wo nkwagyeɛ nti,
kɛseyɛ ne anidie na wode ama no.
6Aane, wode no asi hɔ sɛ nhyira nko ara daa,
wode w’anim anigyeɛ gye n’ani.
7Ɛfiri sɛ ɔhene ani da AWURADE so,
na deɛ ɔwɔ sorosoro adɔeɛ nti ɔrenhinhim.
8Wo nsa bɛka w’atamfo nyinaa,
wo nsa nifa bɛnya wɔn a wɔkyiri woɔ.
9Wobɛyi wo ho adi
ayɛ wɔn sɛ ogya fononoo,
AWURADE de n’abufuo bɛmene wɔn,
na ogya ahye wɔn.
10 Wobɛsɛe wɔn aba afiri asase so,
ne wɔn asefoɔ afiri nnipa mma mu.
11 Sɛ wɔbɔ wo ho pɔ bɔne na wɔsusu bɔne bi ho a,
wɔrentumi nyɛ. 12 Na wobɛma wɔasane wɔn akyi,
wode wo bɛmma bɛkyerɛ wɔn anim. 13AWURADE, ma wo ho so w’ahoɔden mu,
yɛde adwontoɔ ne sankuo bɛkamfo wo mmaninneɛ.

Title: NNWOM 22
Content:
Amanehunu dwom
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no “Adekyeeɛ foroteɛ” sankuo nne so. Dawid dwom.
1 Me Nyankopɔn, me Nyankopɔn, deɛn nti na woagya me?
Me su a mesu mefrɛ woɔ ne me nkwagyeɛ ntam ware.
2Me Nyankopɔn, meteam mefrɛ wo awia,
na wommua me, ne anadwo, nso mennya ɔhome.
3Na woyɛ kronkron,
wote w’ahennwa so, na wo na Israel ayeyie nyinaa wɔ woɔ.
4Wo so na yɛn agyanom de wɔn ho toeɛ,
wɔde wɔn ho too wo so, na wogyee wɔn.
5 Wo na wɔteaa mu frɛɛ woɔ, na wɔnyaa nkwagyeɛ,
wɔde wɔn ho too wo so, na wɔn ani anwu.
6 Na me deɛ, meyɛ aboa, na menyɛ onipa,
meyɛ nnipa ahohoradeɛ ne ɔman akyiwadeɛ.
7 Wɔn a wɔhu me nyinaa
di me ho fɛw trɛ wɔn anomu woso wɔn tiri ka sɛ:
8Dane to AWURADE so, ma no nnye no,
sɛ ɔpɛ no a, ma no nyi no!
9 Na wo na woyii me firii me na yam,
metua me na nufoɔ ano no, na womaa me anidasoɔ.
10Mefiri yafunum ara na wɔde me too wo soɔ,
