wone me Nyankopɔn firi me na yam.
11Mma me ne wo ntam nnware,
na ahohia abɛn
a ɔboafoɔ bi nni hɔ.
12Anantwinini bebree atwa me ho ahyia,
Basan anantwie akɛseɛ abɔ me ho kɔntɔnkrɔn.
13Wɔtrɛ wɔn anomu kyerɛ me
sɛ gyata a ɔteteɛ na ɔbobom.
14 Wɔahwie me agu sɛ nsuo,
na me nnompe nyinaa ahwinhwan n’akwaa so.
M’akoma ayɛ sɛ akraa,
anane wɔ me yam.
15 M’ahoɔden mu awe sɛ kyɛmferɛ,
na me tɛkyerɛma afam me dodom,
na wode me ato owuo mfuturo mu.
16 Nnipa bɔne te sɛ akraman atwa me ho ahyia,
na wɔbom ba me so,
wɔahwire me nsa ne me nan mu.
17Metumi mekan me nnompe nyinaa,
wɔn deɛ, wɔhwɛ me de gye wɔn ani.
18 Wɔkyɛ me ntoma mu fa,
na m’atadeɛ so na wɔbɔ ntonto.
19Na wo, AWURADE, ntena akyiri.
M’ahoɔden, yɛ ntɛm bɛboa me.
20 Hwim me kra firi nkrantɛ ano,
m’ade koro no firi akraman nsam.
21Gye me firi gyata anomu,
na ɛkoɔ mmɛn mu na wotie me.
22 Mɛbɔ wo din makyerɛ me nuanom,
mɛkamfo wo asafo mu.
23Mo a mosuro AWURADE, monyi no ayɛ.
Yakob asefoɔ nyinaa, monhyɛ no animuonyam,
na Israel asefoɔ nyinaa, momfɛre no.
24 Na wansere na wankyiri
ɔmanehunufoɔ amaneɛ,
na wanyi n’anim anhunta no,
na mmom ɔsu frɛɛ no no, ɔtiee.
25 Wo na woma meyi wo ayɛ asafo kɛseɛ mu,
mɛma m’aboadeɛ wɔ, wɔn a wɔsuro no no anim.
26 Ahobrɛasefoɔ bɛdidi na wɔamee,
wɔn a wɔpɛ AWURADE akyiri kwan bɛyi no ayɛ.
Mo akoma nnya nkwa daa.
27Asase ano ano sofoɔ nyinaa bɛkae
adane aba AWURADE nkyɛn,
na amanaman mmusuakuo nyinaa
abɛkoto n’anim.
28Na ahennie wɔ AWURADE,
na ɔdi amanaman so.
29 Asase so abrane nyinaa bɛdidi na wɔakoto no,
wɔn a wɔsiane kɔ mfuturo mu nyinaa,
ne deɛ anka ne kra nni nkwa no bɛkoto no.
30 Nkyirimma bɛsom no,
wɔbɛka AWURADE ho asɛm, awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛdidi soɔ mu.
31 Wɔbɛba abɛka ne tenenee akyerɛ ɔman a wɔbɛwo wɔn no,
sɛ ɔno na wayɛ.

Title: NNWOM 23
Content:
AWURADE ne odwanhwɛfoɔ pa
Dawid dwom.
1 AWURADE ne me hwɛfoɔ, hwee renhia me.
2 Ɔma meda adidibea a ɛhɔ wira yɛ frɔmfrɔm,
ɔgya me kɔ nsuo a ɛho dwoɔ ho.
3 Ɔdwodwo me kra,
ɔde me fa akwantenenee so,
ne din nti.
4 Sɛ mpo menam owuo sum kabii bɔn no mu a,
mensuro bɔne biara,
ɛfiri sɛ wo ne me na ɛwɔ hɔ,
w’abaa ne wo poma
na ɛkyekyere me werɛ.
5 Woto me pono,
m’atamfoɔ anim,
wode ngo fɔ me tirim,
me kuruwa yɛ ma bu so.
6 Ampa ara yie ne adɔeɛ nko na ɛbɛdi m’akyiri
me nkwa nna nyinaa,
na mɛtena AWURADE fie
daa.

Title: NNWOM 24
Content:
Ba a animuonyam hene no ba
Dawid dwom.
1 Asase ne n’adeɛ dodoɔ yɛ AWURADE dea,
wiase ne wɔn a wɔte mu no wɔ no.
2 Na ɔno na ɔhyɛɛ aseɛ, ɛpo so,
na ɔde atintim asukɛseɛ soɔ.
3 Hwan na ɔbɛforo AWURADE bepɔ no,
na hwan na ɔbɛgyina ne tenabea kronkron hɔ?
4Deɛ efi nni ne nsam na n’akomam teɛ,
deɛ ɔmma ne kra ani nsa ahuhudeɛ,
na ɔnka nkontompo ntam.
5 Ɔno na ɔbɛnya AWURADE nsam nhyira
na ne nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn bɛbu no bem.
6 Yeinom ne wɔn a wɔpɛ n’akyiri kwan no abusua,
wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ w’anim, O Yakob Nyankopɔn.
7 Mo, aponkɛseɛ, momma mo tiri so,
na mo, tete apono, montrɛ mo ho mu,
na animuonyam hene no nhyɛne mu.
8Hwan ne animuonyam hene yi?
Ɛyɛ AWURADE, otumfoɔ kɛseɛ, ɔbrane,
AWURADE a ɔyɛ ɔbrane, ɔko mu.
9Mo, aponkɛseɛ, momma mo tiri so,
na montrɛ mo tete apono no mu,
na animuonyam hene no nhyɛne mu.
10Hwan ne saa animuonyam hene yi?
Asafo AWURADE,
ɔno ne animuonyam Hene no.

Title: NNWOM 25
Content:
Fakyɛ ne kwankyerɛ ho mpaebɔ
Dawid deɛ.
1AWURADE, wo na mema me kra so mekyerɛ woɔ.
2Me Nyankopɔn, wo so na mede me ho matoɔ,
mma m’ani nnwu,
mma m’atamfoɔ ho nnsɛpɛ wɔn, me nti.
3 Ampa ara, wɔn a wɔhwɛ wo kwan no biara ani renwu,
wɔn a wɔtwa nkontompo kwa no na wɔn ani bɛwuo.
4 AWURADE, kyerɛ me w’akwan,
na fa me fa w’atempɔn so.
5Ma mennante wo nokorɛ mu, na kyerɛkyerɛ me,
ɛfiri sɛ wone me nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn,
m’ani da wo so daa nyinaa.
6AWURADE, kae wo mmɔborɔhunu ne w’adɔeɛ
a ɛwɔ hɔ firi tete no.
7 Nkae me mmɔfraase bɔne ne me mfomsoɔ, na mmom
kae me sɛdeɛ w’adɔeɛ teɛ,
AWURADE, w’ayamyie nti.
8AWURADE yɛ, na ɔtene,
enti na ɔkyerɛkyerɛ nnebɔneyɛfoɔ ɔkwan soɔ.
9Ɔma ahobrɛasefoɔ nante tenenee mu,
na ɔma ahobrɛasefoɔ sua ne kwan.
10AWURADE atempɔn nyinaa yɛ adɔeɛ ne nokorɛ
ma wɔn a wɔdi n’apam ne n’adansesɛm soɔ.
11AWURADE, wo din nti fa me bɔne kyɛ me,
na ɛdɔɔso pii.
12 Onipa biara a ɔsuro AWURADE no,
ɔbɛkyerɛ no kwan a ɔmfa soɔ.
13 Ne kra bɛtena yiedie mu,
na n’asefoɔ anya asase atena so.
14 AWURADE yi ne tirim asɛm kyerɛ wɔn a wɔsuro no,
na ɔma wɔhunu n’apam no mu.
15M’ani hwɛ AWURADE daa,
na ɔno na ɔbɛyi me nan afiri afidie mu.
16Dane w’ani hwɛ me, na dom me,
na meyɛ ankonam, na meyɛ mmɔbɔ.
17M’akoma mu ahohia so,
yi me firi m’ahokyere mu.
18Hwɛ m’amaneɛ ne m’ahometeɛ,
na fa me bɔne nyinaa kyɛ me.
19 Hwɛ sɛ m’atamfoɔ dɔɔso,
na wɔde atirimuɔden tane me.
20 Hwɛ me kra so na gye me,
mma m’ani nnwu, na medwane bɛtoa wo.
21 Ma pɛyɛ ne teeyɛ nhwɛ me so,
ɛfiri sɛ m’ani da wo so.
22 Onyankopɔn, gye Israel
firi wɔn ahohia nyinaa mu.

Title: NNWOM 26
Content:
Nyankopɔn fam ahoteɛ
Dawid deɛ.
1AWURADE, bu me bem,
na me pɛyɛ mu na mebɔɔ me bra,
na mede me ho metoo AWURADE soɔ, manwatiri.
2 AWURADE, hwehwɛ me mu na sɔ me hwɛ,
nane me sawa ne m’akoma.
3Na w’adɔeɛ wɔ m’ani so,
na menam wo nokorɛ mu.
4 Me ne nnipa huhuo antena,
na me ne nyaatwomfoɔ anhyia mu.
5Metane nnipa bɔne dwabɔ,
na me ne nnebɔneyɛfoɔ ntena.
6 Mɛhohoro me nsa, bemdie mu,
na matwa w’afɔrebukyia ho mahyia, AWURADE,
7sɛ merema wɔate m’aseda dwom,
na maka w’anwanwadeɛ nyinaa.
8 AWURADE, medɔ wo fie tenabea
ne faako a w’animuonyam teɛ.
9Nhwim me kra nka nnebɔneyɛfoɔ ho,
anaasɛ me nkwa nka mogyapɛfoɔ ho nkɔ.
10Wɔn na mmusuo hyɛ wɔn nsam,
na kɛtɛasehyɛdeɛ ayɛ wɔn nifa ma.
11Na me deɛ, pɛyɛ mu na mebɔ me bra:
Gye me, na hu me mmɔbɔ.
12 Me nan gyina deɛ ɛhɔ da fam,
asafo ahyiaeɛ mu na mɛhyira AWURADE.

Title: NNWOM 27
Content:
AWURADE ne me hann ne me nkwagyeɛ
Dawid deɛ.
1 AWURADE ne me hann ne me nkwagyeɛ,
hwan na mensuro no?
AWURADE ne me nkwa ahoɔden,
hwan anim na me ho mpopoɔ?
2 Nnipa bɔne a wɔhyɛ me so
na wɔtane me,
sɛ wɔretoa me abɛsunsuane me a,
wɔawatiwatiri na wɔahwehwe ase.
3 Sɛ dɔm kyere me so nsraban a,
m’akoma rentu;
sɛ wɔtu me so sa a,
ɛno mu mpo na me ho tɔ me.
4 Adeɛ baako na masrɛ AWURADE,
ɛno na mɛhwehwɛ akyire kwan;
sɛ me nna a medie nyinaa
mɛtena AWURADE fie,
na mahwɛ AWURADE animteɛ,
na madwene me tirim wɔ n’asɔrefie.
5 Na ɔkora me ne sese mu
wɔ hia da,
ɔde me hunta ne ntomadan ahuntaeɛ,
ɔma me so gyina ɔbotan so.
6Na afei ɔbɛma me tiri so,
m’atamfoɔ a wɔatwa me ho ahyia no so,
na mabɔ ne ntomadan mu
ayeyie afɔdeɛ,
na mato AWURADE sankuo dwom.
7AWURADE, tie me sufrɛ;
hu me mmɔbɔ, na gye me so.
8 Woaka sɛ: Monhwehwɛ m’anim, nti,
m’akoma se wo sɛ:
AWURADE, w’anim na merehwehwɛ.
9Nyi w’anim nhunta me,
mfa abufuo mpamo w’akoa.
Me boafoɔ ne wo,
nto me ntwene, na nnya me,
me nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn.
10 Na m’agya ne me na agya me,
na AWURADE deɛ, ɔgye me.
11 AWURADE, kyerɛ me wo kwan,
na fa me fa ɔtempɔn tamaa so,
m’atɛfoɔ nti.
12Nnane me mma sɛdeɛ m’atamfoɔ pɛ,
na adansekurumfoɔ asɔre atia me,
ne wɔn a wɔpu aniɛdensɛm.
13 Megye medi sɛ mɛhunu AWURADE ayamyɛ,
ateasefoɔ asase so.
14 Ma w’ani nna AWURADE so,
hyɛ wo ho den na ma wo bo nyɛ duru,
Aane, ma w’ani nna AWURADE so.

Title: NNWOM 28
Content:
Abooboo, adesrɛ ne aseda
Dawid deɛ.
1 AWURADE, wo na mesu mefrɛ woɔ, me botan,
mmua w’ano wɔ me ho;
anyɛ saa na womua w’ano wɔ me ho a,
mɛyɛ sɛ wɔn a wɔsiane kɔ Amena mu no.
2 Sɛ mesu mefrɛ wo,
na mema me nsa so
mekyerɛ wo tenabea kronkron hɔ a,
tie me nkotosrɛ.
3 Ntwe me mfra abɔnefoɔ ne abusuyɛfoɔ
a wɔne wɔn yɔnkonom kasa asomdwoeɛ soɔ,
na wɔn akoma mu deɛ, bɔne wɔ mu.
4Yɛ wɔn sɛdeɛ wɔn nneyɛɛ
ne wɔn abrabɔ bɔne teɛ,
susu wɔn nsa ano nnwuma so ma wɔn,
tua wɔn deɛ wɔayɛ so ka.
5 Ɛfiri sɛ wɔn ani nni AWURADE nneyɛɛ ne ne nsa ano nnwuma so:
Ɔbɛdwiri wɔn, na ɔrento wɔn nsi hɔ.
6Ayeyie nka AWURADE,
ɛfiri sɛ watie me nkotosrɛ.
7 AWURADE ne m’ahoɔden ne me kyɛm.
Mede m’akoma mato ne so, na waboa me,
enti m’akoma ho asane no,
na mede me dwom meda no ase.
8AWURADE ne ne nkurɔfoɔ ahoɔden,
deɛ wasra no no nkwagyeɛ aban ne no.
9 Boa wo man, na hyira w’apɛgyadeɛ,
na yɛne wɔn, na ma wɔn so daa.

Title: NNWOM 29
Content:
Nyankopɔn animuonyam a ɛda adi ahum mu
Dawid dwom.
1 Mo ɔsoro asafo, momfa animuonyam mma AWURADE,
momfa animuonyam ne tumi mma AWURADE.
2 Aane, monhyɛ AWURADE din animuonyam,
monsɔre AWURADE, ahokeka kronkron mu.
3 AWURADE nne wɔ nsuo so,
animuonyam Nyankopɔn ma aprannaa bom,
AWURADE wɔ nsuo bebree so.
4AWURADE nne mu yɛ den sɛ,
AWURADE nne mu wɔ animuonyam.
5AWURADE nne bubu ntweneduro,
AWURADE bubu Lebanon ntweneduro.
6 Na ɔma wɔhurihuri sɛ nantwie ba,
Lebanon ne Sirion sɛ okoo ba.
7AWURADE nne pa gya a ɛdɛre.
8AWURADE nne ma ɛserɛ so hɔ him,
AWURADE ma Kades serɛ so hɔ po.
9AWURADE nne ma aforoteɛ ko awoɔ,
na ɛma kwaeɛ mu da hɔ,
na n’asɔrefie mufoɔ nyinaa ka sɛ: Animuonyam nka Nyankopɔn.
10AWURADE tenaa ase wɔ nsuo a ayiri so,
na AWURADE bɛtena hɔ sɛ ɔhene daa.
11 AWURADE bɛma ne man ahoɔden,
AWURADE de asomdwoeɛ bɛhyira ne man.

Title: NNWOM 30
Content:
Aseda dwom
Dwom a wɔto de dwiraa Asɔredan no ho. Dawid dwom.
1 Mɛma wo so, AWURADE, ɛfiri sɛ woayi me,
na woamma m’atamfoɔ ani annye, me nti.
2AWURADE, me Nyankopɔn, mesu mefrɛɛ wo,
na wosaa me yadeɛ.
3 AWURADE, woatwe me kra afiri Asamando,
woama me nkwa na mankɔ Amena mu.
4Monto AWURADE dwom, mo a moyɛ n’ahotefoɔ,
na monyi ne din kronkron no ayɛ.
5 Na n’abufuo kyɛre kakraa bi,
na n’adɔeɛ deɛ, ɛtena hɔ kyɛre sɛ nkwa berɛ.
Osu bɛsoɛ anadwo,
na adeɛ kye a, na anigyeɛ aba.
6Na me deɛ, mesee m’ahodwoɔ mu sɛ:
Merenhinhim ara da.
7AWURADE, wode w’anisɔ ama me
atim denden sɛ bepɔ,
na wode w’ani huntaa no,
m’akoma tui.
8Wo, AWURADE, na mesu mefrɛɛ woɔ,
na mekoto mesrɛɛ AWURADE sɛ:
9 Ɛdeɛn mfasoɔ na ɛwɔ me so
wɔ m’Amena mu korɔ mu?
Mfuturo bɛda wo ase anaa?
Ɛbɛka wo nokorɛ akyerɛ anaa?
10AWURADE, tie, na hu me mmɔbɔ!
AWURADE, bɛboa me!
11 Woama m’abooboo adane me asa,
woasane me ho ayitoma,
na wode anigyeɛ abɔ me abɔsoɔ,
12 na m’animuonyam ato wo dwom, na annyae da.
AWURADE, me Nyankopɔn, mɛda wo ase daa.

Title: NNWOM 31
Content:
Ahotosoɔ dwom
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dawid dwom.
1Wo, AWURADE, na madwane abɛtoa woɔ,
mma m’anim nngu ase da biara da.
Fa wo tenenee so gye me,
2 yɛ aso ma me,
yɛ ntɛm gye me.
Yɛ me dwanekɔhyɛbea botan
ne srɔnsrɔn so aban sɛ wɔbɛgye me nkwa.
3 Na wone me botantim ne me tenabea srɔnsrɔn,
na wo din nti wobɛkyerɛ me kwan na woakɔgya me.
4 Wobɛyi me afiri afidie a wɔahunta asum me no mu,
na wo ara ne m’aban a ɛyɛ den.
5 Wo nsam na mede me honhom mehyɛ,
AWURADE, nokorɛ Nyankopɔn, woagye me.
6Metane wɔn a wɔdi atorɔ ahuhudeɛ akyire,
na me deɛ, mebata AWURADE ho.
7Mɛdi ahurisie, na m’ani agye w’adɔeɛ ho,
sɛ woahwɛ m’amanehunu,
na woahunu me kra ahohia.
8 Na woanyi me anhyɛ ɔtamfoɔ nsa,
wode me nan agyina deɛ ɛtrɛ.
9 AWURADE, hu me mmɔbɔ,
na me ho dwan me.
Awerɛhoɔ ama m’ani ne me kra ne me honam atwintwam.
10Na me nkwa ahwere yea mu,
na me mfeɛ ahwere ahomeguo mu.
M’amumuyɛ nti m’ahoɔden so ahwan,
na me nnompe ahodwo.
11 M’ahohiahiafoɔ nyinaa nti mayɛ ɔhohorafoɔ,
na mayɛ me ho tefoɔ so duru,
na m’amannifoɔ suro me,
wɔn a mefiri adi a wɔhu me dwane me. 12Nnipa werɛ afiri me sɛ owufoɔ,
mayɛ sɛ adeɛ a wɔto twene.
13 Na mete nnipa bebree nsekudie,
ahudeɛ atwa me ho ahyia,
sɛdeɛ me ho agyina a wɔakorɔ no mu
wɔabɔ wɔn tirim sɛ wɔbɛsɛe me kra.
14Na me deɛ, wo, AWURADE, so na mede me ho matoɔ.
Mese: Wone me Nyankopɔn.
15 Wo nsam na me mmerɛ wɔ,
gye me m’atamfoɔ ne m’ataafoɔ nsam.
16 Te w’anim kyerɛ w’akoa,
fa w’adɔeɛ so gye me nkwa.
17AWURADE mma m’anim nngu ase,
na mesu mefrɛ wo.
Ma abɔnefoɔ anim ngu ase,
na wɔntotɔre mum Asamando.
18Ma atorofoɔ ano mmua,
wɔn a wɔka ɔteneneeni ho nsɛm a ɛyɛ den
ahokyerɛ ne aniammɔho mu no.
19Wo papa a wode asie ama wɔn a wɔsuro wo no
sɛdeɛ asi so fa!
Ɛno na woyi kyerɛ wɔn a wɔdwane bɛtoa woɔ no, nnipa anim.
20 Wode w’anim bɔ wɔn ho ban
de wɔn hunta firi nnipa a wɔabɔ kyenku anim,
wode wɔn sie ɔsese mu
firi tɛkyerɛma birebire ho.
21 Nhyira ne AWURADE
sɛ wama n’adɔeɛ ayɛ nwanwa ama me,
kuro a ahohiahia wɔ.
22 Nso me deɛ, mekaa no m’ahoyera mu sɛ:
Wɔatwa me afiri w’ani so.
Nanso mesu mefrɛɛ woɔ no,
wotee me nkotosrɛ.
23Monnɔ AWURADE, mo a moyɛ n’ahotefoɔ nyinaa.
AWURADE hwɛ wɔn a wɔdi nokorɛ so,
na ɔtua deɛ ɔdi ahantansɛm no ka ma no boro so.
24 Monhyɛ mo ho den na monsi mo bo,
mo a motwɛn AWURADE nyinaa.

Title: NNWOM 32
Content:
Bɔne fakyɛ mu ahotɔ
Dawid deɛ. Nnweneho dwom.
1 Nhyira ne deɛ wɔde ne mmarato akyɛ no,
na wɔakata ne bɔne soɔ.
2Nhyira ne onipa a AWURADE mmu n’amumuyɛ ngu ne soɔ,
na nnaadaa nni ne honhom mu.
3 Na memuaa m’ano no, me nnompe hodwoe,
m’apinisie a mesii no daa nyinaa nti.
4Na awia ne anadwo wo nsa yɛɛ me so duru,
me mu nsuo twee, na mekusaa sɛ awia berɛ mu.
5 Mekaa me bɔne mekyerɛɛ wo,
na mankora m’amumuyɛ so.
Mekaa sɛ: Mɛka me mmarato makyerɛ AWURADE.
Wo na wode me bɔne so mmusuo kyɛeɛ.
6Yei nti teeni biara mmɔ wo mpaeɛ da a ɔbɛhu woɔ no.
Ampa ara, sɛ asu kɛseɛ yiri a, ɛremfa ɔyaa korɔ.
7Wone me huntabea,
wobɛbɔ me ho ban na me ho annwan me,
na wode nkwagyeɛ nnwom atwa me ho ahyia.
8 Na wo AWURADE aka sɛ: Mɛbue w’adwene mu na makyerɛ wo
ɔkwan a wobɛfa soɔ,
m’ani wɔ wo so, na mɛtu wo fo.
9 Monnyɛ sɛ apɔnkɔ anaa mfunumupɔnkɔ a wɔnnim de,
nnareka ne ɛho homa na wɔde to wɔn ano mu twe wɔn,
anka wɔrentwe mmɛn wo.
10Ɔbɔnefoɔ yea dɔɔso,
na deɛ ɔde ne ho to AWURADE soɔ no,
wɔde adɔeɛ bɛdi no barehyia.
11 Ateneneefoɔ, momma mo ani nnye AWURADE ho, na monni ahurisie!
Akoma mu teefoɔ nyinaa, momfa anigyeɛ nhuro!

Title: NNWOM 33
Content:
Wiase sodie ho dwom
1 Ateneneefoɔ, momfa anigyeɛ nhuro AWURADE mu,
ɛsɛ wɔn a wɔtene no sɛ wɔyi no ayɛ.
2 Momfa sankuo nna AWURADE ase,
momfa sankuo a ɛso homa du nto no dwom!
3 Monto dwom foforɔ mma no,
mommɔ sankuo yie nka ɛnne ho!
4Na AWURADE asɛm tene,
na ne nnwuma nyinaa wɔ nokorɛ mu.
5Ɔdɔ asɛntenenee ne atemmuo,
AWURADE adɔeɛ ahyɛ asase so ma.
6 AWURADE de n’asɛm na ɛyɛɛ ɔsoro,
na ɔde n’anomu honhom yɛɛ emu asafo nyinaa.
7 Ɔka ɛpo nsuo boa ano kuo,
ɔde ebunu sie deɛ ɛhɔ dɔ.
8Ma asase nyinaa sofoɔ nsuro AWURADE,
wɔn a wɔte wiase nyinaa mfɛre no;
9na ɔno na ɔka a, ɛba mu,
ɔno na ɔhyɛ a, ɛgyina hɔ.
10AWURADE ma amanaman agyina dane hunu,
ɔma aman adwene yɛ ɔkwa.
11AWURADE agyina deɛ, ɛgyina hɔ daa,
n’akomam adwene wɔ hɔ ma awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa.
12 Nhyira ne nkurɔfoɔ a wɔn Nyankopɔn ne AWURADE,
ne ɔman a wayi wɔn de ayɛ ɔno ara n’apɛgyadeɛ.
13AWURADE firi soro hwɛ,
ɔhunu nnipa mma nyinaa.
14Ɔte ne tenaberɛ na ɔhwɛ
asase sotefoɔ nyinaa.
15Ɔno na ɔnwono wɔn nyinaa akoma,
ɔhu wɔn nnwuma nyinaa mu.
16 Ɔhene biara mfa ɛdɔm dodoɔ nni nkonim,
ɔbrane mfa ahoɔden kɛseɛ nnye ne ho.
17 Nkwagyeɛ mu, ɔpɔnkɔ yɛ ade hunu
na wɔmfa n’ahoɔden dodoɔ nnye onipa.
18 Hwɛ, AWURADE ani wɔ wɔn a wɔsuro no so,
ɛwɔ wɔn a wɔn ani da n’adɔeɛ soɔ no so,
19 sɛ ɔbɛgye wɔn kra afiri owuo mu,
na wama wɔanya nkwa ɛkɔm mu.
20 Yɛn kra twɛn AWURADE,
yɛn boafoɔ ne yɛn kyɛm ne no.
21Na ne mu na yɛn akoma bɛtɔ yɛn yam,
ɛfiri sɛ yɛde yɛn ho ato ne din kronkron so.
22AWURADE, ma w’adɔeɛ ntena yɛn so,
sɛdeɛ yɛn ani da wo soɔ no.

Title: NNWOM 34
Content:
AWURADE adɔeɛ ne n’ayamyɛ ho dwom
Dawid deɛ a ɔtoeɛ berɛ a ɔdanee sɛ ɔbɔdamfoɔ Abimelek anim na ɔpamm no maa no kɔeɛ no.
1 Mɛhyira AWURADE nna nyinaa,
n’ayeyie wɔ m’anomu daa yi.
2AWURADE mu na me kra bɛhoahoa ne ho,
ahobrɛasefoɔ bɛte, na wɔn ani agye.
3Mo ne me nkamfo AWURADE kɛseyɛ,
na momma yɛmmom mma ne din so.
4Mahwehwɛ AWURADE, na wabua me,
na wagye me afiri deɛ mesuro nyinaa mu.
5Wɔn a wɔhwɛɛ no no anim tee,
na wɔn anim angu ase.
6Ohiani yi teaa mu, na AWURADE tiee no,
na ɔgyee no n’ahohia nyinaa mu.
7 AWURADE bɔfoɔ bɔ wɔn a wɔsuro no ho nsraban hyia,
na ɔgye wɔn.
8 Monka nhwɛ na monhunu sɛ AWURADE yɛ,
nhyira ne onipa a ɔdwane kɔtoa no.
9 AWURADE akronkronfoɔ, monsuro no!
na biribiara remmɔ wɔn a wɔsuro no.
10 Gyata mmuruwa bɛdi hia na ɛkɔm ade wɔn,
na wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ AWURADE no adepa biara remmɔ wɔn.
11Mma, mommra, monyɛ aso mma me!
Mɛkyerɛ mo AWURADE suro.
12 Mo mu hwan na ɔhwehwɛ nkwa,
na ɔpɛ onyinkyerɛ sɛ ɔbɛhunu papa?
13Kora wo tɛkyerɛma, bɔne ho,
ɛne w’ano, nnaadaasɛm ho.
14 Yi bɔne ho akwa, na yɛ papa,
hwehwɛ asomdwoeɛ, na ti no.
15AWURADE ani wɔ ateneneefoɔ so,
na n’aso tie wɔn sufrɛ.
16 AWURADE ani sa nnebɔneyɛfoɔ,
sɛ ɔbɛhye wɔn ase, asase so.
17Ateneneefoɔ su frɛ, na AWURADE tie,
na ɔgye wɔn firi wɔn ahohia nyinaa mu.
18 AWURADE bɛn wɔn a wɔn akoma abubuo,
na ɔgye wɔn a wɔn honhom apɛkyɛ.
19 Ɔteneneeni amaneɛ dɔɔso,
na AWURADE gye no ne nyinaa mu.
20Ɔhwɛ ne nnompe nyinaa,
sɛdeɛ emu baako mpo mmu.
21Bɔne bɛkum ɔbɔnefoɔ,
na wɔn a wɔtane ɔteneneeni no bɛbrɛ mu.
22AWURADE gye ne nkoa kra,
na wɔn a wɔdwane kɔtoa no nyinaa remmrɛ mu.

Title: NNWOM 35
Content:
Atamfoɔ nti ɔhwehwɛ mmoa
Dawid deɛ.
1AWURADE, wo ne wɔn a wɔne me ham no nham,
wo ne wɔn a wɔne me ko no nko!
2 Sɔ ɛkyɛm ne nkatanim mu,
na sɔre bɛboa me.
3Twe pea na si wɔn a wɔtaa me no kwan,
ka kyerɛ me kra sɛ: W’agyenkwa ne me!
4 Ma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ me wuo no anim ngu ase na wɔn ani nwu,
ma wɔn a wɔpɛ me bɔne no mfa ahohora nsane wɔn akyi!
5Ma wɔnyɛ sɛ ntɛtɛ, mframa anim,
na ma AWURADE bɔfoɔ nsum wɔn ngu!
6Ma wɔn akwan mu nnuru sum na ɛnyɛ torotorotoro,
na AWURADE bɔfoɔ ntaa wɔn!
7 Na wɔasum me fidie wɔn amena mu kwa,
na wɔatu me kra amena kwa.
8 Ma ɔsɛeɛ mmɛfiri no awora,
na ma ne fidie a wasum ahunta no nyi no,
ma ɔmfa bubububu nhwe mu!
9Na me kra bɛdi ahurisie AWURADE mu,
na ne ho asane no, ne nkwagyeɛ mu.
10Me nnompe nyinaa bɛka sɛ:
AWURADE, hwan na ɔte sɛ wo
a wogye ɔmanehunufoɔ
deɛ ɔyɛ den sene no no nsam
ne ɔmanehunufoɔ ne ohiani firi ne dwotwafoɔ no nsam.
11Adansefoɔ nkontompofoɔ sɔre;
adeɛ a mennim na wɔbisa me.
12 Wɔde bɔne tua me papa ka,
me kra adi basugya.
13 Na me deɛ, wɔyare a,
mefira ayitoma,
mede mmuada mebrɛɛ me kra ase,
na mebɔɔ mpaeɛ maa no sane bɛguu me kokom.
14Meyɛɛ sɛdeɛ ɔyɛ m’adamfo ne me nua,
mesii me tiri ase twann
sɛ obi a ɔregyam ne na.
15Na ɛnam sɛ merekɔhwe aseɛ nti,
wɔn ani gye na wɔbɔ kyenku,
nkwahumafoɔ ne nnipa a mennim wɔn bɔ me so kyenku,
wɔya ara na wɔnnyae.
16 Sɛ asansanfoɔ pɛ nkyewankyewa ho tena di fɛw no,
wɔtwɛree wɔn se guu me so.
17 AWURADE, wobɛhwɛ ara akɔsi da bɛn?
Gye me kra firi wɔn sɛeɛ mu,
m’ade korɔ firi agyata nsam!
18 Mɛda wo ase edwa kɛseɛ mu,
mɛyi wo ayɛ ɔman dodoɔ mu.
19 Mma m’atamfoɔ atorofoɔ no
ani nnnye me ho,
mma wɔn a wɔtane me kwa no mmmu me anikyeɛ!
20Na wɔnka asomdwoeɛ nsɛm,
na wɔdwene nkontomposɛm tia
wɔn a wɔdwo, asase so.
21 Na wɔtrɛ wɔn anomu bayaa wɔ me so,
wɔse: Wiɛ, wiɛ,
yɛn ani ahunu!
22AWURADE, woahunu, mmua w’ano,
AWURADE, mfiri me nkyɛn nkɔ akyiri!
23 Nyane, na sɔre bɛbu me atɛn,
me Nyankopɔn ne m’AWURADE, bɛdi m’asɛm!
24AWURADE, me Nyankopɔn, fa wo tenenee so bɛbu me atɛn,
na mma wɔn ani nnnye me ho!
25Mma wɔnnka no wɔn akoma mu sɛ:
Wiɛ, deɛ yɛpɛ ni!
Mma wɔnnka sɛ: Yɛamene no.
26 Wɔn a wɔn ani gye m’amanehunu ho nyinaa,
ma wɔn ani nwu na wɔn anim ngu ase.
Wɔn a wɔdi me so akokurokosɛm no,
ma aniwuo ne ahohora nsi wɔn aduradeɛ!
27 Wɔn a me tenenee sɔ wɔn ani no,
ma wɔnni ahurisie na wɔn ani nnye;
ma wɔnka daa sɛ:
Wɔnkamfo AWURADE kɛseyɛ,
sɛ n’akoa yiedie sɔ n’ani.
28Na me tɛkyerɛma bɛka wo tenenee
ne w’ayeyie daa nyinaa.

Title: NNWOM 36
Content:
Nyankopɔn adɔeɛ
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. AWURADE akoa Dawid deɛ.
1 Ɔbɔnefoɔ mmarato kasa
wɔ n’akoma mu:
Nyankopɔn suro biara
nni n’ani so.
2Na ɔbu ne ho bi ɔno ara ani so
sɛ wɔrenhunu n’amumuyɛ na wɔakyi.
3N’anomu nsɛm yɛ ahuhusɛm ne nnaadaa,
wagyae nimdeɛsua ne papayɛ.
4 Ɔdwene amumuyɛdeɛ ne kɛtɛ so,
ɔde ne nan asi ɔkwan a ɛnyɛ so;
bɔne deɛ, ɔnkyi.
5 Ao, AWURADE, w’adɔeɛ kɔduru soro,
na wo nokorɛ kɔduru wiem tɔnn.
6 Wo tenenee te sɛ Nyankopɔn mmepɔ,
w’atemmuo te sɛ ebunu a emu dɔ.
AWURADE, wogye nnipa ne mmoa nkwa.
7Ao, Onyankopɔn, hwɛ sɛdeɛ w’adɔeɛ no si so fa!
Na nnipa mma de wɔn ho kɔhyɛ wo ntaban nwunu ase.
8 Wo fie mu sradeɛ meemee wɔn,
na woma wɔnom w’anigyeɛ asubɔnten.
9 Ɛfiri sɛ wo nkyɛn na nkwa nsutire wɔ,
wo hann mu na yɛhunu hann.
10Ma w’adɔeɛ nkyɛre mma wɔn a wɔni woɔ,
ne wo tenenee mma akoma mu teefoɔ.
11Mma ɔhantanni nan nntia me,
na mma abɔnefoɔ nsa nnsum me!
12Ɛnneɛ na amumuyɛfoɔ atotɔ,
wɔasum wɔn ahwehwe fam a wɔntumi nsɔreɛ.

Title: NNWOM 37
Content:
Abɔnefoɔ ahotɔ nkyɛ
Dawid deɛ.
1 Nha wo ho nnebɔneyɛfoɔ nti,
mma wo bo nnha wo amumuyɛfoɔ ho;
2na ɛrenni da bi na wɔatwa wɔn agu sɛ ɛserɛ,
na wɔakusa sɛ wura mono a wɔatwa.
3 Bata AWURADE ho, na yɛ papa,
tena asase so, na di nokorɛ,
4na ma w’ani nka AWURADE ho,
na wama wo deɛ w’akoma pɛ.
5 Fa wo kwan hyɛ AWURADE nsam,
na fa wo ho to ne so, na ɔno na ɔbɛyɛ,
6 na wayi wo tenenee adi sɛ adekyeeɛ,
ne wo bem sɛ owigyinaeɛ.
7 Yɛ komm ma AWURADE, na tɔ wo bo ase twɛn no.
Nha wo ho, deɛ ne kwan asi no yie no nti,
onipa a ɔdi ne bo soɔ no nti.
8Ma abufuo ntwa, na gyae bo bɔne yɛ,
nha wo ho, na ɛbɛwie bɔne nko,
9 na wɔbɛyi nnebɔneyɛfoɔ hɔ,
na wɔn a wɔtwɛn AWURADE no, wɔn na wɔbɛnya asase no adie.
10 Aka kakraa bi na ɔbɔnefoɔ nni hɔ,
na wɔhwehwɛ ne tenaberɛ a, na ɔnni hɔ.
11 Na ahobrɛasefoɔ bɛtena asase no so,
na wɔagye wɔn ani asomdwoeɛ bebree mu.
12Ɔbɔnefoɔ susu ɔteneneeni ho asɛm,
na ɔtwɛre ne se gu ne so,
13 AWURADE sere no,
ɛfiri sɛ wahunu sɛ ne da reba.
14 Abɔnefoɔ atwe nkrantɛ,
na wɔakuntunu wɔn tadua mu
sɛ wɔbɛma ɔmanehunufoɔ ne ohiani ahwe ase,
na wɔaku wɔn a wɔn abrabɔ yɛ:
15Wɔn nkrantɛ bɛwɔ wɔn ara wɔn akoma mu,
na wɔn tadua abubu.
16 Adeɛ kakra a onipa tenenee wɔ no yɛ
sene abɔnefoɔ bebree ahonyadeɛ dodoɔ,
17na abɔnefoɔ abasa bɛbubu,
na AWURADE wowa ateneneefoɔ.
18AWURADE nim wɔn a wɔdi mu no nna,
na wɔn agyapadeɛ bɛtena hɔ daa.
19 Wɔn ani renwu berɛ bɔne mu,
na wɔbɛmee, ɛkɔm nna mu.
20 Na abɔnefoɔ deɛ, ɔbɛyera,
na AWURADE atamfoɔ bɛyɛ sɛ ɛserɛ so nhwiren,
wɔbɛhye awie sa sɛ wisie.
21Ɔbɔnefoɔ fɛm, na ɔntua,
na ɔteneneeni hunu mmɔbɔ, na ɔma.
22 Na wɔn a wahyira wɔn na ɛbɛtena asase so,
na wɔn a wabɔ wɔn dua no, wɔbɛyi wɔn hɔ.
23AWURADE na ɔde onipa anammɔn sisi yie,
na ne kwan sɔ n’ani,
24 sɛ ɔhwe ase a, ɔrentɔ fam tim,
ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE kura ne nsam.
25 Mayɛ abɔfra, na afei mabɔ akora,
nanso menhunuu onipa tenenee a wɔapa no
anaasɛ n’asefoɔ resrɛ aduane.
26Ɔhunu mmɔbɔ daa, na ɔde fɛm,
na n’asefoɔ nso yɛ nhyira.
27 Firi bɔne ho na yɛ papa,
na woatena hɔ daa;
28 ɛfiri sɛ AWURADE dɔ atɛntenenee,
na ɔrennya n’ahotefoɔ.
Ɔhwɛ wɔn so daa,
na abɔnefoɔ asefoɔ deɛ, wɔbɛyi wɔn hɔ.
29 Ateneneefoɔ bɛtena asase so,
na wɔatena so daapem.
30Ɔteneneeni ano ka nyansasɛm,
na ne tɛkyerɛma bu atɛntenenee;
31 ne Nyankopɔn mmara wɔ n’akomam,
na ne nan nwatiri.
32 Ɔbɔnefoɔ tɛ ɔteneneeni,
na ɔhwehwɛ sɛ ɔku no.
33 AWURADE rennya no ne nsam,
na sɛ wɔbu no atɛn a, ɔremmu no fɔ.
34 Twɛn AWURADE, na fa ne kwan so,
na ɔbɛma wo so, na woanya asase no atena so;
sɛ wɔhye abɔnefoɔ ase a, wobɛhunu.
35 Mahunu ɔbɔnefoɔ a ɔdi tumi,
na ɔdennane sɛ dua frɔmm a anya asiyɛ,
36 na obi twaa mu no, na hwɛ, ɔnni hɔ,
na mehwehwɛɛ no, nanso manhu no.
37 Kari onipa a ɔyɛ pɛ, na hwɛ deɛ ɔtene;
sɛ saa onipa no awieeɛ yɛ asomdwoeɛ.
38Na mmaratofoɔ deɛ, wɔbɛsɛe wɔn nyinaa prɛko,
abɔnefoɔ ase deɛ, wɔbɛhye.
39 Na ateneneefoɔ nkwagyeɛ firi AWURADE,
ɔne wɔn dwanekɔhyɛbea, ahohia da mu.
40 Na AWURADE boa wɔn, na ɔgye wɔn,
ɔyi wɔn firi abɔnefoɔ nsam, na ɔgye wɔn nkwa,
ɛfiri sɛ wɔde wɔn ho to ne so.

Title: NNWOM 38
Content:
Amanehunu mu ahonu dwom
Dawid dwom a wɔde bɔ nkaeɛ afɔdeɛ.
1Ao, AWURADE, ntwi m’anim w’abufuo mu,
na ntwe m’aso w’anibereɛ mu;
2 na w’agyan awowɔ me aka mu,
na wo nsa aduru me so.
3 W’abufuhyeɛ nti
ahoɔden bi nni me honam mu,
me bɔne nti
nkwahosan bi nni me nnompe mu;
4 na me mfomsoɔ aboro me tiri so,
ɛdɛn me so sɛ adesoa duruduro.
5M’akuro bɔn na aporɔ
m’agyimisɛm nti.
6Mapompono na mapua koraa,
da mu nyinaa mede awerɛhoɔ menam foofoo.
7Na ahyehyekuro ayɛ m’asene mu ma,
na ahoɔden bi nni me honam mu;
8mahodwo na mabubu pasaa,
m’akoma apinisie nti mesu denden.
9AWURADE, deɛ mepɛ nyinaa da w’anim,
na m’apenepene nhunta wo.
10M’akoma bɔ paripari, m’ahoɔden atu,
na m’aniwa hann mpo nni me ho bio.
11 M’adɔfo ne me nnamfo afiri me haw no ho akɔgyina nkyɛn,
na m’abusuafoɔ gyinagyina akyirikyiri.
12Na wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ me kra no asum me mfidie,
na wɔn a wɔpɛ me bɔne no ka me sɛeɛ ho asɛm,
na wɔdwene nnaadaasɛm da mu nyinaa.
13 Na me deɛ, mete sɛ ɔsotifoɔ a ɔnte asɛm,
na mete sɛ emum a ɔmmue n’ano.
14Na mayɛ sɛ onipa a ɔnte asɛm
na n’anomu nni ntuatuaano.
15Na wo, AWURADE, na m’ani da wo soɔ,
AWURADE, me Nyankopɔn, wobɛbua.
16Na mese: Mma wɔn ani nnnye wɔ me ho,
na sɛ me nan watiri a, wɔanhoahoa wɔn ho wɔ me so.
17Na mereyɛ mahwe ase,
na me yea wɔ m’anim daa.
18 Na meka me mfomsoɔ,
me bɔne nti me werɛ aho.
19Na m’atamfoɔ ho yɛ wɛwɛwɛ, wɔn ho yɛ den,
na wɔn a wɔtane me kwa no dɔɔso.
20 Na wɔde bɔne tua papa so ka,
papa a medi akyire nti wɔpɛ me ho asɛm.
21AWURADE, nnya me,
me Nyankopɔn, mma wo ne me ntam nnware.
22Yɛ ntɛm bɛboa me,
AWURADE, m’agyenkwa!

Title: NNWOM 39
Content:
Nkwa yɛ tia
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ Yedutun. Dawid dwom.
1 Mekaa sɛ: Mɛhwɛ m’akwan yie,
na mamfa me tɛkyerɛma manyɛ bɔne.
Mede nnareka bɛsɔ m’ano,
sɛ ɔbɔnefoɔ wɔ m’anim yi.
2 Medanee mum meyɛɛ komm,
memuaa m’ano, papa ho,
nanso me yea mu yɛɛ den.
3M’akoma yɛɛ hyerehyere wɔ me mu,
meredwendwen no, na ogya no redɛre,
na mede me tɛkyerɛma mekasae.
4 AWURADE, ma menhunu m’awieeɛ
ne me nna kakra a wɔasusuo no.
Ma menhunu me kyɛre a mammɛkyɛre.
5 Hwɛ, woayɛ me nna nsaama pɛ,
na me mfeɛ nyɛ hwee w’anim.
Ampa ara, onipa asi so sɛ deɛn ara a,
na ɔyɛ huruhuro ara kwa.
6 Ampa ara, onipa biara nam sɛ sunsum kwa.
Ampa ara, wɔha wɔn ho huruhuro ho,
ɔhyɛ da so, na ɔnnim deɛ ɔbɛboa ano.
7Na afei, AWURADE,
ɛdeɛn na meretwɛn?
Wo so na m’ani da.
8Gye me firi me mmarato nyinaa mu,
mfa me mma, na ɔkwasea mmmɔ me ahohora.
9 Matɔre mum, memmue m’ano,
ɛfiri sɛ wo na woayɛ.
10Yi wo haw firi me so.
Wo nsa ano hweɛ rehye me.
11 Sɛ wode amumuyɛ ho animka
twe onipa aso a,
woma n’ahoɔfɛ hye sɛdeɛ nweweboaa yɛ.
Ampa ara, nnipa nyinaa yɛ ahuruhuro.
12 AWURADE, tie me mpaebɔ,
na yɛ aso tie me sufrɛ.
Mmua w’ano me nisuo ho,
na meyɛ wo hɔhoɔ,
meyɛ ɔmamfrani sɛ m’agyanom nyinaa.
13 Yi w’ani firi me so, na mente m’anim,
ansa na mafiri ha, na wɔanhu me bio.

Title: NNWOM 40
Content:
Aseda ne adesrɛ mpaebɔ
Wɔde ma awonkyerɛfoɔ. Dawid dwom.
1Twɛn na metwɛnee AWURADE,
na ɔyɛɛ aso maa me, na ɔtee me sufrɛ.
2Na ɔyii me firii ɔsɛeɛ amena mu,
firii atɛkyɛ mu,
na ɔde me nan sii ɔbotan so,
ɔmaa m’anammɔn tintimii.
3 Na ɔde dwom foforɔ ahyɛ m’anomu,
yɛn Nyankopɔn ayeyie.
Nnipa bebree bɛhunu asuro,
na wɔabata AWURADE ho.
4Nhyira ne onipa a
ɔde n’ani ato AWURADE soɔ,
na ɔnnane n’ani nkyerɛ ahantanfoɔ
ne wɔn a wɔmane di atorɔ.
5 AWURADE, me Nyankopɔn,
w’anwanwadeɛ ne w’adwene, woama no adɔɔso ama yɛn,
wɔrentumi mfa biribiara nto wo ho;
anka mɛka na makasa ho,
ɛdɔɔso sene sɛ wɔbɛtumi akan.
6 Wompɛ afɔrebɔ ne ayɛyɛdeɛ,
woasiesie aso de ama me,
wommisa ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ
ne bɔne ho afɔdeɛ.
7Ɛnna mekaa sɛ: Hwɛ, mereba,
wɔatwerɛ me ho asɛm nwoma mmobɔeɛ no mu.
8Deɛ mepɛ ne sɛ mɛyɛ deɛ wo, me Nyankopɔn, wopɛ,
na wo mmara wɔ m’akomam.
9 Maka tenenee ho asɛmpa
asafo kɛseɛ mu,
hwɛ, meremmua m’ano,
AWURADE, wonim.
10Mankora wo tenenee m’akomam,
maka wo nokorɛ ne wo nkwagyeɛ,
mansi w’adɔeɛ ne wo nokorɛ so
asafo kɛseɛ mu.
11Wo, AWURADE, worensi me
wo mmɔborɔhunu so,
w’adɔeɛ ne wo nokorɛ
bɛbɔ me ho ban daa.
12Na bɔne a wɔnnim ano
atwa me ho ahyia,
m’amumuyɛ asɔ me mu
a ɛmma menhunu adeɛ bio,
ɛdɔɔso sene me tiri so nwi,
na m’akoma agya me.
13AWURADE, ma no nyɛ wo fɛ sɛ wobɛgye me,
AWURADE, yɛ ntɛm bɛboa me!
14 Ma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ me kra
asɛe no no ani nwu,
na wɔn anim ngu ase,
ma wɔn a wɔpɛ me bɔne nsane wɔn akyi, na wɔnnane ahohorafoɔ.
15 Wɔn a wɔse me sɛ: Wiɛ, wiɛ no,
ma wɔn ho nnwiri wɔn, wɔn aniwuo akatua so.
16Ma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ woɔ nyinaa
nni ahurisie, na wɔn ani nnye wo ho;
ma wɔn a wɔdɔ wo nkwagyeɛ nka daa sɛ:
Wɔnkamfo AWURADE kɛseyɛ.
17 Na me deɛ, meyɛ mmɔbɔ na meyɛ ohiani deɛ,
nanso AWURADE dwene me ho.
Wone me boafoɔ ne me gyefoɔ, me Nyankopɔn,
ntwentwɛn wo nan ase!

Title: NNWOM 41
Content:
Amaneɛ a ɛfiri yadeɛ ne atamfoɔ mu
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dawid dwom.
1 Nhyira ne deɛ ɔdwene mmɔborɔni ho,
AWURADE bɛgye no, da bɔne mu.
2AWURADE bɛhwɛ no so,
na wama no nkwa,
na wɔahyira no asase so.
Na worenyi no nhyɛ n’atamfo a wɔpɛ no nsa.
3AWURADE bɛwowa no yadeɛ mpa so;
ne yadeɛ a ɔyare da hɔ nyinaa, wodane ma no si no yie.
4 Me na mekaa sɛ: AWURADE, hu me mmɔbɔ,
sa me kra yadeɛ, na mayɛ wo bɔne!
5M’atamfoɔ kasa me ho bɔne sɛ:
Da bɛn na ɔbɛwuo na ne din ayera?
6Na sɛ ɔba bɛhwɛ me a, ɔka atorosɛm,
n’akoma tase nsɛnhunu fa,
ɔfiri adi kɔbɔ dawuro.
7Wɔn a wɔtane me nyinaa tutu me ho asu,
wɔsusu me ho bɔne ka sɛ:
8Abusudeɛ akuta no,
na afei ɔda hɔ yi, ɔrensɔre bio.
9 M’adamfo pa mpo a mede me ho metoo ne soɔ
a ɔdii m’aduane bie no, wama ne nantin so atia me.
10Na wo, AWURADE, hu me mmɔbɔ,
na ma me so, na mentua wɔn so ka!
11Yei ho na mɛhunu sɛ wopɛ me:
Sɛ m’atamfoɔ renni me so ahurisie.
12Na me deɛ, wosɔ me mu ma megyina hɔ, me mu a medie mu,
na wode me gyina w’anim pintinn daa.
13 Nhyira ne AWURADE, Israel Nyankopɔn,
ɛfiri teteete de rekɔ daa.
Amen ne Amen.

Title: NNWOM 42
Content:
NWOMA A ƐTƆ SO MMIENU
(Nnwom 42—72)
Nyankopɔn ho anigyina
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Kora mma nnweneho dwom.
1Sɛdeɛ ɔforoteɛ pere
hwehwɛ nsuwa no,
sɛ me kra pere hwehwɛ wo,
Onyankopɔn, ne no.
2 Onyankopɔn, nkwa Nyankopɔn ho sukɔm de me kra.
Da bɛn na mɛba mabɛfiri Nyankopɔn anim?
3 Me nisuo ayɛ me aduane
awia ne anadwo,
sɛ wɔse me daa sɛ:
Wo Nyankopɔn wɔ he?
4 Mekae yeinom,
na mehwie me kra wɔ me mu,
sɛdeɛ me ne asafokuo
nante kɔɔ Nyankopɔn fie,
na me ne nkurɔfoɔ a wɔnam yuu hyɛ fa no
de ayeyie ne aseda nnwom kɔeɛ no.
5 Me kra, adɛn na woaboto sɛɛ,
na wosi me mu apini?
Fa w’ani to Nyankopɔn so na mɛda so mayi no ayɛ,
sɛ ɔyɛ m’anim boafoɔ
6ne me Nyankopɔn.
Me kra aboto wɔ me mu,
enti mekae wo,
Yordan ne Hermon mmepɔ asase so,
Misar bepɔ so.
7 Ebunu frɛ ebunu,
wo nsuo a ɛworo guo no gyegyeegye no mu,
w’asorɔkyeɛ ne wo aworɔ nyinaa
abu afa me so.
8Adekyeeɛ bi AWURADE bɛyi n’adɔeɛ adi,
na anadwo mato no dwom
mabɔ me nkwa Nyankopɔn mpaeɛ.
9 Mɛbisa me Nyankopɔn ne me botan no, sɛ:
Adɛn nti na wo werɛ afiri me?
Adɛn nti na ɔtamfoɔ hyɛ a ɔhyɛ me soɔ nti
memfa awerɛhoɔ mennanteɛ?
10Ahohora a m’ahohiahiafoɔ bɔ me no
yɛ me sɛ me nnompe redwerɛ,
sɛ daa wɔbisa me sɛ:
Wo Nyankopɔn wɔ he?
11 Me kra, adɛn na woaboto sɛɛ,
na wosi apini wɔ me mu?
Fa w’ani to Nyankopɔn so, na mɛda so mayi no ayɛ,
sɛ ɔyɛ m’anim boafoɔ ne me Nyankopɔn.

Title: NNWOM 43
Content:
Fa wo ho to Nyankopɔn so
1 O Onyankopɔn, bu me bem,
na wo ne ɔman a ɛnyɛ no nni asɛm mma me.
Gye me firi nkontomponi ne omimfoɔ nsam.
2 Na wone me dwane kɔtoa Nyankopɔn,
adɛn nti na woto me twene?
Adɛn nti na ɔtamfoɔ hyɛ a ɔhyɛ me soɔ nti
memfa awerɛhoɔ mennanteɛ?
3 Ma wo hann ne wo nokorɛ
mmɛgya me,
na ɛmfa me nkɔ wo bepɔ kronkron so
ne wo tenabea.
4 Na makɔ Nyankopɔn afɔrebukyia ho,
m’ahurisie anigyeɛ Nyankopɔn nkyɛn,
na mede sankuo mada wo ase,
Onyankopɔn, me Nyankopɔn.
5 Me kra, adɛn na woaboto sɛɛ,
na wosi apini wɔ me mu?
Fa w’ani to Nyankopɔn so, na mɛda so mayi no ayɛ,
sɛ ɔyɛ m’anim boafoɔ ne me Nyankopɔn.

Title: NNWOM 44
Content:
Akane ne nnɛ
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Kora mma nnweneho dwom.
1 Onyankopɔn, yɛde yɛn aso ate,
yɛn agyanom aka akyerɛ yɛn sɛ:
Woayɛ adwuma bi wɔn berɛ so,
tete mmerɛ no mu.
2Wode wo nsa pamm amanaman,
na wɔn deɛ, woduaa wɔn.
Wobɔɔ aman, na wɔn deɛ,
wotrɛɛ wɔn mu.
3Na ɛnyɛ wɔn ara afena na wɔde nyaa asase no,
nanso ɛnyɛ wɔn ara nsa na ɛgyee wɔn,
na mmom ɛyɛ wo nifa ne wo basa
ne w’anim hann,
ɛfiri sɛ wopɛ wɔn.
4 Wo, Onyankopɔn, wone me Hene,
hyɛ na Yakob nnya nkwagyeɛ ara nko.
5Wo so na yɛnam sum ahohiahiafoɔ guo,
wo din mu na yɛtiatia wɔn a wɔsɔre tia yɛn no soɔ.
6 Na memfa me ho mento me tadua so,
na m’afena nso rennye me.
7Na woagye yɛn yɛn ahohiahiafoɔ nsam,
na woahyɛ wɔn a wɔtane yɛn aniwuo.
8Nyankopɔn mu na yɛhoahoa yɛn ho da mu nyinaa,
na yɛyi wo din ayɛ daapem.
9Nanso woato yɛn agu, na woabɔ yɛn ahohora,
na wo ne yɛn dɔm ankɔ.
10Womaa yɛdanee yɛn akyiri kyerɛɛ yɛn ahodwanfoɔ,
na wɔn a wɔtane yɛn fom yɛn fa.
11Wode yɛn maa sɛ nnwan a wɔdie,
na woabɔ yɛn ahwete amanaman mu.
12Woantɔn wo nkurɔfoɔ annye hwee,
woamfa wɔn annye aboɔden.
13 Wode yɛn asi hɔ ama wɔn a wɔtete yɛn ho nsopa,
ama wɔn a wɔatwa yɛn ho ahyia no fɛdie, ne ehuro.
14Wode yɛn ayɛ akasabebuo amanaman mu,
woma aman bobɔ wɔn tiri nko wɔ yɛn ho.
15Daa nyinaa m’ahohora da m’anim,
na aniwuo akata me so,
16deɛ ɔbɔ me ahohora na ɔsopa me no nne
ne ɔtamfoɔ ne ɔweretɔfoɔ nti.
17Yei nyinaa aba yɛn so,
nanso yɛn werɛ mfirii wo,
na yɛntwaa w’apam no ho nkontompo.
18Yɛn akoma nsanee n’akyi,
na yɛn anammɔn nteree wo kwan ho.
19Nanso woabubu yɛn pasaa, deɛ sakraman wɔ,
na wode esum kabii akata yɛn so.
20Sɛ yɛn werɛ afiri yɛn Nyankopɔn din
anaasɛ yɛatrɛ yɛn nsam akyerɛ onyame foforɔ a,
21 ɛnyɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔbɛhwehwɛ?
Na ɔno na ɔnim akoma mu ahuntasɛm.
22 Na wo nti na wɔku yɛn daa nyinaa,
wɔbu yɛn sɛ nnwan a wɔrekɔku wɔn.
23 AWURADE, nyane ɛ, adɛn nti na woda?
Sɔre ɛ, nto yɛn ntwene koraa.
24 Adɛn nti na woyi w’ani hunta,
na wo werɛ firi yɛn amaneɛ ne yɛn so hyɛ no?
25Na wɔabrɛ yɛn kra ase kɔ mfuturo mu,
yɛn yafunu butu fam.
26Sɔre bɛboa yɛn ɛ,
na gye yɛn, w’adɔeɛ nti!

Title: NNWOM 45
Content:
Ɔhene ne ayeforɔ
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no “Sosannim” sankuo nne so. Kora mma nnweneho, adɔdeɛ dwom.
1 Asɛm pa ayɛ m’akoma ma abu so.
Meka adeɛ a mayɛ a ɛfa ɔhene ho,
me tɛkyerɛma yɛ ɔtwerɛfoɔ a ne nsa yɛ hare atwerɛdua.
2 Wo ho yɛ fɛ sene nnipa mma,
wɔde adom ahyɛ w’anomu ma.
Enti na Onyankopɔn ahyira wo daa.
3Otumfoɔ, fa w’afena bɔ w’asene,
fa w’animuonyam ne w’ahensɛm bɔ abɔsoɔ.
4 Na fa w’ahensɛm no te mu kɔ w’anim
ma nokorɛ ne tenenee a wɔabrɛ no aseɛ,
na wo nifa nkyerɛkyerɛ w’adeɛ a ɛyɛ hu.
5W’agyan ano yɛ nnam,
aman bɛhwehwe ase w’anim,
ɛwɔ ɔhene atamfoɔ akoma mu.
6 Onyankopɔn, w’ahennwa wɔ hɔ daa daa,
w’ahennie poma yɛ tenenee poma.
7Wodɔ tenenee, na wotane abɔnefosɛm,
enti na Onyankopɔn, wo Nyankopɔn,
de anigyeɛ ngo asra woɔ sene wo mfɛfoɔ.
8 Kurobo ne pɛprɛ ne bɛwewonua yi hwa wo ntadeɛ nyinaa mu,
sankuo a wɔbɔ no asommɛn aban mu ma w’ani gye.
9Ahemfo mmammaa wɔ wo mmaa animuonyamfoɔ mu,
wo dɔyerɛ abɛgyina wo nifa, Ofir sika mu.
10 Ɔbabaa, tie, na hwɛ, na yɛ aso,
na ma wo werɛ mfiri wo man ne w’agya fie.
11Na ɔhene ani asɔ w’ahoɔfɛ,
na ɔne wo wura, na sɔre no.
12Na Tiro babaa de ayɛyɛdeɛ ba,
na ɔman mu adefoɔ bɛdɛfɛdɛfɛ wo.
13Ɔhene babaa wɔ animuonyam kɛseɛm ɔdan mu,
wɔde sikatam abu n’aduradeɛ.
14Ɔhyɛ mmobɔmu atadeɛ, na wɔde no brɛ ɔhene,
wɔde mmaabunu a wɔyɛ ne mfɛfoɔ di n’akyi bɛbrɛ wo.
15Wɔde anigyeɛ ne ahosan na ɛde wɔn reba,
wɔkɔhyɛne ɔhene aban mu.
16Wo mma bɛsi w’agyanom ananmu,
wode wɔn bɛsisi asase nyinaa so ahene.
17Mɛma wɔakae wo din, awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa mu,
enti na aman bɛyi wo ayɛ daa daa.

Title: NNWOM 46
Content:
“Yɛn Nyankopɔn ne abankɛseɛ”
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Kora mma dwom. Wɔnto no “Alamot” sankuo nne so.
1Onyankopɔn yɛ yɛn dwanekɔbea ne ahoɔden,
ahohia mu boafoɔ pa a wɔanya no nhunuiɛ.
2Enti sɛ asase ani dane butu,
na mmepɔ tutu gu po bunu mu,
3na emu nsuo woro na ɛhuru
na n’asorɔkyeɛ ma mmepɔ woso mpo a, yɛrensuro.
4 Asuo bi, ne mmɔmu ma Nyankopɔn kuro ani gye,
ɔsorosoroni tenabea kronkron no.
5Onyankopɔn te mfimfini, ɛnwoso,
Onyankopɔn boa no anɔpahema.
6Amanaman yɛ hoo, ahennie wosowoso,
ɔma ne nne so ma asase nane.
7Asafo AWURADE ne yɛn wɔ hɔ,
Yakob Nyankopɔn ne yɛn abankɛseɛ.
8 Mommra mmɛhwɛ AWURADE nnwuma,
ɔsɛeɛ ko a wama no aba asase soɔ.
9 Ɔma akodie gyae kɔsi asase ano,
ɔbubu tadua mu na ɔtwitwa pea mu asinasini,
ɔde ogya hye nteaseɛnam.
10Monyɛ komm na monhunu sɛ mene Onyankopɔn.
Wɔmma me so amanaman mu,
wɔmma me so asase so.
11Asafo AWURADE ne yɛn wɔ hɔ,
Yakob Nyankopɔn ne yɛn abankɛseɛ.

Title: NNWOM 47
Content:
Onyankopɔn di hene
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Kora mma dwom.
1Aman nyinaa, mommɔ mo nsam,
momfa anigyeɛ nhuro mmɔ ose mma Onyankopɔn.
2Na AWURADE a ɔwɔ sorosoro no ho yɛ hu,
ɔyɛ ɔhenkɛseɛ asase nyinaa so.
3Ɔbrɛ aman ase de hyɛ yɛn ase,
na ɔde nkurɔfoɔ hyɛ yɛn nan ase.
4 Ɔyi yɛn apɛgyadeɛ ma yɛn,
Yakob a ɔdɔ no no animuonyam.
5 Onyankopɔn de anigyeɛ huro kɔ ɔsoro,
AWURADE de totorobɛnto gyegyeɛ kɔ.
6Monto Nyankopɔn dwom, monto ayeyie dwom,
monto dwom mma yɛn hene, monto ayeyie dwom.
7 Na Onyankopɔn ne asase nyinaa so hene,
mommɔ sankuo nto nnweneho dwom.
8Onyankopɔn di amanaman so hene,
Onyankopɔn te n’ahennwa kronkron so.
9 Aman ahene boaboa wɔn ho ano,
Abraham Nyankopɔn man.
Na asase so akyɛm yɛ Onyankopɔn dea,
wɔama no so kɛse.

Title: NNWOM 48
Content:
Sion yɛ Nyankopɔn kuro
Kora mma dwom.
1 AWURADE yɛ kɛse, na wɔyi no ayɛ sɛ,
yɛn Nyankopɔn kuro mu,
ne bepɔ kronkron so.
2 Tenabea a ɛyɛ fɛ,
asase nyinaa anika,
ɛne Sion bepɔ,
atifi fam nkyɛn mu no,
ɔhenkɛseɛ kuro no.
3Onyankopɔn ama wɔahu no
kuro yi aban mu sɛ abankɛseɛ.
4 Na hwɛ, ahemfo bɛhyiae,
wɔboom yuu bae.
5Wɔbɛhunui, wɔn ho dwirii wɔn,
wɔbɔɔ hu, na wɔdwanee tonom.
6Nketenkete kutaa wɔn,
yea kaa wɔn sɛ ɔbaa a ɔreko awoɔ.
7Wode apueeɛ mframa
bobɔɔ Tarsis ahyɛn.
8Sɛ yɛteeɛ no, sɛ yɛhunuu no ne no,
asafo AWURADE kuro mu,
yɛn Nyankopɔn kurom,
Onyankopɔn ma n’ase tim daa.
9Onyankopɔn, yɛkaee w’adɔeɛ
w’asɔrefie hɔ.
10Onyankopɔn, sɛ wo din teɛ no,
saa na w’ayeyie teɛ de kɔsi asase ano ano;
tenenee ahyɛ wo nsa nifa ma.
11Ma Sion bepɔ ani nnye,
ma Yuda mmammaa nni ahurisie
w’atemmuo nti.
12Momfa Sion ho ntwa ho kɔntɔnkrɔn,
monkan n’abantenten,
13momfa mo ani nkari n’afasuo,
monhwehwɛ n’aban mu yie,
na moaka akyerɛ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛbɛdi mo akyire no,
14 sɛ saa Nyankopɔn yi yɛ
yɛn Nyankopɔn daa daa,
ɔbɛyɛ yɛn kwankyerɛfoɔ de akɔsi owuo mu.

Title: NNWOM 49
Content:
Abɔnefoɔ ahotɔ nkyɛ
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Kora mma dwom.
1 Aman nyinaa, montie yei,
mo a mote wiase nyinaa, monyɛ aso.
2Nnipa mma mpapahwekwaa oo,
mmarima mma a wɔwɔ din oo,
adefoɔ ne ahiafoɔ nyinaa.
3M’ano bɛka anyansasɛm,
na m’akomam nsusuiɛ yɛ nhunumu ara nko.
4 Mɛbrɛ m’aso ase matie abebusɛm,
mede sankubɔ mɛkyerɛ me bɛ ase.
5Adɛn nti na mensuro nna bɔne mu,
nna a m’atɛfoɔ amumuyɛ twa me ho hyia mu?
6Wɔde wɔn ho to wɔn ahonyadeɛ so,
na wɔde wɔn adedodoɔ hoahoa wɔn ho.
7Onua rentumi nnye onipa da,
ɔremma Onyankopɔn ne mpatadeɛ,
8 na wɔn kra gyeɛ boɔ yɛ den,
na ɛma no gya hɔ koraa,
9sɛ ɔntena ase ara daa,
na wanhunu Adamena.
10 Na ɔhunu sɛ anyansafoɔ wuwu,
na saa nso na nkwasea ne agyimifoɔ sɛeɛ,
na wɔgya wɔn ahodeɛ ma ebinom.
11Wɔn tirim ne sɛ wɔn adan bɛtena hɔ daa,
na wɔn afie atena hɔ akɔsi awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ so;
wɔde wɔn din toto wɔn nsase.
12 Nanso onipa a ɔwɔ anidie mu no, ɔrentena mu,
ɔte sɛ mmoa a wɔyi wɔn hɔ.
13Ɔkwan a nkwasea fa soɔ nie,
na wɔn a wɔpɛ wɔn anomu asɛm no di wɔn akyi.
14Wɔboa Asamando sɛ nnwan;
Owuo hwɛ wɔn so,
na teneneefoɔ bɛtiatia wɔn so anɔpa,
na wɔn deɛ, Asamando bɛsɛe wɔn ahoɔfɛ,
na wɔannya tenabea bio.
15 Na me kra deɛ, Onyankopɔn bɛgye no Asamando nsam,
na ɔbɛgye me.
16 Sɛ obi nya ne ho a, nsuro,
sɛ ne fie animuonyam redɔɔso a, nsuro,
17 na ɔwu a, ɔremfa emu biribiara nkɔ,
n’animuonyam rensiane nni n’akyi.
18 Sɛ ɔhyira ne kra ne nkwa berɛ mu,
nso wɔyi wo ayɛ sɛ woyɛ wo ho yie a,
19ɔbɛkɔ n’agyanom abusua mu,
wɔrenhunu hann ara da.
20 Onipa a ɔwɔ anidie mu na ɔnni nhunumu no,
ɔte sɛ mmoa a wɔyi wɔn hɔ.

Title: NNWOM 50
Content:
Nyamesom pa
Asaf dwom.
1 Onyankopɔn, Tweaduampɔn AWURADE rekasa,
na ɔfrɛ asase
firi owia apueeɛ de kɔsi n’atɔeɛ.
2Sion, ahoɔfɛ a ɛwie pɛyɛ no mu na
Onyankopɔn firi hran.
3 Yɛn Nyankopɔn bɛba, na ɔrenyɛ komm.
Ogya di n’anim rehye adeɛ,
na ahum atu huu atwa ne ho ahyia.
4 Ɔrefrɛ ɔsorofoɔ firi ɔsoro aba, ne asase,
sɛ ɔrebɛbu ne man atɛn:
5 Mommoaboa m’ahotefoɔ ano mma me,
wɔn a wɔnam afɔrebɔ so ne me wɔ apam no.
6Na ɔsoro bɛka ne tenenee akyerɛ,
ɛfiri sɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔrebɛbu atɛn.
7Me man, montie, na merebɛkasa;
Israel tie, na merebɛdi wo adanseɛ:
Me, Onyankopɔn, meyɛ wo Nyankopɔn.
8 Ɛnyɛ wo kum afɔdeɛ nti na mɛka w’anim,
na wo hyeɛ afɔdeɛ wɔ m’anim daa.
9Meremfa wo fie mu nantwinini,
wo nnwammuo mu mpapo,
10ɛfiri sɛ kwaeɛ mu mmoa nyinaa wɔ me,
mmepɔ apem so mmoa.
11Menim mmepɔ so ntakraboa nyinaa,
na wiram mmoadoma nyinaa wɔ me hɔ.
12Sɛ ɛkɔm de me a, anka merense wo,
na wiase ne ne mayɛ wɔ me.
13Medi anantwinini nam?
Na menom mpapo mogya?
14Fa aseda afɔdeɛ bɔ Onyankopɔn,
na tua w’aboadeɛ ma deɛ ɔwɔ ɔsorosoro no;
15 na frɛ me hiada mu,
na mɛgye wo na woahyɛ me animuonyam.
16 Na ɔbɔnefoɔ deɛ, Onyankopɔn se no sɛ:
Adɛn nti na woka m’ahyɛdeɛ,
na wode w’ano bɔ m’apam din,
17na wo korɔ yi ara wokyiri animka,
na woto me nsɛm gu w’akyire?
18 Sɛ wohunu owifoɔ a, wopɛ n’asɛm,
na wo ne awaresɛefoɔ bɔ. 19Wogyaa w’ano mu kɔ bɔne mu,
na wo tɛkyerɛma toatoa nnaadaasɛm.
20Wotena ase ka wo nua ho nsɛm,
wo na ba mpo, wosopa no.
21 Woayɛ yeinom, na mayɛ komm nti,
wosusu sɛ mete sɛ wo ara,
mɛka w’anim na mede mataataa w’anim.
22Mo a mo werɛ firi Onyankopɔn no, monnwene yei ho ɛ,
na mantete mo asinasini a ɔgyefoɔ biara nni hɔ.
23Deɛ ɔde aseda bɔ afɔdeɛ no hyɛ me animuonyam,
na deɛ n’akwan teeɛ no,
mɛkyerɛ no Nyankopɔn nkwagyeɛ.

Title: NNWOM 51
Content:
Dawid ahonu mpaebɔ
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dawid dwom; ɔkɔɔ Batseba ho a Odiyifoɔ Natan baa ne nkyɛn no, na ɔtoeɛ.
1 Onyankopɔn, hu me mmɔbɔ, sɛ w’adɔeɛ teɛ no,
wo mmɔborɔhunu a ɛdɔɔso nti pepa me mmarato.
2 Hohoro me ho firi m’amumuyɛ mu koraa,
na prapra me ho firi me bɔne mu.
3 Na mahunu me mmarato no,
na me bɔne wɔ m’anim daa.
4 Wo nko ara na mafom woɔ,
na mayɛ deɛ ɛyɛ w’ani so bɔne,
na woadi bem wo kasa mu,
na wo ho ate, w’atemmuo mu.
5 Hwɛ, wɔwoo me amumuyɛ mu,
na bɔne mu na me na nyinsɛnee me.
6Hwɛ, wopɛ nokorɛ me sawa mu,
na ma menhunu nyansa me mu ahuntaeɛm.
7 Fa adwera yi me ho bɔne, na me ho afi;
dware me, na mayɛ fitaa asene nsukyerɛmma.
8 Ma mente anigyeɛ ne abotɔyam nsɛm,
na nnompe a woabubuo no adi ahurisie.
9Yi w’ani firi me bɔne ho hunta,
na pepa m’amumuyɛ nyinaa.
10 Onyankopɔn, bɔ akoma a emu teɛ ma me,
na yɛ honhom foforɔ a aseɛ tim wɔ me mu.
11Nto me mfiri w’anim ntwene,
na nyi wo kronkronyɛ honhom mfiri me so.
12Ma mennya wo nkwagyeɛ ho abotɔyam bio,
na ayamyie honhom nsɔ me mu.
13Mɛkyerɛ mmaratofoɔ w’akwan,
na nnebɔneyɛfoɔ adane aba wo nkyɛn.
14Onyankopɔn, me nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn,
gye me firi mogya ho fɔ mu,
na me tɛkyerɛma ato wo tenenee ho ahurisie dwom.
15AWURADE, bue m’ano fafa,
na mede m’ano makyerɛ w’ayeyie.
16 Na wompɛ afɔrebɔ, anka mɛbɔ,
ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ nsɔ w’ani.
17 Nyankopɔn afɔdeɛ ne honhom a abubuo;
Onyankopɔn, akoma a abubuo, na apɛkyɛ na worempoɔ.
18Ma no nyɛ wo fɛ sɛ wobɛyɛ Sion yie;
to Yerusalem afasuo!
19Ɛno na wobɛpɛ tenenee afɔdeɛ,
ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ ne afɔdeɛ mu,
ɛno na wɔde anantwinini bɛkɔ w’afɔrebukyia soɔ.

Title: NNWOM 52
Content:
Amimfoɔ awieeɛ
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dawid nnweneho dwom. Ɔtoe berɛ a Edomni Doeg bɛka kyerɛɛ Saulo sɛ Dawid aba Ahimelek fie no.
1 Ɔkatakyie, adɛn na wohoahoa wo ho bɔne ho?
Nyankopɔn adɔeɛ wɔ hɔ
daa nyinaa.
2Nkontomponi, wo tɛkyerɛma dwene mmusubɔ ho
te sɛ yiwan a ano yɛ tahwetahweɛ.
3Wopɛ bɔne sene papa,
wopɛ atorɔ sene sɛ wobɛka deɛ ɛtene.
4Nkɔnkɔnsa tɛkyerɛma,
wopɛ amammɔsɛm ara nko.
5Onyankopɔn nso bɛbɔ wo ahwe fam koraa,
ɔbɛyi wo hɔ atu wo afiri wo tenabea,
na watutu w’ase afiri ateasefoɔ asase so.
6 Teneneefoɔ nso bɛhunu asuro,
na wɔasere no sɛ:
7Hwɛ, onipa a wamfa
Onyankopɔn anyɛ ne dwanekɔbea,
na ɔde ne ho too n’ahodeɛ bebree no soɔ,
na ɔhyɛɛ ne ho den, n’anibereɛ mu, no nie.
8 Na me deɛ, mete sɛ ngodua frɔmfrɔm,
Nyankopɔn fie,
mede me ho meto Nyankopɔn adom so
daa daa.
9Mɛyi wo ayɛ daa,
sɛ wo na woyɛeɛ,
na mɛtwɛn wo din, ɛfiri sɛ ɛyɛ,
w’ahotefoɔ anim.

Title: NNWOM 53
Content:
Nnipa amumuyɛ
(Nnwom 14)
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dawid nnweneho dwom. Wɔnto no “Mahalat” sankuo nne so.
1Ogyegyentwie se n’akomam sɛ:
Nyankopɔn bi nni hɔ.
Wɔasɛe, na wɔyɛ amumuyɛdeɛ a wɔkyire,
obiara nni hɔ a ɔyɛ papa.
2Onyankopɔn firi soro
hwɛ nnipa mma,
sɛ ɔbɛhunu sɛ obi wɔ hɔ a ɔyɛ ɔbadwemma,
obi a ɔhwehwɛ Nyankopɔn akyiri kwan.
3Nanso wɔn nyinaa amane,
wɔn nyinaa aporɔ,
obiara nni hɔ a ɔyɛ papa,
ɔbaako mpo nni hɔ.
4Amumuyɛfoɔ anhunu de,
wɔn a wɔdi me man sɛdeɛ wɔdi aduane,
na wɔnsɔre Onyankopɔn?
5Ɛno na wɔn ho popoeɛ,
deɛ ahopopoɔ nnie hɔ,
na Onyankopɔn petee wɔn a wɔbɔɔ wo so nsraban nnompe,
woahyɛ wɔn aniwuo, na Onyankopɔn apa wɔn.
6Hwan na ɔde Israel nkwagyeɛ bɛfiri Sion aba?
Da a Onyankopɔn de ne man agyapadeɛ bɛsane aba no,
Yakob bɛdi ahurisie, na Israel ani agye.

Title: NNWOM 54
Content:
Atamfoɔ ho mpaebɔ ne aboadeɛ ma
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔmfa sankuo nto. Dawid nnweneho dwom. Ɔtoo no berɛ a Sififoɔ bɛka kyerɛɛ Saulo sɛ: Dawid abɛhunta yɛn nkyɛn no.
1 Onyankopɔn, fa wo din so gye me,
na fa wo tumi di m’asɛm ma me.
2Onyankopɔn, tie me mpaebɔ,
yɛ aso tie m’anomu nsɛm;
3na ananafoɔ asɔre atia me,
na atirimuɔdenfoɔ rehwehwɛ me kra,
wɔamfa Onyankopɔn anyɛ wɔn ani so biribi.
4Hwɛ, Onyankopɔn ne me boafoɔ,
AWURADE nko ne deɛ ɔsɔ me kra mu.
5Ɔbɛma m’atɛfoɔ bɔne asane akɔ wɔn so,
fa wo nokorɛ yi wɔn hɔ.
6Mɛbɔ ayamyie afɔdeɛ ama wo;
AWURADE, mɛyi wo din ayɛ sɛ ɛyɛ.
7 Na wagye me, amaneɛ nyinaa mu,
na m’ani ahunu deɛ mepɛ m’atamfoɔ ho.

Title: NNWOM 55
Content:
Deɛ ayɔnkofoɔ ayi no ama
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔmfa sankuo nto. Dawid nnweneho dwom.
1Onyankopɔn, yɛ aso tie me mpaebɔ,
na nhunta wo ho mfiri me nkotosrɛ ho.
2Wɛn w’aso ma me, na gye me so.
M’adwene mu nnwane wɔ m’abooboo mu, na mesi apini,
3ɔtamfoɔ nne
ne ɔbɔnefoɔ ahodwan nti.
Na wɔbɔ mmusuo gu me so,
na wɔde abufuo tane me.
4M’akoma pere wɔ me mu,
na owuo ho hu agu me so.
5Suro ne ahopopoɔ aba me so,
na ahoyera akata me so.
6 Na mese: O, sɛ mewɔ ntaban sɛ aburuburo deɛ ɛ,
anka mɛtu makɔtena baabi.
7Aane, anka mɛdwane makɔ akyirikyiri,
na makɔtena serɛ so.
8Anka mɛyɛ ntɛm madwane mafiri mframa kɛseɛ
ne ahum yi mu.
9 AWURADE, yɛ wɔn basabasa, paepae wɔn tɛkyerɛma mu,
na mahunu amimdie ne aperedie, kuro no mu.
10Awia ne anadwo wɔnam
n’afasuo so twa ho hyia,
na amumuyɛ ne ɔhaw wɔ mu.
11Amammɔsɛm wɔ mu,
na nhyɛsoɔ ne nnaadaa
mpa n’abɔntene so.
12Na ɛnyɛ ɔtamfoɔ na ɔbɔ me ahohora,
ɛno deɛ, anka mɛtie.
Ɛnyɛ deɛ ɔkyiri me na ɔkyerɛ ne ho wɔ me soɔ,
anka mede me ho bɛhunta no.
13 Na wo dasani a me ne wo bɔ soɔ,
me yɔnko ne me manni,
14wo a wo ne me di atirimusɛm dɛdɛ,
na yɛnam yɔɔ kɔ Nyankopɔn fie.
15Ma owuo nto nsi wɔn so,
ma wɔnsiane nkɔ Asamando anikan,
na nsɛmmmɔne wɔ wɔn tenabea ne wɔn mu.
16Me deɛ, mɛsu mafrɛ Onyankopɔn,
na AWURADE abɛgye me.
17Anwummerɛ ne anɔpa ne awigyina
na mɛdwene me tirim na masi apini,
na ɔbɛte me nne.
18Wagye me kra asomdwoeɛ mu,
na wɔammɛn me,
na wɔn a wɔne me anya dɔɔso.
19 Onyankopɔn bɛte na wabua wɔn.
Na ɔno na ɔte hɔ firi teteete.
Wɔn deɛ, wɔnsakyera,
nanso wɔnsuro Onyankopɔn.
20Ɔtene ne nsa ne nnamfonom so,
wabu n’apam so.
21 N’anomu nsɛm yɛ fekɔɔ sene bɔta,
na ɔko wɔ n’akomam.
Ne nsɛm mu dwo bɛtɛɛ sene ngo,
nanso ɛyɛ mfena a wɔatwe.
22 Dane w’adesoa to AWURADE so,
na ɔbɛsɔ wo mu,
ɔremma ɔteneneeni
ntwe n’anan mu da.
23 Na wo, Onyankopɔn, wode wɔn
bɛkɔ ɔsɛeɛ amena mu,
mogyapɛfoɔ ne nnaadaafoɔ
renni wɔn nna fa,
na me deɛ, mede me ho meto wo so.

Title: NNWOM 56
Content:
Amanehunu mu anidasoɔ
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dawid abebuo dwom. Wɔnto no “Yohat elem rehokim” sankuo nne so. Ɔtoe berɛ a Filistifoɔ kyeree no Gat no.
1 Onyankopɔn, hu me mmɔbɔ,
na ɔdasani repɛ me amene me,
daa nyinaa ɔde ɔko hiahia me ho.
2M’atɛfoɔ repɛ me amene me daa nyinaa,
na nnipa pii ama wɔn ho so ne me reko.
3Ɛda a mesuro no,
mede me ho metwere wo.
4 Nyankopɔn mu na meyi n’asɛm ayɛ,
Nyankopɔn so na mede me ho matoɔ,
merensuro, onipa bɛtumi ayɛ me dɛn?
5Da biara wɔtutu me nsɛm ano sisi,
bɔne nko ara na wɔdwene me ho.
6Wɔboa ano hyia ma wɔtɛ me,
na wɔkari m’anammɔn
berɛ a wɔtwɛn me kra.
7 Wɔde amumuyɛ bɛnya kwan adwane anaa?
Onyankopɔn, fa aman hwe fam abufuo so.
8Wo na woabu me kyini a mekyini yi ano,
fa me nisuo gu wo kotokuo mu.
Ɛnni wo nwoma mu anaa?
9Ɛno na m’atamfoɔ bɛsane wɔn akyire,
ɛda a mesu mefrɛ no.
Yei na menim sɛ Onyankopɔn wɔ m’afa.
10Nyankopɔn mu na meyi n’asɛm ayɛ,
AWURADE mu na meyi n’asɛm ayɛ.
11Nyankopɔn so na mede me ho matoɔ,
merensuro, nnipa bɛtumi ayɛ me dɛn?
12Onyankopɔn, w’aboadeɛ wɔ me hɔ,
mɛbɔ aseda afɔdeɛ mama wo.
13 Na woagye me kra afiri owuo mu,
worenyi me nan mfiri asehweɛ mu anaa?
Na manante Nyankopɔn anim,
nkwa hann mu.

Title: NNWOM 57
Content:
Nyankopɔn mu ahotosoɔ
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dawid abebuo dwom. Wɔnto no “Al-taset” sankuo nne so. Ɔtoo no ɔbodan no mu berɛ a ɔdwanee Saulo no.
1 Hu me mmɔbɔ, Onyankopɔn,
hu me mmɔbɔ,
na wo na me kra dwane bɛtoa woɔ,
na wo ntaban ase nwunu mu na mepɛ me dwanekɔhyɛbea
kɔsi sɛ ahohia yi bɛtwa mu.
2Mesu mefrɛ ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔn,
mefrɛ Onyankopɔn a ɔdi ma me wie.
3Ɔbɛsoma afiri soro abɛgye me,
ɔbɔ deɛ ɔregye me amene me no ahohora.
Onyankopɔn bɛsoma n’adom ne ne nokorɛ.
4Me kra da agyata mu,
meda wɔn a wɔhome gyaframa mu.
Nnipa mma a wɔn se yɛ mpea ne agyan,
na wɔn tɛkyerɛma yɛ nkrantɛ nnamnnam.
5Onyankopɔn, ma wo ho so tena soro,
ma w’animuonyam so asase nyinaa so.
6 Wɔsum m’anammɔn fidie,
me kra brɛɛ ase,
wɔtuu me kwan mu amena,
wɔn ankasa ahwehwe mu.
7M’akoma atim, Onyankopɔn,
m’akoma atim,
mɛto dwom na mayi ayɛ.
8 Me kra, nyane,
bɛnta ne sankuten, nyane,
me nso mɛnyane anɔpahema.
9AWURADE, mɛda wo ase aman mu,
mɛto wo ayeyie dwom aman mu,
10 na w’adɔeɛ so kɔduru soro,
na wo nokorɛ kɔduru wiem tɔnn.
11Onyankopɔn, ma wo ho so tena ɔsoro,
ma w’animuonyam so asase nyinaa so.

Title: NNWOM 58
Content:
Onyankopɔn ne ɔtemmufoɔ
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no “Al-taset” sankuo nne so. Dawid abebuo dwom.
1 Mo atumfoɔ, ampa ara, moka asɛntenenee anaa?
O, nnipa mma, mobu atɛntenenee anaa?
2Dabi, modi asɛmmɔne, akoma mu,
mo nsam akakabensɛm na mokari de ma, asase soɔ.
3Abɔnefoɔ bɔ ko firi ɔyafunum,
wɔfiri wɔn na yam fom kwan di atorɔ.
4Wɔn borɔ te sɛ ɔwɔ borɔ,
wɔte sɛ ahuritia sotifoɔ a wasi n’aso
5 a ɛntie ntafowayifoɔ
a wɔyi nkonyaa nyansam.
6Onyankopɔn, bubu wɔn se, wɔn anomu,
AWURADE, tutu gyata aburuwa sebɔmmɔfoɔ.
7Ma wɔn nwe sɛ nsuo a ɛretwe,
ɔkuntunu ne bɛmma mu a,
ma no nyɛ sɛdeɛ wɔabu ano.
8Ɔsene sɛ nwa a wɔapɛkyɛ no,
sɛ ɔba a ɔbaa apɔn a ɔnhunuu owia da.
9Ansa na mo nkukuo bɛte nkasɛɛ no nka no,
sɛ ɛyɛ mono oo, ɛreben oo, ɔde abufuhyeɛ bɛpra ne nyinaa agu.
10Ɔtenenee ani bɛgye sɛ wahunu aweretɔ,
ɔbɛhohoro ne nan ase ɔbɔnefoɔ mogya mu.
11 Na nnipa bɛka sɛ: Ampa, akatua wɔ hɔ ma ɔteneneeni,
ampa, Onyankopɔn wɔ hɔ a ɔbu atɛn asase soɔ.

Title: NNWOM 59
Content:
Dwom a ɛtia nkɔnkɔnsa
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no “Al-taset” sankuo nne so. Dawid abebuo dwom. Ɔtoo no berɛ a Saulo soma baa ne fie sɛ wɔnku no no.
1 Me Nyankopɔn, gye me firi m’atamfoɔ nsam,
bɔ me ho ban, wɔn a wɔsɔre tia me no ho.
2Gye me amumuyɛfoɔ mu,
na gye me nkwa firi mogyapɛfoɔ nsam.
3Na hwɛ, wɔtɛ me kra,
akokobirefoɔ boaboa wɔn ho ano tia me.
AWURADE, ɛnyɛ me mmarato anaa me bɔne nti.
4 Ɛnyɛ amumuyɛ nti na wɔtu mmirika siesie wɔn ho.
Sɔre bɛboa me, na fa w’ani hwɛ.
5Na wo, AWURADE, asafo Nyankopɔn, Israel Nyankopɔn,
nyane bɛhwɛ amanaman nyinaa,
nhunu amumuyɛfoɔ nkontompofoɔ mmɔbɔ.
6 Wɔsane ba anwummerɛ,
wɔpɔ so sɛ akraman,
na wɔdi kuro mu kyinhyia.
7Hwɛ, wɔde wɔn ano woro kasa,
nkrantɛ wɔ wɔn ano, na “hwan na ɔteɛ?”
8 Na wo, AWURADE, wosere wɔn,
wodi amanaman nyinaa ho fɛw.
9M’ahoɔden, wo na mehwɛ wo kwan,
na Onyankopɔn yɛ m’abankɛseɛ.
10 Me Nyankopɔn de n’adom bɛhyia me,
Onyankopɔn bɛma mahunu deɛ mepɛ, m’atɛfoɔ ho.
11Nku wɔn, na me man werɛ amfi;
fa w’ahoɔden bɔ wɔn pansam, na fa wɔn hwe fam,
yɛn kyɛm ne wo, AWURADE.
12Wɔn anomu nsɛm yɛ nsɛmmɔne nko,
enti ma wɔnkye wɔn, wɔn ahantan mu,
ne nseɛ ne atorɔ a wɔdie no nti.
13Hye wɔn abufuo mu,
hye wɔn na wɔantena hɔ,
na ma wɔnhunu sɛ Onyankopɔn na ɔdi Yakob so hene
kɔsi asase ano.
14 Na wɔsane ba anwummerɛ,
wɔpɔ so sɛ akraman
na wɔdi kuro mu kyinhyia.
15Wɔn deɛ, wɔdwane hwehwɛ aduane,
na sɛ wɔmmee a, wɔtena hɔ anadwo.
16Na me deɛ, mɛto w’ahoɔden ho dwom,
na mato w’adɔeɛ ho ahurisie dwom anɔpa,
sɛ woayɛ me abankɛseɛ
ne me hia da mu dwanekɔbea.
17M’ahoɔden, wo na mɛto wo dwom,
na Onyankopɔn ne m’abankɛseɛ,
m’adom Nyankopɔn.

Title: NNWOM 60
Content:
Nkoguo akyiri mpaebɔ
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no “Susan Edut” sankuo nne so. Dawid abebuo dwom. Wɔmfa nkyerɛkyerɛ adeɛ. Ɔtoo no berɛ a ɔne Mesopotamia ne Soba Siriafoɔ koeɛ, na Yoab sane kɔkumm Edomfoɔ mpem dummienu nkyene bɔn mu no.
1 Onyankopɔn, woasum yɛn agu, woabɔ yɛn apansam,
wo bo afu; ma yɛn ho mmra yɛn ho bio.
2Woama asase awoso, woapae mu,
fa n’asinasini sisi anim, na ɛhinhim.
3 Woama wo man ahunu deɛ ɛyɛ den,
woama yɛanom ntintan nsa.
4 Wode frankaa ama w’afɛrefoɔ
sɛ wɔmfa mma wɔn ho so, nokorɛ nti.
5Deɛ ɛbɛyɛ na wɔagye w’adɔfo nti
fa wo nifa gye yɛn nkwa, na gye yɛn so.
6Onyankopɔn akasa n’ahoteɛ mu:
Mɛdi ahurisie, mɛkyɛ Sekem mu,
na masusu Sukot bonhwa.
7 Gilead wɔ me, na Manase wɔ me,
na Efraim yɛ me tiri so dadekyɛ;
Yuda yɛ m’ahempoma.
8Moab yɛ me dwaresɛn,
Edom so na mɛto me mpaboa maguo,
me nti, Filistifoɔ asase, teateam.
9Hwan na ɔde me bɛkɔ kuro denden no mu,
hwan na ɔbɛgya me akɔ Edom?
10Ɛnyɛ wo, Onyankopɔn, na woasum yɛn aguo yi,
na wo, Onyankopɔn, ne yɛn dɔm ankɔ?
11Bɛboa yɛn ahohia mu,
na onipa mmoa yɛ ɔkwa.
12Yɛde Onyankopɔn na ɛbɛyɛ mmaninneɛ,
na ɔno na ɔbɛtiatia yɛn ahohiahiafoɔ soɔ.

Title: NNWOM 61
Content:
Banbɔ ho adesrɛ
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔmfa sankuo nto. Dawid deɛ.
1Onyankopɔn, tie me sufrɛ,
yɛ aso ma me mpaebɔ.
2Mefiri asase ano mesu mefrɛ wo
m’akoma ahometeɛ mu,
wode me bɛkɔ
ɔbotan a ɛware sene me so.
3 Na wo na woayɛ me dwanekɔhyɛbea,
abantenten a ɛyɛ den, ɔtamfoɔ anim.
4 Mɛtena wo ntomadan mu daa,
mɛhyɛ wo ntaban a ɛkata me soɔ no ase.
5Na wo, Onyankopɔn, woate me bɔhyɛ,
wode wɔn a wɔsuro wo din agyapadeɛ ama me.
6 Wobɛto ɔhene nna so,
na ne mfeɛ akɔduru awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛdidi soɔ so.
7 Ɔbɛtena Nyankopɔn anim daa,
fa adɔeɛ ne nokorɛ hwɛ no so.
8Ɛno na mɛto dwom pa mama wo din daa,
na mama m’aboadeɛ daa daa.

Title: NNWOM 62
Content:
Nyankopɔn mu kommyɛ
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ Yedutun. Dawid dwom.
1 Ampa, me kra yɛ komm hwɛ Onyankopɔn ara;
ne nsam na menya nkwagyeɛ. 2Ampa ara, ɔne me botan ne me nkwagyeɛ,
m’abankɛseɛ, merenhinhim bebree bi.
3Mobɛha ɔbaakofoɔ akɔsi da bɛn,
na mo nyinaa adwiri no
sɛ ɔfasuo a akyea ne ɛban a agoɔ?
4Ampa ara, wɔatu agyina sɛ wɔbɛtu no so.
Wɔpɛ atorɔdie,
wɔde wɔn ano hyira,
nanso wɔn mu deɛ, wɔdome.
5Ampa, me kra, yɛ komm hwɛ Onyankopɔn ara,
na ne nsam na menya deɛ m’ani da soɔ.
6 Ampa ara, ɔne me botan ne me nkwagyeɛ,
m’abankɛseɛ, merenhinhim.
7 Nyankopɔn nsam na me nkwagyeɛ ne m’animuonyam wɔ,
me botan a ɛyɛ den, me dwanekɔhyɛbea ne Onyankopɔn.
8Nkurɔfoɔ, momfa mo ho nto ne so daa.
Monyi mo yam nkyerɛ no,
Onyankopɔn ne yɛn dwanekɔhyɛbea.
9Ampa ara, nnipa mma yɛ huhuo,
mmarima mma yɛ atorɔdeɛ.
Wɔgu nsaniam a, ɛhwan kɔ soro,
wɔn nyinaa yɛ huhuo.
10 Mommfa mo ho nnto amimdie so,
na monnyɛ dwotwa ho ahokyerɛ.
Sɛ ahonyadeɛ dɔre a, mommfa mo akoma nnto so.
11Na Onyankopɔn akasa prɛko,
mprenu na mateɛ:
Sɛ tumi yɛ Nyankopɔn dea,
12 na wo, AWURADE, na adom wɔ woɔ.
Na wobɛtua onipa ka
sɛdeɛ n’adwuma teɛ.

Title: NNWOM 63
Content:
Nyankopɔn ho anigyina
Dawid dwom. Ɔwɔ Yuda serɛ soɔ no, na ɔtoeɛ.
1 Onyankopɔn, wone me Nyankopɔn,
mehwehwɛ wo anɔpahema,
wo ho sukɔm de me kra,
me honam ahodwo repɛ wo hɔ biribi,
asase pɛsɛɛ a nsuo nni soɔ ma no tɔ piti wɔ so.
2Saa na mehwɛɛ woɔ wɔ kronkronbea hɔ,
sɛ mɛhunu wo tumi ne w’animuonyam.
3Na w’adɔeɛ yɛ sene nkwa,
mede m’ano bɛyi wo ayɛ.
4Saa na mete aseɛ yi mɛhyira woɔ,
wo din mu na mɛma me nsa soɔ.
5Ɛbɛmee me kra sɛ ekyim ne sradeɛ,
na mede ahosan mu anoteɛ bɛyi wo ayɛ.
6Sɛ mekae wo me kɛtɛ so a,
medi wo ho dadwene adasuo mu.
7Na woayɛ me boafoɔ,
na wo ntaban ase nwunu mu na medi ahurisie.
8Me kra bata wo ho di w’akyi,
wo nsa nifa sɔ me mu.
9Na wɔn a wɔpɛ me kra asɛe no no
bɛsiane akɔ asase ase tɔnn.
10Wɔde wɔn bɛto afena ano,
wɔbɛyɛ sakraman deɛ.
11Na ɔhene deɛ, n’ani bɛgye Nyankopɔn ho,
obiara a ɔka ne ntam no de bɛhyehyɛ ne ho,
na wɔbɛmua wɔn a wɔdi atorɔ ano.

Title: NNWOM 64
Content:
Onyankopɔn bu abɔnefoɔ atɛn
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dawid dwom.
1Onyankopɔn, tie me nne,
m’abooboo mu,
bɔ me nkwa ho ban, na ɔtamfoɔ ammɛyi me hu.
2Fa me hunta firi nnipa bɔne kokoam agyinatuo ho,
firi amumuyɛfoɔ gyegyeegye ho.
3 Wɔn na wɔse wɔn tɛkyerɛma ano sɛ afena,
wɔkuntunu tadua mu rebɛto wɔn mmɛmma, ɛne nsɛm fo,
4 sɛ wɔbɛto abɔ deɛ ɔyɛ pɛ no kokoam,
wɔto bɔ no mpofirim, na wɔnsuro.
5 Wɔhyɛ wɔn asɛmmɔne mu den,
wɔkeka sɛ wɔbɛhunta asum fidie,
wɔka sɛ: Hwan na ɔbɛhu yɛn?
6Wɔbɔre hwehwɛ amumuyɛ,
wɔawie wɔn tirim pɔ no,
wɔabɔre abɔre, na onipa tirim ne n’akomam dɔ.
7Na Onyankopɔn bɛto bɛmma abɔ wɔn,
wɔbɛpira mpofirim,
8 na wɔbɛhwe ase, na wɔn tɛkyerɛma so asɛm abua wɔn atifi,
wɔn a wɔhu wɔn nyinaa ho bɛpopo.
9Na nnipa nyinaa bɛsuro,
na wɔaka Nyankopɔn adwuma,
na wɔahunu ne nneyɛɛ mu.
10Ɔteneneeni ani bɛgye AWURADE ho,
na wadwane akɔtoa no,
na akoma mu teefoɔ nyinaa bɛhyehyɛ wɔn ho.

Title: NNWOM 65
Content:
Onyankopɔn nhyira ho aseda dwom
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dawid dwom.
1Onyankopɔn, wɔde abodwoɔ yi wo ayɛ wɔ Sion,
na wo na wɔde aboadeɛ ma woɔ.
2O mpaebɔ tiefoɔ,
wo nkyɛn na nnipa nyinaa ba.
3Amumuyɛdeɛ boroo me so,
wo na woakata yɛn mmarato soɔ.
4 Nhyira ne deɛ woyi no
na woma no bɛn wo sɛ ɔntena w’abannwa soɔ.
Wo fie nnepa bɛmee yɛn,
w’asɔrefie kronkron nnepa no.
5Wode asɛntenenee a ɛyi hu bua yɛn,
yɛn nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn,
wo na asase ano nyinaa ani da wo soɔ,
ne wɔn a wɔwɔ akyirikyiri po so.
6Wode w’ahoɔden de mmepɔ tintim hɔ,
wode tumi amia.
7 Woma ɛpo huuyɛ,
emu asorɔkyeɛ huuyɛ gyae,
na woma aman kitikitiyɛ ano dwo.
8Na wo nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ nti
wɔn a wɔte ahafi nohoa suro,
woma wɔn a wɔte apueeɛ ne atɔeɛ nohoa tɔnn
to ahosan dwom.
9 Woabɛhwɛ asase agugu so nsuo,
woama ɛso aduane abu so bebree.
Nyankopɔn asubɔnten no, nsuo ayɛ mu ma,
womaa wɔn aburoo gyinae,
womaa no sii so sɛdeɛ ɛsɛ.
10 Woguguu n’akofie so nsuo
de honoo emu apɔapɔ,
wode osuo yɛɛ no bɛtɛɛ,
wohyiraa ne fire so.
11Woabɔ w’ayamyɛ afirinhyia abotire,
na sradeɛ sosɔ w’akwan so.
12Ɛsosɔ serɛ so adidibea so,
na mpampa de abotɔyam hyehyɛ wɔn ho.
13Nnwankuo ahyɛ adidibea no ma,
aburoo nso akata abɔn no mu,
wɔdi ahurisie bɔ ose,
anigyeɛ dwom nko ara na wɔtoɔ.

Title: NNWOM 66
Content:
Nkwagyeɛ ho ayeyie dwom
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dwom.
1Asase nyinaa, monni ahurisie mmɔ ose mma Onyankopɔn,
2monto dwom mma ne din animuonyam,
monhyɛ no animuonyam nyi no ayɛ.
3Monse Onyankopɔn sɛ: Wo nnwuma yɛ hu ampa.
Wo tumi kɛseɛ nti w’atamfo bɛkoto wo.
4Asase nyinaa bɛsɔre wo
na wɔato wo dwom,
wɔbɛto dwom ama wo din.
5Mommra mmɛhwɛ Nyankopɔn nneyɛɛ,
n’adeɛ a ɔyɛ de di nnipa mma soɔ yɛ hu.
6 Ɔmaa ɛpo danee asase pɛsɛɛ,
wɔde anammɔn twaa asu kɛseɛ,
ɛno nti yɛn ani gye ne ho.
7Deɛ ɔde ne tumi di hene daa no,
ɔwɔ amanaman ho ani.
Mma mansotwefoɔ mmma wɔn ho so.
8Aman, monhyira yɛn Nyankopɔn,
na momma wɔnte n’ayeyie yie.
9Ɔde yɛn aka ateasefoɔ ho,
na wamma yɛn nan anwati.
10 Na wo, Onyankopɔn, na woakari yɛn ahwɛ,
woanane yɛn ahwɛ sɛ wɔnane dwetɛ hwɛ mu.
11Wode yɛn ahyɛ asau mu,
wode adesoa dompee asoa yɛn.
12 Woama ɔdasani anante yɛn tiri so,
yɛafa ogya ne nsuo mu,
nanso woayi yɛn aba deɛ nnepa abu soɔ hɔ.
13Mede ɔhyeɛ afɔdeɛ bɛkɔ wo fie,
mɛma wo m’aboadeɛ,
14deɛ mede mebuee m’ano,
ne deɛ m’ano kaa m’ahohia mu no.
15Mede nnwan a wɔadɔre
ne adwennini a ɛyɛ hwam bɛbɔ wo ɛhyeɛ afɔdeɛ,
mede anantwie ne mpapo bɛbɔ afɔdeɛ.
16Mo a mosuro Onyankopɔn nyinaa,
mommra mmɛtie, na mɛka deɛ wayɛ ama me.
17Mede m’ano mesu mefrɛɛ no,
na mede me tɛkyerɛma meyii no ayɛ.
18 Sɛ medi ahuhudeɛ akyiri m’akomam a,
anka AWURADE rentie me.
19Ampaneampa, Onyankopɔn atie me,
wayɛ aso atie me mpaebɔ.
20Nhyira ne Onyankopɔn
a wannane me mpaebɔ ani,
na wanyi n’adɔeɛ amfiri me soɔ.

Title: NNWOM 67
Content:
Nnɔbaeɛ twa ho aseda dwom
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dwom a wɔto no asankuo ano.
1 Onyankopɔn, dom yɛn, na hyira yɛn,
te w’anim kyerɛ yɛn.
2Na ma wɔnhunu w’akwan wɔ asase so,
wo nkwagyeɛ amanaman nyinaa mu.
3 Onyankopɔn, aman bɛyi wo ayɛ,
aman nyinaa bɛyi wo ayɛ.
4Aman ani bɛgye na wɔato ahosan nnwom,
sɛ wobu aman atɛntenenee
na wokyerɛkyerɛ asase so aman kwan.
5Onyankopɔn, aman bɛyi wo ayɛ,
aman nyinaa bɛyi wo ayɛ.
6 Asase abɔ n’aduane, Onyankopɔn,
yɛn Nyankopɔn bɛhyira yɛn.
7 Onyankopɔn bɛhyira yɛn,
na wɔn a wɔte asase ano nyinaa asuro no.

Title: NNWOM 68
Content:
Nyankopɔn nkonimdifoɔ no ho ayeyie dwom
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dawid sankuo dwom.
1 Ma Onyankopɔn nsɔre na n’atamfo nhwete,
na ma wɔn a wɔkyiri no nnwane n’anim.
2Sɛ wisie tu korɔ no, sɛ bɔ wɔn guo ara ne no;
sɛ akraa nane ogya ho no,
sɛ abɔnefoɔ bɛsɛe Nyankopɔn anim ne no.
3Na teneneefoɔ deɛ, wɔn ani bɛgye,
wɔbɛdi Nyankopɔn anim ahurisie
na wɔn ho asane wɔn, anigyeɛ mu.
4 Monto Nyankopɔn dwom, monto dwom mma ne din,
montoto kwan yie mma deɛ ɔte adeɛ so nam ɛserɛ so reba,
ne din de AWURADE, na monni n’anim ahurisie.
5 Nwisiaa se ne akunafoɔ sɛnnifoɔ ne Onyankopɔn,
ne tenabea kronkron mu.
6Onyankopɔn ma ɔhokwafoɔ nya mpɔn-ne-mma,
ɔtu apokyerɛfoɔ ma wɔbɛdi yie,
na mansotwefoɔ deɛ, wɔte nkyɛkyerɛ so.
7 Onyankopɔn, wofirii adi dii wo man anim,
wofaa ɛserɛ paradada soɔ no,
8 asase wosoe, ɔsoro nso sosɔɔ nsuo
Nyankopɔn anim,
Sinai yi ara wosoe Onyankopɔn,
aane, Israel Nyankopɔn, anim.
9Onyankopɔn, wotɔɔ adɔeɛ suo guu w’agyapadeɛ so,
na ɛtɔ piti a, wo na woma no yɛ yie.
10W’asafo tenaa so;
Onyankopɔn, w’ayamyɛ mu wosiesie maa amanehunufoɔ.
11 AWURADE bɛka n’anomu asɛm,
mmaa a wɔka nkonim asɛmpa no asafo so.
12Atamfoɔ dɔm ahemfo bɛdwanedwane,
na ɔbaa a ɔte fie no akyekyɛ asadeɛ mu.
13 Motete nnwammuo ntam a,
ɛte sɛ aburuburo ntaban a wɔde dwetɛ agu ho,
ne ne ntakra a sika fɛfɛ hran ho.
14Otumfoɔ bɔ ahemfo gu asase no so a,
ɛhoa sɛ nsukyerɛmma Salmon so.
15Basan mmepɔ yɛ Nyankopɔn mmepɔ,
Basan mmepɔ yɛ mmepɔ atentene.
16 Adɛn na mo mmepɔ atentene
mode ani bɔne hwɛ bepɔ a Onyankopɔn pɛ sɛ ɔtena soɔ no?
Ampa, AWURADE bɛtena so daa.
17 Nyankopɔn ko teaseɛnam yɛ mpempem bubuanwea,
AWURADE wɔ wɔn mu te sɛ Sinai kronkronbea no mu.
18 Woaforo kɔ soro,
woafa nnommumfoɔ nnommum,
woagye nnipa mu ayɛyɛdeɛ, mansotwefoɔ mu mpo,
na AWURADE Nyankopɔn atena hɔ.
19 Nhyira ne AWURADE
a ɔsoa yɛn adesoa ma yɛn daa daa,
ɔno Onyankopɔn no ne yɛn nkwagyeɛ.
20Ɔno Onyankopɔn no ne yɛn nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn,
na AWURADE na owuo mu fire wɔ no.
21Ampa ara, Onyankopɔn bɛpiepie n’atamfo ti,
ɔbɛpie deɛ wasi atimum
na ɔkyea n’afodie mu no ti.
22Na AWURADE aka sɛ:
Mɛfa wɔn mafiri Basan maba bio,
mede wɔn bɛsane afiri po bunu mu aba,
23na wode wo nan akeka mogya mu,
na w’akraman tɛkyerɛma anya atamfoɔ no ho biribi atafere.
24 Onyankopɔn, wɔhunu w’adi a worebɛfire,
me Nyankopɔn ne me hene adi a ɔrebɛfiri, kronkronbea hɔ.
25 Nnwontofoɔ di kan, asankubɔfoɔ di akyire
wɔ mmabaa a wɔka mpintin ntam.
26 Monhyira Onyankopɔn, mo asafo ahyiaeɛ mu,
mo a mofiri Israel abura mu, monhyira AWURADE.
27Benyamin akumaa, wɔn sodifoɔ, wɔ hɔ,
Yuda atitire, wɔn asafohene ahodoɔ,
Sebulon atitire ne Naftali atitire wɔ hɔ.
28Wo Nyankopɔn ahyɛ de wo tumi ama wo,
Onyankopɔn, hyɛ deɛ woayɛ ama yɛn yi mu den.
29 W’asɔrefie a ɛwɔ Yerusalem nti,
ahemfo de ayɛyɛdeɛ bɛbrɛ wo.
30Ka mmɛwa mu aboa ne anantwininikuo
ne anantwie mma a ɛyɛ aman no anim,
na wɔde dwetɛ mpɔ abɛsom.
Pansam aman a wɔpɛ akodie mu.
31 Akunini firi Misraim bɛba,
Etiopia bɛtene ne nsa ntɛm ama Onyankopɔn.
32Asase so ahennie, monto Onyankopɔn dwom,
monto dwom mma AWURADE.
33Monto mma deɛ ɔte tete soro mu soro.
Hwɛ, ɔma wɔte ne nne a ɛyɛ tumi nne.
34 Momfa tumi mma Onyankopɔn,
n’animuonyam kata Israel so,
na ne tumi wɔ wiem tɔnn.
35 Nyankopɔn, wo ho yɛ hu, wo tenabea kronkron mu,
Israel Nyankopɔn
de tumi ne ahoɔden ma ne man.
Nhyira ne Onyankopɔn.

Title: NNWOM 69
Content:
AWURADE akoa a ɔwɔ amanehunu mu
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no “Sosannim” sankuo nne so. Dawid deɛ.
1 Onyankopɔn, gye me nkwa,
na nsuo aduru me kra ho.
2Matɔ amena kuronkuron atɛkyɛ
a gyinabea nni hɔ mu,
maduru ebunu
a nsuo bu kata me soɔ mu.
3Me sufrɛ ama mabrɛ,
me mene mu awe,
mahwɛ me Nyankopɔn kwan
ama m’ani abu.
4 Wɔn a wɔtane me kwa dɔɔso
sene me tiri so nwi,
m’asɛefoɔ a wɔyɛ m’atamfoɔ atorofoɔ dɔɔso,
deɛ memfaeɛ no,
wɔse mennane memma.
5Onyankopɔn, wonim me nkwaseasɛm,
na me mfomsoɔ nhunta wo.
6AWURADE, asafo AWURADE Nyankopɔn,
mma wɔn a wɔtwɛn woɔ ani nnwu me ho,
Israel Nyankopɔn,
mma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ woɔ no anim nngu ase, me nti.
7 Na wo nti na magye ahohora,
na aniwuo ahyɛ m’ani so ma.
8 Madane me nuanom mu ɔhɔhoɔ,
mayɛ me na mma mu ɔnanani.
9 Na wo fie no ho dɔ ahyɛ me ma mmoroso,
na wɔn a wɔbɔ wo ahohora ahohorabɔ aba me so.
10Na me kra suu mmuada mu,
na ɛdanee me ahohorabɔ.
11Mede ayitoma meyɛɛ me ntoma
na mayɛ wɔn akasabebuo.
12 Wɔn a wɔtete kuro pono mu ka me ho asɛm,
na nsanomfoɔ de me to dwom.
13 Na me deɛ, mebɔ wo, AWURADE, mpaeɛ,
adom berɛ mu,
Onyankopɔn, w’adɔeɛ kɛseɛ nti,
fa wo nkwagyeɛ nokorɛ gye me so.
14Yi me firi atɛkyɛ mu, na mammem,
ma wɔnyi me mfiri wɔn a wɔkyiri me nsam
ne abunu mu.
15Mma asuo a ayire no mmfa me,
na mma ebunu mmmene me,
na mma amena nnka me nnhyɛ mu mmmua n’ano.
16AWURADE, gye me so, na w’adɔeɛ yɛ,
dane w’ani kyerɛ me,
sɛdeɛ wo mmɔborɔhunu bebree no teɛ.
17Na nyi w’ani nhunta w’akoa,
na me ho dwane me, gye me so ntɛm.
18Twe bɛn me kra, na bɛgye no,
m’atamfoɔ nti gye me.
19Wonim m’ahohora
ne m’aniwuo ne me nsopa,
w’ani tua m’ahohiahiafoɔ nyinaa.
20 Ahohora apɛkyɛ m’akoma, na abɔ me yadeɛ,
na mehwɛ deɛ ɔrebɛma me due kwan a, obi mma,
mehwehwɛ awerɛkyekyefoɔ a, menhunu bi.
21 Wɔde bɔnwoma yɛɛ m’aduane,
na me sukɔm mu wɔmaa me nsa kekakeka sɛ mennom.
22 Ma wɔn pono a ɛsi wɔn anim nnane sɛ apa,
na wɔdi yie a, ma no nyɛ afidie mma wɔn.
23Ma wɔn ani so nyɛ wɔn kusuu,
na wɔanhunu adeɛ,
na ma wɔn sisi mpopo daa,
24ma w’ani mmere wɔn so,
na w’awerɛhoɔ ne w’abufuo nka wɔn.
25 Ma wɔn tenabea nnane amamfo,
na obiara nntena wɔn ntomadan mu.
26 Ɛfiri sɛ wɔtaa deɛ wo ara woabɔ no no,
na wɔka wɔn a woapira wɔn no yea kyerɛ.
27 Ma amumuyɛ mmɔ wɔn amumuyɛ so,
na mma wɔmmma wo tenenee mu.
28 Ma wɔnyi wɔn mfiri ateasefoɔ nwoma mu,
na mma wɔnntwerɛ wɔne ateneneefoɔ din mmmom.
29Na me deɛ, meyɛ ɔmanehunufoɔ ne ɔwerɛhoni,
Onyankopɔn, ma wo nkwagyeɛ mma me so.
30Mede dwontoɔ bɛyi Nyankopɔn din ayɛ,
na mede aseda makamfo no.
31 Na ɛbɛsɔ AWURADE ani yie
asene nantwinini a ɔwɔ mmɛn na ne tɔte mu apaeɛ.
32 Ahobrɛasefoɔ hunu a, wɔn ani bɛgye,
mo a mohwehwɛ Nyankopɔn akyiri kwan,
mo akoma nnya nkwa.
33Na AWURADE tie ahiafoɔ,
na ɔnto ne nkurɔfoɔ nneduafoɔ ho mpe.
34Ma ɔsoro ne asase nyi no ayɛ,
ɛpo ne deɛ ɛkeka ne ho wɔ mu nyinaa.
35Na Onyankopɔn bɛgye Sion
na wakyekyere Yuda nkuro,
na wɔatena mu, na ayɛ wɔn dea.
36Na ne nkoa asefoɔ bɛnya adi,
na wɔn a wɔpɛ ne din no atena mu.

Title: NNWOM 70
Content:
Nkwagyeɛ ho adesrɛ
(Nnwom 40.13-17)
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Dawid deɛ. Wɔde bɔ nkaeɛ.
1 Onyankopɔn, yɛ ntɛm bɛgye me,
AWURADE, yɛ ntɛm bɛboa me.
2Ma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ me kra ani nwu
na wɔn anim ngu ase,
ma wɔn a wɔpɛ me bɔne nsane wɔn akyi
na wɔnnane ahohorafoɔ.
3Wɔn a wɔse “wiɛ, wiɛ” no,
ma wɔnsane wɔn akyi,
wɔn aniwuo akatua ho.
4Ma wɔn a wɔhwehwɛ woɔ nyinaa nni ahurisie
na wɔn ani nnye wo ho,
na ma wɔn a wɔdɔ wo nkwagyeɛ no nka daa sɛ:
Ma wɔnkamfo AWURADE kɛseyɛ.
5Na me deɛ, meyɛ mmɔbɔ, na meyɛ ohiani.
Onyankopɔn, yɛ ntɛm ma me.
Wone me boafoɔ ne me gyefoɔ,
AWURADE, ntwentwɛn wo nan ase.

Title: NNWOM 71
Content:
AWURADE, nnya me
1Wo AWURADE na madwane mabɛtoa woɔ,
m’anim rengu ase da biara da.
2Fa wo tenenee yi me, na gye me,
yɛ aso ma me, na gye me nkwa.
3 Yɛ sɛ ɔbotan a mɛtena so maba hɔ daa.
Woahyɛ sɛ wɔnnye me nkwa,
na wone me botan ne me ho fasuo.
4Me Nyankopɔn, gye me firi ɔbɔnefoɔ nsam,
gye me omumuyɛfoɔ ne otirimuɔdenfoɔ nsam.
5Na wo, AWURADE, ne m’anidasoɔ,
deɛ mefiri me mmɔfraase mede me ho metoo ne soɔ.
6 Wo na mefiri yafunum mede m’akyiri metweree woɔ,
woyii me firii me na yam,
wo na mɛyi wo ayɛ daa.
7 Mayɛ nnipa bebree ani so anwanwadeɛ,
na wone me dwanekɔhyɛbea a ɛyɛ den.
8W’ayeyie ne w’anidie
bɛhyɛ m’anomu ma da mu nyinaa.
9 Nto me ntwene nkɔkoraaberɛ,
na sɛ m’ahoɔden sa a, nnya me.
10Na m’atamfoɔ ka me ho asɛm,
na wɔn a wɔtɛ me kra bom tu agyina
11ka sɛ: Onyankopɔn apa no;
monti no nkye no,
na obi nni hɔ a ɔbɛgye no.
12Onyankopɔn, mma me ne wo ntam nnware,
me Nyankopɔn, yɛ ntɛm bɛboa me.
13Me kra ho asɛmpɛfoɔ ani bɛwu na wɔayera,
ahohora ne nsopa bɛkata wɔn a
wɔpɛ me bɔne so.
14Na me deɛ, mɛtwɛn ara daa,
na mede bi maka w’ayeyie nyinaa ho.
15 M’ano bɛka wo tenenee,
ɛbɛka wo nkwagyeɛ da mu nyinaa
a mennim ano.
16Mede AWURADE Nyankopɔn ahoɔdenneɛ bɛba abɛkae wo tenenee
a ɛyɛ wo nkutoo dea no.
17 Onyankopɔn, wo na wofiri me mmɔfraase kyerɛkyerɛɛ me,
na maka w’anwanwadeɛ no mabɛduru sɛsɛɛ.
18 Onyankopɔn, nkɔkoraaberɛ ne ɛdwono mu nso mpa me,
kɔsi sɛ mɛka wo tumi ho asɛm makyerɛ nkyirimma,
na maka wo mmaninyɛ makyerɛ wɔn a wɔbɛba nyinaa.
19 Na, Onyankopɔn,
wo tenenee kɔ sorosoro,
wo a woayɛ ade akɛseɛ,
Onyankopɔn, hwan na ɔte sɛ woɔ?
20 Wo a woma yɛhunu amaneɛ bebree a ɛyɛ ya,
wobɛma yɛanya nkwa bio,
na woatwe yɛn
afiri asase akunu mu asane aba.
21Wobɛma me kɛseyɛ adɔ,
na woadane w’ani akyekyere me werɛ.
22Me nso mede bɛnta bɛyi wo ayɛ,
me Nyankopɔn, ne wo nokorɛ,
mede sankuten bɛto wo,
O Israel Hotefoɔ no, dwom.
23Meto ayeyie dwom ma wo a,
m’ano ne me kra
a woagye no no ho bɛsane no.
24Mede me tɛkyerɛma
nso bɛka wo tenenee ho asɛm daa,
ɛfiri sɛ wɔn a wɔpɛ me bɔne no ani awu,
na wɔn anim agu ase.

Title: NNWOM 72
Content:
Asomdwoeɛ hene ne n’ahennie
Salomo deɛ.
1Onyankopɔn, fa w’atemmuo ma ɔhene,
ne wo tenenee ma ɔhene ba.
2Ma no mfa tenenee nni wo man so,
na ɔmfa atemmuo nhwɛ w’amanehunufoɔ.
3 Mmepɔ bɛso asomdwoeɛ ama ɔman,
na nkokoɔ nso de tenenee aba.
4 Ɔbɛbu ɔman mu amanehunufoɔ atɛn,
na wagye ahiafoɔ mma nkwa,
na wabubu nhyɛsofoɔ mu pasapasa.
5Owia ne ɔsrane da so wɔ hɔ yi,
wɔbɛsuro wo, awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa mu.
6Ɔbɛba sɛ osuo a ɛtɔ gu ɛserɛ a wɔahu soɔ so,
sɛ osu kɛseɛ a ɛtɔ dwodwo asase mu.
7Ɔteneneeni bɛsi frɔmm ne berɛ so,
na asomdwoeɛ pii bɛba akɔduru sɛ ɔsrane nni hɔ bio.
8 Ɔbɛdi hene afiri po so akɔsi po so,
de afiri asubɔnten no so akɔsi asase ano.
9 Wɔn a wɔte serɛ so bɛkoto n’anim,
na n’atamfo atafere mfuturo.
10 Tarsis ne nsupɔ mu ahemfo
bɛba abɛyɛ ayɛ,
Saba ne Seba ahemfo bɛba abɛkyɛ adeɛ.
11 Na ahemfo nyinaa bɛkoto asɔre no,
amanaman nyinaa bɛsom no.
12 Na ɔbɛgye ohiani a ɔsu frɛ no,
ne ɔmanehunufoɔ a ɔnni boafoɔ.
13Ɔbɛkora ɔbrɛfoɔ ne ohiani,
na wagye ahiafoɔ nkwa.
14 Ɔbɛgye wɔn afiri nhyɛsoɔ ne atirimuɔdensɛm mu,
na wɔn mogya boɔ ayɛ den n’anim.
15 Na ɔbɛnya nkwa,
na ɔde Seba sika no bi bɛma no,
na ɔno nso bɛbɔ mpaeɛ ama no daa,
ahyira no da mu nyinaa.
16Asase no so aburoofuo bɛduru mmepɔ atifi,
ɛso aba bɛwoso
sɛ Lebanon,
na nkuro no asoa
sɛ asase so nwira.
17 Ne din bɛtena hɔ daa,
na owia wɔ hɔ yi ne din asi so,
na nnipa de no ahyira wɔn ho,
na amanaman nyinaa ahyira no.
18Nhyira ne AWURADE Nyankopɔn,
Israel Nyankopɔn a ɔno nko yɛ anwanwadeɛ,
19 na nhyira ne n’animuonyam din daa,
na n’animuonyam nhyɛ asase nyinaa ma.
Amen ne Amen.
20Yisai ba Dawid mpaebɔ asa.

Title: NNWOM 73
Content:
NWOMA A ƐTƆ SO MMIƐNSA
(Nnwom 73—89)
Gyidie mu tumi
Asaf dwom.
1Ampa ara, Onyankopɔn yɛ ma Israel,
ma wɔn a wɔn akoma mu teɛ.
2 Na me deɛ, anka me nan reyɛ amane,
m’anammɔn reyɛ awatiri.
3 Na metwee ahokyerɛfoɔ ho ninkunu,
ɛfiri sɛ mehunuu abɔnefoɔ yie a wɔdie no.
4Wɔnhunu owuo mu aninyanneɛ,
na wɔwɔ honam ne ahoɔden.
5Ɔdasani haw deɛ, wɔnni bi,
nanso wɔnnwane wɔn ho sɛ nnipa binom.
6Enti ahantan adi wɔn kɔn ho barehyia,
na akakabensɛm asi wɔn aduradeɛ.
7 Srade ama wɔn ani apupu,
wɔn akoma mu adwene firi bu so.
8Wɔsi atwetwe na wɔde adwemmɔne ka amimdie asɛm,
wɔka akokurokosɛm.
9Wɔma wɔn ano to ɔsoro,
na wɔn tɛkyerɛma nenam asase so.
10Enti wɔn nkurɔfoɔ twe bɛdane wɔn,
na wɔnya nsuo kuruwa ma nom.
11 Na wɔse: Ɛbɛyɛ dɛn na Onyankopɔn bɛhunu,
nimdeɛ wɔ ɔsorosoroni no tirim anaa?
12Hwɛ, yeinom ne abɔnefoɔ,
nanso wɔn ho dwo wɔn daa, wɔama wɔn adeɛ adɔɔso.
13Ampa ara, mate m’akoma ho kwa,
na mahohoro me nsa bemdie mu kwa,
14nanso wɔaha me da mu nyinaa
na wɔatwe m’aso anɔpa biara.
15Sɛ mese: Mɛka no sɛɛ deɛ a,
anka matwa wo mmasantene nkontompo.
16Na mesusuu ho sɛ mɛhunu adeɛ yi,
ɛyɛɛ m’ani so den dodo,
17kɔsii sɛ mekɔɔ Nyankopɔn kronkron mu hɔ na
mekɔhunuu deɛ akyire ɛkɔwiee wɔn.
18Ampa ara, wode wɔn gyina deɛ ɛhɔ yɛ torɔ,
wode wɔn hwe fam bubu wɔn pasaa.
19Hwɛ sɛ wɔadane sɛ amamfo seesei ara,
ehu ama wɔawie sa.
20Sɛ daeɛ a wɔaso anyane,
na wo, AWURADE, wokanyane wo ho a,
woma ani pa wɔn sunsumban soɔ.
21Sɛ ɛyɛ m’akoma awerɛho
na me sawa mu wowɔ me a,
22 anka meyɛ ɔkwasea a mennim de,
na mayɛ sɛ aboa, w’ani so.
23Na me deɛ, mɛtena wo nkyɛn daa,
woasɔ me nsa nifa mu.
24Wonam w’atirimpɔ so kyerɛkyerɛ me kwan,
na akyire yi no, woagye me akɔ animuonyam mu.
25Hwan na mewɔ no ɔsoro?
Na sɛ wowɔ me a, menhwehwɛ asase so hwee.
26 Ma me honam ne m’akoma nwie sa,
Onyankopɔn ne m’akoma botan ne me kyɛfa daa.
27Na hwɛ, wɔn a wɔfiri wo nkyɛn kɔ akyiri no bɛyera,
wobɛsɛe wɔn a wɔfiri wo nkyɛn kɔbɔ adwaman nyinaa.
28Na me deɛ, Nyankopɔn nkyɛn tena yɛ ma me,
mede AWURADE Nyankopɔn mayɛ me dwanekɔhyɛbea
na maka wo nnwuma nyinaa.

Title: NNWOM 74
Content:
Asafo no amanehunu mu sufrɛ
Asaf nnweneho dwom.
1Onyankopɔn, adɛn nti na woasum yɛn agu koraa,
na w’abufuo rehye w’adidibea nnwan?
2 Kae w’asafo a wotɔɔ wɔn teteete,
woagye wɔn sɛ w’agyapadeɛ mantam no,
Sion bepɔ a wobɛtenaa soɔ no.
3Ma wo nan so bɛhwɛ daa amamfo no,
ɔtamfoɔ asɛe kronkronbea hɔ ade nyinaa.
4W’atamfo teateam w’ahyiaeɛ mu,
wɔasi wɔn nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ de ayɛ nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ.
5Wɔyɛɛ sɛ nnipa a wɔma mmonnua so kɔ soro
de rebɛbu kwae mu nnupa,
6na afei — ɛho nnwinneɛ nyinaa,
wɔde akuma ne asaeɛ abubu.
7 Wɔde ogya ato wo kronkronbea hɔ,
wɔagu deɛ wo din tenaeɛ no ho fi.
8 Wɔkae wɔn akoma mu sɛ:
Momma yɛmmia wɔn nkɔ fam prɛko.
Wɔahyehye Nyankopɔn ahyiaeɛ nyinaa asase so.
9Yɛnhunu yɛn nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ,
odiyifoɔ bi nni hɔ bio,
na yɛn mu biara nnim da ko a ɛbɛkɔ akɔsie.
10Onyankopɔn, ɔhohiahiafoɔ nka ahohorasɛm nkɔsi da bɛn?
Ɔtamfoɔ ngu wo din ho fi daa anaa?
11Adɛn nti na wotwe wo nsa, wo nsa nifa?
Yi firi wo kokom, wie wɔn.
12Nanso Onyankopɔn ne me hene firi teteete,
ɔyɛ ɔgyeɛ adwuma asase so.
13 Wo na wode w’ahoɔden paee po mu,
wobobɔɔ nsuo atweaseɛ ti, nsuo no ani.
14Wopɛkyɛɛ dɛnkyɛmmirampɔn ti,
wode no yɛɛ ɛserɛ sofoɔ aduane.
15 Wo na woyii nsuo ani ne asubɔnten,
womaa asukɛseɛ a ɛsene daa wee. 16 Adekyeeɛ yɛ wo deɛ, anadwo nso wɔ wo,
wo na woasiesie akanea ne owia.
17Wo na woatwa asase ano nyinaa hyeɛ,
wo na woyɛɛ ahuhuro ne awɔ berɛ.
18Kae yei sɛ atamfoɔ bɔɔ AWURADE ahohora,
AWURADE, na ɔman agyegyentwie guu wo din ho fi.
19Mfa w’anyankuku kra nhyɛ mmoa nsa,
mma wo werɛ mmfiri wo mmɔborɔfoɔ kra da.
20Ma w’ani mmra apam no so,
na atirimuɔdensɛm tenabea ayeyɛ asase so nkokoam ma.
21Mma deɛ wɔhyɛ no soɔ mmfa ahohora nnsane mmma,
ma ɔmanehunufoɔ ne ohiani nyi wo din ayɛ.
22Onyankopɔn, sɔre, bɛdi wo ara w’asɛm,
kae sɛdeɛ nkwasea bɔ wo ahohora da mu nyinaa.
23Mma wo werɛ mmfiri w’atamfo nne,
wɔn a wɔsɔre tia woɔ no gyegyeegye a ɛkɔ soro daa yi.

Title: NNWOM 75
Content:
Onyankopɔn yɛ wiase temmufoɔ tenenee
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no “Al-taset” sankuo nne so. Asaf dwom.
1 Onyankopɔn, yɛda wo ase da wo ase,
na wo din abɛn; wɔka w’anwanwadeɛ kyerɛ.
2Mɛba berɛ a ɛsɛ mu,
na me ara mabɛbu atɛntenenee.
3Asase ne wɔn a wɔte soɔ nyinaa mu hodwo a,
me na mede mu afadum mesisi hɔ.
4Mese ahokyerɛfoɔ sɛ: Monnyɛ ahokyerɛ.
Na mese abɔnefoɔ sɛ: Mommma abɛn no so.
5Mommma mo abɛn so nnkɔ soro,
monnto bamkɔn nnkasa.
6Na ɛmfiri apueeɛ, na ɛmfiri atɔeɛ,
nanso ɛmfiri mmepɔ serɛ so,
7 na mmom Onyankopɔn na ɔbu atɛn,
ɔbɛbrɛ oyi ase, na wama oyi so.
8 Na kuruwa bi wɔ AWURADE nsam,
na emu bobesa ani firi ahuro,
mfrasa ayɛ mu ma, na ɔhwie bi; ampa ara,
aseɛ puo mpo, asase so abɔnefoɔ nyinaa bɛfefe anom.
9Na me deɛ, mɛka ɛho asɛm daa,
mɛto Yakob Nyankopɔn ayeyie dwom,
10na abɔnefoɔ mmɛn nyinaa, mɛbubu,
teneneefoɔ mmɛn na wɔbɛma soɔ.

Title: NNWOM 76
Content:
Nkonimdie ne Nyankopɔn ayeyie dwom
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔmfa asankuo nto. Asaf dwom.
1Yuda mu na wɔahunu Onyankopɔn,
ne din so Israel mu.
2 Ne sese si Salem,
na ne tenabea wɔ Sion.
3 Ɛhɔ na ɔbubuu tadua mu mmɛmma,
ɔkyɛm ne nkrantɛ ne ɔsa.
4W’anim yɛ nyam,
na ɛhran sene asadeɛ mmepɔ no.
5Wɔasɛe abrane akokoɔdurufoɔ no,
wɔatɔ nko da wɔn nna,
na ahoɔdenfoɔ no mu biara anhunu ne nsa.
6Yakob Nyankopɔn, w’ateatea nti
na nteaseɛnam ne apɔnkɔ nyinaa adeda nnahɔɔ.
7Wo na wo ho yɛ hu,
na sɛ wo bo refu a,
hwan na ɔbɛtumi agyina w’anim?
8 Wofiri soro maa wɔtee atemmuo,
asase suroe na ɛtɛm dinn,
9berɛ a Onyankopɔn sɔre bɛbuu atɛn,
sɛ ɔbɛgye wɔn a wɔdwoɔ asase soɔ nyinaa no.
10Na nnipa abufuhyeɛ dane wo ayeyie,
wode abufuhyeɛ a ɛboro soɔ bɔ abɔsoɔ.
11 Monhyɛ AWURADE, mo Nyankopɔn, bɔ, na momfa mma no.
Ma wɔn a wɔatwa ne ho ahyia nyinaa
mfa ayɛyɛdeɛ mmrɛ deɛ ne ho yɛ hu no.
12Ɔhu atumfoɔ home gu,
ne ho yɛ asase so ahemfo hu.

Title: NNWOM 77
Content:
Mmerɛ a atwam ne nnɛ
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ Yedutun. Asaf dwom.
1 Mɛma me nne so makyerɛ Onyankopɔn,
na masu mafrɛ no;
mɛma me nne so makyerɛ Onyankopɔn,
na ɔbɛyɛ aso ama me.
2M’ahohia da mu na mehwehwɛɛ AWURADE,
me nsam atene anadwo nyinaa,
na ɛmpa aba, me kra po awerɛkyekyerɛ.
3Mekae Onyankopɔn a, mesi apini,
medwene a, me honhom tɔ piti.
4Wokura m’anisuatɛtɛ mu,
ɛpempem me, na mentumi menkasa.
5 Medwene tete nna no,
tete mmerɛ no mu mfeɛ.
6Mekae m’anadwo dwom, medwene m’akomam,
na me honhom hwehwɛm pɛsɛpɛsɛ.
7 AWURADE bɛto atwene daa,
na ɔrennom bi bio anaa?
8N’adɔeɛ awie mutwa koraa anaa?
N’asɛm a ɔkaeɛ no asa ama awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa anaa?
9Onyankopɔn werɛ afiri adom,
anaasɛ ɔde abufuo atwe ne mmɔborɔhunu ato ne yam?
10Ɛnna mese: Me dadwene a ɛda me soɔ ne sɛ,
ɔsorosoroni no nifa asakyera.
11Mɛkae AWURADE nneyɛɛ maka,
aane, mɛkae wo tete anwanwadeɛ,
12na masusu w’adwuma nyinaa ho,
na madwene wo nneyɛɛ ho.
13 Onyankopɔn, wo kwan wɔ kronkronyɛ mu,
hwan na ɔyɛ nyame kɛseɛ sɛ Onyankopɔn?
14Wone Onyankopɔn a woyɛ anwanwadeɛ,
woama wɔahunu wo tumi, aman mu.
15Wode wo nsa na agye wo man,
Yakob ne Yosef mma no.
16Asuasu hunuu wo, Onyankopɔn,
asuasu hunuu wo, na wɔbɔɔ binim,
abunu nso wosowosoe.
17Amununkum tɔɔ osuo bibibibi,
ewiem tɔnn gyegyee,
w’agyan nso pepaa anyinam,
18wo prannaa boboom, ahum a ɛdi kyinhyia mu.
Anyinam hyerɛn wiase,
asase popoe na ɛwosoe.
19Wo kwan faa ɛpo mu,
na wo tempɔn nsuo pii mu,
na wɔanhunu w’anammɔn.
20 Wonam Mose ne Aaron nsa so
bɛgyaa wo man sɛ nnwankuo.

Title: NNWOM 78
Content:
Israel poɔ ne Yuda yie
Asaf nnweneho dwom.
1Me man, monyɛ aso mma me nkyerɛkyerɛ,
monwɛn mo aso mma m’anomu nsɛm.
2 Mɛbue m’ano mmebuo mu,
mɛyi atetesɛm adi sɛ akasabebuo.
3 Deɛ yɛateɛ na wɔama yɛahunu
na yɛn agyanom aka akyerɛ yɛn no,
4yɛremfa nhunta wɔn mma,
yɛreka nkyirimma AWURADE ayeyisɛm,
ne ne tumidie, ne n’anwanwadeɛ a wayɛ no.
5Ɔde adanseɛ tintim Yakob mu,
na ɔhyɛɛ mmara Israel mu,
ɛno na ɔde hyɛɛ yɛn agyanom
sɛ wɔmma wɔn mma nhunu,
6na nkyirimma,
mma a wɔbɛwo wɔn no, ahunu,
na wɔsi so a, wɔaka akyerɛ wɔn mma,
7sɛ wɔmfa wɔn ani nto Nyankopɔn so,
na wɔn werɛ mmfiri Nyankopɔn nneyɛɛ,
na wɔnni ne mmara nsɛm so.
8 Na wɔanyɛ sɛ wɔn agyanom,
mma asoɔdenfoɔ ne atuatefoɔ,
mma a wɔmfa wɔn akoma nsi tee,
na wɔn honhom nni Nyankopɔn nokorɛ.
9Efraim mmabanin, taduakurafoɔ, bɛmmatofoɔ,
wɔdane wɔn ani ɔko da.
10Wɔanni Nyankopɔn apam so,
na ne mmara nso, wɔampɛ sɛ wɔnante mu.
11Na wɔn werɛ firii ne nneyɛɛ
ne n’anwanwadeɛ a ɔde kyerɛɛ wɔn no.
12 Ɔyɛɛ anwanwadeɛ wɔn agyanom anim,
Misraim asase so, Soan petee mu.
13 Ɔpaee ɛpo mu de wɔn twaa mu,
na ɔmaa nsuo gyinaa sɛ ekuo.
14 Ɔde mununkum gyaa wɔn awia,
na anadwo nyinaa ɔde ogya kanea nso gyaa wɔn.
15 Ɔpaee abotan mu ɛserɛ so,
na ɔmaa wɔnom sɛ asukɛseɛ.
16Ɔmaa nsubɔntene firii ɔbotan mu bae,
na ɔmaa nsuo senee sɛ asutene.
17Nanso wɔkɔɔ so ara yɛɛ no bɔne,
tee ɔsorosoroni no anim atua anwea pradada so.
18 Na wɔsɔɔ Onyankopɔn hwɛe wɔn akoma mu,
bisaa no aduane sɛdeɛ wɔn kɔn dɔeɛ,
19na wɔkasa tiaa Onyankopɔn sɛ:
Onyankopɔn bɛtumi ato pono ɛserɛ so anaa?
20Hwɛ, ɔbɔɔ ɔbotan ma nsuo tui,
na asubɔnten senee;
paanoo nso, ɔbɛtumi ama,
na wapɛ nam ama ne man anaa?
21 Enti AWURADE teeɛ no, ne bo fui,
na ogya sɔɔ Yakob mu,
na abufuo nso sɔre tiaa Israel,
22ɛfiri sɛ wɔannye Onyankopɔn anni,
na wɔamfa wɔn ho anto ne nkwagyeɛ so.
23Nanso ɔhyɛɛ ewiem tɔnn ɔsoro,
na ɔhinii ɔsoro apono,
24 na ɔtɔɔ mana guu wɔn so sɛ wɔnni,
na ɔde ɔsoro aduane maa wɔn.
25Atumfoɔ aduane na onipa diiɛ,
ɔmaa wɔn aduane di mee.
26Ɔmaa apueeɛ mframa bɔe ɔsoro,
na ɔde ne tumi twee anafoɔ mframa bae,
27na ɔtɔɔ nam guu wɔn so sɛ mfuturo,
ne ntakraboa sɛ mpoano anwea.
28Na ɔmaa wɔtotɔɔ wɔn nsraban mu
de twaa wɔn tenabea ho hyiae.
29Na wɔdi mee boroo so,
ɛfiri sɛ ɔmaa wɔn wɔn akɔnnɔdeɛ.
30Wɔnnya nnyaee wɔn akɔnnɔ no,
wɔn aduane da so wɔ wɔn anomu no,
31 Nyankopɔn abufuo sɔre tiaa wɔn,
na ɔkunkumm wɔn mu abrane no mu bi,
na ɔde Israel mmeranteɛ hwehwee fam.
32Yei nyinaa mu na wɔkɔɔ so yɛɛ bɔne,
na wɔannye n’anwanwadeɛ no anni.
33 Enti ɔmaa wɔn nna yeraa sɛ ahuro,
ne wɔn mfeɛ ehu mu.
34Ɔreku wɔn no, na wɔhwehwɛɛ no,
na wɔsane bɛpɛɛ Nyankopɔn akyiri kwan ntɛm,
35na wɔkaee sɛ Onyankopɔn ne wɔn botan,
