na ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔn ne wɔn gyefoɔ.
36Wɔde wɔn ano dɛfɛdɛfɛɛ no,
na wɔde wɔn tɛkyerɛma dii atorɔ kyerɛɛ no,
37na wɔn akoma deɛ, ɛntim ne ho,
na wɔanni n’apam mu nokorɛ.
38Na ɔno deɛ, ɔyɛ ntimmɔborɔ nti,
ɔkataa wɔn amumuyɛ so,
na wansɛe nnipa;
na ɔtaa sianka n’abufuo,
na wanhwanyan n’awerɛhoɔ nyinaa.
39 Na ɔkaee sɛ wɔyɛ ɔhonam,
mframa a ɛkorɔ na ɛnsane n’akyiri bio.
40 Mprɛ ahe ara na wɔante n’anim atua ɛserɛ soɔ,
na wɔanho ne werɛ anwea pradada soɔ!
41Na wɔsane sɔɔ Onyankopɔn hwɛe,
na wɔyii Israel Kronkronni no ahi.
42Wɔankae ne tumi,
da a ɔyii wɔn firii ɔhohiahiafoɔ nsam,
43 na ɔyɛɛ ne nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ Misraim
ne n’anwanwadeɛ, Soan petee mu no.
44 Ɔdanee wɔn nsubɔntene mogya,
na wɔantumi annom wɔn nsuwansuwa.
45 Ɔsomaa ahuriiɛ bɛguu wɔn so maa wɔbɛwee wɔn,
ne mponkyerɛne maa wɔbɛsɛee wɔn.
46 Ɔde wɔn nnɔbaeɛ maa mmɛbɛ,
na ɔde wɔn adwumadeɛ maa ntutummɛ.
47 Ɔde asukɔtweaa sɛee wɔn bobe,
na ɔde nsukyenkyeneeɛ bɔɔ wɔn akyee nnua,
48na ɔyii wɔn afieboa maa asukɔtweaa,
ne wɔn mmoakuo maa asraman.
49Ɔtoo n’abufuo hyehyeɛ no guu wɔn so,
anibereɛ, ahi ne ahohia,
abɔfoɔ bɔne a ɔsomaa wɔn baa wɔn soɔ no.
50 Ɔbɔɔ kwan maa n’abufuo,
wankora wɔn kra amfiri owuo mu,
na ɔyii wɔn nkwa maa owuyadeɛ.
51 Na ɔkum Misraim mmakan nyinaa,
wɔn ahoɔden asefire, Ham ntomadan mu.
52 Na ɔgyaa ne man sɛ nnwan,
na ɔkaa wɔn sɛ mmoakuo, ɛserɛ so,
53 na ɔgyaa wɔn dwoodwoo kɔe na wɔansuro,
na wɔn atamfoɔ deɛ, ɛpo no kataa wɔn so.
54 Na ɔde wɔn baa ne kronkronbea hyeɛ so,
bepɔ a ne nsa nifa gyeeɛ no so.
55Ɔpampamm amanaman, wɔn anim,
na ɔtwee wɔn awunnyadeɛ so ntonto kyɛɛ no homa so,
na ɔmaa Israel mmusuakuo tenatenaa wɔn ntomadan mu.
56Nanso wɔsɔɔ ɔsorosoro Nyankopɔn hwɛe tee no atua,
na n’adansesɛm no, wɔanni so.
57 Na wɔwae twaa nkontompo sɛ wɔn agyanom,
wɔmanee sɛ tadua daadaafoɔ.
58 Wɔde wɔn sorɔnsorɔmmea huruu ne bo,
na wɔde wɔn ahoni maa no twee ninkunu.
59Onyankopɔn tee, na ne bo fui,
na Israel ho yɛɛ no nwunu koraa.
60 Na ɔgyaa Silo tenabea no,
ntomadan a ɔsii nnipa mu no.
61Ɔde n’ahoɔden hyɛɛ nnommumfa mu,
na ɔde n’animuonyam hyɛɛ ɔtamfoɔ nsa.
62Ɔgyaa ne man maa nkrantɛ,
na ne bo fuu n’agyapadeɛ.
63Ɔgya hyee wɔn mmeranteɛ,
na wɔn mmabaa nso, wɔanto wɔn ayeforɔ dwom.
64 Wɔn asɔfoɔ totɔɔ nkrantɛ ano,
na wɔn akunafoɔ annya asuyɛ.
65Na AWURADE nyanee sɛ obi a ɔfiri nna mu,
sɛ ɔkatakyie a nsa ma no huro,
66na ɔbobɔɔ n’atamfo maa wɔsanee wɔn akyi,
ɔbɔɔ wɔn daa adapaa.
67 Nso wampɛ Yosef ntomadan no,
na Efraim abusuakuo no, wamfa;
68 na mmom ɔfaa Yuda abusuakuo,
Sion bepɔ a wadɔ no no.
69Na ɔsii ne kronkronbea sɛ ɔsoro
sɛ asase a ɔde atim hɔ daa no.
70 Na ɔyii n’akoa Dawid,
na ɔfaa no firii nnwammuo mu.
71 Ɔmaa no firii nnwammereɛ a wɔma nufoɔ akyiridie bae,
sɛ ɔmmɛyɛne ne man Yakob
ne n’agyapadeɛ Israel.
72Na ɔyɛnee wɔn akoma mudie so,
na ɔde ne nsam nimdeɛ kyerɛɛ wɔn kwan.

Title: NNWOM 79
Content:
AWURADE gye wo man
Asaf dwom.
1Onyankopɔn, amanaman aba w’agyapadeɛ mu,
wɔagu w’asɔrefie kronkron ho fi,
wɔama Yerusalem ayɛ agoago.
2Wɔde wo nkoa amu
ama ewiem nnomaa adi,
wɔde w’ahotefoɔ nam ama asase so mmoa.
3Wɔahwie wɔn mogya agu sɛ nsuo
de atwa Yerusalem ho ahyia,
na deɛ ɔsie wɔn nni hɔ.
4 Yɛayɛ ahohora ama wɔn a wɔtete yɛn ho,
fɛdie ne ahiyie ama wɔn a wɔatwa yɛn ho ahyia.
5 Ɛnkɔsi da bɛn, AWURADE, na wo bo bɛfu daa,
na wo ninkuntwe adɛre sɛ ogya?
6 Hwie w’abufuo gu amanaman
a wɔnni woɔ
ne ahennie
a wɔmmɔ wo din no so,
7na wɔamene Yakob,
na wɔahye ne tenabea ase.
8Nkae akanefoɔ amumuyɛ mfa ngu yɛn so,
yɛ ntɛm ma w’ayamhyehyeɛ mmɛhyia yɛn,
na wɔabrɛ yɛn ase fɔmm.
9Di boa yɛn, yɛn nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn,
wo din animuonyam nti na yi yɛn,
na wo din nti kata yɛn bɔne so.
10 Adɛn nti na amanaman nka sɛ:
Wɔn Nyankopɔn wɔ he?
Ma wɔnhunu amanaman mu, yɛn anim,
sɛ wotɔ wo nkoa mogya a wɔka guiɛ no so were.
11 Ma ɔpokyerɛni apinisie nnuru w’anim,
sɛ wo nsa kɛseyɛ teɛ no, kora owuo mma.
12 Na ahohora a wɔn a wɔtete yɛn ho de abɔ wo, AWURADE, no,
dane no mprɛnson gu wɔn kokom.
13Na yɛn a yɛyɛ wo man ne w’adidibea nnwan no,
yɛbɛda wo ase daa,
yɛbɛka w’ayeyie akyerɛ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa.

Title: NNWOM 80
Content:
Israel foforɔyɛ
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no “Sonannim Edut” sankuo nne so. Asaf adansedie. Dwom.
1 Israel dwanhwɛfoɔ, yɛ aso,
wo a woka Yosef sɛ nnwankuo,
wo a wote Kerubim soɔ, pue hran.
2Efraim ne Benyamin ne Manase anim
na ma wo homene soɔ,
na bra bɛgye yɛn.
3 Onyankopɔn, ma yɛnsane mmra,
na ma w’anim nhyerɛn na yɛanya nkwa.
4AWURADE, asafo Nyankopɔn, wo bo bɛfu
atia wo man mpaebɔ akɔsi da bɛn?
5 Wode nisuo yɛɛ aduane maa wɔdii,
na wode nisuo maa wɔnomee.
6Wode yɛn yɛɛ ntɔkwa maa wɔn a wɔtete yɛn ho,
na yɛn atamfoɔ sereseree wɔ wɔn mu.
7 Asafo Nyankopɔn, ma yɛnsane mmra,
na ma w’anim nhyerɛn na yɛanya nkwa.
8 Wotuu obobe firii Misraim bae,
wotutuu amanaman na wobɛtɛe.
9Woyii n’anim kwan, na ɛgyee nhini,
na ɛyɛɛ asase ma.
10Ne nwunu kataa mmepɔ so,
na ne nhoma kataa Nyankopɔn tweneduro so.
11Ɛbaebaee ne mman mu kɔduruu ɛpo ho,
na n’abasa frɔmfrɔm kɔɔ asubɔnten no ho.
12 Adɛn nti na woabubu ne ban,
ma wɔn a wɔnam kwan soɔ nyinaa tete no yi?
13Kwaeɛm kɔkɔte sɛe no,
na petee mu mmoa we.
14Asafo Nyankopɔn, sane w’akyiri ɛ!
Brɛ w’ani ase firi soro hwɛ,
na bɛhwɛ obobe yi,
15na bɛwowa deɛ wo nifa tɛeɛ no,
ne ɔba a woafa no ayɛ wo deɛ no pintinn.
16Wɔde ogya ahye no, wɔatwitwa no,
w’anim ateatea nti wɔresɛe.
17Fa wo nsa kata wo nifa nipa no so,
onipa ba a woafa no ayɛ wo deɛ pintinn no so,
18na yɛrentwe mfiri wo nkyɛn.
Ma yɛnnya nkwa, na yɛmmɔ wo din.
19 AWURADE, asafo Nyankopɔn, ma yɛnsane mmra,
ma w’anim nhyerɛn na yɛanya nkwa.

Title: NNWOM 81
Content:
Nokorɛ afahyɛ
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no Gatfoɔ sankuo nne so. Asaf deɛ.
1Mommɔ ose mma Onyankopɔn, yɛn ahoɔden,
monhuro mma Yakob Nyankopɔn.
2Monto dwom na monyan mpintin,
mommɔ sanku dɛdɛ ne bɛnta.
3 Monhyɛne totorobɛnto ɔsrane foforɔ so,
ɔsrane korokumatwa mu, mma yɛn afahyɛ da.
4Na ɛne sɛnnahɔ ma Israel,
atorɔmudeɛ ma Yakob Nyankopɔn.
5Ɔde adi adanseɛ, Yosef mu,
ɛberɛ a ɔfirii adi faa Misraim asase soɔ,
metee obi a menni no kasa.
6Meyii ne mmatiri firii adesoa ase,
ne ne nsa firii kɛntɛn ho;
7 wofrɛɛ ahohia mu, na meyii wo wɔ mu,
mefiri aprannaa mu megyee wo so.
Mesɔɔ wo mehwɛɛ Meriba asuo ho.
8Me man, tie, na menni wo adanseɛ,
O Israel, sɛ wobɛtie me a!
9 Mma onyame nanani bi nntena wo mu,
na nsɔre onyame nanani biara.
10Me ara mene AWURADE wo Nyankopɔn
a meyii wo Misraim asase so mebaeɛ no,
trɛ wo anomu tɛtrɛɛ na menhyɛ no ma.
11Nanso me man antie me nne,
na Israel ampene me.
12 Na megyaa wɔn wɔn akoma denyɛ mu,
maa wɔnantee wɔn ara tirim agyina a wɔtuiɛ mu.
13Ao, sɛ me man tie me ɛ,
sɛ Israel nante m’akwan so ɛ!
14Anka ɛrenkyɛ na mabrɛ wɔn atamfoɔ ase,
na madane me nsa matia wɔn ahohiahiafoɔ.
15Anka AWURADE atamfoɔ bɛbrɛ wɔn ho ase ama no,
na wɔn berɛ akyɛre akɔsi daa.
16 Na ɔde ayuo mu ayuo pa bɛyɛne wɔn,
na mede abotan mu woɔ bɛma woamee.

Title: NNWOM 82
Content:
Israel atamfoɔ
Asaf dwom.
1 Onyankopɔn gyina Nyankopɔn asafo mu,
ɔbu atɛn anyame ntam.
2 Da bɛn na mobɛbu ntɛnkyea,
na moahwɛ abɔnefoɔ anim akɔsie?
3 Monni ɔbrɛfoɔ ne awisiaa asɛm,
monni asɛntenenee mma ɔmanehunufoɔ ne mmɔborɔni.
4Monnye ɔbrɛfoɔ ne ohiani,
monhwim wɔn mfiri abɔnefoɔ nsam.
5Wɔnnim de, na wɔnte aseɛ,
esum mu na wɔnante korɔ,
asase nnyinasoɔ nyinaa rewoso.
6 Me deɛ, maka sɛ: Moyɛ anyame,
na mo nyinaa yɛ ɔsorosoroni no mma,
7nanso mobɛwuwu sɛ nnipa pɛ,
na moatotɔ sɛ ahemfo mu biara.
8Ao! Onyankopɔn, sɔre ɛ, bu asase atɛn,
na wo na wobɛdi adeɛ, amanaman nyinaa mu.

Title: NNWOM 83
Content:
Israel atamfoɔ
Asaf dwom.
1Onyankopɔn, nyɛ komm,
mmua w’ano, na nhome, Onyankopɔn.
2Na hwɛ, w’atamfo yɛ gyegyeegye,
na wɔn a wɔkyiri woɔ ama wɔn tiri so.
3 Wo man tiri so na wɔrepam anyansapam,
na wɔkɔ wɔn a wɔahunta no tiri so agyina.
4Wɔka sɛ: Mommra mma yɛnku wɔn ase mfiri ɔman no mu,
na wɔankae Israel din bio.
5Na wɔde akoma korɔ tu agyina,
wo tiri so na wɔpam.
6Edom ntomadan ne Ismaelfoɔ,
Moab ne Hagarfoɔ,
7Gebal ne Amon ne Amalek,
Filistifoɔ asase ne wɔn a wɔte Tiro.
8Asiria nso de ne ho bataa wɔn ho,
wɔaboa Lot mma.
9 Yɛ wɔn sɛ Midian, sɛ Sisera,
sɛ Yabin, Kison subɔn mu.
10Wɔsɛee wɔ Endor,
na wɔyɛɛ sɛ nwira dodoɔ maa asase.
11 Yɛ wɔn ne wɔn adehyeɛ sɛ Oreb ne Seeb,
na yɛ wɔn ahemfo nyinaa sɛ Sebah ne Salmuna,
12 wɔn a wɔka sɛ:
Momma yɛmfa Nyankopɔn afie nni, no.
13Me Nyankopɔn, yɛ wɔn sɛ ahum a ɛdi kyinhyia,
sɛ mframa anim ntɛtɛ.
14Sɛ ogya a ɛhye kwaeɛ
na ogyaframa tafere mmepɔ ho no,
15saa ara na fa w’ahum taa wɔn,
na fa wo mframa denden no yi wɔn hu.
16AWURADE, ma wɔn ani nwu,
na wɔmmisa wo din akyiri kwan.
17Ma wɔn anim ngu ase na wɔmmɔ twi daa,
na wɔmmɔ adapaa na wɔnyera,
18 na wɔnhunu sɛ
wo a wo din de AWURADE no,
wo nko ara ne ɔsorosoroni, asase nyinaa so.

Title: NNWOM 84
Content:
Nyankopɔn fie ho anigyeɛ
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no Gatfoɔ sankuo nne so. Kora mma dwom.
1 Sɛdeɛ wo tenabea hɔnom si yɛ fɛ,
asafo AWURADE.
2 Me kra ani gyina, ɛtɔ piti mpo,
AWURADE adihɔ no nti,
m’akoma ne me honam di ahurisie
ma Onyankopɔn teasefoɔ.
3 Nso apatuprɛ anya ɛdan,
na asomfenakatakyi anya ebuo
a ɔbɛto ne mma agu mu,
ɛne w’afɔrebukyia no, asafo AWURADE,
me Hene ne me Nyankopɔn.
4 Nhyira ne wɔn a wɔte wo fie,
wɔbɛkɔ so ayi wo ayɛ.
5Nhyira ne onipa a n’ahoɔden wɔ wo mu,
na Sion atempɔn no wɔ n’akomam.
6Wɔtwam nisuo bɔn no mu a,
wɔdanedane no deɛ mmasuo wɔ,
bereamporɔsuo nso de nhyira pii kata so.
7Wɔnante firi ahoɔden mu kɔ ahoɔden mu
bɛpue Nyankopɔn anim, Sion.
8AWURADE, asafo Nyankopɔn, tie me mpaebɔ,
yɛ aso, Yakob Nyankopɔn!
9 Yɛn kyɛm, Onyankopɔn, hwɛ,
na hwɛ deɛ woasra no no anim.
10 Na wo fie dakorodie yɛ
sene nna apem.
Mepɛ me Nyankopɔn fie nammɔnnampan mu tena mmom
sene sɛ mɛtena abɔnefoɔ ntomadan mu.
11 Na owia ne kyɛm ne AWURADE Nyankopɔn.
AWURADE ma adom ne animuonyam,
ɔmfa papa nkame
wɔn a wɔnam tee no.
12Asafo AWURADE, nhyira ne onipa
a ɔde ne ho to wo soɔ.

Title: NNWOM 85
Content:
Adom ho adesrɛ
Wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ. Kora mma dwom.
1AWURADE, woadom w’asase,
wode Yakob agyapadeɛ asane aba,
2 wode wo man mfomsoɔ akyɛ,
woakata wɔn bɔne nyinaa so.
3Woatwe w’anibereɛ nyinaa,
woadane afiri w’abufuo hyehyeɛ no mu.
4Yɛn nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn, ma yɛnsane mmra,
na twa wo bo a ɛfu yɛn no to wo yam.
5 Wo werɛ bɛho atia yɛn akɔsi daa anaa?
Wobɛtwe w’abufuo mu akɔ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛdidi soɔ mu?
6Worensane mma yɛn nkwa,
na wo man ani nnye wo ho?
7AWURADE, ma yɛnhunu w’adɔeɛ,
na fa wo nkwagyeɛ ma yɛn.
8 Mɛtie deɛ Onyankopɔn AWURADE bɛka.
Ampa, ɔka asomdwoeɛsɛm kyerɛ ne man ne n’ahotefoɔ,
na mma wɔnnsane nnkɔ nkwaseadeɛ mu.
9Ampa ara, ne nkwagyeɛ bɛn wɔn a wɔsuro no,
na animuonyam atena yɛn asase so.
10Adom ne nokorɛ bɛhyia,
na tenenee ne asomdwoeɛ adi mfeano.
11Nokorɛ bɛfifiri asase so,
na tenenee afiri soro ahwɛ.
12Nso AWURADE bɛma papa,
na yɛn asase bɛma ne nnɔbaeɛ.
13Tenenee bɛdi n’anim,
na asi n’anammɔn kwan so.

Title: NNWOM 86
Content:
Ahohia kɛseɛ mu mpaebɔ
Dawid mpaebɔ.
1AWURADE, brɛ w’aso ase tie me,
na meyɛ mmɔborɔni ne ohiani.
2 Hwɛ me kra so, na meyɛ ɔhotefoɔ;
wo, me Nyankopɔn, gye w’abɔfra
a ɔde ne ho twere woɔ.
3 O AWURADE, hu me mmɔbɔ,
na wo na mesu mefrɛ wo da mu nyinaa.
4Ma w’akoa kra ani nnye,
na wo, AWURADE, na mema me kra so mema.
5 Na wo, AWURADE, woyɛ, na wode kyɛ,
na w’adɔeɛ dɔɔso ma wɔn a wɔfrɛ woɔ nyinaa.
6AWURADE, yɛ aso ma me mpaebɔ,
na tie me nkotosrɛ nne.
7 M’ahohia da mu mɛfrɛ wo,
na wobɛgye me so.
8 Obiara nte sɛ wo, anyame mu, AWURADE,
na biribiara nte sɛ wo nnwuma.
9Amanaman a woyɛeɛ nyinaa bɛba
abɛkoto w’anim, AWURADE,
na wɔabɛhyɛ wo din animuonyam.
10Na woyɛ kɛseɛ, na woyɛ anwanwadeɛ,
wo nkutoo ne Onyankopɔn.
11 AWURADE, kyerɛ me wo kwan,
mɛnante wo nokorɛ mu;
ka m’akoma bom ma no nsuro wo din.
12O AWURADE, me Nyankopɔn, mede m’akoma nyinaa bɛda wo ase,
na mahyɛ wo din animuonyam daa,
13sɛ w’adɔeɛ so wɔ me soɔ,
na woayi me kra afiri Asamando bunu mu.
14Onyankopɔn, ahantanfoɔ asɔre atia me,
na atirimuɔdenfoɔ asafo rehwehwɛ me kra,
na wɔamfa wo ansi wɔn ani so.
15 Na wo, AWURADE, woyɛ Onyankopɔn mmɔborɔhunufoɔ ne ɔdomfoɔ,
wo boasetɔ kyɛ, na w’adɔeɛ ne wo nokorɛ dɔɔso.
16 Dane w’ani kyerɛ me, na dom me,
fa w’ahoɔden ma w’akoa,
na gye w’afenaa ba nkwa.
17Yɛ me ho nsɛnkyerɛnneɛ ma no nsi me yie,
na m’atamfoɔ nhunu, na wɔn ani nwu,
sɛ wo, AWURADE, woaboa me akyekyere me werɛ.

Title: NNWOM 87
Content:
Nyankopɔn kuro mufoɔ
Kora mma dwom.
1AWURADE kuro a ɔkyekyereeɛ wɔ mmepɔ kronkron so.
2AWURADE dɔ Sion apono sene Yakob tenabea nyinaa.
3Wɔka wo ho animuonyamsɛm,
Nyankopɔn kuro.
4 Sɛ mebɔ Misraimfoɔ, Babelfoɔ, Filistifoɔ, Tirofoɔ ne Etiopiafoɔ
din wɔ wɔn a wɔni me mu mpo a,
yeinom wɔwoo wɔn hɔ ara.
5Na Sion ho deɛ, wɔbɛka sɛ:
Wɔwoo wɔn nyinaa mmaako mmaako wɔ ne mu,
na ɔno na ɔma n’ase tim, ɔsorosoroni no.
6Sɛ AWURADE twerɛ aman din a, ɔbɛka sɛ:
Oyi, wɔwoo no hɔnom.
7Na nnwontofoɔ ne asafoɔ bɛka sɛ:
Me mmasuo nyinaa wɔ wo mu.

Title: NNWOM 88
Content:
Sɔhwɛ kɛseɛ mu mpaebɔ
Kora mma dwom a wɔde ma dwonkyerɛfoɔ sɛ wɔnto no “Mahalat Leannot” sankuo nne so. Esrahini Heman nnweneho dwom.
1AWURADE, me nkwagyeɛ Nyankopɔn,
mesu mefrɛ, w’anim, awia ne anadwo,
2ma me mpaebɔ nnuru w’anim,
na brɛ w’aso ase ma me nteamu.
3Na nnebɔne afono me kra,
na me kra rebɛn Asamando.
4Wɔkane me fra wɔn a wɔkɔ Amena mu mu,
mayɛ sɛ ɔbarima a ɔnni mmoa biara.
5Wɔato me atwene awufoɔ mu
sɛ atɔfoɔ a wɔde wɔn agu ɛda mu
a wonkae wɔn bio,
na wɔatwa wɔn afiri wo nsam.
6Wode me ato Amena donkodonko mu,
esum mu, ebunu ase tɔnn.
7 W’abufuhyeɛ hyɛ me so,
na woma w’asorɔkyeɛ nyinaa gu me so.
8 Woayi m’amannifoɔ
afiri me nkyɛn kɔ akyirikyiri,
wode me ayɛ wɔn akyiwadeɛ,
woato me mu a meremfiri adie.
9Amaneɛ ama m’ani akusa,
mefrɛ wo, AWURADE, da mu nyinaa,
metrɛ me nsam mekyerɛ wo.
10 Wobɛyɛ anwanwadeɛ akyerɛ awufoɔ,
anaasɛ nsamanfoɔ bɛsɔre ayi wo ayɛ?
11Wɔbɛka w’adɔeɛ ɛda mu
anaa wo nokorɛdie ɔsɛeɛ amena mu?
12Wɔbɛhunu w’anwanwadeɛ, esum mu,
ne wo tenenee awerɛfire asase so?
13Na me deɛ, wo, AWURADE, na mesu mefrɛ,
na me mpaebɔ tua wo nhema.
14AWURADE, adɛn na woto me kra twene,
adɛn nti na wode w’anim hunta me?
15Meyɛ mmɔborɔni, na mereyɛ mawu firi me mmɔfraase,
wo ho hu akuta me, na metɔ ntintan.
16W’abufuo abu afa me so,
wo ho hu atware me;
17atwa me ho ahyia te sɛ nsuo da mu nyinaa,
ɛbom twa me ho kanko.
18 Woayi ɔdɔfo ne adamfo afiri me nkyɛn kɔ akyirikyiri,
na me manni kɔ sum mu.

Title: NNWOM 89
Content:
Mpaeɛ a wɔbɔ ma Dawid fie
Esrahini Etan nnweneho dwom.
1Mɛto AWURADE adɔeɛ ho dwom daa,
mede m’ano bɛka wo nokorɛdie makyerɛ awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛdidi soɔ;
2na mɛka sɛ: Adɔeɛ bɛsi so daa,
ɔsoro hɔ na wode nokorɛdie atintim.
3 Me ne deɛ mayi no no apam apam bi,
maka ntam makyerɛ m’akoa Dawid:
4Mɛma w’asefoɔ atim akɔsi daa,
na mama w’ahennwa asi so akɔduru awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ a ɛdidi soɔ so.
5Na ɔsoro yi wo, AWURADE, anwanwadeɛ ayɛ,
ne wo nokorɛ nso wɔ akronkronfoɔ asafo mu.
6 Na hwan na ɔwɔ wiem a wɔde no bɛto AWURADE ho,
hwan na ɔsɛ AWURADE, anyame mma mu?
7Onyankopɔn a ne ho yɛ hu, akronkronfoɔ dwabɔ kɛseɛ no mu,
na wɔsuro no sene wɔn a wɔatwa ne ho ahyia nyinaa.
8 AWURADE, asafo Nyankopɔn,
hwan na ɔte sɛ woɔ?
Otumfoɔ AWURADE, wo nokorɛdie atwa wo ho ahyia.
9 Wo na wodi ɛpo mfumpaabuo soɔ,
sɛ n’asorɔkyeɛ sɔre a, wo na wodwodwo ano.
10 Wo na woabubu Rahab pasaa sɛ ɔtɔfoɔ,
wode wo tumi nsa abɔ w’atamfo apansam.
11 Ɔsoro wɔ wo, asase nso wɔ wo;
wiase ne ne mayɛ, wo na wohyɛɛ aseɛ.
12Atifi fam ne anafoɔ fam, wo ara na wobɔeɛ,
Tabor ne Hermon di wo din mu ahurisie.
13Tumi basa ne mmarimayɛ wɔ wo,
wo nsa yɛ den, wɔama wo nifa so.
14 Tenenee ne atemmuo ne w’ahennwa nnyinasoɔ,
adɔeɛ ne nokorɛ gyina w’anim.
15Nhyira ne ɔman a wɔnim osebɔ
na wɔnante wo, AWURADE, anim hann mu.
16Wo din mu na wɔn ho bɛsɛpɛ wɔn daa nyinaa,
na wo tenenee mu na wɔama wɔn soɔ.
17Na wɔn ahoɔden ahyehyɛdeɛ ne wo,
na w’adom mu na wɔama yɛn abɛn soɔ.
18 Na AWURADE na yɛn kyɛm wɔ no,
na Israel Kronkronni no na yɛn hene wɔ no.
19 Da bi wokasaa anisoadehunu mu
kyerɛɛ w’ahotefoɔ sɛ:
Madi maboa ɔbarima bi,
mama obi a wɔayi no firi ɔman no mu so.
20 Mahunu m’akoa Dawid,
mede me ngo kronkron masra no.
21Ɔno na me nsa bɛma no atim,
na me basa nso ahyɛ no den.
22Ɔtamfoɔ bi rensisi no,
na obusuyɛfoɔ bi renhyɛ no so.
23Na mɛbubu n’anim ahohiahiafoɔ,
na mabobɔ wɔn a wɔtane no.
24 Na me nokorɛdie ne m’adɔeɛ ne no bɛtena,
na me din mu na wɔbɛma n’abɛn soɔ.
25 Na mede ne nsa bɛsi po mu,
na mede ne nifa masi nsubɔntene so.
26 Ɔno deɛ, ɔbɛfrɛ me sɛ: Wone m’agya,
me Nyankopɔn ne me nkwagyeɛ botan!
27Na me nso mede no bɛyɛ m’abakan,
asase so ahemfo mu pumpuni.
28 Mɛkora m’adɔeɛ mama no daa,
na m’apam atim hɔ ama no.
29Mɛma n’asefoɔ atena hɔ daa,
ne n’ahennwa sɛ ɔsoro nna.
30Sɛ ne mma gya me mmara
na wɔnnante m’atemmudeɛ mu,
31sɛ wɔgu m’ahyɛdeɛ ho fi
na wɔnni me mmaransɛm so a,
32ɛno deɛ mede abaa bɛba abɛtwe wɔn aso, wɔn mmarato ho,
na mede ɔhaw ahodoɔ mabɛtwe wɔn aso, wɔn amumuyɛ ho.
33Na m’adɔeɛ deɛ, merenyi memfiri ne ho,
na merenyɛ me nokorɛdie no ho nsakyirinsayam.
34Merengu m’apam ho fi,
na merensakyera deɛ afiri m’anomu no.
35Maka me kronkronyɛ ho ntam baako,
merenni Dawid hwammɔ.
36 N’asefoɔ bɛtena hɔ daa,
na n’adwa ayɛ m’anim sɛ owia.
37 Ɛbɛtim hɔ sɛ ɔsrane daa,
sɛ ɔdanseni nokwafoɔ a ɔwɔ wiem.
38 Na wo ara deɛ, woato atwene na ayɛ wo nwunu,
na woafa deɛ woasra no no abufuo.
39Woapo w’akoa apam,
woagu n’abotire ho fi de ato fam.
40Woadwiri ne ban nyinaa agu,
woama n’aban akɛseɛ ayɛ agoago.
41 Wɔn a wɔtwam ɔkwan no soɔ nyinaa fom no fa,
wayɛ ahohora ama wɔn a wɔtete ne ho.
42Woama n’ahohiahiafoɔ nifa so,
woama n’atamfo nyinaa ani agye.
43Aane, woadane n’afena ano nso,
na woamma no annyina ɔsa mu.
44Woama n’animuonyam apa,
na woato n’adwa atwene fam.
45Woatwa ne mmeranteberɛ nna so,
wode aniwuo abum ne so.
46 Ɛnkɔsi da bɛn, AWURADE, na wode wo ho bɛhunta daa
ama w’abufuo adɛre sɛ ogya?
47 Kae me nna tiaa a ɛyɛ:
Ade hunu yi ara nti na wobɔɔ nnipa mma nyinaa?
48Ɔdasani bɛn na ɔte ase a ɔrenhunu owuo,
na ɔbɛyi ne kra afiri Asamando nsam?
49 Ɛhe na wo kane adɔeɛ no wɔ, AWURADE,
deɛ wokaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ Dawid, wo nokorɛ mu no?
50AWURADE, kae wo nkoa ahohora
a ɛfiri aman dodoɔ no nyinaa mu a ɛda me koko soɔ.
51AWURADE, w’atamfo bɔ ahohora,
wɔbɔ deɛ woasra no no anammɔn ahohora!
52 Nhyira nka AWURADE daa.
Amen ne Amen.

Title: NNWOM 90
Content:
NWOMA A ƐTƆ SO NNAN
(Nnwom 90—106)
Daa Nyankopɔn ne yɛn dwanekɔbea
Nyankopɔn nipa Mose mpaebɔ.
1AWURADE, wo na woayɛ yɛn dwanekɔbea,
awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ nyinaa mu.
2Wo deɛ, wɔnnya mmɔɔ mmepɔ
na wonnya nyii asase ne wiase adie no,
na wofiri tete akyirikyiri kɔsi daakye akyirikyiri yɛ Onyankopɔn.
3 Woma ɔdasani dane mfuturo, na wose:
Onipa mma, monsane mmra mo mfuturo mu.
4 Na mfirinhyia apem yɛ w’ani so
sɛ nnora da a ɛtwaa mu
ne anadwo mu dasuo.
5 Woma wɔsene kɔ sɛ susuansuo,
wɔte sɛ daeɛ, anɔpa wɔfefɛ sɛ wira,
6anɔpa ɛyɛ frɔmfrɔm, na ɛfefɛ,
anwummerɛ wɔtwa, na atwintwam.
7Na yɛresa w’abufuo mu,
na yɛahye w’abufuhyeɛ no ano.
8Wode yɛn amumuyɛ asi w’anim,
wode yɛn kokoam bɔne aba w’anim hann no mu.
9Na yɛn nna nyinaa atwam kɔ w’abufuo mu,
yɛahwere yɛn mfeɛ sɛ asomusɛm bi.
10 Yɛn mfirinhyiam nna, emu wɔ mfeɛ aduɔson,
na sɛ ɛboro so a, na ɛreduru aduɔwɔtwe,
na emu ahohoahoadeɛ yɛ ɔbrɛ ne ahuhudeɛ,
na ɛtwaa mu ntɛmso, na yɛtu kɔe.
11Hwan na ɔhunu w’abufuo ano den a ɛyɛ,
ne w’anibereɛ, sɛ wo ho suro teɛ?
12 Ma yɛnhunu yɛn nna kan sɛdeɛ ɛteɛ,
na yɛanya nyansa akoma.
13AWURADE, sane w’akyi, da bɛn ara?
Na ma wo nkoa nyɛ wo mmɔbɔ.
14Fa w’adɔeɛ ma yɛmmee nhema,
na yɛadi ahurisie, na yɛn ani agye yɛn nna nyinaa mu.
15Ma yɛn ho nsane yɛn, sɛ nna a wobrɛɛ yɛn ase wɔ mu
ne mfeɛ a yɛhunuu mu bɔne no.
16Ma w’adwuma nna adi mma wo nkoa,
na w’animuonyam nna adi, wɔn mma so.
17Na AWURADE yɛn Nyankopɔn animteɛ mmra yɛn so,
na yɛn nsa ano adwuma no, ma no nyɛ yie mma yɛn,
aane, yɛn nsa ano adwuma ma no nyɛ yie.

Title: NNWOM 91
Content:
Ɔsorosoroni no huntabea
1Deɛ ɔte ɔsorosoroni no huntabea, mekyerɛ
deɛ ɔtena Otumfoɔ no nwunu ase no
2 bɛse AWURADE sɛ: Me dwanekɔbea ne m’abankɛseɛ,
me Nyankopɔn a mede me ho meto wo soɔ.
3 Ampa ara, ɔno na ɔbɛgye wo afiri ofirisumfoɔ fidie mu
ne owuyadeɛ sɛeɛ mu.
4Ɔde ne ntakra bɛkata wo so,
na ne ntaban ase na wobɛkɔ akɔhyɛ,
ɔkyɛm ne nkataboɔ ne ne nokorɛ.
5Worensuro anadwo bumbɔ,
bɛmma a ɛtu nam awia,
6ɔyaredɔm a ɛnenam sum mu,
nsane yadeɛ a ɛsɛe ade awia ketee.
7Apem totɔ wo nkyɛn
na ɔpedu totɔ wo nifa a,
wo deɛ, ɛrenka wo.
8 W’ani nko na wode bɛhwɛ,
na woahunu abɔnefoɔ akatua.
9Na wo, AWURADE, ne me dwanekɔbea,
aane, ɔsorosoroni no na wode no ayɛ wo tenabea.
10Bɔne renka wo,
na ɔhaw remmɛn wo ntomadan.
11 Na wahyɛ n’abɔfoɔ ama wo,
sɛ wɔnhwɛ wo so, w’akwan nyinaa mu.
12Wɔbɛsoa wo wɔn nsam,
na wo nan ampem ɔboɔ.
13 Wobɛnante gyata ne ahuritia so,
wobɛtiatia gyataburuwa ne ɔtweaseɛ so.
14Na sɛ ɔfam me ho yi, mɛgye no,
mɛma no so, ɛfiri sɛ ɔnim me din.
15Ɔsu frɛ me, na mɛgye no so,
me ne no bɛtena ahohia mu,
mɛyi no na mahyɛ no animuonyam.
16Mɛma no adi nkwa tentene amee,
na mama no ahunu me nkwagyeɛ.

Title: NNWOM 92
Content:
Nyankopɔn tenenee nnisoɔ ho ayeyie
Dwom a wɔto no homeda.
1 Ɛyɛ sɛ wɔda AWURADE ase
na wɔto dwom ma wo din, ɔsorosoroni,
2sɛ wɔka w’adɔeɛ anɔpa
ne wo nokorɛdie anadwo,
3 sankuhan du ne bɛnta so,
sankuo ho adwempa dwom mu.
4Na wo, AWURADE, woma m’ani gye wo nneyɛɛ ho,
wo nsa ano nnwuma ho na mɛdi ahurisie.
5 AWURADE, sɛdeɛ wo nnwuma si soso fa,
w’adwene mu dɔ pii.
6Ogyimifoɔ nnim,
na ɔkwasea nhunu yei mu.
7 Abɔnefoɔ fifiri sɛ ɛfan
na amumuyɛfoɔ nyinaa si so sɛ nhwiren a,
ɛne sɛ wɔbɛsɛe wɔn korakora.
8 Nanso wo AWURADE deɛ, wo korɔn daa.
9Na hwɛ, w’atamfo no, Ao AWURADE,
w’atamfo no deɛ, wɔbɛsɛe,
na wɔbɛhwete amumuyɛfoɔ nyinaa mu.
10 Na woma m’abɛn so sɛ okoo deɛ,
wode ngo foforɔ gu me so.
11 Na m’ani hunu deɛ mepɛ m’atɛfoɔ so,
na m’aso te deɛ ɛyɛ me dɛ, abɔnefoɔ a wɔsɔre tia me no ho.
12 Ɔteneneeni bɛfefɛ sɛ abɛ,
ɔbɛnyini sɛ Lebanon so tweneduro.
13 Wɔn a wɔatɛ wɔn AWURADE fie no
bɛfefɛ yɛn Nyankopɔn abannwa so.
14 Wɔbɛkɔ so aso aba nkɔkoraaberɛ,
wɔbɛyɛ akɛseɛ ne frɔmfrɔm ara
15 de akyerɛ sɛ AWURADE tene,
ɔne me botan, na deɛ ɛntene biara nni ne mu.

Title: NNWOM 93
Content:
Daa hene
1 AWURADE di hene, ɔde animuonyam ahyehyɛ ne ho.
AWURADE ahyehyɛ ne ho, ɔde ahoɔden akyekyere ne ho,
na wiase tim hɔ a ɛrenhinhim.
2W’adwa tim hɔ firi tete,
wowɔ hɔ firi daa.
3Asutene ama so, AWURADE,
asutene ama wɔn nne so,
asutene ma wɔn huuyɛ so.
4Deɛ ɔsene nsukɛseɛ nne, nsuo a ɛwɔ tumi,
ɛpo mu asorɔkyeɛ nne,
ɔne ɔsoro hɔ tumfoɔ AWURADE.
5 W’adansesɛm yɛ nokorɛ pii;
kronkronyɛ na ɛfata wo fie,
AWURADE, nnasanten nyinaa.

Title: NNWOM 94
Content:
Onyankopɔn yɛ ɔweretɔfoɔ
1 Aweretɔ Nyankopɔn, AWURADE,
aweretɔ Nyankopɔn, pue.
2 Asase temmufoɔ, ma wo ho so,
tua ahokyerɛfoɔ ka.
3AWURADE, ɛnkɔsi da bɛn na abɔnefoɔ,
ɛnkɔsi da bɛn na abɔnefoɔ nni ahurisie?
4Wɔka asɛmdenden,
amumuyɛfoɔ nyinaa di ahantansɛm.
5Wo man deɛ, AWURADE, wɔrebɔ no pasaa,
na wɔbrɛ w’agyapadeɛ ase.
6Wɔkum okunafoɔ ne ɔhɔhoɔ,
na wɔdi nwisiaa awu;
7 na wɔka sɛ: AWURADE renhunu,
na Yakob Nyankopɔn remmu.
8 Ɔman mu agyimifoɔ, monte aseɛ,
na mo, nkwasea, da bɛn na mobɛhunu de?
9 Deɛ ɔtɛ aso no, ɔrente asɛm,
anaa deɛ ɔnwonoo ani no, ɔrenhunu adeɛ?
10Deɛ ɔtwe amanaman aso no, ɔrentenetene,
deɛ ɔkyerɛ nnipa nimdeɛ no, ɔno ɛ?
11 AWURADE hunu nnipa adwene sɛ ɛyɛ ahuhudeɛ.
12 Nhyira ne onipa a wo, AWURADE, wotwe n’aso,
na wofiri wo mmara no mu kyerɛkyerɛ no,
13 sɛ wobɛma no nna bɔne ho abodamu
akɔsi sɛ wobɛfunu amena ama ɔbɔnefoɔ.
14Na AWURADE rento ne man ntwene,
na ɔrennya n’agyapadeɛ,
15na atemmuo bɛsane akɔ tenenee mu,
na akoma mu teefoɔ nyinaa bɛdi akyire.
16Hwan na ɔbɛsɔre ne nnebɔneyɛfoɔ adi asie ama me?
Hwan na ɔbɛgyina ne amumuyɛfoɔ adi asie ama me?
17 Sɛ ɛnyɛ AWURADE na ɔyɛ me boafoɔ a,
anka aka kumaa na me kra akɔtena kommyɛ mu.
18Sɛ mese me nan rewatiri a,
wo, AWURADE, w’adɔeɛ na ɛwowa me.
19 Me mu dadwene dɔɔso a,
w’awerɛkyekyerɛ gye me kra ani.
20Amammɔeɛ adwa a ɛnam mmara so bɔ mmusuo no
ne wo bɛfa yɔnkoɔ anaa?
21Wɔbɔ ɔteneneeni kra so kyenku,
na wɔbu mogya a ɛdi bem fɔ.
22Nanso AWURADE ayɛ me abankɛseɛ,
na me Nyankopɔn ayɛ me dwanekɔbea botan.
23Na ɔde wɔn mmusuo abua wɔn atifi,
na wɔn bɔne nti ɔbɛyi wɔn hɔ.
AWURADE, aane, yɛn Nyankopɔn bɛyi wɔn hɔ.

Title: NNWOM 95
Content:
Momma yɛnsɔre AWURADE
1Mommra mma yɛnto anigyeɛ dwom mma AWURADE,
momma yɛmmɔ ose mma yɛn nkwagyeɛ botan.
2Momma yɛmfa aseda mmra n’anim,
na yɛmfa nnwom nni ahurisie mma no.
3 Na AWURADE yɛ Onyankopɔn kɛseɛ
ne ɔhenkɛseɛ, anyame nyinaa so.
4Ne nsam na asase mu ahuntadeɛ wɔ,
na mmepɔ so srɔnsrɔn nso wɔ no.
5Ɔno na ɛpo wɔ no, na ɔno na ɔyɛeɛ,
na asase pɛsɛɛ nso, ne nsa na ɛnwonoeɛ.
6Mommra mma yɛmmutu nkoto nsɔre
AWURADE, yɛn yɛfoɔ anim.
7 Na ɔno ne yɛn Nyankopɔn,
na yɛn deɛ, yɛyɛ n’adidibea nkurɔfoɔ
ne ne nsam nnwan.
Ɛnnɛ mote ne nne no ɛ!
8Monnyɛ mo akoma denden sɛ Meriba,
sɛ Masa da no, ɛserɛ so hɔ,
9 berɛ a mo agyanom gyegyee m’ano,
na wɔsɔɔ me hwɛeɛ no, nanso na wɔanya me nnwuma nhunui.
10Mfeɛ aduanan na awoɔ ntoatoasoɔ no ho yɛɛ me ahi,
na mekaa sɛ: Ɔman a wɔfom akoma mu ne wɔn.
Na wɔn deɛ, wɔanhunu m’akwan.
11 Na ɛmaa mekaa m’abufuo mu ntam,
sɛ wɔrennuru me home mu.

Title: NNWOM 96
Content:
Asase nyinaa so wura no ayeyie
(1 Berɛsosɛm 16.23-33)
1 Monto dwom foforɔ mma AWURADE,
asase nyinaa, monto dwom mma AWURADE.
2Monto dwom mma AWURADE, monhyira ne din,
monka ne nkwagyeɛ mfiri da nkɔ da mu.
3Monka n’animuonyam, amanaman mu,
n’anwanwadeɛ, aman nyinaa mu.
4Na AWURADE yɛ kɛseɛ, na ɔsɛ ayeyie sɛ,
ne ho yɛ hu, anyame nyinaa so,
5na aman anyame nyinaa yɛ abosonhuhuo,
na AWURADE mmom na ɔyɛɛ ɔsoro.
6Ɔhran ne animuonyam wɔ n’anim,
tumi ne ahoɔfɛ wɔ ne kronkronbea hɔ.
7Aman mmusuakuo, momfa mma AWURADE,
momfa animuonyam ne tumi mma AWURADE.
8 Momfa AWURADE din animuonyam mma no,
monsoa ayɛyɛdeɛ mmra n’abannwa so.
9Monsɔre AWURADE, ahokeka kronkron mu,
asase nyinaa, mo ho mpopo n’anim.
10 Monka amanaman mu sɛ, AWURADE di hene,
na wiase tim hɔ a ɛrenhinhim,
na ɔbɛdi aman so, tenenee mu.
11 Ma ɔsoro ani nnye na asase ho nsane no,
ma ɛpo ne ne mayɛ nworo.
12Ma petee mu ne deɛ ɛwom nyinaa nni ahurisie,
ɛno na kwaeɛ mu nnua nyinaa bɛto anigyeɛ nnwom,
13 wɔ AWURADE anim, na ɔreba,
na ɔreba abɛbu asase atɛn.
Ɔrebɛbu wiase atɛn tenenee mu,
ne aman wɔ ne nokorɛ mu.
